Summary: Restaurant and Bar staff are friendly and accommodating.  Someone needs to check the a/c in the hallways.  Navigating from parking to your room couldn't be more convoluted if they tried.  Plus daily parking rate is very high
Manager Response: Dear Kevina,  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I apologize for not explaining our parking in a more detailed manner.  I will most definitely retrain my team to ensure that this does not recur.    Safe travels,  Rob

Summary Heading: Great Hotel, sub par room service.
Summary: The hotel was clean and nice. The conference rooms were very nice. I was extremely disappointed with the room service food quality.  The $28 short ribs were covered in a sauce that tasted like ketchup and BBQ sauce. Consider dining out.
Manager Response: Dear Michael,  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.   I apologize for not exceeding your expectations with our short rib.  I will speak to the chef and  take counter measures to prevent this issue from recurring.    Again thank you for your comments.  Travel safe,  Rob

Summary: I enjoyed my stay at this Hilton location.  I would definitely return to this location if I'm ever in the area and in need of a place to stay.  Some of the local places within walking distance were entertaining.  Overall, I had a wonderful experience with staff and everything this Hilton location and Costa Mesa had to offer.
Manager Response: Dear Anthony,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa. I am glad that you loved our property. Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: We used our points for two rooms for 4 nights to beach it in Newport, Laguna and Huntington. The manager Rob runs a tight ship and was personally very nice on the phone. The pool and jacuzzi are spotless. It is a great location.  I ubered over to the Southcoast Plaza (they have a free shuttle also) Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Taylor,  Thank you for your kind and gracious comments.  I truly appreciate it.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: The pool is great and opens early in the morning but the rooms are just okay, parking is 35.00 a day plus tip and there are sneaky charges applied a departure. If it was cheaper I would return. The Hilton in Moab is awesome so I thought this one would be good but I was very disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear 205kaitlind,  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I apologize for not exceeding your expectation with our parking charges , but am glad that we made it right prior to your departure.    Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Our company had a launch event at this hotel and it was absolutely amazing!   The facility was perfect.  The staff took great care of us.  The room we rented was first rate.   We were there for a 3-day weekend event and we were wonderfully overwhelmed at how great our people were serviced. It was a very memorable event and this hotel was KEY in making that happen.
Manager Response: Dear Kelli,  Thank you for your four star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I truly appreciated that you acknowledged my teams hard work in keeping the hotel clean and well maintained while delivering exceptional guest service.  Please come back soon,  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: This is my first time here and hopefully not my last.  Staff very pleasant and helpful, front desk manager reached out to me before my arrival, executive club very nice and well stocked.  Loved the modern bathroom/shower, so nice to see something other than ceramic tile.  Room very well appointed and cooling system worked well. Loved the solid wood doors, even on the closet, a rarity.  A couple of minor maintenance issues that were quickly taken care of.  Great pool.  Very inviting lobby.  Public areas were kept uncomfortably warm for a northerner.  The elevator banks on floor seven were stifling at times and lobby surprisingly warm as most are too cool.  Shuttle to mall and airport.
Manager Response: Dear Fcrane25,  Thank you for your four star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad that we exceeded your expectations and that you enjoyed our amenities.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: I "bunked" with a business associate who paid for the room, and she didn't take the time (so I will) to complain about: (1) the INCREDIBLY LOUD bumping, grinding sound that seemed to be coming from some large element of the plumbing vibrating in the walls at least 3-4 times during the night, and (2) the fact that the TV didn't work. Otherwise, this was a decent hotel with a lively bar, comfortable beds, clean room, great shower.
Manager Response: Dear Magpie63,  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I apologize for the noise and the TV malfunction.  I am glad we were able to make it right and that your enjoyed your guest room.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: too many extra fees for ho hum hotel make this a bad deal
Summary: This place has hefty extra charges in a ho hum hotel that is dated. Don't be fooled by their teaser rates. Valet parking is 33.00 and self-parking is 25.00. They also charge you a hefty fee to use the internet. So add on $40-$50 to whatever rate you are being quoted. This is crazily high. I have stayed at all the decent hotels around here and this is the highest parking charge. There is no good reason for it except they want to rip you off and have an automatic moneymaker. I hate it when fees are concealed like this and when it is blatantly a rip off attempt. The closest good thing to this hotel is The Camp and no one is parking here to go to that. It's also pretty blah for a Hilton and hasn't been updated in a long time. No one wants you to have a great stay here. They just
Manager Response: Dear Frank,  Thank you for your feedback.  I apologize that you were surprised by our parking fees. We have checked the other hotels in the market and feel we are priced in the middle.   We do offer free internet and am glad you liked the camp and that we had an opportunity to make it right before you checked out.    Safe travels,  Rob

Summary Heading: Many Issues for a Nice Hotel
Summary: I recently stayed one night on a business trip.  Here are the things I had a problem with:  -Valet parking is $38 and self parking is $30. Really? Are we in New York City?  I-I am on an expense account and really wanted a steak at the bar. However the only steak was $48.  A good way to lose a client. I heard from the customer sitting next to me that there was a great strip steak for a reasonable price that had just been removed from the menu. The menu was very limited for a large hotel.  -An upscale property should have a clock that works.  -Room service in the morning was served in a paper bag with plastic utensils. I had to look on the phone to see if I was in a Motel 6.  -The TV had a sporadic connection. It worked 50 percent of the time I was there. The screen said " no
Manager Response: Dear Kathy,  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa mesa.  I apologize for not meeting your expectation, but am glad we had an opportunity to make it right before you checked out.  Safe travels,  Rob

Summary: We stayed for five nights at the Costa Mesa Hilton and we would definitely stay again if our summer vacation is in the area again.  It is close to everything and the hotel staff is so friendly and everything is really just perfect.
Manager Response: Dear Eric,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad that you loved our property.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: My stay at the Hilton in Orange/Costa Mesa was amazing.  The staff is awesom.  They accommodate your every need.  Beds are comfy. Rooms are spacious.  Anything I needed was met with kindness and respect.  Super impressed with my stay there. I will be back!!
Manager Response: Dear Stephanie,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad that you loved our property.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Great location and friendly staff! Hotel offers a great layout as well. Walk to restaurants. Pool is nice! We booked park and eat package, breakfast was good and special orders were made upon request.
Manager Response: Dear jeff,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad that you loved my team and amenities.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Not the Hilton I am used to any more.
Summary: Hilton has been a disappointment, lately. The breakfast was low quality, the room was not up to par with a full service hotel standard, poor pillows, TV with poor selection and not working properly, carpets were dirty, bathroom floor not clean enough, the room was bare with low quality amenities, and check in was not very good. We were told we had to wait until 4 PM to get into our room when another agent told us there was a room ready. Hilton service standards are becoming very low.
Manager Response: Dear Nicholas,  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.   I apologize for not meeting your expectations and I am glad that we were able to make it right before you departed.  Safe travels,  Rob

Summary: $25 to self park was very expensive.  No free coffee, no breakfast, very basic rooms.  Would not stay here again - the low teaser rate is a fake out, because if you stay somewhere else with parking and breakfast it would save $35-40/person daily
Manager Response: Dear Scott,  Thank you for your post and for selecting the Hilton Costa mesa.   I apologize that our parking and breakfast cost surprised you.  I will check pricing at our competitive set to ensure its not too high.  Again,  I appreciate the feedback.  Rob

Summary: Wonderful stay at the Hilton!  Rather last minute stay-cation booking that was relaxing and in the best accommodations I could have asked for. I enjoyed the Executive Floor with the Reception and Breakfast. There was also a jacuzzi in the room and the outside pool was lovely!
Manager Response: Dear Lisaann,  Thank you for your five star review and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa for your stay-cation getaway.  I am glad that you loved your room and enjoyed the pool and executive floor.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: I live in Torrance-not too far, but brought my kids here to enjoy a night in a hotel with a pool and lots of TV channels for a little summer treat.  The hotel was beautiful, the staff friendly, and the pool was AWESOME!  They had the BEST time.  We had stayed at a less desirable hotel (won't name names) the night before closer to the beach, but this place was first class.  Comfortable, excellent service...I'd definitely stay here again.  (For those of you who don't know, there is a parking fee. Pretty standard for nice hotels but I'd forgotten about factoring that into the cost.)
Manager Response: Dear Turferg,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa for you summer getaway.  I am glad that you loved our property and that my team exceeded your expectations.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Probably a great hotel a couple decades ago.
Summary: This hotel was dated, dingy and musty. Hilton should remodel to replace old beat up rooms and upgrade the air conditioning to keep the air fresh. The staff also seemed in need of an upgrade. Many seemed bothered with having to help guests.
Manager Response: Dear 574Kenf,  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I apologize for the disconnect as we generally get outstanding reviews.  I am glad that we had an opportunity to make it right.  Safe travels,  Rob

Summary Heading: Bad wifi - Won't stay here again
Summary: Came here with my wife for her business conference. I was planning to do some work while she was in her conference but that didn't go well as the hotel wifi from the room was unusable. The signal was so bad, it kept dropping the wifi connection. I talked to the front desk soon after we checked in and he said he'd reboot the equipment.  When we returned for dinner, it wasn't any better so I talked to the front desk again and the man said he'd notify his supervisor and engineering and someone would be contacting me.  They never did. I ended up having to go sit in the lobby for a reliable connection.  My wife had a separate wifi for the conference as the hotel wifi wasn't available in the conference rooms. She said half the rooms you couldn't get on (dead spots) which impacted the
Manager Response: Dear Keith,  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I apologize for the WIFI outage and for the cleanliness issue that you experienced.  I am glad my team had an opportunity to make it right before your checked out.  Safe travels,  Rob

Summary: Everything was good except for the air conditioning in the room. It wasn't cold at all. Literally slept with no blanket and sweated the whole night. I would go back if the rooms were colder and it didn't sound like a fish tank was in the room
Manager Response: Dear Lopez327,  Thank you for your four star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I apologize for the Air Conditioning issue that you experienced.  I am glad that my team had an opportunity to make it right with you.  Safe travels,  Rob

Summary: Great hotel, this was our second visit, the staff was very helpful. We enjoyed the restaurant delicious food which was consistent through our visit. The staff of house cleaning are the best they were very  accommodating with our needs.
Manager Response: Dear Rosemarie,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad that you loved our housekeeping team.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Great hotel.  One of the best Hiltons I have stayed at. Looking for a reason to go back. Beautiful hotel and the best customer service from the Reservation desk to the bell hop to the Valet Manager. Back to work Monday morning and have told everyone if you are ever in the OC area you have to stay at this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Maggiea,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa.  I really appreciate your comments.  Please come back soon.   Warm regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Great hotel close to the airport!
Summary: We stayed here when we flew to Mexico (drove up from San Diego since Southwest flew nonstop to Puerto Vallarta).  We did a parking special that they had so we stayed there the night before we left, left our car there for the week and came back and stayed the night again before we headed back home.  We enjoyed having drinks and food in their bar/restaurant.  The food was really good! The staff was very friendly from the front desk personnel, to the bartender and waiter at the restaurant!  The rooms were very nice and comfy and we hope to stay there again someday! We couldn't have been more pleased!  We actually were there Dec 2015.
Manager Response: Dear Stephanie,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad that your loved our restaurant, bar, and comfy guest rooms.   Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Very nice Hotel. There was a lot going on while we were there, but everything ran smooth. Pool was relaxing. Only reason didn't get a 5 was the elevators were slow, otherwise it was a nice relaxing time.
Manager Response: Dear Traveler,  Thank you for your four star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad that you enjoyed our pool and  all of other hotel amenities.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: happy with hilton in Costa Mesa
Summary: Well worth the money, especially for conventions.  The convention food set up was excellent. The convention timeliness was excellent. The rooms were clean. the pool was beautiful, the weather was great.  The only weakness was phone signal in some parts of the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Paul,  Thank you for your four star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad that you had a successful convention while enjoying all of our hotel amenities.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: We were given a dingy room on 2nd floor with half a window overlooking the parking lot. The room also had a humming and clanging pipe type noise  coming from the wall (tv side). Parking is very expensive at 25/night. Not a good experience
Manager Response: Dear Phillipp,  Thank you for your feedback.  I apologize for not meeting your expectations with your room selection.  Please contact me when you return and I will make it right.  Safe travels,  Rob

Summary: Great location to stay for that early morning flight out of John Wayne airport.   All of the amenities... full service bar,  great workout room,  etc.   One minute drive/ walk to airport. Price varies on date and season.
Manager Response: Dear Paul,  Thank you for your four star review and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa,.  I am glad to hear that you enjoyed the amenities and we were able to exceed your expectations.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: This is a really nice hotel, room was great parking is not that good and charges $28 a day.  I asked for extra towels and never received them, sharing a hotel room with wife and two daughters you need extra towels.  Hilton Honors Diamond members have their own room for breakfast and drinks on the Executive floor.  That was nice.  We went to Crystal Cove State Park and hiked the trails and ended the day with Whale watching out of Balboa Peninsula.
Manager Response: Dear Sean,  Thank you for you feedback.  I apologize for our housekeeping team members not meeting your expectations.  I appreciate that you loved our property and want to personally thank you for being a loyal Hilton Honors Member.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: This hotel is perfect location, for beach access, shopping, great restaurants, its clean, and the personal is so friendly and helpful. You will also enjoy your stay here.  Its 1/2 mile if that to the South Coast Mall.  I love going to Newport for the beach and great seafood restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear Mona,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am so pleased that you enjoyed your stay and that my team exceeded your expectations.  I am blessed to have such an outstanding team and Hotel.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Arriving on the 4 th of July we had a spectacular view of fireworks up and down The O.C. Coastal displays.   Quiet most nights around Holiday as this is a convention and business hotel.  Excellent Breakfast BD room service.  Swimming pool and spa were clean and relaxing again Business hotel advantage ( no kids) !  Workout room plenty of new looking equipment.  Staff at front desk very helpful With PC use in business center.   Had TV issue in one of two rooms that was remedied on first call.  Easy Lyft or Uber to  Either Irvine or Newport Beach.  Airport shuttle ( SNA) every 30 min.
Manager Response: Dear Charles,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting us as your Fourth of July Hotel. I appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work in keeping the hotel clean and well maintained while delivering excellent service.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Very comfortable hotel. Computers to use, Star bucks in lobby, restaurant in lobby and small store for misc. items. One block walk to several very good restaurants. Very nice rooms and plenty of meeting rooms for almost any size convention.
Manager Response: Dear Bill,  Thank you for your comments and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad that you enjoyed your stay.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Showing some signs of its age.  Needs a face-lift.  Service was great, had no issues at all with the employees, they were great.   The location is very close to the mall but walking to it requires crossing busy roads and a freeway bridge.  But Uber is quick and cheap and easy.
Manager Response: Dear Anthony,  Thank you for your four star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad that you loved our location and service.  please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Overall happy with our stay, second time staying there. Good hotel overall with clean rooms and comfy beds for our family of 4.  we enjoy the swimming pool and also the hot tub, although hot tub was extremely hot the second day of our stay and couldn't get in it. apparently this is a on again/off again problem there.
Manager Response: Dear Fazeln,  Thank you for your feedback and loyalty to Hilton and our property here in Costa mesa. I appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work in keeping the hotel clean and well maintained while delivering excellent service. I apologize for the temperature fluctuations in the spa water.  I will most definitely investigate and repair.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: After the absolute horrible mess of the Del Mar Hilton, we were a bit hesitant to stay here. Boy were we wrong. We had a great time here starting from when we walked in. The very nice young lady at check in was very kind and courteous. I explained the situation of our previous 2 nights and she was more than understanding. She even upgraded our room which she didn't have to do, nor did we expect it. Free underground parking, very clean rooms, glass elevators, you name it, this place had it all. We come to Newport Beach quite often, and this will be our new place to stay. Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear Salaminizer,  Thank you for your five star rating and for being a loyal hilton guest. I appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work in keeping our hotel clean and well maintained while delivering excellent service. Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: If you are looking for a great bar where they make you feel like family this is the place. 90 inch tv makes you feel like you are really at the games. The staff knows their drinks and they make them really delicious.
Manager Response: Dear 396sasham,  Thank you for your five star rating and  for being a loyal hilton guest. I appreciate that you acknowledged my team's hard work in keeping our hotel clean and well maintained while delivering excellent service. Please come back soon.  Travel safe,  Rob

Summary Heading: The Hotel with poor maintenance and bad house keeping
Summary: Just Bought 5 pairs of expensive >$1000 shoes and the room leakage ruined them, and the bathroom is not having toilet paper the solution fron the management is so poor, giving points and they dont really give the best resposibilty for the leakage because they affraid to pay my ruined shoes.
Manager Response: Dear Paul,  Thank you for your feedback.  I apologize for your guestroom experience. I am glad that my team made it right before you departed.  Travel safe,  Rob

Summary: Was greeted and was a very pleasant stay. Great staff and room. Very nice pool area. Location was great easy and nice restaurants and shopping nearby. Stayed for business but also there for pleasure. Parking was easy and attendants were very helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Chris,  Thank you for your comments and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay. Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: The sinks were stained and we found hair in the shower. The towels were even stained. The front desk offered no additional service when we told them the situation. We filed a complaint with corporate and only received an apology from them. Nothing from the hotel staff here. Disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear GorGor,  Thank you for your feedback.  I apologize for not exceeding your expectations, but am glad that we finally made it right.  Travel safe,  Rob

Summary: This hotel and room exceeded my expectations.  I was thoroughly comfortable with the room. The king-sized bed and room was spacious and clean.  No interruptions from any noise and the hotel set-up is perfect for the area and conference in which I participated.  The amenities were ample.  I would come back in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: Dear Christian,  Thank you for your five star rating and for being a loyal hilton guest. I appreciate that you acknowledged my team's hard work in keeping our hotel clean and well maintained while delivering excellent service. Please come back soon.  Safe travels,  Rob

Summary: Came with my family for a 4th of July family holiday. Was absolutely disgusted. My husband and I are Diamond members and were offered absolutely no upgrades. Not to mention, they wouldn't even let us use the separate high speed wifi free of charge (that's normally included as a perk of being a Diamond member!!). My daughter went to take a shower first thing after arriving to the room and screamed when she found poo stains on what was supposed to be a fresh towel. We called the front desk to let them know of the matter and they offered no assistance or apology. Shame, because the location was good too. I doubt I will be returning. Recommend to no one. Don't even bother coming. The location is not worth it.
Manager Response: Dear Christina,  I am sorry that we made you so mad that you gave us the same feedback twice.  As mentioned prior, I am sincerely sorry that my housekeeping team let you down. This was an anomaly.    Travel safe,  Rob

Summary: I came to California for vacation with my family. We arrived very late and I decided to take a shower. The outside of the folded towel looked fine but the minute I picked it up, I discovered black spots that looked like leftover poo all over it!! Called the front desk and all they did was bring over a few new towels (which I was still skeptical of). They didn't even bother offering an apology or any other assistance. I am appalled!! I would have given NEGATIVE stars if possible!! Would recommend to NO ONE. Unfortunately, I have to stay the rest of the week here. But I highly doubt I will return again.
Manager Response: Dearp Puffzee,  Thank you for you feedback. I apologize  for your towels and for our housekeeping service not exceeding your expectations. I am glad that my team made it right before you departed.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Their customer service agent Miguel was awesome.  He raised my level of expectations for any hotel to follow.  Miguel ensured my stay was pleasant. I will return again to this hotel and remain an honors member if this is the level of service I will receive always.
Manager Response: Dear Sabrina,  Thank you for your five star rating and for  being a loyal hilton guest. I appreciate that you acknowledged my team's hard work in keeping our hotel clean and well maintained while delivering excellent service. I will be sure to recognize Miguel for making your stay more pleasant  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Dirty linen/towels and awful check out.
Summary: We chose the Hilton because we thought it should be a safe option. Can't go wrong with it since the reviews were good. Nope we should've picked a different hotel. Self parking is $25 which is ridiculous.  I have stayed at many hotels and hiltons are always charging so much for parking.  Valet for $25 fine that's fairs. Check in was great. Check out was not. We let the front desk know that housekeeping needs to do better job on the linens placed on our beds as we found Stains on both the queen sized beds. The bathtub clogged during every shower. Had to rinse our legs after every shower. Our towels also had stains as did the shower curtain ( I don't think it was changed in between new guests)  at check out all he said to me was. " GOOD TO KNOW" No apology or we will work on it.
Manager Response: Dear Sandra,  Thank you for you feedback.  I apologize that you had to pay for parking and that our housekeeping service did not exceed your expectations.  I am glad that my team made it right before you departed.  Safe travels,  Rob

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel; Free shuttle to airport and mall!
Summary: Enjoyed my week as I attended the 104th IAWP Conference. The hotel was absolutely wonderful as was the staff.  Food is great in the hotel restaurant; Starbucks onsite!!  My only suggestion would be to combat the issue of declined cell phone coverage on the Banquet Floors.
Manager Response: Dear 763shellied.  Thank you for your five star rating and for being a loyal hilton guest. I appreciate that you acknowledged my team's hard work in keeping our hotel clean and well maintained while delivering excellent service. Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Mean to seniors and mean to disabled.
Summary: My dad fell in the bathroom. Instead helping us call the police they callled the police and asked us to leave at 11:30 at night. This was after the same manager put us in the wrong room. I called a total of 17 times to correct our missing reservation.
Manager Response: Dear Frances,  Thank you for your feedback.  I am sorry to hear that we didn't meet your expectations.  Safe travels,  Rob

Summary Heading: stay at the Hilton COSTA MESA
Summary: excellent location, clean rooms and very helpful staff. The executive lounge is well stocked with newspapers food and three big screen tv's. The view out the window is awesome.The pool and hot tub is relaxing.  Only issue is the expensive restaurant.  I recommend the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Seth,  Thank you for your five star rating and for taking the time to give me valuable feedback.  I will most definitely review our pricing strategy in our restaurant and pass your comments on to my team.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Nice hotel with very courteous staff
Summary: This hotel is conveniently located close to a freeway and 10 minutes from John Wayne/Orange County airport.There was a free shuttle to and from the airport which did a continuous loop for pickup. I had a room at the end of the hallway which was very far from the elevator.  Even though it was on a busy street, the room was quiet as there was no room across the hall. I was with a group and the price was very good.  The restaurant had very good food and the breakfast buffet was $20. The lower level of the hotel where the meeting rooms were was very cold in places, painfully cold and I am from Minnesota. You would need a car to get anyplace as there was very little to walk to in the area. I think parking was very expensive so call and ask.
Manager Response: Dear Karen,  Thank you for your four star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I was glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and liked our service delivery.  Please come back soon.  Rob

Summary: The hotel is not bad, but not great. Definitely for the business crowd. I stayed here on Hilton Honors Points, but the room rate was $269 that night. I would have never paid that. Hotel and rooms were clean, just dated. Staff was nice.
Manager Response: Dear Carebear,  Thank you for your feedback and for acknowledging my teams hard work in keeping the hotel clean and well maintained while delivering excellent service.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: As a Hilton honors member you become accustomed to certain things.  We were charged $6 for water provided in the room.  When I questioned this charge at checkout I was told for the free bottled water I had to come to the front desk to receive that daily but the water in my room was a $6 charge.  Ok odd policy but whatever.  Also you should note that you can get bottle water free from the valet guys which by the way were exceptional in their customer service.  Above and beyond.  Thanks Marcel!!  The hotel rooms were large and clean offered coffee makers flat screen TVs and 2 queen size beds.  There is a nice restaurant that offers a breakfast buffet for $19.95 or a menu to order various items.  Starbucks is located in the lobby.   McDonald's is across the street (a very very Main
Manager Response: Dear Jane, Thank you for your feedback.  I apologize for not exceeding your expectations and will use your comments to provide additional training to my team.    travel safe,  Rob

Summary: Excellent service and accommodations but mediocre food.  Terrible overcooked oatmeal, dried out chicken, but good flatbread pizza.  Breakfast buffet had cold scrambled eggs. The morning coffee was awful, but the decaf was acceptable.
Manager Response: Dear Samuel,  Thank you for your feedback.  I apologize for not meeting your expectations in our restaurant.  I will most definitely review your comments with my team.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Dirty, Dirty, Dirty oh - and nasty attitude
Summary: We are Hilton Diamond Elite - meaning we basically live in Hiltons. This one has been one of the worst experiences with a Hilton ANYWHERE. My husband and I travel constantly for work and pleasure. I like Marriott, he chooses Hilton. Hopefully this changes his mind.   First, there was a problem with the credit card - not their fault, and we had to get the authorization sent over. So we did. Only to be told by a VERY rude manager that it must be faxed, not emailed back to the email address they gave us. OK, so I'm not sure who uses fax machines anymore. I took the credit card authorization myself from the email that was sent to them and faxed it from my iPad.  It was 11:30pm in California so it would have been 2:30a.m. for us to wake someone up to refax the authorization. They
Manager Response: Dear Amanda,  Thank you for your post.  I truly apologize for not meeting your expectations and for the experience that you had with your credit card, guest room and my team.  I will most definitely share your comments with them to prevent this from recurring in the future.  Again, I am sorry for this matter and for any inconvenience it may have caused you.  Travel safe,  Rob

Summary: The rooms and the property itself could use a little updating which is why I only gave 3 stars.  Upon check-in we were given a room looking over the atrium (the inside lobby area) but it was dark and uninviting.  After calling the frint desk, they moved us to a room with a balcony overlooking the pool. The view was nice and it was refreshing to open the sliding glass doors and let the coolCalifornia air in.  The doors are older and hard to open and the room as a whole could use some updates.  The breakfast buffet was very nice with a plethora of options and the pool area with waterfalls and fountains was a welcome retreat.  If you are looking for a comfortable more affordable stay in the heart of the OC this is a good choice. If you're looking for a trendy, modern hotel this is
Manager Response: Dear Coliemix,  Thank you for your post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa. I apologize for the slow start in giving you the accommodations that you wanted, but am glad it worked out.  Please let me know the next time your travels bring you here and I will ensure that you are upgraded.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Still a great places after many 3-5 day visits.
Summary: I believe that this was at least my 10th-or-more stay at the Hilton-Costa Mesa, and have never encountered a disappointing episode. The rooms always were immaculate, the staff friendly and helpful, and its super convenient to the SNA John Wayne Airport.
Manager Response: Dear Charlesec,  Thank you for your five star rating being a loyal hilton guest.  I appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work in keeping our hotel clean and well maintained while delivering excellent service.  Please come back soon.  Travel safe,  Rob

Summary: Hilton Hotels are my preferred hotel as the rooms are a generous size and clean.  Our stay here was very pleasant and the staff made us feel very welcome.  They sufficiently accommodated a situation regarding our room location.  If noise bothers you,  would recommend that you request a room away from the pool equipment. Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Linda,  Thank you for your five star post and for being a loyal hilton guest.  I truly appreciate you selecting the hilton Costa Mesa and for your kind and gracious comments.   Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: The staff was warm and welcoming and wanted to make we were happy with our stay  I was so happy with this visit that I booked a 2nd stay next week- this will be our new place to stay when visiting the area
Manager Response: Dear Sheela,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  We look forward to seeing you again next week.  Safe travels,  Rob

Summary: We stayed here during the Memorial Day weekend.  We were attending the Scottish Festival at the OC Fair grounds and wanted to stay close since we would be going back on Sunday.  Beautiful hotel near shopping, South Coast Plaza, and the OC Fair Grounds. Room was very nice and the bed was comfortable.  We had dinner in the restaurant as well as breakfast in the morning.  We did the B&B package. Dinner was delicious and breakfast was good too!  We would stay here again.  Hilton Honors Silver Member.
Manager Response: Dear Lars,  Thank you for your five star rating and for you selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad that you love property and location and that we have become your preferred Hotel.  See you soon.  Rob

Summary: My husband and I were welcomed from the moment we pulled up in front of the Hotel. Maribel at the front desk was exceptional -- friendly, helpful and professional!! Roger in the dining room also exhibited outstanding service and attention to detail with their delicious breakfast buffet. The individual service we experienced will make a lasting impression when considering accommodations for future business and leisure travel needs.
Manager Response: Dear Jeff,  Thank you for your Five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I appreciate that you acknowledged my team's hard work in delivering excellent service and a lasting impression.   Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Very satisfied with my stay here at this hotel. Located not to far from the beach and multiple restaurants. Definitely would consider staying here again. Awesome staff and great customer service. Thank you
Manager Response: Dear Juan,  Thank you for your five star rating and for you selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad that you love the property, our,  and location.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards, Rob

Summary: From the initial check - in until we left we were treated exceptionally well. I have no complaints. The executive lounge was a very nice feature. We were able to enjoy a nice breakfast and evening snacks.
Manager Response: Dear Pamela,  Thank you for your five star rating and for you selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad that we made your check in easy and that my team smothered you with excellent service.   Again, I truly appreciate your comments.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: The hotel isn't a great representative of the hilton brand.  its a bit old and tired, and although everything works and the staff try hard to be friendly.   the room was all right -- it had everything you need except a safe and the shower wasn't really strong enough, but that's ok.  There was no shower gel -- a difference between hilton in Asia and hilton in the US. the gym was good, better than the average hotel gym, and the pool was just long enough to swim a couple of laps. The good thing was that it was open from 6am to 10pm.     I didn't like having to pay $25 per day for parking when space is obviously not at a premium here.  But the location is good if you're driving.  Near both the 405 and the local roads.   not sure i would stay here again, there's nothing remarkable
Manager Response: Dear Pam,  Thank you for your four star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I apologize for the slow shower and for your safe missing.  I do appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work in keeping the hotel clean and well maintain while delivering excellent service.  Please com back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Great location.  Easy to Park car if you rent one.  Starbucks bar in hotel. Turning the water on in the bathtub/shower did take me awhile to figure out, but eventually did. King size bed was comfortable and clean.
Manager Response: Dear Barbara,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa. I apologize for the shower valve being confusing.   I do appreciate that you loved our property and enjoyed our Starbucks.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: I stayed here last year en route to Lake Tahoe feom Australia and again this year on the way to Colorado . The rooms are very nice with lovely comfy beds ,the breakfast is too notch and the public areas are all very nice . Only visited executive lounge breifly and it was very nice although i wasnt there for evening drinks . Was well looked after as Hhonors Diamond member as well with free upgrade and bfast . Will defo return .
Manager Response: Dear Andy,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad to hear that your enjoyed  our beds and found yourself at home in our lobby.  Again, thank you for being a loyal Diamond Member and please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Excellent beautiful property across from South Coast Mall...with a shuttle from the hotel to the mall. The lobby is beautiful with marble, several eating places, comfy seats and booths...so you can meet your friends for a drink or a Starbucks...which is also in the hotel near the front desk. The staff was very accommodating... This was a convention...and the abundance of rooms available for meetings etc. was amazing. For convention food at the hotel, it was excellent... Perfect spot to be if you have to be at a convention...
Manager Response: Dear Tahoe2,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa. I am glad that you loved our convenient location  and that you found our lobby comfy.  Please come back soon.    Warm regards, Rob

Summary: Comfortable beds, clean rooms, good food, helpful staff....good location.  Meeting rooms  nice, banquet service very efficient. Quiet atmosphere so one could really relax. More bell captain help would've made visit outstanding.
Manager Response: Dear Terry,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa. I am glad to hear that your enjoyed our beds and found yourself at home in our lobby and meeting space.   Again, thank you for your kind and gracious comments and please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: We came in late and thankfully the Hilton had some extra rooms. There was a small issue, and the gentleman who helped us, Rudy, was amazing! We had breakfast in the morning and witnessed amazing staff...even when hotel guests were being rude, the staff remained kind and gracious. Both my husband and I were not feeling well and decided to stay another night due to how friendly the staff is...and the hotel is beautifully kept up. First time staying at a Hilton and we will definitely return! The value was great! As crowded as it was, it was quiet. Food is good. Water pressure...could be stronger :) overall...love it!
Manager Response: Dear Hilary,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa. I am glad to hear that Rudy solved your issue you enjoyed your extra night with us. (we hope you are feeling better)   Again, thank you for your kind and gracious comments  and please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Business stay at the Hilton Costa Mesa was a pleasant surprise. From the doorman and front desk welcome to the genuine smiles from the staff it is apparent the mission is Service at this property. I was upgraded to concierge level, quiet room with a view to the east. Concierge room had the standard amenities with plenty of seating.   A package that I shipped to the Hilton with meeting supplies had problems with delivery, UPS claiming business was closed...really?? The next morning the staff was all over this issue, texting me with updates regularly. The package was received and I was able to get on with my meeting without a problem. My thanks to Elizabeth and Seth for their help and constant communication with this problem.   I didn't have the opportunity to tour the area during
Manager Response: Dear Gshibb,  Thank you for your four star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I  appreciate that you acknowledged my team's hard work in keeping the hotel clean and well maintain while delivering excellent service. Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: It's a nice hotel and walking distance from the south plaza mall. There's also a lovely Japanese grocery store behind the hotel. Room service is quite possibly the worst I've ever experienced in a 4 star hotel - over priced to be served in plastic boxes with plastic cutlery!! You may as well buy your food at the grocery store and eat from their plastic as it's much cheaper. The rooms are clean and spacious and comfortable. If they sort out the room service it would be fantastic.
Manager Response: Dear Minnie,  Thank you for your four star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa. I am glad to hear that your enjoyed our convenient location.  I apologize for not exceeding your expectations with our room service and shipping.    Again, thank you for your kind and gracious comment regarding our clean and spacious rooms.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: I am frequent guest of this hotel. Every time my experience is one of the worst. Waited for over 30 minutes to ask to eat for lunch. Then again 30 minutes to have breakfast. If you come here your will find me here still waiting. Waiters have a disgusting attitude. They literally do not care about customer experience. I will unfortunately have to return. Hopefully this will serve to people to make a better choice. Unfortunately I cannot choose were to stay because is decided by the management of the company I am working for. Good travel to all.
Manager Response: Dear Federico,  Thank you for your feedback.  I am extremely sorry that my team let you down in our restaurant.  I am glad that we had an opportunity to make it right.  Safe travels,  Rob

Summary: I visited this hotel for business and found it to be ok but not great. The room is clean and comfortable and the bed was adequate to sleep in. The bed was not very good for sitting up watching television, the mattress slips away from the headboard and the pillows fall between. The bathroom was clean and had all the necessary items but the hot water took forever to come on and was not easy to figure out. The room service comes in a bag that is delivered to your door with plastic utensils. This is a moderately priced hotel for the area and is close to everything so I will probably stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Vince,  Thank you for your four star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa. I am glad to hear that your enjoyed our beds and found yourself at home in your clean spacious room.   I am sorry that we missed the mark on your room service order and will review your comments with my team.  Again, thank you for your post and I hope that you will come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Beautiful location and great restaurant area
Summary: I recently dealt with Tanya Acevez the Reservations Manager who was extremely helpful with my request and professional, my daughter and I had a wonderful time staying there. The bar and restaurant has a very relaxed feel to it and good food. The Starbucks in the hotel lobby is an added attraction with a good selection and lovely service. The gym is large and has a nice outlook at the pool. Thanks Maria
Manager Response: Dear Laureen,  Thank you for your four star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa mesa.  I am glad that Tanya was able to take care of your request and that you loved our property.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: I was here on business, excellent staff willing to help.  Really clean and nice Hilton honors breakfast.  You do have to pay for parking at this property, and not many spaces.  We checked in really late at night so they forgot to check that we are diamond members so our keys did not work for the private lounge.  They did fix that for us.    I need to use the business center before a meeting, this is a large hotel with many types of travelers.  They only have two computers with one printer so I did have to wait a while for my turn.
Manager Response: Dear Deb,  Thank you for your four star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  In addition, I want to thank you for being a loyal Diamond member.  I apologize for the issue you had with parking and for the wait time you had in our tech center.  Again thank you for your comments and please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: This hotel has been horrible for conferences.  They were grossly understaffed-- particularly at the restaurant and especially for a hotel hosting two conventions that weekend.  I missed two panels I wanted to go to that were important to me because the restaurant didn't get my food out for an hour and a half.  They also made events at the hotel late by not having the proper set up or double booking two different conventions over each other.
Manager Response: Dear Elizabeth,  Thank you for your feedback and for choosing the Hilton Costa Mesa for your conference. I am truly sorry that my team did not meet your expectations in our restaurant.  I have used your experience as an example to retrain my staff.  In addition, I am glad that I was able to make it right with you and the group for being a little late for your set up in the ballroom. Again, I apologize for these matters and for any inconvenience it may have caused you.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Not told about parking fees. Slow tub drain. Had to stand in ankle deep water when showering. Hotel was a sponsor for the O C Marathon that we were attending. The concierge desk had very little info about it. They also had trouble finding info/maps online.
Manager Response: Dear Michael,  Thank you for your feedback.  I apologize for the tub slow draining and  for not having the information that you requested.  I will most definitely get these issues fixed.  Again thank you for your post.  Safe travels,  Rob

Summary: There was no room service menu inside the room. It was 10pm and last orders for room service are 11pm. I was not well so i was not wanting to go down to the restaurant. i called "guest services" and the lady on the phone told me she would have a menu sent up. Some time passed and i realised it was already 10.45pm. I called back guest serivces and this time a man answered. He had not been informed of the situation and had no idea what i was talking about. I had to explain to him again and asked please can i have the menu delivered and that now i was worried i was not going to be able to order from the full menu as it was almost 11pm. There was no sympathy or apology. His response was "just come down to the restaurant it doesn't close until 12." i am sick that is why i did not
Manager Response: Dear Holy,  Thank you for your feedback and for your company choosing the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I apologize for the inconvenience that I caused you for the breakdown in service. These issues have been addressed with my team.  I am glad that you gave us an opportunity to make it right.  Again, thank you for your post.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: It was a wonderful experience I will stay at this property again with out hesitation. Wonderful staf and extremely friendly and helpful.   I've already recommended it to people.   Even the valet staff were friendly and very helpful.    I really did enjoy my time there
Manager Response: Dear Shannon,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa. Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Definitely a business hotel. Room service food and beverage options are limited.Conference & meeting facilities were great! I would definitely stay again, but only for business trips. Hilton Honors program is good.
Manager Response: Dear Michael,  Thank you for your four star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa. In addition, I want to thank you for your feedback regarding our food options.  We have just created new menu's for all of our venues which will correct the issue.   Again thank you for your comments and please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Great time overall.  Staff amenable and flexible. Easy check in and out process. Concierge level amenities top of the line.  Parking was accessible.  Room service responsive to our needs. BellmAn was gracious
Manager Response: Dear Tonia,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Nicely appointed lobby, helpful staff, comfortable rooms, good service over-all. Breakfast menu has lots to choose from.  Located within 10-minute drive of South Coast Plaza shopping center and Segerstrom Center for the Arts.
Manager Response: Dear Marilyn,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa. Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Great choice for business in Costa Mesa
Summary: Clean, efficient, well-appointed: this hotel is in a great location, near John Wayne Airport and South Coast Plaza.  Great value for the money.  Friendly staff, Starbucks in the lobby, nice clean rooms.  They have electrical outlets on the tables by the head of the bed... I can't comprehend why some other hotels still don't have this.
Manager Response: Dear David,  Thank you for your five star rating and for you selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad that you love property, team, and location.  Please come back soon for a fresh brewed coffee.    Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: It was a bad experience! Toilet didn't not flush appropriately. Staff provided poor customer service. I won't recommend anyone to stay at this humorless. Jazcuzzi was broken and did ni post any signs.
Manager Response: Dear Bang,  Thank you for you post.  I truly appreciate it and will follow up with my team.  Safe travels,  Rob

Summary: We stayed in this place for one night and enjoyed the hospitality provided by the hotel. Our check in was efficient and the receptionist provided us with two complimentary bottles of water and some candies. our room was decorated nicely, had a comfortable bed and a small refrigerator. We could not hear the traffic noise in the nearby street.  The hotel has a couple of restaurants, a Starbucks, some interesting shops, and ample parking spaces. There are also many restaurants in the neighborhood and within walking distance.  Our section of the hotel lost power the day we were going to check out. According to hotel staff, it was caused by the construction in the hotel vicinity. I had to take shower in a dark bathroom, which was not terribly inconvenient. Upon checking out, the
Manager Response: Dear Manouch,  Thank you for your four star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: The experience started out wonderfully but devolved at the departure to leave us with a bad experience.  We were visiting Disneyland with a school group and decided to stay at the Hilton.  We arrived at midnight and the service was excellent.  When I asked whether there would be a breakfast in the morning and what time it was, the on duty guest receptionist gave us complementary breakfasts and also a card for free parking.  We were elated and thought this was what the Hilton experience was all about.  Extras that make their guests happy.  The room was nice, there was a small matter of water overflow in the shower, but that was minor (why the pick there was 9/10).  The next morning we got up and had the breakfast buffet.  When we went to check out we were informed that the
Manager Response: Dear Deny,  Thank you for your feedback.  I apologize for the miscommunication regarding your breakfast and parking charges.  I will ensure that my team is retrained to prevent this from recurring.  Safe travels,  Rob

Summary: Be careful with Waz, they send you to the wrong place, 30 minutes away. Must type in the address, not the name of the hotel. Went to a family affair here and they handled the group events well. Nice gym. Parking lot was full.
Manager Response: Dear Robin,  Thank you for your four star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Stayed at this Hotel and it was a strange experience. Was given keys to a room that did not work. Second room worked, however when I checked out I was still listed in the first room and was charged twice for my stay. It's a long story, but I think the employee that checked me in is running a scam on this place. The Front desk manager has taken care of the problem for me, however unless his boss is made aware I don't know if the problem will be fixed. Probably won't go back. Haven't been able to email the General Manager, as I cannot find a way to contact him.
Manager Response: Dear Frank,  Thank you for your feedback.  I will reach out to you today.    Safe travels,  Rob

Summary: My service experience was excellent!  In particular, I sincerely appreciated the gentleman at the front desk (so sorry I didn't get his name) who assisted me in accessing the fitness center locker room.  I had already checked out of my room from my stay the prior night, but had been in a full day of Customer meetings.  He gave me a key that could access the fitness center locker room, so that I could shower and change into comfortable clothes for the flight home.  It was wonderful of him to go the extra mile and made for a much more pleasant trip home.  Thanks again!
Manager Response: Dear Matthew,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: beautiful hotel and wonderful staff but noisy location. Hotel staff is awesome and the food is great. I would definetly go there again.  Pool is big, hot tub big and towels at the pool too.  Great breakfast buffet,cozy bar and little shop for the forgotten items.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I just came here for a wedding reception and it was wonderful. The staff was quite accommodating when checking in. They had room ready for us at 10 am when usually we would be checking in at 1-2 pm. The hotel is nice and clean and what else would you want more from that!
Manager Response: Dear Dipster,  Thank you for your four star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Great service, great pool, really nice rooms and lobby, and great location. Within 10 minutes of everything like beach, restaurants, and so much shopping.  My family loves the executive level and it's such a good deal,!
Manager Response: Dear Qjamiec,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: This review is about a month overdue, but I would like to personally thank Abigayl Flores and Daria for their outstanding customer service. I've stayed at many Hiltons, but my boyfriend and I continually come back to this property because the staff has always been welcoming and attentive. For starters, the rooms are HUGE compared to most standard Hilton rooms. Everything is up to date and the common areas were recently renovated. We'll be back soon!
Manager Response: Dear Kelly,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: This is a great location. It's convenient to the airport, downtown, shopping and great places to eat. The staff is awesome and will ensure you stay is top notch. This was my first time I'm Santa Ana and I will definitely stay here when I go back.
Manager Response: Dear Allan,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: The staff at this hotel was superb!  I seriously cannot praise them enough!  We came in for a trade show and had countless heavy boxes and the guys were always willing to help!  (I would have seriously gone on break when they saw us get off the elevator).  The hotel dining area was nice, our waiter was great!  The check in and check out process was seamless!  Room was clean and inviting!  Will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work at keeping the hotel clean and well maintained while delivering excellent service.  Please hurry back.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Great Hotel , Perfect Location , The best Staff , Extremely clean , great atmosphere , The Best Place to stay in Costa Mesa for business or pleasure...We  Will go back anytime we are in Costa Mesa CA .
Manager Response: Dear Anthony,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa. I appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work at keeping the hotel clean and well maintained while delivering excellent service. Please hurry back.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: One of the best mattresses and pillows I've ever experienced. Hotel was in a great location, very convenient to the freeways. Staff was accommodating and very easy to get a late checkout. Not enough coffee in the room, but they brought some up quickly after a phone call to the front desk.
Manager Response: Dear Jentsd,  Thank you for you five star post I really appreciate it.  I am glad that you loved our location and my team.  Please come back soon.  warm regards,  Rob

Summary: From the moment that I arrived, I was treated like a VIP.  I love this hotel and I will definitely go back again. A 10 minute walk from South Coast Plaza and other hotels. Great service at the front desk and priced right.
Manager Response: Dear Mary,  Thank you for your five star rating and being a loyal guest.  I am glad that my team exceeded your expectations.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Great room and restaurant and excellent menu selection for breakfast and dinner. Servers on both nights were exceptionally friendly. Front desk associates were very friendly and accomodating, receivedmy room as requested.
Manager Response: Dear Traveler,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa mesa.  I am glad that my team exceeded your expectations.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Great hotel in Orange county, California
Summary: Close to great shopping at South Coast Plaza and wonderful restaurants nearby.  The staff is always friendly and efficient and will do anything to keep you happy.  Always a great experience and fun. Near Airport.  And even a shuttle to take you to the mall.
Manager Response: Dear Barbara,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work in keeping the hotel clean and well maintained while delivering excellent service.  Please come back soon to enjoy our location and shopping.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Miguel was so helpful and friendly upon our arrival! What a great way to welcome us to the hotel! Our room was clean and spacious and the staff was nice and accommodating!  We will definitely be back, next time we are in Orange County!
Manager Response: Dear Heather,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I appreciate that you acknowledged Miguel and my team.  I am truly the luckiest GM to have such an awesome support cast.  I will most definitely recognize him in our next team meeting.  Please come back soon. Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Great place to have a Business function. Lots of meeting space and quality of food is excellent.  Do not use Hot Tub it is not relaxing. The jets do not work properly. Try to stay above the 2nd floor. You will have a view then.
Manager Response: Dear Cindy,  Thank you for your four star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am sorry that you experienced trouble with our spa.  I will ensure that the jets get get checked out.   I am glad to hear that loved our food and that you loved the service that my team provided.    Warm regards,  Ron

Summary: Has meetings at this hotel for several days. My check in experience was great, welcomed as HH member right away. What I loved is I forgot to give my HH number, but they were ready for me and welcomed me at check in. Meeting room and food for the events was well done. My room was clean and very comfortable. I would love to stay again when in the area. Thank you to all the staff!!
Manager Response: Dear Merit,  Thank you for your five star rating and for being a loyal Hilton Honors member,  I truly appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work in keeping the hotel clean and well maintained while delivering excellent service.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: It was a nice hotel, but parking was not that great. Especially paying $25 dollars for parking. Then upstairs parking is bad, but downstairs is actually better. The shower handle is very hard to use. Instead of pulling the handle you need to pull behind the handle for water to come on. Lastly, you will need to go downstairs to he lobby for Ice.
Manager Response: Dear Traveler,  Thank you for taking the time to give me your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.    I apologize for your poor experience with the shower valve and our ice distribution.  These items should have been communicated better to you.   Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: This hotel is in a great location, close to airport and OC attractions. The Compset is offing rooms for about the same rate that have been renovated, have comfortable (new) beds and televisions that work. I would have expected more from Hilton.
Manager Response: Dear Adams,  Thank you for your post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad we had the opportunity to make it right with your experience.  Please come back soon.  Safe travels,  Rob

Summary: The 1st room I have not had to clean myself in years!  All the team was amazing and I was left with a welcomed feeling and genuinely was appreciated but....  The most amazing thing for me was how amazingly clean my room was!  I am a very hard person to please when it comes to cleanliness of the guest room and this is the 1st room I did not have to clean myself in at least 7 years, and I travel A LOT!!  KUDOS TO HOUSEKEEPING!!!
Manager Response: Dear Thomas,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I appreciate that you acknowledged my housekeeping team's hard work at keeping the hotel clean and well maintained.   I agree, they are amazing.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: I didn't stay at the property itself but our work conference was held at this location over the course of three days. I really wanted to thank their overall hospitality that we received while we were there but I would especially like to thank one of the servers, Marisela that truly went out of her way. I asked her a question as to whether which deserts didn't have chocolate since I had given it up for lent and she was able to point out the two different options. She then proceeded to go to the back room and was a sweetheart and brought me a plate of pastries that was not available at the front. She also proceeded to let me know that if i did not want something so sweet that she can provide me with a plate of fruit. The little desserts were absolutely perfect so I didn't need it
Manager Response: Dear Jessica,  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments.  I am very pleased that Marisela exceeded your expectations.   Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: It was not a good experience
Summary: Would not go again to this hotel and would not recommend to a friend or family. Lights went out when I was there for like 5 hours. Kids were running around making a loud noise couldn't sleep. How to park top level the whole time.
Manager Response: Dear Alexandro,  Thank you for your feedback and fo selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I apologize for the power outage as it was beyond our control.   I am glad that we were able to make it right.   Again thank you for your post.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Cons: There were opened and re-filled with tap water FIJI bottles in my room (that I unknowingly drank), and as an apology, all the front desk did was give me a free water bottle Poor lighting in rooms Dingy/outdated rooms Unhealthy food in executive lounge Small gym  Pros: Close to airport Updated bathrooms Pretty lobby Little Market to buy food
Manager Response: Dear EH,  Thank you for your comments,  I apologize for the opened fiji water and the inconvenience that it caused you.  I am glad that you liked our corner pantry and pretty lobby.    Safe travels,  Rob

Summary Heading: First stay but will be back!
Summary: I spent two nights at the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa and was absolutely thrilled. I was there on business and arrived early.  While my room was not ready, Maribel at the front desk went out of her way to make me feel welcomed. I received a complementary upgrade to the Executive floor and was able to relax while my room was ready. The entire staff was very friendly, the room and bathroom were just wonderful. The Executive lounge is a very nice amenity. I visit the area a couple of times a year and this has become my go to hotel. At checkout Maribel was at the front desk and she asked how the stay was and mentioned she hoped I'd visit again. Friendly folks like Maribel really go a long way and I look forward to returning.
Manager Response: Dear jeseperez,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am pleased to hear that my team took excellent care of you and you were able to enjoy our executive lounge,   We appreciate your loyalty and hope you visit again soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: I wanted to be closer to the elevator however front desk said they were full. But when I searched online there were rooms available. I was unable to leave a phone msg for a colleague as the front desk said there was a block on the phone... Not so. Then on check out charged an extra $50 on my account.
Manager Response: Dear Traveler,  Thank you for taking the time to give me your feedback.  I apologize for the miscommunication at the front desk.  I am glad we were able to make it right before you departed.    Safe travels,  Rob

Summary: I enjoyed this Hilton hotel immensely. From the time of check in to the time of departure the service, amenities and staff were second to none! Since I was participating in a conference we had wonderful meeting facilities and the banquet food for lunch and dinner was excellent.
Manager Response: Dear ChristopherdE9042LB,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work in keeping the Hotel clean and well maintained while delivering excellent service.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Always consistent, the Hilton again didn't disappoint. This location was convenient to everything. Shopping, airport etc. Very quiet and well maintained property with all the amenities I need and appreciate. Great value for the spend.
Manager Response: Dear Elizabeth,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad that you loved our location.  Please come bvack soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Was pleasant stay except extremely bad weather and few fire alarm incidents on wee hours in the morning (False Alarm) hotel was busy with few Grp conventions so waiting at elevator (5 but only 4 were in use) long time only to get to the 4th Floor
Manager Response: Dear Ted K,  Thank you for your feedback.  I apologize for the false alarm and the inconvenience that our elevators caused you.  I am glad we were able to make it right before you departed.  Safe travels,  Rob

Summary Heading: A long way from LAX Airport but otherwise a good location.
Summary: Have stayed here a couple of times and the staff are always very friendly and accommodating.  A special mention to Thomas at the Concierge desk. So helpful. There is a shuttle bus to South Coast Plaza for shopping and restaurants. Very clean and good sized rooms.   Being able to order food in the bar area is a plus and the menu is more than adequate. Good coffee at the Starbucks in the Lobby.
Manager Response: Dear Mrst1956,  Thank you for your five star rating and for being a loyal guest.  I appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work in keeping the hotel clean and well maintained while delivering excellent service.  I will be sure to recognize Thomas for his helpfulness.  Please visit again soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: I've been here in this hotel several times atleast 5-10 times last year 2016. I used to be a flight attendant and Hilton was our hotel in LA. This hotel is not that bad but most of the time I have horrible experience especially with Receptionists. My assigned room is sharing with my colleague and whenever it's weekend my husband stays with me and we purchased our room, respecting the privacy of my colleague. I used the company rate as benefits but the receptionists are very inconsistent with breakfast and parking fees. I dunno if they don't like flight attendants staying there, we blocked 50 rooms or more that's they give awful service or maybe they don't like our company because unfortunately some crew are annoying, awful, cheap in comes with tip and some are rude but it
Manager Response: Dear philhotelier,  Thank you for your feedback.  I apologize for you feeling unwanted by the receptionist.  I assure you that we love all of our guest and I will most definitely have a retraining session with my team.  Please stop by during your next visit.    Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: This hotel offers and advertises amenities that are not worth the extra money. My fruit basket contained one apple, one orange, and one strawberry, I also got 4 bottles of water and 5 chocolate covered strawberries for a bill of $72.04.  Oh, I forgot to mention it was 4 HOURS LATE. I was STILL CHARGED the $72.04.  The room (before tax, etc.) was $278.72. So, for 27.5 % of the room fee, I received poor room service which included 4 bottles of water, 3 pieces of fruit and 5 chocolate covered strawberries. NOT A GOOD DEAL... In case you were wondering.
Manager Response: Dear Traveler,  Thank you for your feedback.  I apologize for the issues you had with our fruit basket and for it being delivered late.  I have reviewed your comments with my team and implemented additional training to prevent this from recurring.  Again, thank you for your post.  Safe travels,  Rob

Summary Heading: Not whatI expect from a Hilton
Summary: They double booked our room, then put us on a lower level. They apparently never told housekeeping that the room was sold and they kept trying to come into our room even after we were in bed. Then the next day they didn't clean it at all. Staff in the restaurant was snippy. The mattress was horrible, you could see depressions in it through the comforter. Still waiting for my bill that was supposed to be emailed to me.
Manager Response: Dear Sailingwidget,  Thank you for your feedback.  I apologize for not exceeding your expectations and for what you experienced during your stay.  I will most definitely review your comments with my team to ensure that this issues do not recur.    Safe travels,  Rob

Summary: Only problem was noise from mini-refrig kept me up half the night until I finally figured out the noise was coming from within the room and not construction across the street. I unplugged the mini-frig and finally got to sleep.
Manager Response: Dear Traveler,  Thank you for your four star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I apologize for the fridge  noise and am glad you were able to finally get some rest.  Please stop by during your next visit.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: It has good location and nice view and silent environment . Room is clean and well-decorated. Unfortunately it was a rainy ,windy day and I could not see blue sky in CA. But I stayed here comfortably.
Manager Response: Dear Traveler,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Room in bad shape, no AC
Summary: Mediocre hotel at best. My room was awful. Maintenance unable to fix problem slept in an oven, couldn't wait to check out. Had to be at hotel for a convention. Otherwise would stay elsewhere. Restaurant not great either, but they did recook my food after they messed it up.
Manager Response: Dear Lulubelle,  Thank you for taking the time to give me your valuable feedback.  I apologize for your disappointing experience.  I am glad that we had an opportunity to make it right and have used your comments to retrain my team.    Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Excellent service, location, comfort ability.  love the spaciousness.  Food was great.  The competition ballroom was just the right size.   Location of restrooms were great .  nice to have a shuttle to and from the airport and hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Irenef125,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa,  I am glad that you loved our team and hotel amenities.  Please visit again soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Stayed here for a quick business trip, being a gold member I was upgraded to the executive floor with the concierge lounge so that was a nice plus since drinks and breakfast are offered in a quiet location.  Service was great as is usually the case with Hilton.  The rooms are about typical for Hilton, beds are comfy.  Parking is extra but safe.  Close to restaurants and shopping but can be hard to get a great room rate, other Hiltons in the area seems to be less expensive so shop around.
Manager Response: Dear TJansen,  Thank you for taking the time to give me your feedback and for giving us a five star rating.   I am glad to hear that you enjoyed our property and than my team exceeded your expectations.  Please visit again soon,  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Great hotel with a reasonably priced restaurant.  Wished take-out food was open until later for late night flights.  Include more healthy items on Bristol Palms menu.  Room was clean and well lit.  Check-in staff friendly and efficient.  Loved that I received 2 free bottles of water.
Manager Response: Dear Traveler,  Thank you for your kind and gracious comments and your five star rating.  I am glad that your enjoyed your stay and that my team exceeded your expectations.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: I stayed here with my business partner on a recent trip to Costa Mesa.  We stayed 4 nights at this hotel based on the proximity to our meeting place.
