I'll break it down into the above average, good, and bad experiences.  Above average: the concierge and gentlemen at the valet were AWESOME!  They went above and beyond to accommodate our requests.  They were always helpful and had a smile to share.  Our room had 2 double beds and it was a good size, clean and the linens smelled fresh.  Good: We ordered off the breakfast menu each day and it was good - $4 for a cup of coffee seems ridiculous though and the fruit was not the quality I would expect.  Bad:  The bar was awful.  The bartender was flat lined and did not seem interested in helping us.  The bottles displayed in the bar
Manager Response: Dear Liana,  Thank you for your feedback.  I apologize for the experience that you had with our bar and bartender.  I will most definitely use your comments to lend additional training to prevent this from recurring.  Safe travels,  Rob

Summary: I've stayed at this hotel several times in the past and thought it was well run. On my last  visit I was disappointed with the food in the executive lounge which had been good in the past. The evening appetizers  were awful and breakfast just OK. The clock in my room had the wrong time and there were no instructions on how to change it. The hotel did have someone come up to set it but the next morning when my alarm didn't go off I realized it was 12 hours off. Disappointing.
Manager Response: Dear CMKONTHEROAD,  Thank you for your four star rating and for being a loyal guest.  I apologize for your experience with the executive lounge food and for your room clock having the wrong time.  I will most definitely share your comments with my Chef and Housekeeper.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: I had a Good time while staying at Hilton Hotel. Coming  and celebrate 15 years Quinceanera Birthday with a large  group of family members and friends. I will recommend to every body what I experienced at Hilton, thanks
Manager Response: Dear K1577EWcarlosv,  Thank you for your five star rating.  It was nice to read that you had a fun party and you loved our team.  Warm regards,  rob

Summary: Stayed three nights last week, and between a leaking toilet (twice-first chance to fix it failed) bad tv signal and poor resolution of reported problems I will not be back. It's too bad, as it's a good location, and the breakfast is quite good.
Manager Response: Dear David,  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I apologize for letting you down and not exceeding your expectations with regards to the TV and plumbing issues.  I am thankful that we had an opportunity to make it right.  Again thank you for your comments.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: What you would expect from a Hilton
Summary: I stayed here many times while out in Irvine, CA for business travels. The staff has always been nice especially in the Executive Lounge. The rooms and bathroom are clean and well stocked. Check in and check out was easy.   The location of the hotel is also well placed if you are travelling for business and/or need access to the airport (~5-10 mins to the airport without traffic). There is a nice mall right down the block as well as plenty of places to eat in the neighboring areas.   The executive lounge also has a "happy hour" type of thing everyday starting at 5. They have snacks non alcoholic drinks for free and alcoholic beverages for purchase. (I've been told Thursday nights are free, not sure because that is when I usually travel back home)  Only thing I would change is
Manager Response: Dear PPatel807,  Thank you for your five star rating and for being a loyal Hilton Honors member.  I appreciate that you acknowledged my team's hard work in keeping the hotel clean and well maintained while delivering excellent service.  I will most definitely share your comments with them.  Please visit again soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: enjoyed the trip because of friendly staff, good amenities, clean rooms and close proximity to beach and airport. concierge was very helpful in finding maps and ways to get to destination and recommended some good restaurants. it was easy to get where I wanted to go. pool and hot tub were great. the hotel is a very nice facility
Manager Response: Dear Reshma,  Thank you for your four star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I was glad to hear that you loved our property and enjoyed you stay.  Please come back soon.  Rob

Summary Heading: Bad place, even for a convention
Summary: It isn't just one thing, its a combination.   They couldn't accommodate a convention of modest size without separating meeting rooms by two floors. You could use escalators to get between them, except that one of them was out of order for two weekdays. No one even showing up to work on it.   The guestroom floors have very large footprints - you need field glasses to see the other end of the hallway. But just one elevator bank.   Want a drink? No vending, or even an ice machine on any guest floor. Ice is available in free sandwich size baggies in the gift shop past the front desk. They will send ice up to your room if you want to make two phone calls and wait 20 minutes. The plastic cups in your room are the size and consistency of what the dentist gives you to rinse.   Towels
Manager Response: Dear Dean,  Thank you for your feedback and for staying with us.  I apologize for the issues that you experienced during your stay,  I have shared your comments with my team to ensure that foam pillows are readily available and that our housekeeping staff gets retrained so these issue do not recur.  I am glad that we made it right and hope that you will choose us again.    Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Monterey stay good experience unless you are vegan/vegetarian and need just one food selection besides a salad. Tooooo cold in rooms and public places. Night manger rude and agitated but day staff were very nice. Location is great - close to airport.
Manager Response: Dear Marcie,  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I apologize for the building temperature and for our night manager's actions.  I am glad to hear that we made it right and that you liked our other team members and our location.  Please come back soon.  Rob

Summary Heading: Excellent place to stay in Costa Mesa
Summary: We had an excellent stay with the Hilton in Costa Mesa.  The accomodations were great.  The service was excellent.  The price was reasonable for that area.  I would definitely recommend that you stay there for business.
Manager Response: Dear 84earls,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I appreciate that you acknowledged my team's hard work in keeping our Hotel clean and well maintained while delivering excellent service.  Please come back soon.  warm regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Excellent Stay at Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa
Summary: Wonderful stay at the Hilton Costa Mesa. My family and I just spent a great weekend at the Hilton. We stayed here late in December when we had tickets at the Segerstrom Center and Irvine Barclay Theatre. We are so pleased with this hotel that this is the second time we have stayed here during the Christmas season. This hotel is terrific and we had a wonderful stay with a great room. We loved the Executive Lounge with the great appetizers and beverages. Special thanks to Front Office Manager L. Castelan and his staff for making our stay so pleasant.
Manager Response: Dear a63cal,  Thank you for your five star rating and for being a loyal guest.  I am glad to hear that you loved our property.  I will acknowledge Luis when I share your comments with my team.    Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: The room was good, they changed out the feather pillows before we arrived (severe allergies).  The food in the honors lounge was more than just the usual nibbles - fresh, nice selection and friendly staff.  Parking is convenient and attached to the hotel.  The hotel is right across from Mitsuwa Marketplace - we recommend going there instead of eating at the hotel - it is not to be missed - something special.
Manager Response: Dear gatordocs,  Thank you for your four star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad to hear that you loved our Executive Lounge and our convenient location.  Please come back soon.  Safe travels,  Rob

Summary: Me and my wife took our trip to Cali for the new year. We like to stay at the Costa Mesa Hilton every time we go. Service is good, friendly staff. Always happy to stay here. And I brought a friend to stay here too.
Manager Response: 671binhn,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the hilton costa Mesa.  I appreciate that you acknowledged my team's hard work in keeping the hotel clean and well maintained while delivering excellent service.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Love this hotel. Great location and Great Team
Summary: I have stayed here several times, and the rooms are always spotless, and well equipped. The entire team here are always very friendly, and helpful. Restaurant and bar in hotel serve late, and we love the Executive lounge. Last time we had to bring our dog, and everyone was very welcoming and kind.Thanks Again for another great stay!!
Manager Response: Dear Lea,  Thank you for you kind and gracious comments,  I am very pleased that my team made you and your whole family feel welcomed.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Short stay in Orange County in Dec 2016
Summary: Great and spacious accommodations station. We had a room in the executive floor, which fave us access to the Exec lounge. This gave us a great breakfast, complementary evening snacks and soft drinks at any time.
Manager Response: Dear Traveler,  Thank you for for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Good hotel but one of our rooms smell urine
Summary: We booked for two rooms,  with very nice view but my kids don't want to stay in their room because it smell like someone urinated on the floor. Security guard was sent to check the complaints/rooms which was so intimidating. The staff changed both rooms so we can stay in connecting rooms but with the poor view. Breakfast is better than some of the Hilton hotels I've been to.
Manager Response: Dear Turtledove,  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I apologize for not exceeding your expectations and I have shared your comments with my housekeeping and security teams.    Safe travels,  Rob

Summary Heading: Pretty to look at but nothing more.
Summary: No Hot Water to shower with, Fridge was broken and had to be replaced, TV was broken and had to be replaced. That along with poor internet service, no microwave in the rooms or available anywhere else if needed, food was very bland and the selection was awkward (mushroom fries....really) It was like a beautiful car with no engine! We were there for a conference and my sister and I were very disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear Niecolar,  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I have shared your comments with my team and have corrected the problems that you experienced. Once again, I am glad we made it right with you for these issues.  Safe travels,  Rob

Summary Heading: Wondeful stay over New Year's weekend
Summary: We were extremely happy with our stay at the Hilton Orange County / Costa Mesa. Abigayle at the front desk was wonderful and made sure we were happy with our room and stay.  Our suite was spacious and very comfortable especially the King bed in the master bedroom.  There is plenty of lounging area around the hotel and good food options as well.  Self parking was also very convenient in the attached garage.  We enjoyed the executive lounge during our stay. My one complaint was that breakfast on New Year's day was extremely crowded and they did not replenish the food quickly and ran out of food and coffee while I was there.  This was a disappointment but I guess they were not prepared for the crowd...everything else about our stay was wonderful so we would definitely come back.
Manager Response: Dear Corinne,  Thank you for the five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I appreciate that you acknowledged Abigayle and loved our property.  As the GM i am extremely lucky to have such a team.   I apologize  for your disappointment with the replenishment of the offerings in the executive lounge.  I will share your feedback with our Chef.     Warm regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: convenient location to food and South Coast Plaza
Summary: There is a great food court within walking distance.  If you YELP, you'll see the food court has at least 3-4 restaurants with 4+ stars.  Also, it is literally 2-3 minutes driving from South Coast plaza.  You can walk there if you have to but the shuttle service is even better.
Manager Response: Dear sddk31,  Thank you for your kind and gracious comments.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: We stayed here for one night, before heading towards the airport the next morning. The hotel has a beautiful driveway and a gorgeous reception area with blown glass decoration and glass lifts with vertically hung fairy lights. We enjoyed the outdoor jacuzzi before retiring to our spacious room with a view of the mountains. The bath was slightly dated but the taps for the sink were very pretty -  brass/gold coated. There were lovely soft pillow cases on the very comfortable bed, making for a pleasant stay. The only thing to mention that could have been improved was that when making two coffees in our room from the coffee maker, there was only one takeaway lid, so I got another from the Starbucks downstairs.
Manager Response: Dear Suzie,  Thank you for your four star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad that you loved our guest rooms and property amenities.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Very good location, super corteous staff, clean and quiet rooms, comfy beds, neat restrooms, great location. I would have liked to see more than the snack store for dinner on Christmas eve though. Overall a good experience.
Manager Response: Dear Luis,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work at keeping the hotel clean and well maintained while delivering excellent service.  Please com back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: I needed one more night to re-qualify for Diamond status, so I made a reservation near my house.  overall, this is a nice hotel, and I would recommend it  What I liked 1. location is convenient to Orange County airport, and close to the South Coast plaza mall 2. Very pleasant check in experience with Matthew 3. I got upgraded to a parlor suite on the executive lounge 4. The executive lounge was nice,  They have coffee, nuts and soft drinks all the time, and served dinner snacks 5-7, and breakfast 6-9  What I did not like 1. they charged for premium internet which is supposed to be complimentary for diamond members, and when I called them to reverse it, they put me on hold for 10 minutes before dealing with it 2. Parking charges are on the steep side
Manager Response: Dear Sean,  Thank you for your feedback and being a loyal Hilton Honors member.  I am sorry that my team did not exceed your expectations.  I will share your comments with them to ensure these issues do not recur.  Please come back soon.  Happy New Year,  Rob

Summary Heading: Great place to stay near SNA.
Summary: We stayed over night and rented a car the next morning. Free shuttle to and from the airport. Only wished it could take is to the mall, across the street as it was raining in Southtern California. Large room accommodates 2 adults and 2 kids. Staff was so kind and friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Vacay711,  Thank you for your kind a gracious comments.  My team and I appreciate them.  Please come back soon.  Rob

Summary Heading: Great experience, too far from LAX though
Summary: All in all my stay was peaceful and pleasant.Will be back sometimes in 2017.Your staff is very courteous.The environment is very friendly and inviting.For the price breakfast could have been a little bit better but all in all it was good and very convenient.
Manager Response: Dear E5076QMJohnm,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad to here that you loved our hotel.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Nice hotel but you have to pay $25 a night for parking. Happy that they have pet rooms. Rooms were clean and beds awesome. You can't tell this place accepts pets, well done. Great bar and dining area. Starbucks on site!!!
Manager Response: Dear Taustin5003,  Thank you for your five star post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa. I am glad that you loved our beds and appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work in keeping the hotel clean and well maintained.   Rob

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for a weekend long chess tournament on site.    Customer service. We requested early check-in around 9a but was declined. However, the receptionist took our number and in less than an hour we received a call saying a room was available and we were also upgraded with club privileges.  We were blown away!  Amenities. Hotel was relatively spacious but it could use some updates soon.  Room was clean and average size by hotel class and location standards.  In-room coffee machine but no minibar. In room fridge great for storing your own goodies.  In the club lounge, Light snacks at night and warm/cold breakfast options in the morning. (The breakfast staff were very nice and attentive.). There is a pool but we did not use due to rain. Starbucks and
Manager Response: Dear Mamadep,  Thank you for your five star rating and selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work in keeping the property clean and well maintained while delivering excellent service.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel 3 times for business.  The garage is always and issue and now my room was above the gym after they gave away the room I chose.  Sounds of the treadmill are not fun especially in the early morning.  They didn't have another room so offered to give me free parking.  Told me if I wanted to try tomorrow I would have to get there early in the morning to ask for a new room???  Not the best Hilton!
Manager Response: Dear Tanya,  Thank you for your feedback and for being a loyal guest.  I apologize for the for the noise that you experienced during your stay,  I will share your comments with my team to ensure that this does not recur,  Again, thank you for your comments.  Travel safe,  Rob

Summary: Great business hotel. Staff very Accommodating . Love the executive suite for breakfast and evening snacks.  The hotel also has perks depending on  the company you work for.  Location close to airport and south coast plaza.
Manager Response: Dear 437Carolynl,  Thank you for your five star rating,  i truly appreciate it.  Safe travels,  Rob

Summary: The hotel is located right where it should be. Close to shopping and I-405. Staff and facilities are very good. I would return again. Parking is plentiful and priced right. Rooms are updated. Executive lounge has a city view
Manager Response: Dear GT1_sea,  Thank you for your feedback.. I truly appreciate it.   Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: All in all, the price is high compared to some other places in the area, but it is worth it.  The hotel is clean, the staff is helpful, and I enjoyed my stay.  The bar has some fantastic food, namely the shrimp.
Manager Response: Dear Rob,  Thank you for your kind and gracious comments. They are truly appreciated.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Check-in and check-out was very efficient, i.e., no lines, etc. Updated rooms and lobby. Rooms very clean. Executive Lounge was a nice addition. Some street noise in room (room did face street). Parking fee was a bit much but typical for most hotels these days. Would definitely stay there again if a hotel stay is necessary.
Manager Response: Dear Tod,  Thank you for your five star rating.  It was greatly appreciated.    Safe travels,  Rob

Summary Heading: They know how to treat a guest!
Summary: My wife and I have been in-between homes for over 4-months.  We have stayed in many Hilton properties over this time and I have to make a commit concerning the Hilton Orange County.  FANTASTIC!  From the entire group at the front desk; maid service; hospitality room; food, etc., it doesn't get much better.  I mentioned to the girls at the front desk that my wife had back surgery and if we could move to a room more convenient for her.  No problems at all!!!  In just a short time they had a new room for us which was absolutely fantastic.  The other day the General Manager stopped me and just asked how our stay was.  We talked for a few minutes and he gave me his card to contact him if we needed anything.  This is service! Again, everyone from the top on down is fantastic and they
Manager Response: Dear Tom,  Thank you for your five star rating and for being a loyal diamond member.  I truly appreciate that you acknowledged my team's hard work in keeping the hotel clean and well maintained while delivering excellent service.  I am a very lucky GM to have such a team.  We hope that your wife has a full recovery and remember we most definitely have the best pillows in orange county.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Hotel was helpful, kind and was a great location.  Even had shuttle service to the Orange County Mall.  When remote was not working, they immediately took care of it and replaced it right away with a new one.   Only problem I had, was purchased salad from Pantry and was so tired from traveling forgot fork and dressing...my mistake...but might be nice if desk would ck on those items.
Manager Response: Dear 783lunnaeh,  Thank you for your four star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am sorry about your experience in the corner pantry and I will most definitely share your comments with my front desk team.  I totally agree that they should have  reminded you about the dressing and utensils.    Please come back soon.    Warm regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Very good location and hotel (for a Hilton)
Summary: Executive floor had very good breakfasts and enough food at night for a dinner even. All the staff are very friendly and helpful. The rooms are good. The keys unfortunately are still inadequate, but was told they're changing to digital soon. My 3rd stay in this hotel
Manager Response: Dear H2marcia,  Thank you for your four star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I appreciated that you acknowledged my team's hard work in keeping the hotel clean and well maintained while delivering excellent service.  I apologize for the experience that you had with our locks.  New ones are on order.  Again thank you for your feedback.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: This motel is very well kept with clean courtyards and a nice pool area. The rooms are spacious and clean. The restaurant has excellent food at reasonable prices. There are several places to eat within walking distance of the motel. The meeting rooms are large and comfortable making it easier to be inside all day.
Manager Response: Dear 17VCkennethc,  Thank you for your four star rating and selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I truly appreciate that you acknowledged my team's hard work in keeping the hotel clean and well maintained while delivering excellent service.  Please come back soon,  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: This was one of the best hotel stays that I have experienced in recent memory. The property was very attractive, everything seemed in good repair, and the staff was super friendly and personable! Online check in was extremely efficient and easy to use.   We were afforded a very generous upgrade to a magnificent suite. Beautiful woodwork throughout the suite gave it a very warm atmosphere, and the furnishings themselves were very comfortable, too. The bathroom was very functional and extremely luxurious with a standalone shower and a HUGE whirlpool tub! Upgraded tile and granite work and classy fixtures made it very elegant!  There was a huge couch in the living room with an attached chaise lounge. The couch boasted a pullout sleeper bed that was perfect for my son. Also in the
Manager Response: Dear Jsaxm,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I appreciate that you acknowledged my team's hard work in keeping the hotel clean and well maintained while delivering excellent service.  I am very pleased that you enjoyed our executive lounge and our breakfast.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Nice place,  unfortunately dirty, slow Internet
Summary: Stayed at the hotel for a conference being held at the adjacent conference center.  Check in was great and the staff were very friendly. The elevators were a tag dirty and the stairway, which I use regularly, was absolutely filthy. The stairway had a look and feel that someone might you waiting around the corner to attack you.  The room was very nice, however the shower had a considerable amount of soap scum and there was trash in the closet from a previous guest.  I'm not sure I would stay at this hotel again. Hoping that the conference will move locations next year.

When I left the front desk employee (a different one) helped me out finding the problem so I could get credit for my stay. Otherwise I had to call the customer service number and spend some unnecessary time on the phone to fix the mistake Hilton made with my account.

I could hear non-stop cars and the movement of the elevator each time it moved (very often).  I requested to move, but by then the hotel had filled, and the only 2 rooms available were wheelchair accessible ones, so  no bath or shower (just a corner of the tiled bathroom), minimal

The fitness center was pretty big for a hotel - 3 ellipticals and maybe 6 treadmills, plus the weight machines.  Only 1 exercise bike, which a friend told me wasn't for serious bike users.

I enjoyed the view also

The service in the restaurant is very slow, the prices are expensive, and if you are vegan or vegetarian, you choices are extremely limited.  There is a refrigerator in the room, so you can bring your own food, and there is a really good vegan place about two blocks away called Seabirds.  There is a Starbucks coffee stand in the lobby, and the staff there were wonderful.  The rooms are large, but a little worn out, and we had

My room was clean,  hot shower and decent water pressure. I had no

There is usually always something wrong with the room, either tv not working, fridge not turned on, alarm clock not working. As a gold member I am usually welcomed and looked after a Hiltons. At this one you are not. I was rudely informed at check in that I am not allowed lounge access. I have been in this executive lounge before and it would have to be the worse Hilton lounge I have ever been in. You have to pay for alcoholic drinks in the evening happy hour. The food offered in the evenings is dismal. A

At the bar or dinner, there was no sandwiches, salads or entrees that were entirely vegetarian  At lunch they had one pasta choice, veg soup had chicken broth, even there was a boring sweet potato dish for dinner. We were three veg eating boring and tasteless sweet potato for dinner.  For Hilton to have no options for vegetarians is not really acceptable. This is the reason I have given only three stars.  Many of our delegates had to go out for meals.
Manager Response: Dear KomillaS,  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad to hear that you enjoyed our Hotel. My overall stay was wonderful and I would definitely stay there again if and when I return to Costa Mesa, California.

Breakfast is expensive though. If time allows you can eat outside but if time is of essence, we don't have much choice.
Manager Response: Dear Sderi,  Thank you for your five star rating and for you loyalty.   I am happy to hear that you loved our property.  Your comments are greatly appreciated. Please visit again soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: We had a conference at the hotel and it was fantastic. The rooms were clean and the service was top notch. The food served in the meeting room was still warm and tasty. We also ate in the restaurant and the food and drinks were perfect.
Manager Response: Dear Raymond,  Thank you for your four star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I appreciated that you acknowledged my teams hard work in keeping the hotel clean and well maintained while delivering excellent service.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Always stay here at the Hilton Costa Mesa, friendly easy going hotel staff, bar good for drinks/food, cafe fab for coffee/snacks. Great location, yoga studio over the road is handy to, and great shopping down the road at South Coast Plaza.
Manager Response: Dear Krissygoldcoast,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad to hear that my team made you feel at home and that you love our location.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: I experienced discrimination on this trip. There was a white Lady that asked the help desk to Re-set her room key and she was not asked for her last name or to show her ID. I on the other hand was asked for my last name. I don't appreciate that at all.
Manager Response: Dear Deshunna,  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I apologize for the inadvertent issue with your room key and identification,  I have reviewed your comments with my team and  found that the guest in question was known by the guest service agent.  Again I am sorry that you were inconvenienced by this experience and hope that you will return soon.  Best regards,  Rob

Summary: The little details were not there. I did not get offered a water or  a cookie,,,I am ok without the cookie but the option is nice. Room was ok I am a HHonor but did not feel as though. I don't need super special treatment but nothing was different.
Manager Response: Dear NagemwF1330PB,  Thank you for you feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I apologize for my team not recognizing you as a Hilton Honors Member.  I have used your comments to redirect my front office team.  Again, thank you for your membership.  Best regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Reasonable Rate for Full Service Hotel, Suprisingly Good Location
Summary: Comfortable hotel with nice restaurant/bar area (it appears this front atrium area was added on after the original hotel).  The surprise is that there are some unexpectedly good casual dining options within walking distance, including a poke bar walkup and an artsy-kitschy 'mall' Called The Camp down the street which houses several dining options and a good bakery.  Also, this location provides easy access to Newport Beach/Balboa Peninsula.  Best of all, it is not Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear Phedras,  Thank you for your four star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am pleased that you felt at home with our restaurant and guest rooms.  I agree, we have a great location that is convenient to all of the awesome venues.  Best regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Airport shuttle does NOT run as advertised
Summary: The hotel claims their hotel shuttle runs from 5:30 am to 11:30 pm and they offer long term parking.  They instruct you to arrive 5-10 minutes before the shuttle departure time.  The shuttle leaves the hotel at the 1/2 hour and the airport at the quarter hour.  This was why we chose to use the hotel services.  We at  the airport shuttle pickup location at 11:08 for the 11:15 shuttle & waited.  At 11:25 we called the airport only to find the shuttle was already at the hotel and there were no more shuttles for the night.  Apparently the shuttle driver left well before the scheduled time.  We ended up having to grab a cab (which was $16 with tip).  The manager at the hotel could care less.  It wasn't the extra $16, it was the fact if you advertise a service, you should provide it.
Manager Response: Dear Stacy,  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa for your parking needs.  I am truly sorry that we were unable to provide transportation and you had to arrive by taxi.  As mentioned this was due to your flight being delayed and the last pick up of the day.  I am glad that we were able to make it right and take care of your cab fare.  Again, thank you for your feedback.  Rob

Summary Heading: Not what I expect from Hilton Property
Summary: The valet service kept texting me back sayin no one was available and they lost my boxes that were delivered to the hotel for my work event. This caused me to be late for my work event. They did not offer me my rewards waters upon checkin nor go through a run down of the hotel and where everything was
Manager Response: Dear Gleanda19752016,  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I apologize for not exceeding your expectations and for inconvenience that my front office team caused you.  I have used your comments to redirect my team and help prevent these issues from recurring.    Rob

Summary: Stayed on the Executive floor with 2 comfortable queen beds with really comfy pillows, for a very reasonable price. Free breakfast every day had Starbucks coffee, juices, bagels, danish, bread, fresh fruit, scrambled eggs, hot oatmeal, bacon and hash browns. The free evening reception had fresh fruit, tortilla chips with salsa and guacamole, veggies and dip, cheese and crackers, Starbucks coffee and a hot dish such as pot stickers or pigs in a blanket.  Overnight there was Reece's pieces, M & M 's, peanuts and wasabi peas. There was always free, cold  bottles of water and cans of Coke, diet Coke, Sprite and milk cartons.  Hotel was quiet despite being full and it was very clean.  Pool was nice. Free bagged ice available in the small store.   The ART bus (Anaheim Resort
Manager Response: Dear 324bw,  Thank you for your kind and gracious comments and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work in keeping the Hotel clean and well maintained while delivering great service.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Rob

Summary: Just spent the night for the trip home from SNA.  Really nice Hilton.  Staff couldn't be nicer.  Great outdoor pool.  Had a drink in the lobby bar.  Very nice bartenders.  The hotel offer valet parking but you can park yourself and it's complimentary.   It's a huge hotel.  But it's clean and the rooms are very comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear David,  Thank you for your Five Star Rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I truly appreciate your kind comments.  My team works hard to deliver a clean and well maintained property.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Stayed here for only 2 nights  in the executive floor rooms and it was great. Rooms are very quiet with not a lot of noise from the hallways and lower floors.  There is some view of the South Coast Plaza Mall nearby but that is all.  Great stay with friendly  and courteous staff. Will definitely stay here again
Manager Response: Dear Dino265,  Thank you for your Five Star Rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I appreciate your comments and will share them with my team .   Safe travels,  Rob

Summary: I am an HHonors member and as such I was able to pre-check myself.  However instead of a speedy check in process I had to wait almost 20 minutes to get a room.  I was told that the room I checked myself in online is actually not available as the TV was not working; my question was then why would the room be available for check in? Long story short I was then given a different room with 2 beds instead of the original room with king size bed requested.  Finally the manager offered points in my HHonors account to make up for the inconvenience which I have not seen yet.
Manager Response: Dear MD,  Thank you for your feedback and for being a Hilton Honors member.  I am truly sorry for your room not being ready and for the inconvenience it caused you. I will make sure to utilize your comments to re-train my team to ensure this issue does not recur.   I am glad we were able to make it right with points.   Again, thank you for letting me know about your experience.  Safe travels,  Rob

Summary: They were great when we arrived. They allowed us to check in 3 hours early which was great. Only problem was the service at the restaurant down stairs and the fact we had to call 2 times for extra pillows. Overall it was a relaxing stay
Manager Response: Dear Luzi615,  Thank you for your four star post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad to here that your had a relaxing stay and that my team took good care of you during MommyCom.  I am sorry that my restaurant team let you down.  I will review your comments with them and the housekeeping team.    Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Bought the magical memories package through Groupon for a free pass to Disneyland or Disney California Adventure with 2 night stay at the Hilton. Being a Marriott regular, I was quite impressed. My room was , the Executive King on 7th floor with free complimentary breakfast in the Executive Lounge.  An issue arose where they ran out of the passes for Disneyland however they credited my room and made other arrangements crediting me my parking for any inconvenience. Very nice hotel employees and manager making my stay there with my three year old granddaughter a wonderful experience. Marriott who?
Manager Response: Dear Giselle,  Thank your for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad to hear that my team took great care of you and your granddaughter.  I appreciate that you acknowledged that you were impressed with our rooms and the upgrade to the executive floor.  Please come back often and soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Business Stay at This Hotel - But very Nice!
Summary: So, given I am in hotels almost every week I did want to give the Hilton a shout out.  This is a great hotel, and a very nice room with a balcony.  I did not play in the pool, but it looks really nice.  Another thing they do that is very unique is that Room Service is catered by a sub company, and everything you order domes in this cool box including wine if you order it.  It is just super efficient, so I like it.  So you all will enjoy as well.  So I would give this hotel a 4 out of 5 for room service as they have nailed this process and it is super fast and the food is quite good. Also, they do have a shuttle from the hotel to the airport, so I expect they have one from the airport to the hotel.      /
Manager Response: Dear lisarb0630,  Thank you for your four star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I appreciate that you acknowledged my team's hard work in keeping our hotel clean and well maintained.  I am pleased that my culinary team exceeded your expectations with our new room service program.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.    Safe travels,  Rob

Summary: If you are planing a trip to LA this place is far if you want to visit the main streets of hollywood. if you are in  a business trip is ok to stay but you need a car, uber or cab to go around for shopping or a good restaurant. Hotel has a good swimming pool and outside jacuzzi that opens early if you want to enjoy an early swim before the crowd arrives. its climatised outdoors pool, the gym is small, the staff are very friendly, room service is poor as most of the options specially in room dinning food during the night is only packed, processed food and american junk with non or poor organic or healthy options. If you want to keep it healthy and shop or eat organic, places of interest nearby is NewPort Center with a small wholefoods 12 mins away by car or even better wholefoods
Manager Response: Dear Maca,  Thank you for your post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad to hear that you liked our pool and spa.   I truly appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work to deliver service excellence.  Please come back soon.  Safe travels,  Rob

Summary Heading: Very comfortable, but a few issues
Summary: I stayed at this hotel last week while on business in the area. I had a second floor room, thus no balcony, but that was just fine. I had an adjoining room but the door remained locked and there was absolutely no disturbing noise. The fitness center was great for my workout needs and I loved that it faced the pool. The front desk staff was very helpful. There were a few issues that I wasn't crazy about, though. First, upon arrival I was told that there is no complimentary breakfast which is odd for a hotel of this caliber. Second, upon check-in I had an incomplete set of toiletries in the bathroom. I found one bar of soap, a shower cap, and a tube of hair conditioner. That's it. I found a room attendant in my hallway and asked for some shampoo and she politely told me I'd have
Manager Response: Dear Marbledance,  Thank you for your four star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad that you enjoyed our buffet and that my team made it right for your experience with room service and bathroom amenities.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Best regards,  Rob

Summary: Excellent service, good communication when it comes to the manager.  thanks.. will stary again. thanks, all the care made me feel real good.  thank thank yoouuuu...will use this facility again   ..for the care i was given
Manager Response: Dear Digna,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad to hear that my team made you feel welcome and at ease.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.    Warm regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Comfortable hotel near the John Wayne Airport
Summary: If you need a room when you are coming or going to the John Wayne Airport. This is a good place to stay. The lobby has a nice breakfast and dining area. The hotel is close to the freeway and their are many shopping centers in the area.
Manager Response: Dear phxfox48,  Thank you for your four star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I appreciate that you enjoyed our restaurant and lobby.  I agree we have the best location in the area.    Safe travels,  Rob

Summary: Great location - close to major roads and airport, with residential areas, shopping and dining close by. Can walk ir drive if need be. Hotel has a nice atmosphere and very comfortable. Front desk staff professional and very laid back and attentive at the same time. Great stay.
Manager Response: Dear Maryannew403,  Thank you for your Five Star Rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work in keeping the hotel clean and well maintained while delivering excellent service.    Warm regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Good location close to South Coast Plaza
Summary: First time staying. Was impress d with the size of the rooms, however could use a refurb as some items need updating, in particular the bathrooms.  The a/c was noisy but didn't disturb me too much.  Close to John Wayne airport, about 10mins away, and the hotel has a free courtesy shuttle every 30mins.  Around 1km away from South Coast Plaza. Too far to walk but again the hotel has a free courtesy shuttle at set times throughout the day. Highly recommended.  Didn't use any of the restaurant or room service selection. This is America after all & cheap options everywhere. Golden Arches (McDonalds) across the road & 7-11 around the corner.
Manager Response: Dear Aoz48X,  Thank you for your Four Star Rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad to hear that you really liked the size of our guest rooms and our location.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon with many more good options.  Safe travels,  Rob

Summary Heading: Costa Mesa Hotel as a vendor for Bead & Design show 2016
Summary: Hotel was very clean and beautiful. The front staff could have been a little more helpful and accommodating with internet issues. Manager was very cordial.  Maids were super nice and helpful. No Ice machines?  have to go to lobby to get ice ?  No internet services in the ballrooms? That doesn't make sense..
Manager Response: DearScottsdalebead,  Thank you for your four star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work in keeping the Hotel clean and well maintained.  I apologize for your experience with the internet access.  This was part of the registration process and it must have been left out.  Again thank you for your feedback.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Staff is awesome and property is very nice. The travel between areas San Diego, Los Angeles,  and Long Beach were very doable, being the hotel was centrally located. We only had breakfast, but the buffet was very tasty and food temperatures were perfect. Although this trip was mainly business, we were able to enjoy the hotel leisurely as well.
Manager Response: Dear qpurdy,  Thank you for your Five Star Rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad that my team took excellent care of you and that you loved our breakfast buffet and central location for your business trip.  Again, thank you for your comments.  We look forard to welcoming you back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Ok so it's a Hilton fancy name and looks impressive on the surface and on first impression. Hotel was clean staff was nice. We were there for a baseball tournament in the area. There was no place in hotel to wash your own laundry late night(which happens when on road for sports games). Also no ice machine you have to go to in hotel Starbucks to ask them for ice. Rooms had a refrigerator but no microwave(so if you want warm your left overs from the night before your out of luck). Breakfast is not included(cost $20.00 per person). Hotel has an aging smell I'm sure from carpet age. AC in the room was noisy. Also heads up parking is not free for some guest(I guess it depends on your books perks). Conclusion for the money I pay less and stay at a holiday inn next round. I'm sure
Manager Response: Dear Gemmom9,  Thank you for your feed back and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work in keeping the hotel clean and well maintained while providing excellent service.  I apologize for the miscommunication regarding the breakfast and laundry machines .  I will make sure that we your comments are passed on to our sales team to communicate your experience to the team meeting planner.    Warm regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Nice hotel - staff attitude probelm at checkout
Summary: I had a minor problem with no shampoo in the bathroom - I did not discover this until the next morning as I was getting ready to shower.  I mentioned this to the person at reception on check-out and his response was a insincere apology.  He came across like he could really care less.
Manager Response: Dear Lloyd,  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I apologize for the desk clerks attitude and will discuss your comments directly.  I assure you that we care about our guest and we are disappointed in not exceeding your expectations.   Sincerely,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: I had a great reception/welcome by Front Desk Agent, Roseann. She made me feel welcome and appreciated upon my arrival. The entire staff was very friendly and helpful. Beds are very comfortable (both the mattress and pillows were great!).  The room had a mini fridge, which was very convenient. And I loved having a Starbucks in the Lobby!
Manager Response: Dear Sonia E,  Thank you for your Four Star Rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad you enjoyed your stay and that my team made you feel welcome.  I will most definitely recognize Roseanne at our team meeting today.  Again, I truly appreciate your feedback.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: This Hilton has clean, spacious & comfortable rooms.  There is plenty of parking (look underground) and a great outdoor pool & hot tub.  The Conference facilities were ample with a separate entry area as well.
Manager Response: Dear Kathryn L,  Thank you for your Five Star Rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am pleased that you enjoyed our guest rooms and our beautiful out door space.  Not many people realize that we have over 900 parking spaces.  Thanks for recognizing that and the hard work of my team to keep the hotel clean and well maintained.    Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: This hilton was beautiful, all the staff was friendly including housekeeping.  Beds are super comfortable and it's convenient to gas, food and shopping. The only negative is the parking garage is small and hard to find parking
Manager Response: Dear Kim C,  Thank you for your Five Star Rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I truly appreciate your kind and gracious comments and am very pleased that you loved our hotel.  I am sorry that you had trouble with our parking garage.  We are working on better directions.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: If you are a soccer team, don't stay here
Summary: We stayed at the Hilton Orange County when we were in town for Surf Cup. My rooming list had 12 rooms, all on the same floor near each other. When we arrived, half our rooms were not ready. All the rooms we received were on different floors, 5 different floors. The stairs are not convenient to use, so you are forced to use the elevators to go one floor. I was told they could not fix this problem because they were sold out, unless we wanted to check out of our rooms and back in the next day. That was not an option since we had early morning soccer games. Breakfast is not included. There is no guest laundry. Parking is expensive.  The hotel is beautiful, the pool is great and they have lovely outdoor patios. The valet and concierge and housekeeping staff were wonderful. The front
Manager Response: Dear Kira D,  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa mesa.  I apologize for not being able to accommodate your group all on one floor and for the inconvenience that it caused you.  This is not the normal way we treat our guest.  I will most definitely use your comments to help retrain my front office team to ensure that these issues don't recur in the future.  Again thank you for your comments.  I am glad that you liked the hotel and its amenities.  Best regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: I pays to be a HHonors member.
Summary: What a great place to stay. Beautiful Hotel. The front desk staff was very nice and welcoming. Not to mention very helpful. My room was nice and clean. I checked in online. I picked my room. It is the only way to go. It makes your arrival quick and easy so you can get in your room to relax. I only wish it would ask what temperature I wanted my room to be at when I walked in. I still had a very nice and comfortable sleep. I also enjoyed the executive lounge breakfast. So it was a great stay over all.
Manager Response: Dear Lowmoreno,  Thank you for your five star Rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.   I appreciate that you acknowledged my team for keeping the Hotel clean and well maintained while delivering service excellence.  I apologize for the room temperature as we set the the thermostats to conserve energy.  I agree with you, please call or text me the next time you you stay with us and I will have your room chilled.  714 438 4900.  Again thank you for your kind comments.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: I stayed here for a convention.  While the property itself was nice with convenient access to the airport, I don't feel it was within walking distance to restaurants.  I was very disappointed in the air conditioning for the room.  When I walked in for the first time, it was hot and muggy.  There was a total of one vent for the entire room and that was located on the wall in the back.  When I asked others if they had the same problem, they did as well.  While I like the hilton brand, I was disappointed in the front desk service along with the room itself.  I would honestly stay elsewhere next time.
Manager Response: Dear GVLADY,  Thank you for your post and feedback.  I apologize for the air conditioner not meeting your expectations and for the extremely hot weather we experienced during your convention.  We have taken action and are correcting the problems that you experienced with my front desk team.  Again thank you for your comments.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Rooms are big enough, big tv, beds and pillows good BUT bath tube was dirty, bathroom is old and small. They do not provide bathrobe nor slippers (not even on demand!)  Gym and pool are OK - provide towels, water and apples - equipments are new.  Receptionists and concierges are nice and helpful  Went for breakfast twice and had to run after the waiters to ask for an omelette both days. (but they do not have problem to come fast to ask you to sign the bill)  Shuttle for the mall every 2 hours.  Good wifi in the room, gym and lobby.
Manager Response: Dear Aurelie R,  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I apologize for not exceeding your expectations and for the inconvenience that these issues caused you.  I appreciate your kind words about our rooms, executive lounge, pool and health club.  These hotel amenities are generally well perceived and commented on.  I have reviewed your comments with my housekeeping team and they too were disappointed and vowed to take the extra steps to ensure the bathroom issue does not recur. Again, thank you for your post.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: tv signal for the channel we watch most frequently kept dropping, after 2 calls, still not corrected. gave up.  snacks in executive lounge missing. after 4 calls with guest services saying they would have it remedied straight away and it NOT remedied, gave up.  after 2 calls about really loud neighbors, suffering retaliation banging on connecting door and continued loud noise, we left our room during the day to get away from it and then after awaken @ 5:30am by it and guest services unable to mitigate it, we checked out much earlier than planned. (7am instead of check out time).  while they took half off our bill and dished out some extra points, i used to appreciate this location, but not anymore.
Manager Response: Dear Melanie,  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am truly sorry for your disappointment with the Television, executive lounge, follow up, and your noisy neighbors.  As you mentioned this is not the normal experience that we deliver to our guest.  I have reviewed your comments with my team and have implemented procedures to prevent these issues from recurring. I am glad that my team made it right before your departure,  We hope that you will reconsider and give us a second chance in the near future.  Again thank you for your comments.  Rob

Summary: Hotels is always clean and the staff are very helpful. Free shuttle bus several times a day to and from the South Coast plaza, however it is only a short walk. There are heaps of options for good food in the area, both in the Plaza complex and also the CAMP where you can find a bunch of cool little food outlets.  FYI there's also a free shuttle bus to John Wayne airport.
Manager Response: Dear CT,  Thank you for your Four Star Rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work to keep the hotel clean and well maintained while delivering excellent service.  I am a lucky GM to have such a team.  In addition,  I am glad that you were able to experience the many options for food and shopping.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Convenient parking for John Wayne Airport
Summary: I am reviewing this property only for the convenience of the parking in relation to John Wayne Airport.  This is a very attractive property, but we did not stay prior to our flight. Parking reservation was made through Cheapairportparking.com, which we have used countless times before, mostly at LAX.  Staff were very helpful in explaining how their shuttle to the airport works. Enter the hotel complex on Airport Way off of Bristol.  The parking structure is around the bend on the right.  Take the white ticket at the gate and save it for later.  Follow the signs for the elevator to the lobby.  The shuttle is a white non-descript van with minimal hotel markings.  Shuttles leave the hotel on the 1/2 hour and return from the airport on the quarter hour.  It is a very quick trip, the
Manager Response: Dear William S,  Thank you for your Five Star Rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa. I appreciate that you liked my team and our property.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Bitten by fleas in the bed, as dogs can now stay here, all food went bad in broken refrig, coffeemaker broke, A/C does not drop the temperature, cannot use the sliding glass door and lock was not working, toilet and sink in conference area broken, room not serviced, drawer with safe in it broken...maintenance nightmare. We all agreed that this was the last time we would stay here. It was shocking for a Hilton.
Manager Response: Dear Lisa M,  Thank you for your post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I apologize for not meeting you expectations and for the inconvenience the issues that you mentioned caused you.  I have followed up with my team to ensure these concerns do not recur in the future.  I am glad we were able to make it right.  Again, thank you for your feedback.  Rob

Summary: Although we had an issue with the room we booked not having a balcony they resolve the situation quickly and got us a new room they also fixed the refrigeratorthat wasn't working in a room as well. We were very satisfied
Manager Response: Dear Janice F,  Thank you for your Five Star Rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad to hear that we were able to make it right and satisfied your expectations.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Really Good Alternative to the South Coast Hotels
Summary: Normally I stay at the hotels on the other side of the 405, (closer to South Coast), but this time I tried the Hilton for a couple of days. The room was huge--not much of a view, but there are pool view rooms available. I would try to book one of those next time. The lobby is huge with plenty of places for the impromptu small meetings that I had. The gym was nice, and the pool area was really nice, too.   The location makes this Hilton a good choice if you need an airport hotel for work, but it also works for a vacation. It''s a quick drive to the beach without paying the beach premiums. And since it's near the 405/55, getting around Orange County in general is simple. For restaurants, The Lab and The Camp are right down the block. Parking is not cheap at the Hilton, though. I
Manager Response: Dear MLNC,  Thank you for your Four Star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad that you felt that our Hotel was nice and that you liked the pool and health club.  I agree with you that we have a excellent location that is close to everything.  Again, thank you for your kind and gracious comments.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Front desk staff needs basic customer service training.
Summary: Lovely stay two years ago prompted us to rebook last weekend. Room and housekeeping are still good, but the front desk staff has no clue what basic customer service looks or sounds like. Request for a quiet room was completely ignored. Warning - Don't stay on the pool side of the property because even on the 7th floor you will feel like the band is in your room with you - bad band at that. We couldn't even hear our television set. Front desk had no apologies - only excuses.
Manager Response: Dear KM,  Thank you for your post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa. I really appreciate your straight talk about my front office team not having customer service skills.   I will make it a point to use your words when we conduct our retraining process.  Again, thank you for allowing me time to correct the issues that you experienced.  We hope that you will give us a second chance.  Warm regards.  Rob

Summary: I arrived a little early and early check in was accomdated with a smile. Service was fast and the staff was very nice and helpful. The bed was super comfortable and there wasn't any noise from other guests. The hotel is located in walking distance to restaurants and the mall. I will stay again!
Manager Response: Dear 634kenyaj,  Thank you for your Five Star Post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I truly appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work to keep our hotel clean and well maintained while delivering excellent service.  We look forward in welcoming you back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Service far less than the value ! Housekeeping did not empty trash, bed was not well made, did not look like floor was vacuumed and left cleaning rag in bathroom. Electrical outlets in bathroom did not work as well as other outlets which included outlet where coffee pot was located.
Manager Response: Dear cynthiahg65250,  Thank you for your feedback.  Again, I apologize for the issues that you experience.  This was not acceptable. I have already followed up with the housekeeping and set up retraining to prevent these issues from recurring.  I am glad that I was able to make it right and hope you will give us a second chance the next time you travel to SoCal.    Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Irelanda, Ramy and Mirebela amazing reception staff. Nothing was too much trouble for them. They were friendly polite and informative no matter what you asked them. They are proud in what they do and this shows as I was satisfied with my queries as they were answered promptly.
Manager Response: Dear Feraz2016,  Thank you for your Four Star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I really appreciate that you acknowledged my front office team.  They work hard to deliver best in class service.    Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: I was able to relax and get refreshed in pool.  My room was quiet and comfortable.  Staff was friendly and helpful.  Great quality food.  The location was excellent with quick access to major freeway, fine dining, and shoping.
Manager Response: Dear Brian R,  Thank you for your Five Star Rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad to hear that you loved our hotel amenities and how my team made you feel well cared for.  Please come back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: I stayed in this hotel for nine days. I was there for a business conference. I was planing to stay 4 nights only and then look for another hotel. However, after seeing the hotel and it's nice amenities I decided to stay for the entire trip. I arrived in the afternoon. The check in was smooth. I stayed at the top floor where there was a complementary basic breakfast. The room was clean an comfortable. The staff at front desk were friendly and helpful. The hotel has a nice location where it is only 5-10 mins walk to South Coast Plaza Mall. One of the biggest Mall in Southern California. There is also a nice eating place close to the hotel where you can find some nice Japanese and Korean restaurants. Another nice eating place called the Halal Guys. They also have a free shuttle
Manager Response: Dear Mrtah,  Thank you for your Four Star Rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work to ensure that our hotel is clean and well maintained while striving for service excellence.  I am truly happy that you extended your stay and were able to take advantage of our stellar location.  South Coast Plaza and the many other venues and are fun and top rated.  I look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: This hotel is ok The rooms are big and have balconies to get fresh air into It's within walking distance to the mall (or $6 uber ride) and local cinema Staff are pleasant and happy to assist however breakfast was a little disappointing not much choice and the staff don't really say hi or let you know that you can't order anything even a drink to tour table everything is self serve which is odd It's roughly 45 minutes from LAX so if a quick in and out for a meeting is needed maybe the Marriott Torrance would be better suited
Manager Response: Dear xxGemxx,  Thank you for your Four Star Rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am pleased that you enjoyed our spacious rooms and our convenient location.  I appreciate your feedback on our breakfast and will review your comments to retrain my team.  Safe travels,  Rob

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for four nights for a conference.  I arrived in the evening and got a room on the fifth floor, my friends arrived earlier than I did and they ended up with rooms on the second floor, where the pool and fitness room are located.  If you are staying with children who like to visit the pool (as mine did), ask for a room on the second floor.  The hotel is beautiful, everything looks very updated and modern.  They have a restaurant on-site, slightly to your right as you enter the hotel with food prices starting at about $12.  They also have a Starbucks on-site, straight ahead as you enter the hotel, with a bar/Tv sitting area next to it.  To the left of the hotel entrance is a small study area with tall and lower tables for working on as well as two computers.
Manager Response: Dear KSH559,  Thank you for your Five Star Rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I truly appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work to deliver great service and ensure that the hotel is clean and well maintained.  Your comments touched about ever component of our property and will be awesome to share with my staff and guest.  I know that our first order will be to re-evaluate the ladies restroom stalls to speed up the lines and work on the ventilation. I truly appreciate your feedback and I am glad you and your family loved our hotel and the many venues close to our property.     Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Love everything about it. Very clean room and yummy breakfast/snack. Pool  feels really good on the right temperature. Next to shopping areas. 405 exit. Mcdonald across. Mitsuwa next corner. I have a great 3 days stay... Grand lobby entrance.
Manager Response: Dear Mrlaranang,  Thank you for your Five Star Post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work in keeping the Hotel clean and well maintained while providing excellent service.  I am glad that you love our location and how convenient we are to places you wanted to be.  Again, thank you for your comments.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Love the bed and bedding at Hilton !
Summary: Like sleeping on a cloud.  The mattress, comforter and pillows are perfect.  The rooms are always cool and quiet and I get the best sleep -- better than home. The free breakfast is always delicious and the staff is always so friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Barbara T,  Thank you for your Five Star Rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am pleased that you loved our spacious rooms and our cozy beds.  I appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work to deliver excellent service and food.  I look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Stayed just for one night after coming back from Mexico. Check in was a breeze and friendly. The lobby is a welcome site the way they have it set up. Very nice. Room was more than I expected. Large, clean and a very comfy bed. A fresh smell as you walk through the door.The bathroom was of average size and nice lighting for my wife getting ready in the morning.  A nice bank of elevators that were all in working condition. If you are in need of something, don't complain, just ask. These folks are trained right and will go out of their way to help. I self parked and had a nice choice and no problems finding a space. The hotel is close to many things with or without a car. We didn't use the pool, but it looked very inviting. This Hilton is a real gem and It will be my go to hotel
Manager Response: Dear Mickey P,  Thank you for you Five Star Post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I truly appreciate that you took the time to compliment my teams hard work to reach for service excellence.  I also want to thank you for being a loyal Diamond member.  Please let me know if I could be of assistance upon your return.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Not only was this hotel extremely clean, but the staff was extraordinary! Best customer service I've experienced in years! The rooms were always cleaned to perfection. The front desk staff was extremely accommodating. The lobby bar/restaurant served wonderful food, and they stayed open extra late when we asked. The pool area was very relaxing, and the gym was above par for a hotel. And, having a Starbuck's in the lobby was really great!  No matter what I requested (directions, extra towels, late check-out, etc.) I heard "yes." What a pleasure!
Manager Response: Dear Beth F,  Thank you for your kind and gracious comments and Five Star Rating.  I truly appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work to become best in class.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: Over friendly and helpful staff. Spacious and clean room. Extraordinary service.nice swimming pool and jacuzzi . Convenient to highway . Excellent breakfast. Good for both business and leisure. Highly recommend if you are visiting Southern California .
Manager Response: Dear Mohamed579,  Thank your for your kind and gracious comments.  I am glad that my team exceeded your expectations and that you enjoyed all of our amenities.  I look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Warm regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary Heading: Can't beat it for the price.
Summary: We were very impressed with the amenities and atmosphere.  Everything was clean and well taken care of.  The staff was very helpful and friendly; especially the valet.  The gym was sufficient and the overall experience was a 10.
Manager Response: Dear Mathew M,  Thank you for your Five Star Rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad that you found my team helpful and our hotel clean and well maintained.  I will share your feedback with the valet department and front desk.  We look forward to your next visit.  Warm regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: The front desk was fabulous. The The front desk experience can make or break your vacation.the staff were wonderful and friendly. The hotel shuttle drops off to south coast plaza and is close to airport. Japanese grocery store and food court close by to pick up sushi and great food at reasonable prices.
Manager Response: Dear SusanwT1544QH,  Thank you for your Five Star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work to provide excellent service and for ensuring that our hotel is clean and well maintained.  I am lucky to have them.  Warm regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary Heading: Missing that something you want at a Hilton
Summary: I stay at Hilton properties almost weekly. You come to expect a level of service, a level of comfort and a Hilton standard. At this Hilton, I encountered and observed some issues. But it is a Hilton and because of that, I gave it 4 rather than 3 stars.  First is the parking. I would recommend using Valet parking, because the self-parking lot is small and over a couple of days, it was a snipe hunt to even find a vacant spot. People parked all over the place, when they just gave up and left their car double parked, in the middle of the drive.   The number of times I went to the front desk, there were other people there complaining - about their room, about room charges, etc. The staff did not seems overly concerned or even helpful. I had a problem with a charge and was told it
Manager Response: Dear SusanneCa,  Thank you for taking the time to give me your feedback on your recent stay here in Costa Mesa.  First I would like to apologize for not meeting your expectations.  We usually receive very positive comments regarding the service and our amenities.   Unfortunately I dropped the ball here regarding your arrival experience and housekeeping issues that you experienced.  I would appreciate it if you could call me so I can make it right.  (714 438 4900)    Warm regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Stayed on the third floor and was very pleased.  The garage parking was easy, with good access to the lobby.  The desk clerk was friendly and attentive.  Third floor room overlooked rooftop parking lot.  Very quiet at night.  Bathroom was large and clean.  Elevators worked quickly and were readily available even with a full hotel.   The meeting space had no exterior windows but was still comfortable.  Lunch in the restaurant was served quickly (wow) and tasty.  The business center was available when needed.  Very pleased.
Manager Response: Dear 1GiantsMS,  Thank you for your Five Star Rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work in providing excellent service and ensuring that the Hotel is clean and well maintained.  I am a very lucky GM to have such a awesome group of all stars.  Its nice to hear that you enjoyed your meeting and liked our offerings in the restaurant.   I will make sure to pass on your feedback at our staff meeting today.    Warm regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: We have just spent a week at the Hilton Orange County/Costa Mesa.   Staff very courteous, rooms nice and clean and buffet breakfast sufficient to keep you sustained throughout the day.   Pool nice and gym facilities clean and well maintained.
Manager Response: Dear C1010ZEab,  Thank you for your feedback and selecting the Hilton Costa mesa.  It was nice to hear that you enjoyed your accommodations and liked our food and gym.  I will share your comments with my team.  Again thank you for your post.  Warm regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: My first stay in this hotel.  The room was nice and well furnished.  However the food in the hotel was very lack lustre and frankly below what I have experienced elsewhere.  This was added to the fact the coffee shop had a broken espresso machine for my 4 day stay!
Manager Response: Dear B5828XLLandrewb,  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I was glad to hear that you liked our accommodations.  I apologize for our food not meeting your expectation and for the espresso machine being out of service.  We had to have parts shipped with caused the delay.  I would love to hear more about your stay and make it right.  Warm regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager 714 438 4900

Summary: This stay was booked as part of a large group-about 400 of us for four days.  The hotel was a fairly typical hotel for anyone who travels frequently; one with large public spaces and decent-sized rooms.  Surprisingly, the staff were not warm and welcoming.  They were professional but that was all.  I did not feel like they wanted my business and frankly, if this had not been a required event, they would not have had it.    Like most hotels, the common rooms were very cold.  We had our staff requesting temperature changes daily.  What could not be changed was the dim lighting throughout the hotel.  Not sure if they are saving electricity or providing mood lighting, but it did not work for me, especially in my room.  I do want to compliment the banquet staff on accommodating so
Manager Response: Dear LisaroseB,  Thank you for your post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I appreciate your comments and will use them to help retrain my team.  There is no excuse why we did not make you feel welcome and appreciated.  I will also investigate the air conditioning and lighting issues that you pointed out.  Again we want our guest to be comfortable and not be frozen.  It was nice to hear that you like our banquet food offerings.  Again, I am very sorry for not meeting your expectations and promis we will be better upon your return.   Warm regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Great hotel with all the Hilton treamings, the reception team is always friendly, the room are clean and modern, bathroom has been modernized toiletries are very nice.  Business lounge has a fantastic breakfast served daily in the evening the offer is very limited and uninspiring, upart from one day of the week, can't remember wich one, drinks are charged in the lounge, very unusual for a business lounge.  Parcels delivered to the hotel for guests are charged a US$15 by hotel, I was very surprised and extremely annoyed, I have never seen such a charge before.
Manager Response: Dear Freddy C,  Thank you for your four Star Rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa. I appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work to provide exceptional service and in keeping the hotel clean and well maintained.  I apologize for surprising you on our parcel charges.  You should have been informed by my team.  We have an extremely heavy volume of  guest packages delivered here daily.  Again, thank you for your comments I will most definitely pass them on to my team.  Safe travels,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Internet connection not good at all.  Coffee machine was worthless; however,  all else was great.  Bed was king sized and comfortable.  Showers were nice and bathrooms were clean and well decorated.  Beautiful hotel....quite a surprise based on the outside appearance.
Manager Response: Dear Sherrip933,  Thank you for you Four Star Rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I apologize for the trouble you experienced with our internet and the coffee maker.  I will have both items checked out to ensure that these issues do not recur.  I appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work in keeping the hotel clean and well maintained.  I look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warm regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Upon arriving at this property I was impressed with the beautiful presence of this Hilton. I am a diamond member who pre checked in online. Something I am not entirely comfortable with but did. I arrived at 1:30 and found my room was not ready which I anticipated before 3:00. I had lunch in the bar area and found it quite nice but a bit pricey (**). The intererior was equally pleasant and comfortable.  I was here for a meeting which will cover several days. Our meeting room was very comfortable. After our meetings we utilized an outdoor space privately. A very nice perk as the rooms are smaller than our usual ones. I did have an issue with the AC in my room which is still, after 2 days, in need of repair. I am assured it will be taken care of this afternoon. On a side note
Manager Response: Dear Stephanie H,  Thank you for taking the time to give me your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.
