I am happy that you found our property comfortable, clean and well maintained.    I am sorry for the delay in your check in and the A/C issue.  It was nice  to have had an opportunity to make it right.  Based on your comments we have taken action to get these issues corrected.  Again, I do appreciate your post and look forward to welcoming you back soon.    Warmest regards,  Rob

Summary: Loved the hotel. The rooms were clean and the beds were comfortable. We spent 2 nights and it was a very quiet hotel considering all the events that were going on. The hotel is also very close to the mall with lots of places to eat nearby, not walking distance but close. Parking is awful when they have events going on and it costs guest 30.00 a day with I personally think is ridiculous. The room service menu is limited and to get ice you have to go downstairs to the little Shop in the lobby. All of the staff we came in contact with were nice and helpful. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Bonitab209,  Thank you for your Four Star Rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work to keep the hotel clean and well maintained.  In regards to the parking and ice, I apologize for any inconvenience they may have caused you.  We most definitely should have explained the protocol more clearly.  Once again thank you for your comments and I look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warmest regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Staff is fantastic.  Hotel needs some modification.
Summary: Booked my room through the online app where it lets you select a room.  Selected a room close to the elevator lobby for speed of getting to morning meetings.  Tip: the elevator shaft is NOISY.  Don't do what I did!  Second tip: the rooms that are oddly numbered saddle up to the courtyard.  This makes your room very dark and with no windows to the open air.  The room felt like a cave.  Ask for a room that is even-numbered, and ask for one in the upper floors, away from the elevator shaft!
Manager Response: Dear Tanya M,  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I apologize for the noise issues and not meeting your expectations on your room location.  I will ask my front office team to ensure that the locations that have been selected are fully explained.  Again, thank you for your solid comments.  I look forward in welcoming you back soon.  Warmest regards,  Rob

Summary: I spent 2 nights here for business. The food was fine. Unfortunately the rest needs work. The room had 2 beds...on one the sheets had some sort of ink stain. Thankfully I was alone and could use the second bed. Internet service was sporadic. My biggest issue came from check in. After a long flight the lock to my room wasn't working. Rather than offering me a new room, the staff tried to send me up (for what would have been a third time) with an engineer. Really?? When I requested a new room they at first made it seem like that was not possible until I pressed the issue. I will try the Weston next time and hope for better.
Manager Response: Dear Barbara B,  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I apologize for the problems that you experienced with your lock and room.   We are in the process of upgrading our lock system to correct the de-magnetization of the key cards. Again I am very sorry we did not exceed your expectations.  It obvious that my team needs  more training in dealing with these issues.  It would be greatly appreaciated if you could give us a second chance to prove this is not the normal guest experience.    Warmest regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Excellent Hotel for Families and Singles, Business Gatherings and Relaxation
Summary: We are here for a Business Meeting with the CSR for a Board of Director's Meeting this week. It is our first time as guests here.  Our room is a Standard Room, with excellent work areas, very clean and very comfortable. Upgraded rooms are available, but we have found that Standard Rooms are really nice and we have no real need to upgrade. The pool area is absolutely fantastic. There is a gym also.  Pool hours begin at six am, so I'll be catching my workout in the pool in the morning, before we start business for the day. I had the pleasure of meeting Jaleesa, the Front Desk Agent who was polite and professional in addressing my questions and concerns. Then I met the Director of Front Office Mr. Michael Flowers, who also welcomed me as a first time guest and informed me that if
Manager Response: Dear Michael S,  Thank you for taking the time to give us a FIVE STAR RATING and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work in keeping the property clean and well maintained. It is always nice to hear when our guest enjoy all of our amenities.  Especially the pool area.  Again, thank you for your kind and gracious comments.  We are all glad that we exceeded your expectations.     Travel safe,  Rob

Summary: Short ride from John Wayne Airport.  Nice hotel - clean, modern.  Very consistent with the Hilton Brand.  Location is great if you are flying out of John Wayne airport.  Will definitely stay there again on my next trip to Orange County.
Manager Response: Dear James H,  Thank you for your Five Star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  Your kind and gracious comments regarding my team, the location, and how well we keep the property clean and well maintained is greatly appreciated. We look forward in welcoming you back soon.  Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Excellent & Clean Rooms Great Breakfast Available parking but expensive Location is great and close to Newport Beach Great Fitness Center Good Family Pool Overall in a good neighborhood and fun place to stay for the family
Manager Response: Dear Nikhil'  Thank you for your four star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I really appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work in keeping the property clean and well maintained,  I hope that you and your family were able to make it to the beach and enjoy the SoCal surf and sun.  Once again thank you for your feedback.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Enjoyed a comfortable and easy stay. Beds were so comfortable and room was spotless. Beautiful hotel. Close to great shopping and close to highway so we could visit many sights during our trip to the OC and LA.
Manager Response: Dear Carolina R,  Thank you four your Five Star Rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa,  I am glad that my team exceeded your expectations and you loved our property.    Your acknowledgement of their hard work in keeping the property clean and well maintained is greatly appreciated.  We look forward to serving you again soon.  Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary Heading: Paid for a place to sleep
Summary: The hotel was nice, but I find it odd that a business that offers sleeping accommodations in exchange for money also hosts late night parties. They finally turned the music down after I called the front desk. Pool was nice. Parking was expensive.
Manager Response: Dear Canyonpeople,  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad that you found our Hotel and amenities nice.  We are most definitely  competitive for weddings and parking in our market.  I apologize for the late night noise.  We should have reserved your room away from the reception area.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Family trip to Irvine for my son to leave from college dorm back home. After long drive from San Jose, CA the hotel stay must be trouble free. Close to a Japanese market place (Mitsuwa) was a nice surprise.
Manager Response: Dear UCI,  Thank you for your Four Star Rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am pleased that you enjoyed our Hotel and the Mitsuwa market across the street.  Warm regards,  Rob

Summary: We spent 2 nights at this hotel for a wedding. We were greeted warmly by the hotel staff and were relaxing in our room in no time. I he view was of a parking lot across the street but could not hear any noise through the window. The breakfast in the executive lounge was very good. It had something for everyone with hot dishes and oatmeal, lots of fruit and pastries, as well as all kinds of hot and cold beverages. This lounge is available all day to just sit and have a drink.  The wedding took place in the terrace area outside on a fountain filled patio. It was quiet and intimate for a beautiful wedding. It was converted to a lounge area with fire pit, cocktail tables and comfortable chairs in a matter of 10 minutes after the ceremony. Everyone in the staff worked quickly and
Manager Response: Dear Debra C,  Thank you for your four Star post and for Staying with us.  I am glad to hear that you enjoyed our rooms and loved our executive lounge.  I agree we have an awesome setting for an intimate wedding and it sounds like your event went extremely well.  I appreciate that you acknowledged the hard work of my team to ensure all of the details were tended to.  Once again, thank you for your kind and gracious comments,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: We stayed here 1 night after arriving into Orange County on a late flight.  The main lobby and bar area looked nice and inviting, but we were travelling with 2 kids, so we headed up the the room without enjoying it.  The beds were comfortable and the bathroom was roomy.  It was convenient, clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Christine C,  Thank you for your Four Star post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad that you found our rooms comfortable and roomy.  Please come back soon to enjoy our lobby bar and restaurant when you have more time to relax.  We also have park and fly packages available for summer vacationers.    Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Very loud room. Maid walked in on my daughter while changing her pants even though the DO NOT DISTURB sign was on the door. She had surgery so was unable to cover quickly. The solution was to offer points. Not a good solution. A/C in conference rooms is broke most of the time.
Manager Response: Dear rig482,  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  As I mentioned on our call this situation was unacceptable.   This  was an unfortunate anominally and I am sorry it happened. I have taken your comments back to my housekeeping team to reemphzise our protochol.  Once again I am truly sorry that this happened and  am glad we made it right and hope that you will give us another opportunity to serve you.   Sincerely,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Stayed for business on Friday/Sat nights. Paid extra for the Executive Floor. First, shuttle left us at the airport because they brought their small van and the was not enough room for the last three people. Said they would send another shuttle, but after 20 min wait we took a cab. Other shuttle bus was parked at the hotel when we arrived. So the "big lie".  Executive club was a joke. Ran out of food first night and next morning. No coffee, little food and hot drink machine broken. Went downstairs for breakfast since there was almost no food in the Lounge and staff overwhelmed. Hotel was busy, so they should have known they needed more staff.  Overall hotel is tired looking. Needs serious update.
Manager Response: Dear Timm5353,  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am truly sorry for not meeting your expectations with our shuttle bus and our Executive lounge. There is no excuse for not being prepared.  We rarely have issues with these two components, but it is obvious that I need to retrain my team.  Again, I apologize for these issues and appreciate your post.  I am sure that it will help me prevent these issues from recurring.    Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: This is my second visit to this Hotel.  The check in was fast and the room was clean and comfortable. The staff is amazing, also The location is very close to Santa Ana Airport and the 405 The hotel restaurant serves good food. So in all a reasonably priced hotel that is very nice .
Manager Response: Dear BStratham,  Thank you for your Four Star post and selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa again.  I appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work in keeping the hotel clean and well maintained.  I will ensure that your comments are delivered to my front office and culinary teams.    We look foreword in serving again in the near future.    Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Overall stay was pleasant.  The staff was welcoming and friendly. The hotel is near shopping and lots of eateries. The decor in the hotel is very up to date and modern. The hotel also has an Starbucks for that all day caffeine fix.
Manager Response: Dear 81Stacey,  Thank you for your feedback and for choosing the Hilton Costa Mesa. I truly appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work in keeping the property clean and well maintain.  I am very glad to hear that you got a little power shopping in while you relaxed at our Hotel.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary Heading: $ 25 TO PARK YOUR CAR FOR 1 NIGHT
Summary: This hotel has a $25 a day charge for parking. They have no ice machines on the quest room floors. never again. I can see that this hotel needs to have some improvements made in the quest rooms. the closets are small and have a selves in the middle that make your long dress hang on the floor. the counter in the bathroom is way to small to place your cosmetics on.
Manager Response: Dear Buenaparkboop,  Thank you for you post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I truly apologize for not meeting your expectations.  My team should have explained the parking fees and our ice delivery system more thoroughly.  I will ensure you that my team understands your relative comments to prevent these issues fro recuing in the future.  Again thank you for your feedback.  Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: I had the pleasure of staying at this Hilton property for an annual convention last week.  The banquet and restaurant food was excellent, the staff was very attentive and accommodating any time anything was needed.  They were efficient with our requests and took care of anything we needed quickly and always with a smile.  The hotel rooms are some of the largest we have ever been able to stay in. This convention had over 500 attendees and was the best hotel so far to host our convention that I have stayed in over the five years I have been attending this convention.  I cannot say enough positive things about this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Josanole,  Thank you for your Five Star post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am very pleased that you found our hotel comfortable and that my team exceeded your expectations.  We truly enjoyed your convention and wish you all the best next year.  We hope that you will return soon to enjoy your home away from home.  Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary Heading: Ladies Oriental Shrine of North American convention
Summary: The best staff ever, Right from check in to check out,  Rooms were spacious and clean. Lots of smiles from every one.  The banquet food was amazing,  This would be the place to book a convention.  They took care of our needs in a fast and efficient way. Centrally located to shopping and entertainment.  Airport within minutes but never heard a plane.   Definitely  would book again
Manager Response: Dear KarenPHP,  Thank you for your kind and gracious Five Star post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad that we exceeded your expectations and that your conference was a success.  I truly appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work to make our guest feel that our hotel is their home away from home.  Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Just spent a week at this Hotel property for  our annual convention and can say the staff could not have been more attentive to our needs. I have stayed at many hotels through out my business career and greatly appreciate staff members who dedicate themselves to exceeding their guests expectations every time, every day and this Hilton Hotel truly value their guests. Thank you Hilton Costa Mesa!
Manager Response: Dear Michelle M,  Thank you for your Five Star post and for selecting the Hilton costa Mesa.  I really appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work in exceeding your expectations and for keeping the property clean and well maintained.  We look forward to serving you again soon.  Safe travels,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: The Hilton Orange County/Costa Mesa Hotel was the best possible place I could have booked my convention for 650 people. The staff was amazing in every possible way, and did everything possible to make this convention the best experience for every person in attendance. The banquet food was excellent. The meeting rooms were perfectly set-up for every event. The AV services provided the very best sound and visuals. The hotel rooms are lovely. Parking excellent. It was perfect in every way and surpassed my expectations. Great management and very professional staff. Thank you for my wonderful experience.
Manager Response: Dear Grandbeacon,  Thank you for your outstanding Five Star Post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa. It is greatly appreciated that you acknowledged my teams hard work to exceed yours and your groups expectations. It was most definitely a pleasure serving you.  We wish you all the best on next years convention.   Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary Heading: Ladies Oriental Shrine of North America convention
Summary: I can't say enough about the hotel staff. They bent over backwards to accomodate our enormous needs, from changing out the ballrooms for different functions on multiple days to the excellent meals for our banquets and luncheons. Our event co-ordinator, Ryan Lytle, banquet captains Rafael, Robert and Jose and our sales manage Deb Sanders were all pleasant, efficient and were wonderful to work with. A convention of our length is a huge undertaking and they were all pros. Could not be happier.
Manager Response: Dear Sandi G,  Thank you for your positive Five Star post and for you and all of the other nice ladies that selected the Hilton Costa Mesa.  We all truly enjoyed serving your group.  It is greatly appreciated that you acknowledged Ryan,Rafael,Robert,Jose Deb, and the rest of my teams hard work to ensure that your convention was a great success.  I am truly proud of my team and feel very fortunate that they are here.   I wish you all the best in  next year's convention.  Again thank you for such wonderful feedback.  I will share your comments at our all employee meeting this Friday.    Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Excellent facility with one exception, no ice machine on floors. You must pick up ice for lobby store or pay (tip) for room service. very inconvenient! Banquet facilities were great; catered food excellent. Staff very accommodating and helpful.  My convention had several emergencies and staff were very quick to respond and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Sandra N,  Thank you for your Five Star post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad that that you recognized my teams hard work to exceed your expectations and accommodate your needs.  I am truly sorry that we did not explain the ice delivery thoroughly enough.  I will ensure to retrain my team so no one else is disappointed.     Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Housekeeping was the only good thing about this Hilton. Everything else was below expectations and experiences from any other I have stayed at. Bring your own food if you want to eat as restaurant was the worst at service in a timely manner.
Manager Response: Dear Sandra M,  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am sorry that we missed the mark with our food and service in our restaurant.  Generally we receive positive feedback.  Based on your comments it's obvious that my team needs to be retrained.  Again, I apologize for your experience and assure you that we will take counter measures  to prevent these issues from recuing in the future.    Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: In town for a convention, the hotel had wonderful meeting rooms and ballroom. Great location near the airport and South Coast Plaza.  Very nice hotel with spacious rooms.  Delicious food and nice wine choices.  Would stay there again if in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Lora G,  Thank you for your Five Star post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am extremely pleased that you enjoyed our delicious food and award winning wines.  In addition, I truly appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work in keeping our property clean and well maintained.  We look forward to serving you again.  Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Wonderful 10 day stay during national convention. Staff was outstanding from top to bottom. More words will just be superfluous.  The entire stay was lovely, fun, and satisfying. Nothing was neglected nor left to chance. All requirements were met graciously by each member of every department.
Manager Response: Dear Harlene J,  Thank you for your kind and gracious Five Star post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad that my team and property exceeded your expectations.    Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: The convention facilities were comfortable and had all of the technical items needed.  There were too few elevators for a group of this size for the rooms, especially when one is disabled.  The food was very good and there could have been more staff to handle the guests.
Manager Response: Dear 756Dianahs,  Thank you for your four star post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am happy that you felt at home and enjoyed our property. It is much appreciated that you acknowledged  my teams hard work in ensuring that our food exceeds the guest expectations.  I am a very lucky GM to have such an awesome team.  Again, thank you for your feedback.  Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Everyone worked with a smile and willingness to make this a very satisfying experience.  It appears that the Hilton thought of everything to make my weeks stay very accommodating.  There is a well appointed snack "store", fitness room, pool, lounge/bar, buffet and restaurant.  The rooms are clean and quiet.
Manager Response: Dear Hug Janet L,  Thank you for your Five Star post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa. I truly appreciate that you enjoyed your stay and acknowledged my teams hard work to exceed your expectations. I wish you the best on next year's conference.  Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: What an exceptional hotel and staff.  The hotel is located in the heart of the city, with easy access to the freeway, shopping and restaurants. The next time I am in Costa Mesa this will be the only hotel I will stay.
Manager Response: Dear Melody G,  Thank you for your wonderful Five Star post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am very pleased that my team exceeded your expectations and that you loved our property. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: The housekeepers were excellent and very helpful  more than willing to please every request with cheer and smiles   The housekeepets were bery professional also amd serious anout their work  the hand delivery of ice was so nice   It was spoiling me  the waiters were however bery rude in the banquets that we attended  they did mot complete serbing each tanle and skipped all around  the room  there is never enough butter on the banquet tables   8 or 10 little 1/4 of a teaspoon balls for ten people at the table  cause hard feelings by the people who get no butter at all and the waiters say they will bring more but never show up again
Manager Response: Dear 291Suzanneh,  Thank you for your Five Star post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  It was very nice of you to recognize my team for spoiling you.  I have followed up with my banquet team and discussed your comments regarding their behavior. Your comments resonated with them and I am sure will help in preventing these issues from recurring in the future.   This was extremely disappointing and I sincerely apologize for them not anticipating your needs  or following up with your request.  Again, thank you for your kind and gracious comments about my team.    Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: If you have a convention rate, but book online, be sure you get something in writing to verify the rate change.  Watch your bill for extra phone call charges,  Rooms are great, Banquets are great, but service slow in restaurant.
Manager Response: Dear Nora T,  Thank you for your post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  You are absolutely right about online rates and group rates being different.  I certainly apologize for this not being explained thoroughly.  I am very appreciative that you enjoyed the rest of our services and thank you for recognizing the hard work of my team.  I will emphasize your comments at our next team meeting.  I am sure they will help in preventing these issues from recurring in the future,  Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Stated already.. Do not want to say any more.. Will not be stating any more that service should have been better in the dinning and bar area, Not enough help. the help on duty were over worked and shows frustration because they could not get the kitchen help to serve the customers.
Manager Response: Dear Janice M,  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I apologize for the poor dinning experience and for being under staffed.  There is no excuse for that.  We have since adjusted our staffing model to eliminate this from recurring. In addition, I am glad we had an opportunity to make it right.  Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: The hotel staff will spoil you and the food fantastic.  The rooms very comfortable and clean.  From the time you arrive until the time that you leave, you will be treated royally.  The hotel location is close to a major shopping area and the parking is very convenient and safe.  Since this was a working stay, I was not able to use additional facilities, but it is nice to know that they are available.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone who is visiting the area and wanted a clean and comfortable place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Barbara C,  Thank you for your outstanding Five Star post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I appreciated that you acknowledged my teams hard work in keeping the Hotel clean and well maintained.  I am also extremely pleased that my team exceeded your expectations and treated you royally.  I am truly blessed to have such a team.  Again, thank you for your positive feedback and recommendation.  Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: We were there for a conference that lasted practically from wake up time to bedtime each day, so we really didn't get to see much of the hotel except for our room and the conference room. But everything was kept up nicely, very modern, mostly clean, and I slept fantastic.  The rooms blocked out noise very well. There was even a dog convention going on at the same time, and I could only hear dogs whining when we walked past their room doors and they were sensing people walking by. However, two mild complaints... 1) I was a little surprised that they let dogs stay in the hotel and didn't mention anything about pets.  Not sure I'd want to stay in a room where pets had been staying right before me.  Especially if I was allergic.  I'm am, but not that bad, but if someone else IS
Manager Response: Dear Simple M,  Thank you for your Four Star post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad that you recognized my teams hard work to keep our property clean and well maintained.  I am truly blessed to have such a great team.  We hope to see you in the near future and again thank you for your feedback.   Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: was there this past week for a convention, called front desk about toilet running. repairman came wiped down the flapper but never fixed it had a running toilet humming all week. Hotel was clean to a point. room service left trays and glasses in hall for most of the week. food was great at our banquets. over priced on everything else.
Manager Response: Dear William L.  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton in Costa Mesa.  I apologize that my property operations team did not get your toilet fixed.  I am also surprised that you found trays and glassware in the corridor.  This definitely goes against our CP Express protocol.  Both items were reviewed with my team to ensure that they don't reoccure the future.  Again, I really appreciate your feedback and look forward to serving you again soon.  Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: One of the things I like about most Hiltons is I don't hear the doors of other rooms slamming as people come in and out.  This one is no exception to that.  Even with our room with a view over the lobby entrance and the freeway 2 blocks away very sound proofed.  Private balcony is great.  Limited choice for eating in hotel but plenty of places in and around the mall walking distance or  you can take the hotel shuttle.   Excecutive floor lounge has a great full breakfast bar.  The fruit was fresh and sweet.  The smoked salmon was great.  A lot of choices and well served.
Manager Response: Dear RMDTMD,  Thank you for your Five Star post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I truly appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work to keep our property clean and well maintained.  I am a very lucky GM to have them.  In addition, I am very pleased that you loved our rooms, our shuttle service, and our executive lounge.  Again, thank you for your kind and gracious comments,  Safe travels,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary Heading: A great place to have a meeting
Summary: I toured this place for an upcoming conference.  I was not planning to use this space- but just went for a tour.  Ramon changed my mind when he pointed out all the amazing features of the hotel and he also accommodated all my request when negotiating our contract.  I am look forward to our meeting in March of 2017.
Manager Response: Dear CRJ1726,  Thank you for your FIVE Star post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa in 2017.  I am very glad that Ramon changed your mind.  In addition, I really appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work in keeping all of our amazing features clean and well maintained. I am truly lucky to have such an awesome team.  Again thank you for your gracious comments and for booking your group here.  I look forward to personally welcoming you back next March.  In the meantime, we hope your flight back home was uneventful.   Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Hotel lobby and room seemed tired compared to last stay three years ago. Some staff were very pleasant and attentive, some were inattentive and uninterested. One day our room wasn't cleaned, though after notifying front desk, it was eventually cleaned at about 8 pm.  Room darkening curtains don't close all the way so morning light shines through. Hallways can be noisy. Hotel is well located and the fruit infused water in the lobby is a nice touch.
Manager Response: Dear Eleanor Y,  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I sincerely apologize for not meeting your expectations.  I have reviewed your comments with my housekeeping and front desk team. Your words were very helping in my retraining process and I am sure will prevent these issues from recurring in the future,  Again, thank you for your post.  Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Could not ask for better accommodations. Paying extra for the executive lounge was well worth it. Staff was extremely helpful and friendly. Bedding was very comforting.  Would not hesitate to recommend this hotel to all my friends.
Manager Response: Dear Mavis R,  Thank you for your kind and gracious Five Star post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am extremely pleased that you enjoyed our executive lounge and my team exceeded your expectations.     I really appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work to keep our hotel clean and well maintained.  We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: As the brand standard within the Hilton chain most loyal Hilton visitors have come to expect quality hotels and exceptional service.  While the staff at this hotel was pleasant and helpful, the hotel is a little dated.  They executive lounge is understaffed and sized for the visitors and in my three visits to the lounge couldn't find a seat and the refreshments none existent.  Room service was also a bit disappointing.  I ordered a salad to find it premade with wilted lettuce.  Overall the appearance of the hotel is nice, and the staff, as mentioned helpful, but e warned, parking in the self park structure can lead to a five minute hike hauling your bags if their isn't parking on the first level near the elevators.
Manager Response: Dear Bretten O,  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa. I appreciate that you acknowledged my staff for being pleasant and helpful.   I am very disappointed that your experience was less than exceptional with regards to the seating in the executive lounge and our pilot room service offerings.  I am truly sorry that we did not exceed your expectations in these areas.  We have adjusted the schedule to accommodate the popularity of our lounge.  Again, I appreciate your feedback and have used your comments to retrain my team.  Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Pool Area peaceful and relaxing.  Nice Hotel Bar Area, Starbucks inside..and great food for a hotel restaurant. Hoping they begin an special  Mother's day brunch.. I highly recommend this place, the service was outstanding.
Manager Response: Dear Kelly C.  Thank you for your kind and gracious comments about your experience.  I am very lucky to have one of the hardest working teams in the market.  We are extremely pleased that you were able to enjoy all of the  hotel amenities that exceeded your expectations.    We look forward to welcoming you back soon.    Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Very clean and friendly. My room on the  6th floor was very quiet. My only complaint was the restaurant was expensive compared to the quality of food served. Otherwise a pleasant stay. The hotel was just a few blocks from the 55 & 405 freeways as well as the South Coast Plaza Mall. If your brave it wouldn't be a difficult walk, just crazy OC traffic!
Manager Response: Dear LMland,  Thank you for your Four Star post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work to keep the hotel clean and well maintained.  I have shared your comments with my Chef regarding the food quality Vs. pricing.  We plan to review  and re-taste the menu to ensure that we don't disappoint our guest in the future.  Again thank you for your feedback.  Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Hotel was adequate however dated.  I have stayed here before and next time will consider another location.  Staff not knowledgeable or attentive to details.  Breakfast was subpar.  I was there on Mother's day with wife and child and not one staff member wished my wife a Happy Mother's day.
Manager Response: Dear Christopher Z,  Thank you for taking the time to give me your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am truly sorry that my team did not acknowledge you and your mother on her special day.  We usually get very high ratings on our buffet and service, but based upon your comments we have had a set back.  I will most definitely put my culinary team through our service training again.  In addition, as Seth mentioned to you on his follow up call; we take this matter very serious and it was a pleasure to make it right.   I hope that you will give us a second change the next time your travels bring you to our area.  I know we will show you that this is not the normal experience our guest enjoy.    Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Room was clean. Pretty quiet. Internet is slow unless you want to pay 9.95 per day for premium. TV menu is awkward. No search. Just have to wait as the channels go by page by page and try to remember what channel a show you are interested in is on. Would Paris stay here? I doubt it.
Manager Response: Dear Justing S6276GB,  Thank you for your post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa. I am pleased that you found our Hotel clean and quiet.  I apologize that you experienced slow Internet and Channel guide service.   I will have our property operations team follow up on your comments to ensure we do not inconvenience any other guest.  Once again, thank you for your feedback.  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary Heading: California State Division International Association for Identification 100th Anniversary
Summary: Excellent week of training and socialization with the CSD IAI 100th birthday anniversary hotel provided the necessaRY accomodations needed to support our group of close to 300 people. Services with coffee, water and tea was plentiful and readily available.
Manager Response: Dear Russ S,  Thank you for your Five Star post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad we exceeded your expectations and that you had a awesome meeting.  Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: My family and I were on vacation visiting DisneyLand and the Hilton Costa Mesa staff were remarkable and the guest room and hotel was super clean and in great condition. I would recommend this hotel to anyone traveling to Orange County. Service was outstanding! Thank you.
Manager Response: Dear General Manager Austin,  Thank you for your Five Star Post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am very pleased that your enjoyed your stay and acknowledged my teams hard work to provide service excellence.  I am truly a lucky GM to have such a hotel and awesome team.  Again thank you for your kind and gracious comments.  I look forward in seeing you again soon.  Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Went for a conference. Hotel was nice and clean. Beds were good. Bathroom toilet seemed to run from time to time. Arrived to check in and got yelled at by valet that I was parked in the wrong spot. Guess they didn't like that I wasn't using valet. But that was ok. They have brick oven pizza in the lobby bar. It was really good. Drinks were average. Overall it was a nice place to spend a week.
Manager Response: Dear CnC95366,  Thank you for your post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am sorry that you had an issue with our valet and the noisy toilet.  I have used your comments to retrain my team fix the issues and prevent these items from reoccurring.  I am very pleased to hear that you felt it was a nice place to spend a week.  Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: This hotel has great staff, everywhere I went the staff was always smiling and willing to assist. I ts in a great location near the freeways, shopping, beach and dining. I would defiantly stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear AliciaH,  Thank you for your positive post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I truly appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work to provide service excellence.  We look forward to your next visit.  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Great clean and big rooms. Nice Executive room with great selection of evening appetizers. Helpful staff and very big hotel.  Parking was given free for diamond members. Although the walk and elevators to the lobby from parking are not convenient.  Everything else is great.
Manager Response: Dear Harold P.  Thank you for your awesome post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am sorry you found our parking inconvenient.  I really appreciate that your acknowledged my teams hard work to keep our property clean and well maintained.   Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: We had a very nice stay in a very welcoming hotel. Great hotek and very comfortable clean room. This hotel is near Huntington Beach and Newport Beach just about 10 minutes away. Great location for this lovely area of California.
Manager Response: Dear Carmen G,  Thank you for your kind and gracious post and for selecting the Hilton Coata Mesa.  I am glad my team made you feel comfortable and really appreciate that you acknowledged their hard work in keeping the property clean and well maintained.  Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary Heading: Fabulous hotel - comfort all the way
Summary: The hotel is attractive, clean and well maintained. The location is Ideal. The housekeeping staff is fabulous, keeping the room well stocked of towells, coffee, etc., but doing so in a way that assures the privacy of the guests. The beds and pillows were the most comfortable of any hotel I've ever stayed in, and the shower was super.
Manager Response: Dear Patti S,  Thank you for your kind and gracious comments and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa. I truly appreciate that you acknowledged my teams hard work to provide great service and keep the property clean and well maintained.  I am glad that you liked our ideal location and hope you were able to do a little power shopping.  We look forward to your next visit.  Thank you again for your post.  Safe travels,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: We were in town for the Orange County Pet Fair, and had not only 2 large dogs but 10 puppies with us, everyone was pleasant and helpful. Most places would have turned us away, the staff at this Hilton was actually glad to see us and very helpful with our dogs
Manager Response: Dear Toni R,  Thank you for your positive post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  We are glad that you and your 12 best friends enjoyed your stay.  Thank you for recognizing my teams true spirit and hard work to achieve service excellence.    Warm regards and Safe travels,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: My family and I stayed in the Presidential Suite and it was amazing! Roomy and beautiful! The hotel is beautiful, as well, staff is amazing! We will definitely be coming back to the hotel and will tell our family and friends!
Manager Response: Dear Danielle E,  Thank you for your kind and gracious post.  I appreciate that you acknowledged the hard work that goes into keeping our hotel clean and well maintained.  I am glad that you enjoyed our Presidential Suite and love that you will influence your friends and family to come stay with us.  Please stop by for a meet and greet the next time you visit,  Warmest regards and Safe travels,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary Heading: Best shopping and not far to Disneyland
Summary: Near the famous Costa Mesa Shopping mall, california. Not far from the beach and 20 minutes to Disneyland. Costa Mesa has seriously the best choice of shops Ive ever encountered all spreading over a few blocks. All the high end brands and some you've never heard of. All the discounters too. Even a Saks fifth Ave discount store as well as the real thing. The hilton hotel is walking distance and is a really nice, friendly, spacious hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Jodie K,  Thank you so much for your positive post and for selecting the Hilton Costa mesa.  I am glad to hear that you love our location and all venues that you enjoyed within minutes of the property.  Especially shopping, which BTW is my favorite.  I also, want to thank you for acknowledging my team for their hard work in keeping our property friendly. clean and well maintained.  Please stop by and say hello the next time you are in the area.    Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Good location near the airport in Orange County, Southern California for business related stay. Good competitive pricing for very good room, excellent services, conference facilities and meal services.
Manager Response: Dear Robert H,  Thank you for your positive feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad that you enjoyed our property and acknowledged my teams hard work to keep our property clean and well maintained.  I will share your comments and recognize the team this Friday at our monthly celebration.  We would love to serve you again in the near future.  Safe travels,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Did it want to drive home so spent the night at the Hilton Orange County/ Costa Mesa.  Super location for those using the airport.  The hotel was spotless and nicely decorated.  Good breakfast buffet that included omlets.  Parking was on the high side considering location.
Manager Response: Dear John W,  Thank you for your kind and gracious post.  I am sorry that you felt our parking rates were too high.  Our parking department determines the rates to be set in the middle of what the other Hotels charge.  Based on your comments I will review it once more.  I am glad that you liked our location and acknowledged the hard work that my team has done to keep our hotel clean and well maintained.    Safe travels,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary Heading: TERRIBLE ROOM SERVICE DELIVERED IN PLASTIC
Summary: I am IRRATE over the ENTIRE Room Service experience- I WOULD NEVER stay in this hotel again becuase of it and you are lucky i ran out of energy that i did not write a scathing review on YELP about it- IF I WANTED to have food delivered in VERY WASTEFUL and UNAPPEALING and impracticle to eat from TAKE OUT PLASTIC I would have gone to a RESTURANT OUTSIDE THE HOTEL. I PICK HILTON for the LEVEL of service and QUALITY of the hotel and ROOM SERVICE - I feel this is SLAP In the face to road worn executives who need to relax and be taken care of after a long day. I WANT A Real Glass  A REAL Fork and REAL plates- WHY am i being punished JUST so it is easier for you and so you can make more money??? I would GLADLY wait another 30 mins and I ALWAYS tip the server extra.THIS IS A TOTAL DEAL
Manager Response: Dear Christine H,  Thank you for posting your in room dining experience and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.   I am sorry to hear that we did not exceed or even meet you expectations with our Corner Pantry express room service pilot program.  I will share your comments with my food and beverage team to ensure that the way we deliver our food is fully explained.  In addition, it appears that the our traditional room service was not offered.  We totally understand your desire to unwind, refresh, and dine at your own pace.   I am so sorry for this breakdown in communication.  We work extremely hard to please our guest and push it to the next level and your feedback will help.   Please contact me the next time you are in the area and I will most definitely make it right.  Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Always use this hotel but sadly fell short of my expectations this time. Very noisy due to debating conference going on. Internet down for most of the time. TV channel offereings is non-existant for foreign travellers
Manager Response: Dear Nickpalmer,  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I apologize for the debate team's noise.  This group will not be back.  Additionally, I was very disappointed as well when the power outage fried the internet server.  We had to locate one and express ship it from the east coast. On the TV channels we are limited by brand standards and ownership as to what we can present.  Again, thank you for your post.    Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier

Summary: This was our first time at this location and we were very pleased with the service all around and very pleased with the cleanliness. The rooms were spacious. The 7th floor executive floor is AWESOME as there is 24 hour access to free snacks and drinks. Breakfast and Happy Hour are provided as well.
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer C,  Thank you for such a nice post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad that you enjoyed our executive lounge.  We would be happy to accommodate you again upon your return to the area.  On behalf of my entire team, thank you for acknowledging their hard work and your Awesome experience.  Safe Travels  Rob

Summary: Front desk, bellman and staff are very professional and helpful. rooms are adequate and well stocked but, cleanliness fell below expectations on this last visit. This has not typically been my experience and it has been reported to management. The new disposal dining approach is disappointing and supports my concerns about the direction the free enterprises system and foreign takeover of business is moving.
Manager Response: Dear Kathleen W,  Thank you for taking the time to give me valuable feedback and for choosing the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I apologize for not exceeding your expectations in our housekeeping and in-room dining services.  We work hard to ensure our property is clean and well maintained.  With regards to in-room dining; this is a beta test and so far we have had favorable comments.  We do have a separate menu for tradition room service which it sounds like you did get this option.  Again thank you for you feedback.  Sincerely,  Rob Gauthier

Summary: The Good: it's really close to SNA airport and they do have a free shuttle service to/from airport as well as to the South Coast Plaza. Check-in was fairly easy and quick. Front desk staff was top notch. Rooms are big, bright with fairly modern amenities. If you here for a conference, like I was, the hotel is fairly easy to negotiate.  The Bad: Halfway through our conference, the wifi wouldn't work in any of the rooms or public areas which caused a major inconvenience and the hotel did nothing to compensate us for it. Also, parking is limited and expensive - especially if you select valet parking, but self-parking isn't cheap either and there are very limited and small spaces. There was also some minor elevator issues the first days and they hotel rooms and conference spaces are
Manager Response: Dear Professorcool.  Thank you for your post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I apologize for not exceeding your expectations with our in room dining and parking services.  I was extremely disappointed in our internet provider not being able to recover quick enough after the power outage fried our server,  We had to locate one and express ship it from the east coast.  Compensation was offered and I am sorry that component was not communicated.  I appreciate your comment on our tap water and will have our property operations team investigate.    Sincerely,  Rob gauthier

Summary: This hotel doesn't have the expected characteristics of the Hilton brand but it's clean, good location and has helpful staff.   I wouldn't pay extra for this hotel, but if you get a competitive rate, it's well worth it.    One downside was a wifi outage that negatively impacted meetings and ability to work.  It took nearly two days to fix.  While I understand these outages happen, it would have been nice if once an extended outage was apparent, if guests could have been given a list of area locations with wifi.    Ask for a room that doesn't face Paulerino street, I was in 328 which was loud due to traffic and street noise.
Manager Response: Dear ChucoChica,  Thank you for your recent post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I apologize for the internet outage.  We experienced a power serge that fried our main computer board and had to get its replacement shipped from the east coast.  In addition, I am sorry that you were not notified of the hot spots that we set up in our lobby and tech center.  I have used your comments to retrain my team to ensure this situation doesn't reoccur.   Safe travels,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: You cannot go wrong here...everything works, and works really really well...rooms are big, bright, super clean...executive lounge well staffed, convenient ..entire staff very well trained...I loved being here...
Manager Response: Dear Mitchell F,  Thank your for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am very please that you enjoyed your stay and look forward to seeing you again soon.  Warmest regards,  Rob

Summary: This hotel was located close to the conference we were attending.  The hotel facilities were very good, and the staff members were very professional, courteous, and helpful.  We are quite satisfied with the entire stay.
Manager Response: Dear Wen M,  Thank you for your recent post and for selecting the Hilton Costa mesa.  I am glad you enjoyed our hotel and acknowledged my teams hard work to provide excellent service.    Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General manager

Summary: Our door handle was loose. Had problems often with the door not opening. We had poor customer service, had to notify the front desk  three times, before the problem was solved. We were move on our second day to a room that had a low water pressure problem and the refrigerator stopped working at some point. They don't have ice machines or vending machines on every floor.   The location is good, the bellman's and the staff that works in the executive launch was very nice and helpful. Also the pool was a nice for families.
Manager Response: Dear Levis L,  Thank you for your post and selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am sorry that your door handle was loose and that the water pressure was low,  I have used your comments to emphasize follow up and better communication with my team.  I am pleased that you liked the executive lounge and our pool area.  It would be appreciated if you could contact me to discuss your stay in more detail.  Again, I apologize for the problems that you encountered and for any inconvenience they caused you,  Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier

Summary: I attended a conference hosted at this property and I was highly disappointed in the experience.  Our room seem to be fine until in the middle of the night the air conditioner started running like a lawn mower.  The food during our entire 5 day stay was terrible!!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Ms _Jess80,  Thank you for your post. I apologize for not meeting your expectation regarding the air conditioning noise and food quality.   I will most definitely use it to retrain my property operation team as well as revisit our quality control within the culinary department.  Again thank you for your comments.  It would be greatly appreciated if you could contact me to discuss these issues further. 714- 540 -7000.  Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier

Summary: Clean but Cole Style Hotel. Staff Are ok not to friendly. Close to the Airport but quiete. Rooms Are big interior is average. Terrible room Service which is sub contracted to an external Provider for Coast Savings i guess. Food is Totals unacceptable and presented like in a fast Food Restaurant not als You would expect it in a Hilton Hotel. Executive Lounge is ok but You Need to Pay for your Drinks which raises the question what You would to for a Drink there when You have to Pay anyway.
Manager Response: Dear Markus,  First, I want to apologize for not meeting your expectations with our in room dining.  We are beta testing this program and for the most part it has been well received.  It really doesn't save money.  We have made the pricing all inclusive and have added a significant amount of paper and container expenses.  Second, I would like to share some of the benefits we have experience.   Our guest know exactly when their order will arrive. They don't have to sign the check. You won't see dirty dishes or carts left behind.  The products are packed and presented in containers  that maintain temperatures for hot and cold food.  This allows prolonged storage in our in room refrigerator for a snack later.  Again, your feed back is welcomed and will be shared with my Blue Energy team to further improve our room service operation.        Warmest regards,  Rob

Summary: Rooms are a good size Gym is well equipped  Breakfast could be better but not bad Car rentals nearby Restaurants and cafes conveniently placed Parking available but not huge Concierge are helpful Internet is great and the bed I had was huge. Nice amount of daylight comes through too.
Manager Response: Dear MartinSR,  Thank you for your recent comments regarding your stay here in costa Mesa.  I am glad that you liked our gym, rooms and the area attractions.  I was surprise to hear that our breakfast was lacking as it is rated extremely high by our comment tracking system.  I will most definitely share your experience with my culinary team to ensure we are consistent 100% of the time.  Again, thank you for your feedback.   Warmest regards,  Rob

Summary: Hilton continues to amaze me, overall.  They have been consistent with their services and I can see why , our company uses them exclusively.    Costa Mesa Hilton is quite comfy.  Though not as modern or updated as other Hilton I've stayed at, this location still has a nice cozy feel to it.  Love the lobby area where there were adequate sitting, especially the one located near the main entrance.  Their in-house Starbucks is quite convenient, as well as their breakfast buffet with their lovely staff.  May I add that it does pay to be a Hilton Honors member where you not only earn more points towards your next free stay, but you also get nicer, bigger rooms (usually at the Hilton Honors floors) and free WiFi.  My room with the two queen size beds still had plenty of walk around
Manager Response: Dear Edwin R,  Thank you for your kind and gracious comments and your company for choosing our Hilton.  I will share them with my team at this weeks team meeting and highlight your comments about our front desk, valet, housekeeping and culinary team.  It is extremely nice to hear that we exceeded your expectations and made you feel welcomed and at home.  Please let me know if I can be of service the next time you return to Costa Mesa.  Again, thank your  for your feedback.  Warmest regards,  Rob

Summary: Great hotel, great Staff and great location.  I think very highly of this hotel, and the staff  The location is very convenient.  I would stay here for business or Leisure on a regular basis!  It is convenient to all things in the area, and is very quiet!
Manager Response: Dear PS Bush,  Thank you for your post and for selecting us as your go to Home away from Home.  I am glad that you like my team and property where our point of difference is the "Essence of California".  Please feel free to contact me the next time your travel plans find you in Costa Mesa.  Again thank you for your comments.  I will share them with my team.  Warmest regards,  Rob

Summary: Nice location close to the SNA airport, nice big lobby. Staff was helpful, wouldn't recommend the onsite food/bar but it was ok.   Rooms are good size and were clean. Shower pressure was noteworthy and impressive for CA! I would stay here again next time I'm in the area.
Manager Response: Dear rsprohas,  Thank you for your comments regarding my Hotel operations and the helpfulness of my team.  I have just made a number of changes that I feel will positively impact the service delivery systems in our Bristol Bar and Restaurant.  Again, thank you for your feedback.  Please feel free to ask for me the next time you are in the area if you should need my assistance.  Warmest regards,  Rob

Summary: The staff were friendly and the whole place was very clean. I had just flown in from U K so was somewhat tired. I was given all the help necessary so have no complaints. I needed an extra hour for checkout the next day and that was no problem.
Manager Response: Dear Grandmanorma,  Thank you for your feedback.  I am glad that my team and property helped you recover and refresh from your long flight.  Please let me know if I could be of any further assistance.    Warmest regards,  Rob

Summary: Only stayed one night but would go back! Was nice touch that this hotel has an executive lounge. Great location and very clean. Wish I could have seen more of the hotel. Staff was friendly and the room was clean. Could have been a little bigger and the thermostat go below 65
Manager Response: Dear Davis T,  Thank you for your kind comments.  I am glad that you found our  property to your liking.  We work hard to deliver exceptional service and I will have our property operations team service the A/C unit to ensure the next guest does not encounter the same issue.  Warmest regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Meets expectations for Hilton Hotel experience
Summary: Stayed one night for work to attend a conference. The reception desk and lobby were welcoming and very attractive. The room met expectations for a Hilton Hotel experience. The room was spacious, with sufficient closet space for a single/double visitor stay. The bedding, noise (low to none), bath towels, bath amenities (shampoo etc) all contributed to a great night's sleep and  relaxing room environment.
Manager Response: Dear Funtravel2323,  Thank you for posting your kind comments regarding my property.  I will pass on your words to my team and I am sure that they will help them continue their quest for service excellence.  Please feel free contact me the next time your plans bring you to Costa Mesa.     Warmest regards,  Rob

Summary: Booked this hotel for a last minute overnight in Costa Mesa.  Lobby is beautiful, service is excellent, concierge is top notch.  Rooms are a bit dated but very clean and spacious.  Just down the street from South Coast Plaza and convenient to anywhere in Costa Mesa/Laguna Beach/Irvine.  Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Scott D,  I want to thank you for your post and for  you selected us to overnight,  I will pass on your comments on to my team, which I am certain will brighten their day.  Warmest regards,  Rob

Summary: Stayed for 5 days to attend training for work. The hotel staff were friendly and helpful.  They had a nice executive lounge with snacks and water.  Wine/Beer for purchase except Thursday which had a wine tasting and free drinks.  Nice benefit for diamond member.  Room was clean and quiet. Upgraded with new carpet. The gym had newer equipment and would appease anyone.  In fact, they were getting new treadmills the week I stayed. Enjoyed my stay and will be back soon.
Manager Response: Dear Jaykid007.  First of all I want to thank you for being a loyal Diamond member. Secondly, to tell you how much we appreciate your positive feedback about the numerous features that you enjoyed during your stay.  We are blessed with prideful owners and team members.  Please don't hesitate to contact me the next time you visit our property so I can personally welcome you.  Warmest regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Just a Great Stay All Around
Summary: Had driven by this property numerous times - finally stayed.  Great weekend deal - upgraded upon request.  Staff was great and room was updated and very clean.  Felt very comfortable and close to everything
Manager Response: Dear Louis1ma,  Thank you for finally stopping.  My team and I truly appreciate your post and we are very pleased that you enjoyed our property, the staff and the convenience to all of the shops, restaurants, as well as the entertainment.    Warmest regards,  Rob

Summary: Great location and facility is well managed and very friendly  personnel.  Walking distance to restaurants and shopping mall. Service in the hotel was great and driving services to John Wayne airport every 30 minutes.
Manager Response: Dear AngelrA2901YE,  Thank you for you kind post.  I am glad that you selected our property and that you enjoyed my team, the area shops, the restaurants, and our convenient Transportation.  I hope you return soon.  Please don't hesitate to contact me as I am at your service.   Warmest regards,  Rob

Summary: My stay for a recent conference was very nice.  My room was  comfortable and my pillows and bed were great.  Used the pool, which was clean; the conference rooms and gym were also clean and comfortable.  Nice stay
Manager Response: Dear Christina A,  Thank your for your post.  I am glad we took away the worry of a pleasant stay, so you could focus on a successful conference.  Please think of us when you return to the OC to be your first choice Hotel.  Warmest regards,  Rob

Summary: The people who assisted us at this Hilton from the front desk to the Bartender, who assisted my husband to get me honey, lemons, and hot water since I was under the weather, were quite helpful. They went above and beyond. Thanks!
Manager Response: Dear Esposa De C,  Thank you for your comments.  It was our pleasure to assist you in your time of need.  It is never a good feeling being ill and away from home.  I am glad that my team took that element away and was able to make you feel welcome and at ease.  Warmest regards,  Rob

Summary: Location of the hotel is good, very close to the South coast plaza shopping centre.  The rooms are good. Clean with confortable beds. There  is a fridge and complimentary coffee. The swimming pool area looks good and the gym is ok. The staff at reception where great and so helpful. Thank you Maribel and Luis. And concierge Thomas and Ali too. They made us feel like at home. They are an assett for the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear 2016Manolo,  Thank you for taking the time to make your post.  I will make sure to recognize Maribel, Luis, Thomas and Ali.  They play a huge part in our service excellence team.  I am glad that you enjoyed our state of the art fitness center and Dreamscape bedding, and the other components that make our property such a smart choice.  Please don't hesitate to contact me the next time you visit our property and I will be at your service.  Warmest regards,  Rob

Summary: Amazing staff, perfectly clean, very welcoming and large rooms.  The hotel has a perfect location and the many dining options are very inviting.  Conference services were the best!!!  Cudos to the entire team.
Manager Response: Dear Andy P,  Thank you for your Five Star post and for staying at the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I appreciated that your acknowledged my teams focus in being best in class for service.  Again thank you for your kind and gracious comments.  We look forward to serving you again soon.  Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Poor service and atrocious food. Sadly, no one at our conference hung around during meals or cocktail hour. Usually conference goers at least have a drink together, but not in this case. One lonely bar tender could not take care of an entire bar/restaurant. The whole atmosphere resembled a bus station where people wait for the next bus out of town.
Manager Response: Dear Ann S,  Thank you for your feedback. We regret we were not able to provide you with the dining experience you expected.  That being said, I will use your comments to retrain my team. Our California d√©cor has been well received and I am sorry that you did not enjoy the atmosphere.  Again, I apologize for not meeting your expectation and hope you will consider staying with us the next time you are in the area.   Thank you,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: The pool and hot tub were unavailable during my recent stay.  Until I checked into the hotel this was not communicated   Nothing was said at check-in, but a note was left on the desk stating that the pool and hot tub were undergoing maintenance and would not be available for the entire week.
Manager Response: Dear Mitchell D S,  Sorry for the delayed response.  I wanted to personally apologize for not communicating prior to your check in regarding our pool closure.    This should have been posted on line and it was not.  I am truly sorry for that and the inconvenience this closure caused you.  In addition, my team should have explained the alternative pool arrangement we had for our guest. That seems to have been missed as well.  Again, I thank you for your feedback.  I have used it to retrain my team and prevent this issue from reoccurring to other guest.   In addition, it would be  appreciated if you could call or email me so I can get more details.  My contact is rob.gauthier@Hilton.com or phone 714 540 7000.    Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier

Summary Heading: Bad Karma left me with a sore back from a tired mattress.  Otherwise, handy and better quality property.
Summary: Lumpy mattress had me tossing and turning.  Close to the I-405 exit for Rte 73 exit and John Wayne Airport.  Room size and furnishings are nice, and hotels convenient to upscale Central Coast Mall. Shuttle service is well publicized and operated professionally  Breakfast at lobby restaurant is not gratis, but food is well prepared and ample selection with reasonable pricing   Valet is responsive, and Bellboy service was top notch.
Manager Response: Dear 550tlw,  Thank you for your feedback and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad that you enjoyed our breakfast and the amenities that we present.  I do appreciate that you mentioned the issue with your mattress.   We have since replaced it.  Safe travels,  Rob Gauthier General manager

Summary: The hotel is well suited for business travel. We were there for an eight person meeting and we had a nice board room with great service and food. My Hilton Honors service was pretty crappy. It wasn't until check out that anyone even mentioned it. The guys in the bar were friendly and great and there was even a happy hour deal. The double queen room was perfect for two of us. Two sinks is a nice touch.
Manager Response: Dear Bethannsh123,  Thank you for your Four Star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I was happy to hear that you loved the food, your room, and my team.  It was very unfortunate that the front desk did not recognize you upon check in.  I apologize for that.  Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: A great location, close to the John Wayne airport with great shuttle service on the 15 and 45 from the airport.  The staff go out of their way to make sure that they exceed your expectations.  The rooms are clean and the beds are comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Kathleen M,  Thank you for your Five Star Rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I apreciated that you acknowledged my teams hard work in keeping the property clean and well maintained while providing awesome service.  I am a lucky GM to have such a team.  Warmest regards,  Rob

Summary: I was at the location for a business event. The staff was very helpful. Great food via room service or restaurant. Room was very clean.   Great size room.  Bathroom tub could use some update.  However, I would return to this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear MM,  Thank you for your comments regarding your stay.  We are very fortunate to have a great Chef in Jeff Vosburgh and having a excellent room footprint.  Please let me know the next time you plan to return to Costa Mesa and I will ensure that your tub is like new.  Warmest regards,  Rob

Summary Heading: Felt like home for a while
Summary: I spent there about two months for work. This place really started feeling like home, in a way.  A very friendly staff and nearby amenities really helped. You have easy access to major shopping malls and very good restaurants in the area.  The rooms are clean and spacious.
Manager Response: Dear Simone Z,  Thank you for your kind and gracious comments. I am very pleased that you were treated as part of our family and that you enjoyed the best shopping in SoCal.  Please let me know we you plan a return trip and I will ensure a complimentary pass to the concierge lounge located in the South Coast Plaza Mall.    Warmest regards,  Rob

Summary: Director of Catering was so attentative, very detailed oriented, accommodating, a pleasant to work with and coordinate conference for 115 people. She was prompt with all requests and communication. She checked and ensured along the way if anything else missed or needed. She understands urgency and how important every detail being raised.
Manager Response: Dear Hideya K,  Thank you for your Five Star Post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am happy that you enjoyed your conference and recognized my team.  We look forward to serving you again soon.  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: I needed to switch rooms twice, once the room was musty and someone wiped their nose on bedskirt.  The second room had not been fully cleaned in the bathroom.   The room keys have issues and plan on re-keying them often (I averaged twice a day almost)  They were courteous in handling the problems.   The complimentary internet is slow.    The food in restaurant is good.
Manager Response: Dear James B,  Sorry for the delayed response.  I want to thank you for your feedback.  Your comments were useful in retraining my front office and housekeeping team. We are ordering new guest room locks and have upgraded our internet service that now provides excellent speed for both free and premium service.   I really appreciate your post and would appreciate it if you contact me the next time your travels bring you to Costa Mesa.    Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier

Summary: All in all it was a good stay. We had minor situations that caused us to rate this hotel lower which were as follows; had to tell front desk twice to send an extra bed to our room. Second, the parking exit was a struggle since the ticket machine wasn't working good.
Manager Response: Dear Roberto T,  Thank you for your Four Star Post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I was glad to hear the you enjoyed your stay,  I apologize for the issues that you experienced with the roll-away bed and parking machine.  I do appreciate your feedback.  Best regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: I stayed at this Hotel on a quick business trip to Orange county and I was pleasantly surprised with this property. My room was clean, comfortable and well appointed.All the staff that I ran into were very friendly and helpful. I stayed on the Executive floor and although I didnt experience that Cocktail hour there I did have Breakfast two mornings which were very nice. I will certainly stay here again on my next trip to Orange county.
Manager Response: Dear BStatham,  Thank you for your Five Star Post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad that we pleasantly surprised you with our property.  I am happy that you loved our rooms, food, and you were well taken care of by my team.  Safe travels,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Arrived at around 9pm and left again at 7am, so a very short stop over.  Had a Pizza just to fill the gap washed down with a couple of beers.  Comfortable room which help me sleep.  Whilst preparing to leave wanted a coffee so poured some bottled water into the coffee machine only to see an oil slick appear on top of the water, tried rinsing the reservoir but still too much so gave up.  Then I tried to iron a shirt only to find that somebody had burnt something on the bottom of the iron.  These last two points have probably been missed by housekeeping even though I left both items out of position.
Manager Response: Dear Bonnerfamily,  Sorry for the late response regarding your stay here in Costa Mesa.  I want to thank you for your candid comments.  I am glad that you enjoyed our pizza bar and our guest room.  I truly apologize for the coffee oil slick and our iron.  We have changed both and have set up a protocol to prevent these issues from reoccurring. Again, thank you for you feedback.  I have shared your words with my team.  Please feel free to contact me the next time your travels bring you to Costa Mesa.  Warmest regards,  Rob

Summary: Good hotel for a business stay. Nicely decorated. Breakfast area open on large, open lobby. Confortable and functional room. Easy access right on I405. No surprises, you know what you are going to get.
Manager Response: Dear iLovejd79,  Thank you for your kind and gracious comments.  We are very pleased that you enjoyed our property and team.  We look forward to serving you again soon.  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: I write this as a Hilton Honours Gold member - stayed here for two nights, two adults & two kids in a nice large room with two queen beds for Comic Con 2015. Value was great, rooms were clean and modern, fast Wi-Fi, free parking, nice pool, good breakfast. Staff were helpful and friendly and provided advise on traffic. Spent more time at Comic Con than the hotel, but for the time at the hotel it was great.
Manager Response: Dear Joe J,  Thank you for your Five Star rating and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa. I am glad that you found our guest rooms comfortable and loved all of our amenities. We look forward to serving you again soon.  Warmest regards,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: The facility and staff are top notch.  Sharp, and friendly, from check-in to check-out they get things done quick!  We had an issue with a hair dryer, it was replaced it immediately no questions asked.  If you need a hotel in this area this is the one.
Manager Response: Dear Michael S  Thank you for your Five Star Post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am pleased that my team exceeded your expectations.    Safe travels,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: If you are going to stay at this hotel which I highly recommend!!!When you check in ask for Luis Castelan he works at the front desk you will not find better CUSTOMER SERVICE anywhere you stay!! He will go make sure that your stay at this hotel was a great one.This is a great hotel! Great food, great atmosphere clean quiet rooms.You will not go wrong staying here!!
Manager Response: Dear Rea S,  Thank you for your Five star post and for selecting the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad to here that Louis exceeded your expectations.  I am also happy that you felt the property had a good feel and that our food was great.  Once again thank you for your kind and gracious comments,  Travel safe,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Water valve in shower was stuck. Thermostat would not adjust. Bed was hard. WiFi was intermittent on arrival.  I attended a conference a the hotel. The staff was unresponsive to requests for basic services during conference setup. WiFi was slow during the conference.
Manager Response: Dear Randy D,  Thank you for your feedback from your recent stay here at the Orange County/Costa Mesa Hilton.  First, let me apologize for not meeting your expectation,  I am truly sorry! I ensure you that the shower valve and thermostat has been repaired so no one else experiences this again.  In addition, I will check the bed firmness to validate that it meets  brand standard.   We are currently upgrading our bandwidth from 100MPS to 250MPS since we have such high usage.   Again, I apologize for these issues and the inconvenience they caused you.
