I will most definitely use your review to  re-coach my  team to be responsive and take ownership to resolve any quest issues that may occur.  Warmest regards,  Rob  .

Summary: Stayed at this hotel where a conference was being hosted.  The hotel was in a great location and the staff was friendly and helpful.  I stayed on the 7th floor and used their executive lounge often.  Their breakfast was fresh and tasted good.  I would stay here again and hope to soon.
Manager Response: Dear KCbusinessguy,  Thank you for your Five Star Rating and for choosing the Hilton Costa Mesa.  I am glad to hear that you loved our rooms, location, and our food.  We look forward in serving you again soon.  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Located exactly where I needed to be.  Generous sized room, contemporary style.  Decent restaurant and bar too. Mushroom soup was a highlight!  Priced just right for what you get when you need to be in Costa Mesa.
Manager Response: Wynndi so glad to hear you enjoyed your overall stay. Yes, the mushroom soup is one of my favorites as well. Our new menu now offers some healthier choices too. Come and see Super Bowl at our bar and try the short ribs and wings , they are "Delish" .  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: My wife and I did not have the best experience here. Upon arriving we saw that our bed was dirty, not only did it have stains all over it but there was crumbs all over and inside the bed. Every morning when we would wake up we would find these bugs with long antenna's littered throughout our bathroom. We thought this was just an abnormality but the next day when we wake up we find more bugs! The bed sheets did not fit the bed.  We told our friends who were staying there as well that we needed to let the front desk know because they were a HILTON and Hilton would not allow something like this to happen and they would do everything they could to help. So I went to the front desk to explain to them the situation and the lady who seemed rather disinterested said, "Oh, no. Thanks for
Manager Response: Mr.&  Mrs. Zach R. we are so sorry to hear the responds from our new front desk agent. Yes, we are all about service and unfortunately the service you received was not the standard.  Please contact the Guest Service Manager for any further assistance or prior to any future stays with us.  Thank you for your feedback and again please accept our apologies for the inconveniences you encountered.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager Guest Service

Summary: Good business hotel with nice lobby.  Service was prompt.  The club lounge nicely stocked with all the basics (of a club lounge).  Stayed here for one night early May 2015.    Good location, close to shopping and concert halls.  Hotel parking no issues.  Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and we do look forward to a return stay in the near future. We do hope you will have the opportunity to enjoy our local entertainment at The Honda Center located only a 15 minute drive. On the Calendar the Anaheim Ducks,  the amazing Globetrotters,  Stars On Ice and  Janet Jackson just to name a few.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: One of the worst hotel ever.
Summary: Hello - The check in and the rooms are okay. Even if it's noisy and we can hear everything from the people outside at the outside pools. No menus for the room service in the room - had to call. After food delivery had to call again cause no cutlery. After paid my bill had to call aigain (2) cause they charged me twice. Guy told me he'll call me in 20 minutes to let me know what happened - no call back - i had to call him back 3 hours later to know what's going on. He said they've put him on hold for so long he forgot to call me back after he got the response. ?!?! really??? Definitely not coming back & will let my employer know that this hotel isn't worth it. Thank you
Manager Response: Eley S. please accept our apologies for any inconveniences and negative overall experience.  We thank you for the feedback and we do value you comments. We do hope that in the future we will have the opportunity to be of service and to make it right and correct the experience to a positive at the time as it occurring. The staff and I strive to offer a positive, memorable experience and friendly service. We do look forward to a return stay to offer such an experience.  Thank you for your patronage.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Diamond member stayed here 3 nights for business. Check in was easy and i asked if they had any Diamond upgrades. They did not but she waived the parking for me which is a great gesture. The hotel is very clean and staff friendly. better than normal hotel bar and food. workout facility was nice and fairly large, and outdoor pool seemed very nice and large as well, but i didn't see anyone in it in January. Room was extremely large with a nice balcony. The location is on a busy street with lots of restaurants close by and easy access to the freeways. South Coast Mall is only a half mile away. Everything was great and i will be back when i am in Costa Mesa again.
Manager Response: truprunbike thank you for the 5 STAR review. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your Diamond experience. We do look forward to seeing you return and please contact our Guest Service Manager if they may be of assistance prior to any future stays with concierge services, special requests and overall questions.   Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The Costa Mesa Hilton is an excellent establishment for personal or business travel.  I travel to Costa Mesa a number of times each year and always reserve a spot in this hotel.  I have always found the staff to be excellent, the accommodations well appointed and the lounge to make the best Manhattan ever!
Manager Response: Awesome to hear and thank you for the feedback. We do hope you also have time out of your busy schedule to enjoy the local attractions and entertainment. Close by is the Segerstrom Center of the Arts and some great dining options. Our Bell staff/ Concierge and Guest Service Managers are always delighted to assist with making reservations and share local information. Thank you for your patronage.  Delighted to be of service, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: This is an excellent choice for a stay in Orange County.  While the hotel is somewhat typical of many Hilton hotels, it has to be one of the cleanest with a very friendly staff.  I would recommend and wills stay there again in the future.
Manager Response: Gary P. we are so grateful you enjoyed your stay in Orange County. Next time checkout some of the things to do in our area.  The local activities offer aquatic adventures from sunset cruises to stand-up paddle boarding. Art walks, wine tastings, tours, live entertainment and cultural venues will fill your itinerary.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: We loved the hotel, everything from the location, which is close to airport and to South Coast Plaza.  Came with a group of friends and a great time. Price was great, beds and bedding were awesome!  We loved the "happy Hour" in the executive lounge.  We will definitely stay here again when we visit Southern California.
Manager Response: Thank you coraleer2016 for your feedback. We are happy to hear you began your new year with us and that you and your friends enjoyed the room and our executive lounge "happy hour". prior to any future stays please do not hesitate to reach out to the hotels service managers for assistance with concierge services, questions, concerns or special requests. Thank you for your patronage.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great place, but TURN OFF THE MUSIC
Summary: Friendly, efficient staff.  Great location, close but not too close to O.C. sites and shopping. But I have one request: consider GETTING RID OF PIPED-IN MUSIC in lobby and ESPECIALLY IN THE POOL AREA.  It's the third millennium, people bring their own music.  There was no quiet place in this hotel to sit and read, or think.
Manager Response: Thank you Aaron D. and please ask the Guest Service Manager next time to turn the music down for your enjoyment at the pool. California Scenario it's peaceful, inspiring and meditative. It's the only Isamu Noguchi public space in Western United States. One of the loveliest places to visit in all of Southern California and it's free of charge.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Our review of the hotel was overall great. The staff were very friendly. The room we stayed in was very clean and roomy. The only problem we had was the access to the hotel from the parking structure. If you don't like to walk do the valet.
Manager Response: Giovanni we are happy to read you enjoyed your stay and that our staff was friendly and helpful. We always suggest to park in the front for registration and unloading of luggage and then to go park the car or allow valet to assist.   Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Just get a room and dont expect anything extra that you pay for. And check your bill thouroughly at check out. I was over charged 225.00 in room service on a 1 night stay.  I paid for a package that was supposed to be my room at check in-- did not show up till after dinner.
Manager Response: Mr. Nicholas S. it is always a great practice to check your bill and to correct any discrepancies prior to departing throughout your travels. Please accept our apologies Mr. S. for any inconveniences you experienced. We do hope you will give us the opportunity to share a better experience with any future stays.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: This very unique property has an amazing staff and wonderful accommodations.  Looking forward to staying here again.  The management/employees goes above and beyond to assist guest. The Location in relation to shopping and restaurants are great.
Manager Response: Awesome comments regarding our fantastic staff and the great location. Shopping at the South Coast Plaza is a true "Shop Till You Drop" kind of experience made better as the Concierge in the Plaza offer an area to relax, to catch your breath and enjoy their hospitality. Our bell staff offers complimentary regular scheduled shuttles to South Coast Plaza to make htis a unique and enjoyable experience.   Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Needed a comfortable hotel in this vicinity for a series of business meetings over several days. My room was great, all expected amenities, clean, quiet with a great bed. I enjoyed the breakfasts daily. Secure off street undercover parking behind hotel. Good value. Would happily return.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very poor service. First I had to change room, because the first one was smelly. In the second room the toilet was broken. After the maintenance fixed it, I had to wait an hour for the housekeeper. The lady at the guest service was giving attitude on the phone. She was not helpful. When I told her that I can't use the toilet as long as it's dirty (because of the maintenance), and I need a housekeeper to clean it, her answer was this: "well, if I want to fly  right now, you wouldn't be able to help me either, because the airplane departs later". I had to inform her that in a 4 star hotel she has all the resources to solve my problem, and she has no reason to talk to me like this. No service recovery has been offered by her, and on top of all, she was rude and giving attitude.
Manager Response: Nick_strl we will have our Director follow up with his team and we apologize for any miss communication or mishandling on our part. Please contact the Manager or Director right away so they can follow up as needed with any future concerns, complaints or issues. We are known as a friendly hotel and our staff are usually great and we feel embarrassed to hear about comments such as yours.   We wish you the best in the New Year. Looking forward to having you return to us real soon.   Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I have a 2016 Mazda Miata with a manual transmission. The valet attendant must not have been able to drive, since I heard the car coming and smelled the burning of my clutch.  All the valet attendant said was, "Sorry, this is just a clown car to me." Worst manners I've ever experienced. Can't drive a manual transmission vehicle.
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies for the negative comment and the way the attendant drove the ca Kevin H.. I have forwarded this review to the valet manager to review with his staff to ensure this will not happen again.    The staff and I are wishing you the best of holidays and may 2016 bring many happy moments with family and friends.  happy New Year ! Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Very Comfortable Hotel for Long Stay
Summary: The Hilton Coast Mesa is a very comfortable hotel for a family and/or long stay.  The rooms are very large--2 sinks (one inside bathroom and one outside), mini fridge in room, large desk and comfy beds.  There is lots of room for suitcases and a nice sized closet.  The hotel has a massive lobby which gives the hotel the feel of a resort hotel opposed to the trendier boutique style hotels that are becoming very popular.  A word of caution--do not stay on the 2nd floor.  Our room was on the 2nd floor and the music from a wedding in the banquet room below rocked our room until after 11:00 p.m.  If there isn't something booked in the banquet room, a 2nd floor room is very conveniently located to the  large and well-equipped fitness center and heated pool/hot tub.  The pool is large
Manager Response: We are so delighted to hear all the comments regarding the location, the room size, the pool and fitness areas and the friendly staff. We hope that 2016 will bring many special moments shared with loved ones.  Thank you for your patronage in 2015 and we look forward to seeing you in 2016.  Happy holidays!  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I had 2 Hilton choices for this short stay; The irvine or the Costa Mesa. After reading the reviews, I chose this property and am SO glad I did.  For starters, the airport is near but not directly in back of the hotel. Another score is the location; Great freeway access, tons of restaurants, and an in-house Starbucks in the lobby. Lastly, they HAVE an Executive lounge.  The lobby was beautiful, and you could see how they cared for it although the hotel was a certain age (as evidenced by the glass elevators in a huge atrium, a distinctive mark) Early Check in was a breeze, I was recognized as a Diamond member, and upgraded by the very polite front desk lady.  My room was fantastic and spacious. I appreciated the comfortable bed and roomy bathroom with stand alone shower. The view
Manager Response: Delighted to hear you enjoyed your room and the location. For further convenience you could use the hotel complimentary airport shuttle to John Wayne Airport. We would like to thank you for your patronage this year and look forward to a return visit next year, 2016. Best of holidays.  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The hotel is a far drive from the LAX, almost an hour away. When you get there is surprisingly  modern. The lobby is huge offering a bar/restaurant and even its own Starbucks coffee shop.  The rooms are large and fairly modern but still a bit dated. Very comfortable and nothing to fault.  The location is central to the area, south coast plaza is minutes down the road offering endless amounts of shopping, a free shuttle drop you off and picks you up ($1 tip is recommended per ride) another shuttle takes you to the district offering Costco target and many other discount stores.  Getting to Hollywood is difficult, not many options apart from a taxi, uber or hire car. I opted for uber and it cost me $200 return (so not worth it) the public transport supposedly takes up to 4hrs to
Manager Response: Thank you Blake H. for your review.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed it all, however please know that the Costco shuttle was a prearranged shuttle by your company and is not an hotel amenity. Our bell staff does offer complimentary shuttle to and from South Coast Plaza. South Coast Plaza shopping is festive and it's feeling a lot like Christmas.  Happy Holidays! Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Wouldn't give it a 5 star rating, but it works.  Stayed for a business trip.  Rooms were fine, beds were fine. Bathroom could have used a bit more care.  They need upgrades.  Hallway carpets were very old.  Over all, stay was fine.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and 2016 is the year where we will continue doing upgrades within the hotel. We hope you will have the opportunity to return next year and see the finished product once the upgrades are completed. We hope you will have the happiest of holidays and that 2016 will bring health, happiness and much love.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The rooms are standard Hilton, which is to say, large and well-equipped. The Executive Lounge is wonderful -- hot breakfast with lots of choices. I was disappointed, though, that it didn't have a latte machine.   Staff were all very friendly and helpful. The shuttle to/from OC airport runs twice an hour and is very convenient. They also run a shuttle several times a day to South Coast Plaza. I wish they would add a stop to/from Segerstrom Center for the Arts, my purpose in visiting.
Manager Response: Our Bristol Brew proudly serves Starbucks's coffee and are happy to assist with serving  the latte, coffees, hot chocolate or chai teas. The Segerstrom is close to South Coast Plaza and allows our guests great options for dinner prior or after a wonderful show at the Segerstrom.  Happy Holidays! Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I loved this hotel. Staff was very friendly and accommodating, the lobby is massive with a restaurant and bar down stairs. The rooms feel new upscale on par with many of the nicer hiltons.   I for sure would stay here again when in the area. Great value & nice property.
Manager Response: Ryan F. thank you for the 5 Star Review....our staff is grateful to hear that they were accommodating and friendly. We are looking forward to the New Year and wish you and yours the best of holidays.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Arrived in this hotel after a almost 10 hours flight and 40 minutes drive from LAX, only to be told that our executive room was not available (apparently they overbooked). I guess sometime this happens, but it was the attitude of the front desk staff for that evening which was disappointing and at the point of being unhelpful. After my wife ask how would we be compensated for not having the type of room we booked and pre-paid for, they told my wife that actually the standard room was not that much different to the executive room and that the best they would do was to put us on higher floors. It was only after much prompting that the manager came and offer "free parking for the stay, a voucher for dinner and same executive lounge access as we would have expected." And then they
Manager Response: I am sorry the front desk staff fell short of the arrival expectations and our Director has followed up with our staff to make it right for all our guests.  If ever there is a concern about the room and how many beds are in the room booked our reservations desk is always delighted to confirm and resolve . Our goal is that we succeed and exceed all our guests expectations from their arrival to their departure. I am delighted to hear you enjoyed the dinner and the executive lounge.Thank you for your comments and we look forward to being of service in 2016.  Happy Holidays! Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Wonderful hotel, clean friendly staff. Close to local stores. The bistro cafe gas delicious food and good prices. The breakfast was pricy but very good. Request a on the pool side for nice view of the city.
Manager Response: We are delighted you enjoyed your conference and gave us the opportunity to pamper you. The staff and I wish you and your family a fabulous holiday. May you enjoy special moments with loved ones. Come and enjoy the Newport Beach Annual Holiday Boat Parade for the holidays.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The hotel is very nice. There is very large, spacious lobby with a restaurant, bar, business facilities and more. The room was very clean and spacious for a Hilton hotel. Parking was close by and convenient. The fitness center and pool areas were above average. Probably the only downside was that I asked for driving advice at the front desk and the lady did not seem to have much knowledge of getting to and around LA - perhaps understandable seeing as we were in Orange County. Breakfast in the executive lounge was also crowded and I would not like to see how much busier it would be if there were more guests at the hotel. Despite this, the food and drinks there were of a high quality. Many shops and restaurants are also close by. I will return here in the future due to the fact
Manager Response: We look forward to your return visit with us and we are delighted to be of service prior to any future stays.  Enjoy the holidays in Newport Beach. South Coast Plaza for the shopping and Nutcracker Suite at the Segerstrom Center of the Arts and then relaxing by the pool the next day before flying home. Shop, Enjoy and Relax !   happy Holidays from all of us.  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I spent a few nights at this hotel in December. I had a frustrating time getting my room keys to work, however the hotel staff was very helpful and apologetic. After the slow start everything ran much smoother.  The hotel is convenient to John Wayne airport and the hotel offers a free shuttle to the airport.   The room was a good size for both work and relaxing. The bed was comfortable and the room was quiet, which is always a good thing.  There is a nice bar with a very large TV and good hotel food for having a drink or a quick bite.  If in the area, would definitely recommend staying here again.
Manager Response: Happy Holidays from all of us. The staff and I are grateful and thankful you took the time to place a 5 STAR review. Hope you will be home for the holidays but if not know that we are your home away from away. We will be delighted to share a Southern California style Christmas. Come and watch the games on our big screen TV in the Bar & Lounge and try our flat breads, shrimp tacos or tasty wings. Let us be of service and share a relaxing day.   Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The hotel was lovely and well located. However, at the price, we were completely surprised to have to pay an additional $25 for parking. This is not a "downtown" location. Parking fees seem excessive. Otherwise fine, clean,comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and comments. We are located close to SNA and offer complimentary airport shuttle. No need to drive, we have a variety of restaurants, shops and entertainment at the South Coast Plaza and Segerstrom Center of the Arts. Just want to relax then take the bus to Newport Beach Harbor and Pier. Ocean 21, whom offers transportation for parties of 4 or more, and Rusty Pelican are on the waterfront ready to share a great evening. Take a stroll on the pier and watch the sunset. A perfect stay-cation.  Happy  Holidays! Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Lousy check-in made up for by quality of service
Summary: I reserved a 2 queen room on the Executive level.  I took the trouble to "eCheck-in" at 8:30am that morning. When I got there at 4pm, they told me that a room was not available on the Exec. Level with the number of beds requested.  The managers, Teague and Michael went WAY above board in trying to find a solution that we found acceptable.  We were very pleased in the end.  For a hotel like Hilton, the quality of the Service staff EASILY makes up for any mistake made by the reservation system.  I'd come back to this hotel in a second!
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and for noting the great service you received from our staff. We look forward to seeing you again real soon. Come and enjoy the Nutcracker Suite at the Segerstrrom Center for the Arts or Disney on Ice at The Honda Center. We have entertainment for all ages.  Happy Holidays ! Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: cannot say anything negative... everything was excellent, highly recommend this location if you are visiting the area, very convenient location, quiet, guest parking is free and easy in and out, executive lounge open 24 hours a day.
Manager Response: Wishing you the best of holidays . We hope the New Year will be filled many visits to Orange County. We are looking forward to being of service.   Happy Holidays from all of us.  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for a conference and was very pleased.  The room was clean, the lobby was nice, the food was good.  The conference facilities were more than adequate.  A pleasant experience.  I would not hesitate to stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing about your comfortable and positive experience. Glad to hear you had a great event. We hope upon your return you will be able to enjoy the beautiful beaches; if it is a cooler day then just the drive up or down the coast is pleasant. If you are driving south then stop in  Dana Point Harbor. Take the morning Catalina Express for a day trip to Catalina or do the Whale Watching boat ride.    Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: This hotel is so close to the airport, we could watch the planes land about a mile away.  It feels very new and upbeat.  The rooms are large, comfortable, and have all the amenities you need. The food was good and service was decent, especially considering the crowds that were eating.  Also, they have lots of convention and meeting space.  I highly recomment this as a place near Orange Country airport.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting us and sharing about your experience shayfree. We hope you will return again real soon to enjoy some of the local activities. Christmas is just around the corner which means the Newport Boat Light parade. A great family event watching the boats and the homes in the Newport and Balboa Island area. It truly feels like Christmas.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I just got home from attending a conference at the Costa Mesa/Orange County Hilton in Costa Mesa, CA, and found it to be an excellent experience.  The staff there were very accommodating with everything I needed from a front desk manager helping me to my room on my arrival and not accepting a tip, to the banquet staff making sure I had the low-carb breakfast option I needed for my restricted diet.  Everyone I ran across was pleasant and bent over backward to be helpful, and made you feel they were grateful to have you as their guest.  One evening we spent 5 hours in the lobby lounge from happy hour to late evening, and our server was absolutely delightful, and very helpful with suggestions.  Just an overall great experience.  Even better, the beds were really comfortable too.
Manager Response: Gayle O we would like to thank you both for your review and for your patronage. It was our delight to be of service with a smile. Please return and visit us again real soon. So much to see and do in Orange County.  Performing at the Segerstrom Center of the Arts is the  Pacific Chorale presents "Tis the Season" just in time for Thanksgiving.  In December the American Ballet Theatre will be performing The Nutcracker.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: This hotel is SUPER clean and the staff is EXTREMELY helpful.  We had our annual conference there and every thing went seamlessly.  From breakfast, to lunch, to dinner!  The rooms are very clean and quiet.
Manager Response: Thank you for the nice comments Suzanne H. Hope you will be able to come again real soon to enjoy some of our local talent or attractions. Close by is The Honda Center where we have some great concerts coming up. On Sat, Dec 5- Chicano Soul Legends, on Tue, Dec 2-M√∂tley Cr√ºe and Jan 16, 2016 - Janet Jackson.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: This hotel charges 15$ for anything (envelopes, packs...) that you want to pick up at the front desk!  This is a real joke and a big surprise if you are not aware about it so this message is to let anyone coming to this hotel know about it... This is ridiculous so don't be like me: shocked when they announce the price to pay in order to get your item delivered!!   Definitely not the best hotel, I had way better in experience in California...
Manager Response: Our Front Desk and our Guest Service Manager are here to listen and to make it right. We are sorry to hear Sebastian B. that you were not happy. We hope you will share another opportunity with us as we strive to ensure a quality stay with all our guests.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Excellent service and accommodations. Would recommend to anyone to stay here! The rooms are clean and quiet, and the staff is courteous and kind. Excellent Value for all you get and with top notch customer service. The staff is very knowledgeable as to what is in the surrounding areas and is quick to recommend the best.
Manager Response: Mr. Scott C. we would like to thank you for recommending our hotel and sharing your experience with us.We hope you will be able to return around the holidays. Come and see the Annual Newport Christmas Boat Parade. The boat parade will light up the harbor for five consecutive nights beginning December 16th. The parade starts at Collins Island at 6:30 p.m. and will last approximately three and a half hours over 250 ships participate in the parade along with hundreds of water front estates. A beautiful way to share the holidays with family and friends.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: All elements of this hotel work, and all at a high level of proficiency. They know what they are doing and are very competent at hospitality. The rooms are large, the beds are very comfortable, the amenities top notch.
Manager Response: Thank you Rob for your vote of confidence in our staff and noting the proficiency of hospitality we offer. We hope you will return again sometime soon and have the opportunity to enjoy our local area. Enjoy winter in the Orange County Fairgrounds with ice skating, holiday film viewings, ice tubing, nightly snowfall, Christmas tree lighting celebration and more festive entertainment and family-friendly activities.  regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Stayed here for a conference and loved it.  Staff at front desk was friendly and our housekeeper was so nice too. Rooms were clean and the best part...the shower head was awesome!  Probably the best shower I've experienced in a hotel. Plenty of parking, and location was prime.  Would totally stay here again and totally recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the friendly service and are happy to hear you had a great event. The location is superb with shopping, beaches and attractions all close by. With the holidays coming may I suggest to check out The Newport Beach Christmas Boat Parade Of Lights 2015. Elaborate Christmas light displays of bay-front estates with their Ring Of Lights competition and one of the largest decorated boat parades in the country.  Awesome!  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The hotel is like every other Hilton...there is no consistency in the Brand.  That said the hotel is well located near So Coast Plaza...and Newport Beach. However the room service...Shocking. We were exhausted and jet lagged from an overseas trip and the thought of going out was too much, so we order room service in spite of the disclaimer on the menu. " We're introducing a new menu and changing the way your meal is delivered. A knock on the door will let you know your meal has arrived ---thoughtfully packaged and delivered in a branded kraft bag."  Seriously who ever thought of this should be fired and sent, not out of the country but out of the planet....possibly the universe!!!!  I mean talk about an environmental disaster...there was more plastic packaging than in my nephews
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and we will be forwarding your comments regarding In Room Dining to our Executive team. We value our guests and also their opinions about their overall experience. Thank you for your patronage.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Quaint hotel, friendly and helpful staff. The hotel appears to have been at this location for while, but it is a Hilton and they have okay for the price.  It is also in walking distance to several locations for dining needs.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review Lance433 and we are happy to hear you enjoyed the location and overall service. We are centrally located so our guests may enjoy several great dining options, great entertainment and attractions and close to John Wayne Airport to make the stay cation convenient.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Okay but there are better choices
Summary: The rooms are clean and the facility is well maintained.  The conference areas are in the basement and have no cellphone coverage.  The parking is okay and the location is convenient if you are driving.  If you are without transportation there is very little to chose from for dining without walking to the South Coast Plaza.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear you were comfortable and your event went well. Several transportation options are taxi, city bus and the bus stop is right in front of the hotel , we may assist to reserve a private car or our bell staff can assist with reserving a rental car with Enterprise. For your convenience you may leave the car at our hotel self parking and drop the key at the designated key drop for Enterprise car rentals.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The room was spacious and clean.  It was a surprise as to the size of the room.  The hotel is located in a nice area.  Lots of restaurants and accessible to area attractions.  Great value for the money spent.
Manager Response: Restaurants are located in The Lab, South Coast Plaza and all around us.  For seafood check out Ocean 21, they also offers transportation to/from for parties of 4 or more. Ask our bell/concierge staff to assist with reservations. Ocean 21 is located by Newport Pier and also has entertainment and don't forget he view of the sunset.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: This hotel is located near the airport, but far enough away that you won't notice the airport traffic.  The hotel offers a free shuttle service and they are prompt.  Everyone that works for this hotel is extremely friendly and helpful.  They have a convenient mini-store in the lobby area with all kinds of healthy and tasty snacks and things that might help you if you forgot something.  They also have a Starbucks in the lobby...bonus.  The rooms are spacious and tidy, and the in-hotel restaurant serves good tasting food.  I've stayed in this hotel twice in the past year, and I would happily stay there again.
Manager Response: We look forward to a return stay and thank you for the great feedback. We are close to Segerstrom Center for the Arts, South Coast Plaza and Newport Beach. SO a stay cation will certain offer the variety and spice in life you are looking for. Enjoy the Hornblower Sunday Brunch and see Newport Bay while sipping a mimosa.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Stayed 3 nights for a conference of about 300 people. Conference facilities were very good. Hotel staff were friendly,helpful and well-trained. The hotel itself is an older property, however, I found it to be well-maintained. Had a room on the 6th floor, looking south - not a bad view. I requested to be away from the pool due to possible noise. However, the room was clean spacious and quiet. Bed was very comfortable. My colleague had a car, and commented that the connected garage was on the small side, but it was probably adequate back when it was built. There is a business center with 4 computers, I believe, off the lobby, where boarding passes can be printed. There was a problem with the printer, but the bellman allowed me to use his station ot print my boarding pass. Location
Manager Response: ALOHA,  We are thankful for the feedback and your review. Hope you will be able to come back again real soon. Christmas time in Orange County is filled with great activities. For the kids at The Honda Center- Disney on Ice- Frozen or maybe enjoy the Newport Harbor Christmas Boat Parade -filled with magical lights and community spirit.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Staid here for four nights, no issues whatsoever.  Bar and conference staff very good, check-in, painless.  Rooms perfectly normal.  Within walking distance to some decent restaurants and bars, all in all a solid choice,
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments regarding our great location and being a  solid choice. Some great choices for restaurants in our area. The variety is fabulous for vegetarian, vegan and meat lovers alike.  Regards,  Yolanda  H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: My experience at this hotel was very good. I requested an early check in ahead of time when I made the reservation. When I called the hotel to confirm, I was told by Robert at guest services that they could not give me an early check in because the hotel was booked. When I explained how important this was, Robert put me on a short hold, and when he came back on the call he had arranged the early check in. All of the staff was friendly and professional. The only downside was the valet parking staff. When I arrived, they were friendly, however did not help with my luggage. When I left, the person did not even come out of the keosk, he held out my keys, and didn't offer any help with my luggage.
Manager Response: Delighted to be of service and to share a memorable stay with all our guests.    Celebrating an anniversary?  We want to know about you , how you met, how you decided to celebrate with us ...Let us make your stay special. Call our Guest Service Managers to assist with making your stay special.  Regards,  Yolanda H.  Guest Service Manager

Summary: Hilton went out of their way to make our conference the best. Robert, one of their staff, was incredible. Anticipating and/or responding to our needs immediately and so politely. The whole staff was professional and accommodating.
Manager Response: Dear Terri H. we will make sure to share your comments with Robert. He is a great asset as are so many of our staff members. We are delighted to hear you will be returner for a visit . Please contact our Guest Service Managers when they may assist with any and all concierge services or to answer questions or concerns. We are here to be of service to ensure we offer a cared for and valued stay.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Close to shopping, semi close to beach, actually perfect spot for us
Summary: overall no complaints, we were in town for a wedding and this hotel had the perfect mix of onsite and close-by attractions. we were pleased with the hotel staff and all facilities... even the lobby bar was above our expectation
Manager Response: Above and beyond all your expectations is what we strive for and we are ecstatic to hear we shared a memorable stay with you. Glad to see you were able to enjoy the area beaches, shopping and the wedding. Our hotel is the perfect location for a weekend event such as the wedding you attended. As an added bonus tour the Newport Harbor and Bay area as a group. How fun that would be.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: This hotel is not a good value for the cost.  Food selection and quality in the restaurant is poor and overpriced.  The open atrium lobby area seems very dated.  This was my second stay and I likely won't return.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear you may not return to our hotel. Our location is central to South Coast Plaza where several great casual restaurants are available for your dining enjoyment. In The Lab there are a variety of vegan and vegetarian options. The area offers unique and chain style dining options for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Come see our concierge and bell staff to assist with making recommendations and reservations.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Great location, few blocks from a mayor shopping mall ( south coast plaza ), this property offers full breakfast buffet, great bar and restaurant, big parking area and valet parking for your convenience. Recently remodeled offers a mini market with drinks, fruits, and snacks, a new rest area with tv's and coaches is strategically located near the front desk. Rooms are nice and comfortables. Hotel offers free shuttle to South Coast Plaza mall.
Manager Response: Thank you for the positive review and noting all the amenities we odder. Also for your convenience we now can reserve seating for the Disneyland Shuttle ; the Costa is $5.00 round trip for adults and $2.00 for kids. The Shuttle picks up at the bus stop outside our hotel.. That is the extra WOW to your visit to the Happiest Place On Earth.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Poor experience at this Hilton last week. I have never had as much trouble in one hotel than I did in this one. Changed rooms two times, would have been three if I hadn't been checking out! ! First room was really loud so I asked to be moved. Second room had ants EVERYWHERE! I killed a couple on the desk and thought oh a couple of ants..then I went to work and realized that an ant was crawling up my shirt..this shirt was hung up and then placed on the bed...so grossed out. Third room also had ants to less of a degree, but the most annoying thing was that not one of the outlets worked in the bathroom area.  The only redeeming quality was that the staff was nice enough. Not nice enough to upgrade my room after the third issue, but gave me a couple of coupons for coffee..I will not
Manager Response: Rohini,  I am sad to read that you did not have a great experience with your event . Your feedback has been forwarded to the proper management to follow up with their team to understand and make it right for any future events.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Hotel rooms are nice and spacious.  Reception staff are nice and accommodating.  Restaurant staff and the general catering of the hotel needs to be looked at carefully.  It was extremely disappointing.  I was there for a health conference, with a lot of people staying at the hotel, first of all I had to leave the restaurant twice as my meal did not arrive, even when I ordered just a cup of soup I was waiting for 25 minutes before I left.  The next time around, my food did not arrive and I had to leave again.  A whole day without eating and a severe headache I decided to order room service as there are not many vegetarian options I requested a vegetarian sandwich and the response was no, we can only give you what is on the menu if you want anything different you have to come
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, I am sorry to hear you had to wait so long for service. Our managemetn have been reviewing your comments and following up with their team so to ensure this does not happen again.  Thank you,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I like everything about this hotel.  Large comfortable, elegant room with upgraded mattress, and television.  Great executive lounge, and lobby.  Friendly, competent staff.  Short walk to the mall and plenty of restaurants.  Will be by go to Costa Mesa property.
Manager Response: chadp1,  Thank you for letting us know about your wonderful stay. As we strive to offer an above and beyond type service it is always great to hear we have done just that ; service above and beyond.  Thank you,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel twice (July and September 2015).  We love the two room suite on the concierge level.  The hotel has a Starbucks and a great lobby bar/restaurant.  The housecleaning service is excellent and the location and proximity to Disneyland is fantastic!  We will continue to stay here when visiting Southern California.
Manager Response: azolivos,  Delighted to hear the family enjoyed Disneyland and both previous stays with us have been enjoyable. We hope you will return to see Disney on Ice-Frozen at The Honda Center ot maybe the kids will enjoy Kurios - Cirque des Soleil at the Orange County Fairgrounds.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service manager

Summary Heading: Very, very good - could be great with very little effort
Summary: This is a very, very good hotel that could be great with just a few tweaks. The employees were great; it is just seven minutes to John Wayne Airport; the property is clean and well maintained; free shuttles to the airport and a nearby shopping mall. But - there was no information in the room about the shuttles, the location of the impressive pool, or how to get ice for guest rooms. Simply providing an info sheet with this and other info would enhance the guest experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback TNbeachbum75 and we will have our housekeeper staff check the rooms more carefully to ensure each room has a compendium with the hotel information. Please accept our sincere apologies. . We are dleighted tohear the staff was friendly adn you had a comfortable and clean room.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Stayed over night had a conference here
Summary: Very nice classy hotel. First Hilton Hotel I've stayed at. Rooms were very nice, had a view of the parking lot so nothing to brag about.  We had a conference here and the team we worked with were great. Couldnt have asked for a better place and great setup for the numbers we had. Had an issue with parking for people attending our event but managed to sort it out before the end of the evening. Didnt have any problems at all staying here. Glad we got to stay here.
Manager Response: I am so happy to hear you enjoyed your conference and your stay with us CC Mani. We hope you will have the chance to return for a measure visit and enjoy the entertainment or attractions in the area. Currently at the Orange County Fairgrounds - Cirque del Soleil, a magic show full of imagination, curiosities and music.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Hilton Costa Mesa - good for business travel
Summary: I have stayed at this hotel countless times.  This is a great choice for business travel due to its proximity to John Wayne airport, and also not far from Long Beach or LAX.  The hotel offers all a business traveller could need, including reliable WiFi, breakfast, meeting rooms, and even a Starbucks in the lobby (which is a huge plus).  There is absolutely no reason that I would stay here for any personal reason, however.  This is a very impersonal hotel that is located for business travelers.  Very nice for business, but I would never stay here for personal travel as it is pretty far from everything (and everyone knows the traffic adds 30 minutes in any direction in SoCal at a minimum!  What should take 15 minutes always takes 45+).
Manager Response: notrub98,  May I suggest to come with your family sometime to enjoy the beaches or some of the local attractions. Disneyland and Knott's Berry Farm or maybe go to see Disney on Ice at the Honda Center for the holidays.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Was here for a two day conference
Summary: Its a nice venue but even if not staying overnight even with validation be ready to pay at least 12 bucks for parking which I think is a rip off.  It must be a big revenue maker for them the paid parking.
Manager Response: osanida,  We are delighted you enjoyed your conference. We offer valet and self parking to make our guests stay more convenient. Next time I hope you will have time to enjoy some of the shows in the are. Just in time for the holidays, Disney On Ice- Frozen at  The Honda Center.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I was only at the hotel fro 24 hours but the service from check in to check out was great. Each staff member seriously goes out of their way to make your stay the best  at the hotel.  The hotel is also super close the the airport so this made traveling back and forth a lot easier.
Manager Response: For an added convenience we also offer complimentary airport shuttles every half hour on the hour from the hotel. We hope you will return for a leisure visit and enjoy our local area. Currently at the Orange County Fairgrounds - Cirque de Soleil a great family show full of imagination, curiosity and amazing acts.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Hilton Costa Mesa stay in September
Summary: I find this hotel is a great value for business travel.  The staff was friendly and helpful.   Although the hotel needed to have some maintenance done, they were very communicative and the work did not impact my stay.
Manager Response: Dear lizstyle,  I am sorry to hear the servers did not communicate properly when taking the dishes out of the way.  We are located a short drive to Newport Beach, Balboa Island for enjoying family time together. Try the Fun Zone and take the ferryboat across - the kids love it. Go to the candy store and see all the candies from years gone by...brings mom & dad back to when they were kids.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I'd recommend this hotel if you are travel agent or flight attendants. Simply this is just a hotel with business feelings only. Not kids friendly. All the staff was not informative. Restaurant staffs kept pushing me order more by taking dishes away even before my kids finished it.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Hilton calm, close to South Coast Plaza and John Wayne Airport
Summary: Can't quite put my finger on it, but . . . as I walked into my room, I felt a definite sense of calm. The room seemed spacious, comfortable, quiet, convenient, and welcoming.  This was a particularly welcome feeling following my drive to the hotel on the 405, complete with a traffic jam on top of the usual congestion. I chose the hotel for its proximity to South Coast Plaza--a bit of a walk but a very, very short drive. I noticed a uniformed airline crew checking in--made sense, considering how close the hotel is to the John Wayne Airport. When I left the hotel, I noticed that there is a gas station/convenience store on the corner. It would have been a handy place to pick up snacks at less-than-hotel prices. As I headed toward the freeway for the next leg in my journey, I
Manager Response: Dear MidwestBoomer,  We are always happy to hear when a guest will be returning. Our hotel does offer complimentary shuttle to/from the South Coast Plaza at regular scheduled times daily. South Coast Plaza is great for shopping and also dining. For a casual choice try Holstein's  or Season's 52 for lunch or dinner.    Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Stayed here for 4 days then onto vegas then back for 3 days
Summary: e clean quiet room 2 double beds.  The staff are so nice and friendly, nothing was a trouble to them .  Also Wine tasting and nibbles early evening was very classy, I Would definitely recommend this Hotel and free shuttle to the shopping centre and John Wayne Airport.  Lots of nice restaurants around the area once again a 15 min walk away or free shuttle.  Even the shuttle ds are nice.
Manager Response: 57 gumby,  We are glad to have been the comfortable and friendly stay you were looking for and that you enjoyed your stay in Orange County. Our pool area, fitness center and tech lounge is waiting for our guests to enjoy throughout their stay. Thank you for your patronage.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great Locationg near the 405 but not Loud
Summary: The Facility is very good.  They have all that you want in a Business Hotel.  Many amenities, very Pretty, and has all the things you need in a Business Hotel.  My favorite place to stay in the Costa Area!
Manager Response: PS Bush,  Delighted to read you enjoyed the location, the hotel and the staff.  We look forward to being of service with any and all future stays.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I would highly recommend this hotel. We had great service. The staff is way more friendly than any other hotel I've stayed. The beds and pillows are very comfortable. Rooms are clean, as well as common areas. The food in the lobby restaurant is very good. Location is only 15 minutes from the town of Newport Beach.
Manager Response: bkpr,  So glad to hear you were comfortable and enjoyed the Bristol Palms menu. Complimentary airport shuttle for our guests and a comfortable bed with great food ...awesome !  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Just stayed here for 11 nights with my wife and 2 kids , had a  really enjoyable time at this Hotel . The staff were very friendly especially Yolanda the Guest service manager who really made our stay here great . The Hotel is kept spotless from the rooms to the public areas . My kids loved the pool area which we had to ourselves most of the time . I will stay at this hotel again next time I am in California.
Manager Response: Dear Allen M,  It was my pleasure to make your stay memorable and enjoyable. There is nothing more special then the memories we make together as a family.   Delighted to be of service,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Large room spacious and comfy big bed. The room was clean. Tea coffee making facilities minus the tea as here were no teabags.  Great location as walking distance from a number of conveniently needed stores.  There's a Starbucks and a small gift shop that sells some food in the lobby  Friendly staff  Liked this place
Manager Response: Stephiepepsi,  The staff and I are happy to see you enjoyed your stay and had a comfortable room. We are steps away from South Coast Plaza  and for lunch or dinner try Holstein's Shakes and Buns. Their unique menu of shakes with alcohol and delicious burgers are a must to try. Bon Appetit!  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Hilton Orange County/Costa Mesa has a number of things going for it.  It is in the perfect spot, right nest to the 405 and with in blocks of the 55 and the 73, The staff is great and the service perfect.  I highly recommend the few extra $ for the Ex level.
Manager Response: JamesW0815,  We are happy to hear you had a enjoyable stay with us. Close to the South Coast Plaza and so many restaurants to choose from too. If you like Cuban food try Habana's or just want to enjoy a flight of wine with a flat-bread then may I suggest Season's 52. Want to see the ocean sunset and didn't want to drive then our bell staff can make arrangements for dining at 21 Ocean and the restaurant offers transportation for parties of 4 or more.   We look forward to assisting you with any and suggestions for a memorable stya wiht us.  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I strayed here two nights at the Executive floor, the room were small but very nice with a very comfy bed:-). I used the Gym and the pool at both were very nice. I ate at the Bar and the food and staff were great. Not much to say the hotel and its location were perfect for my needs during this stay.  the only drawback were the food times in the Lounge since I were there on business the lounge had stopped serving snacks when I returned in the late afternoon.
Manager Response: elvisOfBl  Thank you for your review. The Executive Lounge offers snacks such as peanuts, candies or the like throughout your stay and the appetizer "happy hour" time in the Executive Lounge is daily 5 pm till 7 pm.  We are sorry you missed them and I am sure if you were to discuss this with our Guest Service Manager we would have been happy to assist with somehow having some snacking  items waiting for your return to your room.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I would highly recommend Hilton Hotel....great location: close to Orange County Airport; comfortable rooms and courteous staff. I stayed at this hotel 7 years ago for a wedding and this time, it was even better:
Manager Response: Chris T  So glad to hear you enjoyed your stay and your room was comfortable. We are happy to hear are getting better all the time. Looking forward to seeing you a little sooner than 7 years next time and sharing a superb experience with us.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Flew in from Denver to take care of the details surrounding my mothers death.  The original place we booked was totally unacceptable, but the staff here was great!  They accommodated us on short notice, gave us a good rate, were empathetic and cordial, and made our stay as relaxing as it could be considering the circumstances.
Manager Response: Please accept our condolences David . We are grateful we were able to assist with sharing a comfortable stay with you. We hope any future stays you can make special memories with family and friends here at the beach. If you like to see the ships go by then you would certainly enjoy the annual Tall Ships Festival which is every year in September.   Best wishes,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Solid Hotel Choice. Zero Complaints. Good value.
Summary: Subject line says it all. Very satisfied customer. Solid choice for your business or vacation needs. Given how expensive mid to high rate hotels have become, this is a relatively good value at the price we paid ($100 per night). Again, very satisfied customer. Will return.
Manager Response: Karl H.  The Executive Lounge offers snacks until the appetizers arrive at 5 pm and then after 7 pm they place some snacks for the evening. Possibly they were just in transition of the happy hour to the snack time when you came in.We are looking forward to sharing a 5 STAR experience with you next time.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manger

Summary: My wife and I stayed here this past weekend to have some quiet time and relax. We saw this property on a Travelzoo deal and decided to try it out.   First the positive: Beds are soft and comfortable. Staff was gracious, helpful and kind. Check in and out was a breeze.  A/C worked great. This hotel is great if you are flying out of John Wayne the next morning or have a layover.   Now the negative: Jacuzzi/whirlpool was broken with no sign on it and we were never notified of this upon check in. Jets were broken and NO HEAT. This was a major negative because one of the main reasons we stayed here was to enjoy the pool and Jacuzzi. Lots of drunk people at the pool with their own coolers full of alcohol and smoking weed. A manager walked around the pool area one time and didn‚Äôt say
Manager Response: Dear islandhopper09,  We apologize for the Jacuzzi issue and for not offering another option for you to enjoy a Jacuzzi elsewhere. At the time we were not aware of the issue and since then have rectified the problem. Hope you were able to enjoy the positives you mentioned. Thank you for your feedback and we do hope you will give us another opportunity to share a quality stay.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Awesomely spacious and clean in lobby, hallway, and room at a reasonable rate.  The location is near John Way airport with easy access to 405. I would love to stay again next time I'm in Southern California.
Manager Response: We would love to have you return Acalle. We hope you will be able to enjoy the annual Pageant of the Masters when you return or maybe go see a The Ducks , hockey game, at The Honda Center.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: We're currently visiting the Hilton in Costa Mesa with the family and are extremely satisfied with our trip.  The hotel is very centrally located....close to all the OC beaches, attractions etc. It's not too far from LA either. The hotel staff is extremely friendly and very accommodating. We had booked a regular room for a week stay but they upgraded us a spacious complimentary suite instead (which made our stay all the more comfortable). The housekeeping staff is very efficient as well. The pool is a delight with plenty of lounge chairs and always replenished with clean towels. The only issue I had with the hotel was the breakfast buffet....there's no variety and we got tired of eating the same things every morning for a week. Overall, a relaxing and comfortable stay with our
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and I am pleased to say our buffet now will be offering a variety throughout the week for those guests whom are staying with us for a length of time. Thank you for your feedback and giving us the opportunity to make it right for any future stays. Now the buffet will offer options such as quiche or breakfast burrito on certain days. We wish you Bon Appetit !  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: We were there for business and unfortunately while the hotel was full of softball teams. We were on a floor with an ice machine that did work, but they filled their coolers and water jugs every day-leaving no ice for everyone else.  Then THEY complained! The ice machine situation does need to be remedied; however, the hotel will deliver ice to your room or you can go to the restaurant/bar downstairs. We  visited the Executive Lounge for a delicious breakfast and delightful cocktail hour each day.  The staff was professional and courteous.  One gentleman actually offered and delivered ice to my room one afternoon! The rooms are clean although carpets are a bit worn and dated.  The pool area is fantastic and huge.  Recommend.
Manager Response: Teressa G.  Excellent to hear about your stay. Currently at the Segerstrom is the Phantom of the Opera- a beautiful and tragic love story. The decor I hear is phenomenal and the whole experience is memorable. A must see!  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Fantastic front desk and conference event staff
Summary: Our company had a conference event at Hilton Costa Mesa 11th - 13th August 2015 and the service was exceptional.  Front desk staff and conference event staff were always available to assist with many last minute changes.  Conference participants also liked the venue, room accommodations and food.
Manager Response: Ann T.  We are delighted to hear the event was wonderful and our staff offered great service. I hope you had a chance to check out the local area or maybe go on a scenic drive from Costa Mesa to Laguna Beach on Pacific Coast Highway. If you like art  the annual Pageant of the Masters will be a great way to enjoy one of your evenings.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Only Hilton I will NEVER stay at again
Summary: With the exception of two employees, everyone else could have cared less about us staying there.  As Hilton's go this is not what I expect.  I am a Hilton's Diamond member and was truly disappointed with this property.  The rooms were not clean, they did not clean daily.  The parking was terrible, the parking arms never worked.  I will not stay there again.
Manager Response: Anthony M,  I can imagine how frustrating you were when the parking arms were not working and please accept our apologies for this inconvenience. We were experiencing difficulties with the new system and as of recent we have also added an attendant out in the parking structure to ensure our guests are receiving the proper assistance and service. The housekeeping cleans each day as our guests request  ( if there is a Do Not Disturb on the door or not) and I am not sure why or what transpired with the service delivery during your stay. We do hope you will return real soon so we may have the opportunity to share a better stay with you.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Beautiful hotel.  Great price and pet friendly.  We enjoyed the Starbuck's brand coffee kiosk in the lobby.  We didn't use the bar or restaurant, however they looked like we would of enjoyed their services.  Many others were.  Staff was very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Elaine B.  We are delighted you were able to enjoy Starbucks's at our Bristol Brew,the friendly service in our beautiful location at a great price. We hope you will return and enjoy some of the area attractions, such as Disneyland whom is celebrating 60 years/ Diamond Celebration or Knott's Berry Farm celebrating 50 years. History , Magic and fun rides galore!  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Team travel to Hilton Orange County aka Bates Hotel
Summary: Worst Hotel experience ever.  Part of group that booked 11 rooms for a week for girls travel softball team.  When we got there the hotel had overbooked. Many of the families that had reserved double beds could only get king size bed.  Asst Mgr said that he would give us two roll away beds.  They only brought one which they said was hotel policy.  When I went back to front desk Asst Mgr said that he originally wasn't aware of policy and that one of the kids would have to sleep on the floor and that we were given extra bedding.  We were however not charged for that nights stay.  Toilet was clogged called front desk to inform them and Asst. Mgr that I had dealt with earlier said that there were a couple of clogged toilets ahead of us and it would be a while before they could get to
Manager Response: Mark S.,  We are so sorry to hear about the inconvenience you experienced. We strive to share a valued and comfortable stay with all our guests and when our guests share their feedback that gives us the opportunity to make the necessary corrections and improvements or re-train our staff as per standards. We hope you will return and see us in a different light and really receive the valued stay that we are known for.   Thank you for the opportunity,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Very clean and welcoming hotel, located in an easy to reach spot. Rooms are specious and comfortable. Clean pool area with gym facility in the hotel. The bar prices are in steep side but the quality of food and drinks are good.
Manager Response: ikeam,  Thank you for the wonderful review and we are delighted to hear you enjoyed the pool, the fitness center and our great location.  It also nice to hear you enjoyed your spacious room and that everything was clean. Currently we offer wine tasting at 5 pm in our lobby for all our guest to partake in. Each night a different wine to taste and try along with some our own lat breads form the pizzeria . Cheers !  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I stayed for about 1 week at the hotel on business. the room was clean. The executive lounge is below average. hotel is in need for a facelift. The service was very good. Walking distance to south coast plaza makes it reasonable for a spouse to travel with you.
Manager Response: thicks1,  We are always happy to hear our guests comments as this assist us with making the necessary changes. The hotel just like at home is always making changes and we just made all new changes to the lobby and tech lounge and will begin making necessary changes to the rooms as needed. We are happy to hear the spouse was able to enjoy the shopping at South Coast Plaza while you were in your meetings. Our location also offers  some great restaurants to enjoy with your spouse after the meeting. Our concierge are always delighted to assist with making dinner reservations.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I was served stale rice at the wedding reception and not a word of apology was given. One of the worst stay I have been on. The hotel gave me the same room with another person who as attending the wedding at check-in so when I went to my room, it was already occupied.  Horrible, horrible experience.
Manager Response: Andy C.  We are sorry to hear about your experience and we are following up with the catering company  as well as checking to see whom made the room reservations the way they were set up. We wish the bride and groom a fantastic year ahead and hope the best for them.  Thank you for your feedback and your comments.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Location for Business as well as leisure
Summary: I was staying here with my family. The hotel is very well located in Orange county. The front office staff are very helpful. Usually the lobby is very quite except when the airline crew are checking-in. Rooms are clean and spacious. Pool and other amenities are well placed. Great service recommend to everyone.
Manager Response: 730samir,  We are happy to see the family vacation went well and we were a part of this experience. Our location is close to South Coast Plaza, some great restaurants, John Wayne Airport and some beautiful beaches for the family to enjoy. Our hotel offers a fitness center, a relaxing pool and Jacuzzi area and a tech Lounge for the business travelers to enjoy as well.  Looking forward to seeing you real soon,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: If your destination is Disneyland, this location is too far for you. Other than that, this is a great place to stay in the area. Staff is friendly, rooms are clean, and beds are super comfortable. We had the option to check in digitally and choose our rooms before arrival. That was definitely a plus! Once arrived, all we had to do was pick up our keys, which was a breeze! We're Hilton members, and we have never been disappointed with the brand.
Manager Response: Carolyn L.  Thank you for your feedback. Disneyland is approximately 15 minute drive ( depending on traffic)  from our location and the Disneyland shuttle does offer to pickup and return to our hotel with prior shuttle reservations with the reasonable fee of $5 Adults and $2 Kids; round trip tickets. In the event you cannot reserve due to a late arrival then just be at the Macy's Valet area at the South Coast Plaza the next morning by 8:30 am. Please contact our Guest Service Manager to assist you with all your requests to ensure a quality stay.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: This hotel is a fine hotel for exploring Orange County. The atmosphere is hospitable, tranquil, luxurious. Rooms are clean and spacious. The breakfast is great, without lines for the buffet. Valet and self-parking possible. Nice pool outside.
Manager Response: Terryfrom75,  Glad to hear you enjoyed our hospitality and our buffet. We look forward to a return stay and enjoy the entertainment performing in our area.  Concerts such as Shania Twain on August 18th at The Honda Center or Phantom of the Opera at the Segerstrom Center of the Arts throughout August. We hope to see you there.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I love this hotel so much! Great staff, large and comfortable rooms with windows that open, screens would be nice, and one of the best hotel swimming pools I have seen. I like deep pools. Exec lounge is now 24/7. Thank you!!
Manager Response: Michael D. Thank you for your review and for noting the Executive Lounge on the executive level, our pool and great size rooms to enjoy. Close to South Coast Plaza. offering complimentary shuttle to/fro SNA and South Coast Plaza and now also available with reservations(at least 1 day prior) the ART shuttle to Disneyland. Round trip is $4 for adults and $2 for kids and shuttle picks up at the bus stop area in front of the hotel. Come celebrate the Diamond Anniversary of Disneyland- 60 years of happy faces and special memories.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The hotel lobby and rooms are very nice. The staff is friendly and will go out of their way to make sure you are taken care of. We were very impressed with the smiling faces and genuineness of the Hilton staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful comments misskarr. Our mission is to share a valued and cared for stay with all our guests. Thank you for validating the staff and the friendly service you received. Come and enjoy another stay with us and enjoy some our our area entertainment. Antonello's restaurant  music nightly with Paco Falcone in our Enoteca Wine Bar and a wonderful bar menu or -21 Oceanfront restaurant in Newport Beach has live entertainment 7 days a week in the lounge. Enjoy and relax!  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: We arrived at the hotel and were told our room wouldn't be ready until 10pm due to a late checkout be some airline pilots (they like to have their fun). The hotel gave us a free night and gave us a credit to use in the bar while we waited. A very fair compromise.
Manager Response: Dear Amy S.  We are happy to see our staff compensated you for the inconvenience and happy to hear you enjoyed your stay.  Thank you for your feedback and we look forward to seeing you again real soon. Return to enjoy the beautiful beaches is in our area; just a drive up Coast Highway /US 1 is a beautiful day drive. Stop in Laguna Beach and walk along the beach, shop in the stores and enjoy a lunch at Cucina Allessa or Las Brisas.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Pass this one up! So many problems that the hotel is not willing to even acknowledge that it just becomes frustrating.  We stayed 4 nights and after this establishment, we will never stay at another Hilton.  A/C would not shut off in our room and sliding door barley opened, then would not close.  Maintenance came up and sprayed WD40 on the sliding door track so the door would at least move, and then disabled the A/C.... That night the room smelled like WD40 and we were overheated.  We noticed that we could hear everything outside i.e.; the kids at the pool, the road noise, airplanes... The sliding door seal, we found was bad and missing in spots.   Next morning I went to the front desk and asked that they repair the seal on the door so that the excessive noise could be sealed
Manager Response: sk2853, Please accept our deepest apologies and I am so sorry to hear about your experience and overall stay. Definitely this experience is not our standard and this is not acceptable. I am performing a throughout check up with all departments concerned.  The staff and I hope you will return some time soon so we may share a cared for and valued experience. Please contact the Guest Service Manager prior to any future stays to assist and ensure you will have a comfortable stay with us.   Thank you for your patronage and for your feedback,  Sincerely,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: A good hotel with great amenities and friendly staff.
Summary: Although this is an older hotel, I was pleasantly surprised. Nice lobby area with the usual Starbucks and a bar/restaurant that serves cold beer and a great pizza. Good size rooms, although the tap in the bath takes some figuring out if you haven't seen something similar before. Good wifi throughout and parking available at a very reasonable cost. Plenty of restaurants within walking distance if you don't want to eat in the hotel itself.
Manager Response: Steve Cornell,  Pleasantly surprised with your overall experience. We have some of the most amazing moments were shared during your stay.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Convenient for business in Costa Mesa
Summary: I was here for a week on business and it was a very comfortable and relaxing stay. The rooms are average, but the lobby was very nice. The breakfast in the morning is pretty sufficient. It is pricey at $20, but pretty standard for hotels. I ended up having to work in the lobby the day of my checkout before my flight and it was very accommodating in the business center. I will stay here again for business in the area.
Manager Response: Christina S.   We would have loved to hear what type of breakfast you were craving as we do change the options so now and then. The buffet offers fresh fruit (seasonal fruit) yogurts, lox and bagels , oatmeal for the healthy choice, sausage and bacon , pancakes or waffles, muffins, pastries, breads, scrambled eggs and also the option to order your style eggs. If you wish to order from the menu , my favorite is the Eggs Benedict.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Great Place to stay. Short distance from shopping. Restaurant downstairs had the best breakfast buffet. The pool was clean. The rooms were nice and clean. The bathroom was spacious. Beds were clean and comfortable. The only bad thing there was no microwave in the room. If we needed to warm up anything we had to ask the restaurant to do it.
Manager Response: Great stay and location and location. Maricela H. we thank you for taking the time to share your experience. Currently OC fair is the place to go and have fun. The theme this year is "One Big Party" and they have some great entertainment. Go and eat some fried goodies and enjoy the games and rides.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: It's centrally located as far as for things to do.  A really nice and high end shopping mall is in walking distant.  You are within 15 minutes to drive to Disneyland.  Housekeeping staff is very courteous and makes you feel welcomed.  Internet service is not great when a lot of people are at the hotel.  Elevators are really slow!
Manager Response: DavidZ5262TN,  We are happy you enjoyed your time in the happiest place on earth and came" home" feeling welcomed. We hope you were able to enjoy some of the beautiful beaches too. Just relax, enjoy the sun and the beautiful views of the harbor. Hornblower offers a delighted and delicious Sunday Brunch...dine while touring Newport Harbor. Sometimes you can even see the dolphins play.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: super quick stay but was pleasantly surprised!
Summary: This is a very large hotel that probably caters primarily to businesspeople, but I could see it being a good home base for tourists exploring the nearby area as well.  My stay was for pleasure and was only about 16 hours... most of that time I was at the OC fair and a concert but I did have time to attend the manager's reception in the executive lounge, a nice diamond perk.  My expectations are pretty high as the exec lounges in Europe are very nice and other than Del Mar, I've never been to one where you have to pay for alcohol, so I was disappointed that at this one you do.  But the concierge redeemed themselves by having the bellman shuttle us to the fair, which was very kind. (FYI, cab ride back was a reasonable 12 bucks.)  The hotel parking fee is a little high ($25 self or
Manager Response: As you noted the hotel is in a great location for business and leisure travelers. It sounds like you enjoyed the OC Fair and all the entertainment they offered too. We are only a 10 minute drive away from the fairgrounds and our bell staff are her to be of service. We hope you enjoyed the complimentary appetizers in the Executive Lounge and the discounted priced drinks along with the complimentary breakfast every morning which we offer for all our Diamond and Gold members.
