We look forward to your return stay and our Guest Service Managers are here to be of service with any concerns, requests, local information and to ensure your stay is exceeding your expectations.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: My daughter and I stayed here for a competition, and it was very nice. Room was very clean, and nice.  Love the executive lounge, and the room service was awesome! The front desk staff is awesome.  Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: AWESOME to hear you and your daughter had a great experience even though it was a busy weekend with the competition Diane M. The staff and I love to hear the complements about our excellent staff. We hope next time you and your daughter will be able to enjoy and relax and return in August and see Shania Twain in concert at The Honda Center.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I stay at Hilton properties about 80-100 nights a year as a self employed individual. I am picky because it comes out of my pocket. This is a very well run hotel. Clean, good location, nice breakfast if you are a diamond status in the executive lounge. Whats nice about this Hilton, besides the very clean aspect of the hotel is the food is really good. They make pizza in a brick oven at the bar and I tried several things on the menu that all came out very well. Not your typical hotel (even high end ) food. There is an Asian market across the street with several food vendors inside and that was also great. It has been my best experience to date in OC with a Hilton property. I will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Scott P.  We are happy to see you enjoyed your stay and our Executive Lounge.  We offer complimentary shuttle from/to the airport (SNA) and a complimentary shuttle to South Coast Plaza for the best shopping experience. We are just a few minutes from the beautiful California Beaches; Newport Beach and Balboa Island. The Fun Zone on Balboa Island is a great place to visit with the family and then go to the candy store where you can find some candies from the "Good Old Days" .   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I would absolutely stay here again...the bar downstairs is a fun place to go and one night I shared a flatbread pizza with a colleague.  It was delicious and we ate the entire thing.  The wine was tasty and the bartender was great.  I also had a chance to visit the exec lounge and breakfast and the views are wonderful!  Also the fitness center is top notch and worth frequenting if you are staying.  I hope to go back to this hotel.  I loved my room and even enjoyed a bath one evening.  The room had a balcony that you could also step out for some fresh air.  Parking was also conveniently located and easy to find.
Manager Response: littled6607,  We are happy to hear you were enjoying all our amenities; Life is Good.  Hope next time you will be able to enjoy some of the area entertainment. At the Segerstrom next month is Phantom of the Opera, the production boasts many exciting special effects including the show‚Äôs legendary chandelier.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: It is a older hotel, but still nice
Summary: This hotel is much better than most surrounding the area. Parking can be hectic but enough. WiFi is ok. The lounge is nice, and unlike other hilton hotels they do not lock the beverages up. (Amsterdam central) the 7th floor is nice bigger beds and nicer toiletries.  This is the hotel of choice for me here. Especially for the hilton brand. Close to south coast mall. Also to freeways.
Manager Response: David K,  We are glad to hear you enjoyed the location; close to SNA, South Coast Plaza, the Lab and the  Anti-Mall, and restaurants such as Scott's Seafood,Habana, Native Foods, Season's 52 or Capital Grill for all the business lunches and shopping needs.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Great service recommend to everyone. The stay was worth the price cheaper than crowne Plaza across the street from the Hilton. Feel like your treated like a King and Queen. during the peak period of summer it was definately worth the stay.
Manager Response: MARIA C we are happy to hear you had a great stay with us. We hope you will be able to return and enjoy some of the great attractions or natural beauty of our beaches.   Thank you for your patronage.  regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manage

Summary: Excellent facility. Rooms are spacious and clean. Staff is professional, courteous and unobtrusive. We will definitely stay here again. Only negative is free wifi. It is reminded me of old phone line AOL.
Manager Response: Thank you for our comments regarding your stay and we are happy to hear 251derekn that you enjoyed the service and our location. Check out the Orange County Fair at the fairgrounds , only minutes away from our hotel. or maybe attend a Angels game or go to Disneyland for the day or relax at our pool or the beach???? SO much to do ...let's do a stay-cation and enjoy it all.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The hotel is well maintained and the staff were very friendly. We had to stay away from our home because of work that was being done. The front desk upgraded us to a suite which was really very nice. They also allowed us to take advantage of a late check out. The hotel is very conveniently located to the airport and all of Orange County..
Manager Response: Mark M, we are her to be of service and to accommodate our guests as best we can ,based on availability. We hope you will return for a stay-cation sometime soon, even after the house has been completed....maybe whenever you are attending the Segerstrom Center of the Arts performance . We are walking distance or a short drive for a fun evening of a live performance. Coming in August- The Phantom of the Opera- The beloved story and thrilling score - with songs like ‚ÄúMusic of the Night,‚Äù ‚ÄúAll I Ask Of You,‚Äù and ‚ÄúMasquerade‚Äù - will be performed by a cast and orchestra of 52, making this PHANTOM one of the largest productions now on tour.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Hotel provides regularly scheduled shuttle service to and from airport (SNA).  A definite plus if one does not wish to have a car.  Drivers were most courteous and friendly.  Hotel is a short walk to South Coast Plaza - a wonderful shopping destination.  It also has a shuttle to the Plaza.  Amenities, service, and professionalism are excellent in line with expectations of a Hilton Hotel.
Manager Response: We are so grateful to hear you enjoyed the location , the complimentary shuttles and our service. We look forward to being of service with any future stays  dyklee1029 and hope you will enjoy the area attractions. Disneyland - Diamond celebration/ 60 years ; we do offer Disneyland shuttle tickets at our front desk. The shuttle is $4 adults and $2 kids , round trip transportation with the shuttle takes you at scheduled times. Please inquire at our front desk.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for four nights during our OC vacation. The staff at this hotel is so nice and helpful! Unfortunately, the air conditioner in our first room didn't work. When I went to the front desk to ask for a new room they were super apologetic, upgraded us to the executive floor, comped us breakfast and our parking fee! I was amazed at the genuineness of the staff and concern that we were happy! True hospitality!   Now for the details. The rooms are nice and updated. Despite being close to an airport, you cannot hear the planes. The property is clean and well maintained.  The buffet breakfast is ok, but OC is like a food mecca, so I would rather eat somewhere local, which is what we did.   The only thing that we didn't understand was that the executive lounge
Manager Response: Wonderful to hear you will return Rose M. We will look forward to your arrival and if there is any way our Guest Service Managers may be of service with area information, dining, tour, spa and attractions reservations or any concerns and questions we are to here to be of service.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I've stayed in this hotel during my business trip to south California for 3 days. The hotel is clean, has spacey rooms and very friendly stuff. I forgot my shaving machine, so the guy from reception helped me to find a razor and shaving foam for free, that was a pleasant surprise and save time and hassle to go and buy these somewhere else. The hotel has convenient location - 1 minute driving from 405 and at the same time located in a quiet area. There are 2 gas station in hotel's vicinity, plenty of snack bars and close to Plaza mall. Parking is for free, breakfast has some variety of choice, not bad at all.
Manager Response: Pavel T.  Our goal is to provide a memorable and valued stay and we are always delighted to accommodate with the forgotten packed items.  We also have a great store in our hotel that offers everything from sundries, chips, candies, sodas, waters, yogurts, juices, wines and beers along with great tasting salads and sandwiches. Ready for the afternoon by the pool or picnic on the beach.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Close to South Coast Plaza mall
Summary: As expected. The rooms are comfortable without being plush. Definitely 3.5 to 4 Star accommodation. The location is a big plus as it is conveniently located to the South Coast Shopping mall. The hotel has a shuttle running to/from the shops daily. Or you can walk to the maill. It is approximately 10-15mins.  There is a small gym. A nice pool and spa. The lobby bar is open till late. The standard of accommodation for a Hilton is as expected. Though I would love to see a refurbishment of the rooms as they are beginning to age somewhat.
Manager Response: The staff and I are always happy to read about the guest service, location and our guests overall experience with us. Thank you Kevin P. for your feedback. We do hope you had a chance to visit the local attractions while you were here. Knott's Berry Farm has a new venue "The Iron Reef" the advertisement looks very creepy, crawly and I am sure it is a fun experience for all to enjoy. Then Disneyland is celebrating 60 years, Diamond celebration with a new light parade every evening to enjoy. Our pool is hteperfect area to go and relax after all this excitement.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Hilton for a baseball tournament ... The hotel was fully booked but the service was excellent and very friendly. We had to wait 45 minutes for our room - and the hotel comped our dinner (for 2) while we waited. The room was large and spacious, if a little dark. Great gym and pool area. Easy room service. A very good find.
Manager Response: Ka1019,  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and our team were friendly and offered great service. We hope you will have a chance to back again and enjoy the beautiful beaches; the closest beaches are Newport and Balboa Island and just a 15 minute drive North or South you will the most gorgeous drive on the Pacific Coast Highway to Laguna Beach or Huntington Beach. Make it a day of sun and fun.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Overall a very good experience. Very international feel as many flight crews stay here from many different countries. Check-in was efficient and clerk efficient and friendly. Restaurant (we only ate breakfast there) was efficient, good and reasonable priced. Rooms were typical Hilton: roomy, quality furniture and well maintained. Staff at all levels were friendly and willing to assist. Good experience.
Manager Response: Dear PuebloBenito0802,  Thank you for your review and we are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay. The staff and I hope you will return to visit us again real soon. There is so much to do in our area. Did you know we now have the Disneyland Shuttle stop by our hotel. Just reserve the seating through our front desk; $5 round trip for adults and $2 for kids.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I attended a conference for 5 days at this hotel. The room was pleasant, nothing special but very clean. There's a Starbucks in the lobby (aces in my book) and also a little shop for food. They had yogurt, soda, candy, cheese, fruit, and some other edibles to take up to the room. There's a huge mall close by and some walkable restaurants. The pool is nice. There's a hot tub. The hotel is about 15 minutes from the Angels' baseball stadium.  The wifi is the worst ever. EVER. The parking garage is super-weird. Takes two elevators to get there.   Overall, an average, nice hotel. I don't know the rates as mine was paid for by employer.
Manager Response: We are conveniently located close to the South Coast Plaza, Orange County Fairgrounds and Segerstrom Center for the Arts. The Angels Stadium as well as the Honda Center are only a 15 minute drive and close to the ARTIC-the transportation hub. We look forward to seeing you soon again real soon and we hope you will be able to enjoy a Angels game at that time.  Regards, Yolanda H.  Guest Service Manager

Summary: Room service here is going bistro-style.  No more nice trays or plates or silverwave.  My food came in boxes in... a bag...that was brought to my room (oh hello, like take out!, like I would order something from the deli across the street from my office and bring it back to eat at my desk!).  I ordered chicken with potatoes and minestrone soup.  Both tasted like they came out of the microwave and the soup tasted of plastic that it was probably cooked in.  I was very disappointed during my late night hunger craving.  I mean isn't nice to order a nice juicy cheeseburger and eat it in your room at 9pm!  The hotel did remove it from my bill so that was good.  But come on...for a Hilton Hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback regarding the new In Room Dining Menu. We always appreciate our guests responds and feedback so we can make our guests experience right. I am delighted to hear the staff was courteous and friendly and you did have a positive experience service wise. If there is any other way we may be of service please let us know emailing our hotel Guest Service Manager.  Delighted to be of Service Ms. Judy729.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I visited the Hilton in Costa Mesa and it's pretty disappointing. The parking is very inconvenient just for you to get into the lobby and the 23.00 dollar a day doesn't help either. Their in room internet comes on and off. Their showers are old and small, for a Hilton in a city like Costa Mesa I expected a lot more.
Manager Response: David D. we are sorry you did not enjoy your experience with us. The parking is several levels and and can certainly be confusing for our guests. Please know that our staff along with the self parking attendants are here to assist and help. We look forward to assisting you with any concerns or questions throughout your stay as we are here to be of service.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The lobby is beautiful and it was a good gathering point for classmates as they came and went.  The room was great, very spacious with handy electronic plug-ins- good bed and I wish I could have taken the pillows home with me. The event room was lovely with open doors to a private patio where our dinner was served buffet-style.  The adjacent restrooms were luxurious and immaculate.  Best part was the 6th floor lounge.  Wine and light snacks with friends in the afternoon was a highlight.  Our only hitch was that the bar closed at midnight when we still wanted to visit with friends.  A highlight was watching the hostesses from Emirates Airline arrive for the night- what beauties.
Manager Response: Y5805KWnancyg thank you for your feedback and your comments regarding your school reunion. We have some great patio and ballroom spaces that are conveniently located by restrooms, bar and lounge and the lobby area. We hope you will return sometime soon to enjoy the Orange County Fair, starting July 17th with many concerts and rides to enjoy.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The orange brown color scheme made me feel like the hotel hadn't been updated since the 70s.  At least beds had white duvet cloth covers.  Nothing special, nothing great.  Staff was friendly.    Got confused on the parking. I think if you check in first and then park there is a discount on the parking rate of $20 a night.
Manager Response: GHamp,  The renovations completed last year in our Lobby area certainly is a combination of the old complementing the art decor California style. We are all about the Essence of California and our decor represents the local mission, the Hollywood era and the beach kind of feel. it does bring back some great memories from years past.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Excellent business center located in the lobby with plenty of workspace and plug options.  Nice bar and Starbucks also in the lobby.  The property is near plenty of restaurants and a very upscale mall.  Customer service was impeccable with a gentleman in the lobby whose only job seemed to be customer service and was very attentive.
Manager Response: KSSmithTN,  Thank you for your review and we are delighted to hear you had an impeccable stay. Our Tech Lounge is a great value for our traveling visitors with 4 computers at their disposal and a printer and several plug options or just to relax and watch T.V. while waiting for our complimentary airport shuttle makes the Tech Lounge a great place to sit.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: This was a friendly, clean, smart hotel!  I recommend for a comfortable, quiet sleep. Housekeeping did a thorough job each day.  I was there for a conference and it was a  great conference facility, too.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback Jennifer C.  We are happy to hear you had a great conference and you were exceedingly happy with your overall stay.  Please return sometime for a much needed rest and enjoy Newport Beach or balboa Island. Take a Whale Watching or Hornblower tour of the harbor. It never gets old to see the dolphins in the harbor along the side of the whales...it is all such magnificent to see.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Had a wonderful stay, experience.  Staff were extremely courteous and accommodating.  Hotel was beautiful and location to other restaurants, stores and attractions perfect.  Would highly recommend this hotel and location.
Manager Response: 125shirleyb,  We are grateful to hear you enjoyed your cousins wedding and your overall service at our hotel. The staff adn I are looking forward to another opportunity to share a memorable experience with you again real soon. Possibly return to enjoy the beaches or the Art Festival in Laguna Beach.  A must see is the Pageant of the Masters - enjoy as the famous artists artwork come to live.   Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: We made arrangements to stay at this hotel because of a wedding we were invited to. The group reservation was here and we are also Hilton Honors Members. Our room was upgraded to the Executive Floor and our parking was comped. Great experience.
Manager Response: Thank you Carl W. for staying with us and for sharing about your experience with us. We hope the next time you will be able to enjoy the Orange County Fair the them is "One Big Party"  happening- July 17-August 16, 2015 and the  OC Fair Public Hours are Wednesday-Friday Noon-Midnight and  Saturday-Sunday 10 a.m.-Midnight.  It celebrates its 125th anniversary with 23 days of food, rides, shopping, exhibits and animals. Enjoy world-renowned performers in the Pacific Amphitheater and exciting events in The Hangar and Action Sports Arena.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Be sure to ask for room away from construction
Summary: Our room sounded like someone was coming through wall with a jackhammer. They did comp room for one night. Rooms are roomy and furnishings very nice. Location was perfect for me,right next to freeway, across from mall, lots of shopping and dining.
Manager Response: Dear Ms. Q,  Thank you for your review and we are delighted that we were able to assist with extending your stay at our hotel. Keeping our hotel updated and within our standards and quality sometimes means we have to perform repairs....unfortunately the repairmen began their repairs too early in the day and for that we apologize. I understand they did stop once the management went to them.  Thank you for your patronage and we look forward to seeing you again real soon.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: We stayed here with friends for a concert we were attending in Irvine. The accommodations were perfect for this. Easy check in, clean rooms. Only draw backs were a VERY limited in room dining menu (we ended up ordering pizza from OUTSIDE the hotel) & not having accessible ice. It was several floors away & even at breakfast I was told that it was several floors away & we could go to our rooms & call someone to bring it up. Bummer but overall a decent stay for less then 24 hours.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Breakfast is located in the Main Lobby area restaurant where you have the option for the breakfast buffet or off the menu. The Lounge/Bar area is open for lunch and dinner and offers everything from flat-breads and pizzas to burgers or salmon. All are delicious - my favorite flat-bread is the fig and prosciutto.  We are happy to hear you had a great time with friends and that the accommodations were perfect. We are looking forward to being of service for any and all return visits.  regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: This hotel is large but has such a comfortable feeling. The front desk agents were terrific!  One overheard my family wishing me a happy birthday.  We went out to breakfast and when we came back, I went into the lobby market to purchase 4 bottles of water.  When I went to the front desk to pay for them, the agent said happy birthday, the waters are on the house and they he offered me a bottle of wine!  How very nice!  I was there for a family wedding so we had about 25 rooms and everyone was delighted!
Manager Response: How wonderful to have a happy birthday and a wedding celebration. This is what hospitality is all about and having the opportunity such as this makes our day as well. Thank you for the feedback and we hope next time you will be able to enjoy some of the area activities and attractions. Maybe even enjoy a concert ;  Shania Twain at the Honda Center. Awesome!  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Bar staff: great! Concierge: fabulously helpful. Reception: friendly enough but local knowledge  Don't leave anything behind or you will never see it again. Many of my colleagues , including myself,have accidentally left things ranging from items of clothing to Ipads, in rooms after checking out. I called hotel 20 minutes after checkout to be told nothing was found with a rather " too bad, how sad" attitude from reception.  This happens way too frequently. Sadly, it's the diahonest staff that bring the others down. Shame on you Hilton @ Costa Mesa!
Manager Response: Dear Suzanne M,   Thank you for taking the time to post your feedback. Please accept our sincere apology. We want you to know that the comments we receive from our guests are taken very seriously and your suggestions will help us to improve. Again, please accept our apologies for the inconvenience you experienced. If I can be of further assistance please feel free to contact me.  Thank you,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The Hilton in Costa Mesa is just what you would expect for a Category 4 Hotel.   We used our Hilton Honors and the Executive Club where we had breakfast every morning which was OK, The fruit was fresh and the executive lounge was very nice.   It is not a Luxury hotel but it was clean, in a nice location and the staff was very friendly.
Manager Response: taylorleo,  So glad to hear you enjoyed our Executive Lounge which is a upgraded benefit for our members. The complimentary breakfast offers a variety throughout the week such as scrambled eggs one day and breakfast burrito the next. The fresh fruit , Salmon,with capers, chopped onions and egg along with the variety of chacuterie. We look forward to your return visit real soon and share a exceedign stay with you again.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Family Trip Fab in Costa Mesa Hilton
Summary: I was at the Hilton for a previous conference and I decided to return for vacation. During my previous visit for my annual conference I stayed at a previous hotel and all conference activities were held at the Hilton CM. The service and staff were awesome and I truly regret not having a room there.
Manager Response: Yoroba R.  So great to hear you had a great family trip and that all was exceeding your expectations. Hope you can return again real soon and enjoy some of the beach activities and great surfing iat Newport or Huntington Beaches.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Room Took forever / Double charged for parking!
Summary: I arrived a little early, and my room wasn't ready. That wasn't a problem. The problem was when I returned five hours later, and my room was still not ready! The person at the Front Desk helped and upgraded my room to the "executive floor" but when they did that they forgot something pretty vital. (In my opinion.)  When I booked the room, I chose the "Parking" rate so that I wouldn't have to pay for parking separately. When they moved my room, someone forgot to make a note of that, and charged my room for parking.   I went to the front desk before leaving, and he said he took care of it, but all he did was charge my card for the amount on the folio. Therefore, I paid TWICE for parking!   Ridiculous that that wasn't caught the first time, and even worse that it wasn't fixed when
Manager Response: K C,  I am so sorry to hear that our front desk staff whom tried to offer a upgrade due to your wait time. Thank you for bringing your experience to our attention so may use this opportunity to follow up with our training and to ensure we make it right and share a exceeding experience from check in to check out and departure.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: We stayed here one night and got in very late (about 1am). We had called ahead to let them know and they held our room, no problem. The room was spacious, clean and comfortable.   We used the "express" breakfast and it arrived to our room on time and was very tasty (better than I was expecting).   The front desk, valet and bellman were all helpful and nice. The lobby and other spaces looked well maintained.
Manager Response: MorganElyse,  We are delighted to hear your room was comfortable and clean and waiting for your arrival. The complimentary airport shuttle to John Wayne Airport is a great benefit for all our travelers- one less thing to worry about. Hope you had some down time too and were able to enjoy some of our great restaurants in the area. Whether it is vegetarian you are looking for - 118 Degrees or Native Foods are some great healthy choices and they are close to the hotel.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Courteous and efficient staff from the time you arrive through your dining experience, time at the bar, coming back to your freshly-prepared room and waking the next morning. Great location and the renovations are a fabulous improvement. I feel welcome every time I arrive.  I miss full room service, though!
Manager Response: TKH1208,  We thankful for your feedback regarding your overall stay and have forwarded your comments regarding the new and convenient CP Express. The CP Express experiences goes together with our Corner Pantry located by the Front Desk offering conveniently packaged sandwiches, salads, cheese & fruit boxes along with the juices, milks, sodas or alcoholic beverages with many choices of snacks throughout your stay. The Corner pantry also offers sundries such as band-aids, tide pen, allergy or cold tablets to beauty aids as needed.  Need ice for your bag to keep your drinks cold - check out the ice cream section where we also have bags of ice to make your total experience easy.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The hotel staff here is very helpful, especially Rammy who is professional, efficient and friendly.   Rooms are very clean and nice, especially if you get a room with a porch. The breakfast is also quite tasty and the wait staff there are also solid.  Bravo.
Manager Response: Yuki H,  Thank  you for your review and we do hope you will have another opportunity to visit us and to be able to stay with us next time. July is an exciting month as we offer so many great experiences at our area attractions; Disneyland celebrating 60 years, Knott's Berry Farm adding a new attraction , Laguna Beach has the Art Festival and Pageant of the Masters. There is always just relaxing by our poolside or the beach.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: OK rooms, drink prices double average
Summary: good rooms, cost of food and drinks ridiculously high, in middle of car culture wasteland, but close to shopping and freeways. Has advantage of being near the John Wayne Airport, but the Hotel tries to get your dollars what ever way it can.
Manager Response: We are all about Making It Right and certainly would have wanted the opportunity to assist you with any and all concerns. Our staff and our Guest service Managers strive to share a valued and caring experience with all our guests. The staff and I are happy to hear you enjoyed your overall stay and we will certainly pass your comments...we are looking at beginning a Happy Hour offering specials each day for you to enjoy.Hope to see you back real soon.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Hilton hosted our 50th high school reunion and did an excellent job of tending to our needs.  First rate job all around.  The banquet room was large enough to comfortably seat our group of 130+ people and the food was excellent.
Manager Response: Phillipk,  High School Reunions are like a family reunion...flashback to some good times. Disneyland is celebrating 60 years since they opened. Do you remember the time Disneyland opened? The E Ticket? Now available for your convenience the Disneyland Shuttle from our hotel, just $5 round trip for adults and $2 for kids. we try to make your life easy and truly a restful vacation or stay-cation.   Regards,  Yolanda H, Guest Service Manager

Summary: PROS: Easy to find off the 405 freeway. Plenty of parking (complimentary to guests, fee for visitors). Excellent staff on duty 24/7, very helpful and pleasant. We arrived between "serving times" at the cafe, and someone still offered to make us a sandwich. They have a wonderful lounge/bar/cafe on the ground floor that makes an excellent meeting place. We were there for a large Reunion party, and all of us could readily find our friends by heading downstairs any time of the day or evening.   Some rooms have a balcony, but most don't. If this is important to you, specify that you want one. Otherwise, your room will be hermetically sealed (you will not be able to open your window at all.) Room facilities were top notch. Rooms came with a great shower/bath, lots of fluffy towels,
Manager Response: Luv2Bgoing,,  We are so happy we were able to share a great experience with your High School Reunion.  Our meeting spaces are for large or small groups, for corporate style meetings or romantic weddings in our patios with water fountains or gorgeous outside rose garden. Come check our meeting s spaces and see how we can share a great , valued and memorable experience.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: We had a wonderful time at the Costa Mesa Hilton in celebration of our 50th High School reunion.  The room was so comfortable, the food was great and the service was exceptional.  The staff was always available to help us in any way.  We highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Louis Z.  High School Reunions can be so much fun and we are happy to have been your host. It was our pleasure to ensure your room, food and service was impeccably so you could relax and enjoy the evening with friends. Hope you will have an opportunity to revisit with enjoying the local area beaches. Newport Beach, Balboa Island are closer and yet the little drive ( approx. 15 minutes) up the scenic Coast Highway to Laguna Beach is well worth it.   regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service manager

Summary Heading: Older Property, but clean, quiet and great service
Summary: Stayed here for business trip in SoCal. Very convenient as a base, location is perfect. Staff are great, food in the Restaurant tasty and quick service. Rooms could use an update, but the gym had new equipment and that makes a difference to me.
Manager Response: HammerNJ,  We just renovated our fitness center, lobby area and added the Business Lounge and Corner Pantry for our guests convenience. The Corner Pantry offers snacks such as candy , nuts and chips , sodas, juices, milks, yogurts, sandwiches, waters, alcoholic beverages, salads, and sundries. We try to offer a positive one stop experience for our guests with the Business Lounge for computer and printers and the Corner pantry for you snacking and health needs.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: It is not my first time in this hotel and always the internet not working. The hotel staff every time they say we are facing a problem with the internet and it will be fixed soon BUT never fixed.I called AT&T and checked with them they said that the problem from the hotel and not from them.
Manager Response: The Internet issue is being followed up with and the company is coming to recheck the system at this time. We understand when traveling internationally it is of importance to keep in touch with your family. Sometimes with International connections there can be some problems with the ip address and our operator can assist with this to check and connect. Thank you for your patronage and we look forward to assisting you with any and all requests and concerns.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: We have stayed here many times before and always choose this Hilton because of the staff, cleanliness of the room, and a fantastic breakfast in the executive room. The hotel is humongous and is close to any and everything you could possibly want to do while visiting that part of California, thanks Hilton, I wish all of them were like this
Manager Response: Dear Dennisbynum,  Thank you and we are delighted to see you had a great grad experience;). Congratulations ! Most likely you went to Disneyland and enjoyed the 60 year celebrations they offer in the park. Did you know we have the Disneyland Shuttle pickup in front of our hotel; adults round trip $5 and kids $2. Such a great value! Just make reservations the night before with our Front Desk and our morning staff will be happy to show you where to pick up the shuttle.  Looking forward to making special moments.  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: This hotel is fantastic!  The staff, particularly the manager, was very friendly.  We arrived before check-in time and he was sure to accommodate us with a room immediately.  He even upgraded us (free of charge) to an executive class room that came complete with complimentary continental breakfast.  I wish I could remember his name because he was extraordinary.  The breakfast was very good.  The meeting room was superb.
Manager Response: tspencer9,  So glad to hear you and your family enjoyed the upgrade and had a great experience with us. Hope the kids were able to enjoy our fabulous outdoor pool area and you some California sun.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel in the heart of the OC
Summary: Hilton Costa Mesa is a great place to stay for a weekend getaway. Located in the heart of the OC it is close to beaches, theme parks and shopping. Rates are great, staff is very friendly. They have a great lobby and bar. Very close to South Coast Plaza for great shopping.
Manager Response: Ron T. thank you for your feedback . Our location is close to South Coast Plaza and John Wayne Airport and we do offer complimentary scheduled airport shuttles. our staff is here to make your stay worry free and comfortable. We are looking forward to your arrival:)  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I am a Diamond Hilton Honors member, and when I booked my room online I was not able to get a king room. Just a room with 2 queen beds. My wife is not normally able to travel with me, but she was with me this time, so the room set-up made a difference. The person at the desk (Ramy) not only got me a king room, but bumped us up to a suite. Not on the executive level, but still, a welcome upgrade. Great service.
Manager Response: Dear Mr. & Mrs. Gary G.  Thank you for noting the great guest service and overall experience you had with us due to Ramy's tender care. We did let Ramy know his service was much appreciated. 4th Of July Fireworks in Newport Beach for one of the Premier 4th of July Celebrations and Fireworks Display in Orange County. There‚Äôs no better way to spend the day than on the beach in sunny Southern California and we hope you can join us.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: the room, bed, pillows, etc was first rate, comfortable and clean.  And the large sliding door onto a small "patio" opens!! Climate control was easy and accurate. There were plenty of nice outdoor spaces to enjoy a drink or snack and the pool and hot tub were excellent.  There is shuttle service to and from the airport!! Good value for sure, but the art displayed in the hotel was just awful.
Manager Response: Join us Harley H.  in Newport Beach for one of the Premier 4th of July Celebrations and Fireworks Display in Orange County. There‚Äôs no better way to spend the day than on the beach in sunny Southern California. We are happy to see you had a great experience and ceratinly would love to share another great stay with you.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Booked 4 nights through the HHONORS website at very nice rate, $50 per night + 12,000 HHONORS points.  The location is ideal, right off the 405 freeway and close to the John Wayne Airport.   Nicely furnished rooms and all the comforts of home. The breakfast in the Executive Floor was also very good.  Hilton offers many choices in hotel facilities in the OC, but this one provides the best value and convenience (I have stayed at some of the other Hilton properties, e.g. Doubletree in Santa Ana and Anaheim).
Manager Response: It is always great to hear positive feedback from our guests. Thank you so much Lava Legs for sharing your experience . Hope you will be able to experience The Hornblower Sunday Brunch -it is phenomenal and a great way to enjoy the area - cruising in the Newport Bay.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I got a wonderful experienced in Hilton hotel. If ever I have the chance to travel I will see to it that I will be staying in their hotel. Its a place like home, staff are so helpful always there when you need them.
Manager Response: Ramon V.  I am happy to see you had a great stay with us. To add to the experience next time come see a concert at The Honda center; Fri, Jun 19-MARCO ANTONIO SOLIS Y CAMILA. A beautiful way to spend the evening.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: The hotel is very beautiful with friendly employees.
Summary: The hotel has a shuttle that picked me up from the John Wayne Airport. It runs every 30 minutes. When I checked out, I was taken back to the airport. That is really a plus! The room was beautiful with flat screen TVs and other amenities. The hotel also had an area for computer use. It was truly a wonderful stay.
Manager Response: Mary M. the staff and I are delighted to hear you enjoyed a 5 STAR stay . Close to the hotel is South Coast Plaza with a variety of restaurants, Segerstrom Center for the Arts,  Newport Beach and Balboa Island and just a 15 minute drive is Disneyland , Knott's Berry Farm, Downtown Disney, The Honda Center and Angels Stadium. So much to do so little time.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Average, in the true sense of the word. It's not bad, it's nice, but not great. The hotel shows it's age in architecture but is well maintained. The restaurant had good food but is a bit pricey. The rooms are OK but nothing special.  There is some really fun places to eat within walking distance. They're like little restaurant villages, not really a mall, but an outdoor collection of trendy restaurants and cafes. The closest is called the CAMP, the other is called the LAB. They are both worth a visit.
Manager Response: Dear David G.  We are sorry to hear that you thought of us as average. We have so much to offer along with the friendly service, Executive  Lounge, Pool and Fitness Center , Business Center, restaurants and pizzeria align with a lot of meeting space. Something for everyone.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service manager

Summary: The Hilton hotel has met and exceeded my expectation when it came to service. The staff was so friendly that even the guests felt they needed to be friendly to fit in.  The hotel is so accommodating you have no reason to leave the hotel.  Everything is provided within the hotel for adults and children. O man,(if you want to leave) the area is such a great location that everything you want is within walking distance.  Bus service is right outside the hotel, Gas Stations, Little Plazas, Malls, Restaurants and many others are within walking distances. The hotel is even with minutes of diving distance to attractions.
Manager Response: Marietta R.  Thank you for the great recommendations. Yes you certainly could enjoy several days with in our hotel and enjoy the pools area, the fitness center and the restaurant and bar area. The Anti Mall and The Lab are 2 great malls to walk to and enjoy the unique stores and restaurants. Some great vegetarian choices are in these locations as well as a great Cuban restaurant. Stop by the Concierge to find out about these restaurant and for assistance with dining reservations.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Being a Hilton Honors member, I requested for extra pillows before checking in.  Got to my room, no extra pillows.  Tried to check in at 3:00 pm, room was not ready until 3:30 pm. Lara or Lana at the reception desk was excellent. She was courteous and remembered that it was my birthday. üòÅ. I was placed in the highest floor which is the 7th. The view was okay.  Came in the room by ourselves. No bellboy around. The a/c was not on. The room is clean. Pillows are excellent for me. Bed was just enough. Not too crazy about it though. Would i stay again? No too sure.  Will do another review at check out.
Manager Response: We hope you enjoyed the wedding and that your birthday was celebrated as well. Our staff strive to share an enjoyable stay with all our guests and we will let Lana know she did a great job offering you the Executive Floor . The views in the Executive Lounge is of the city and at night it is just awesome view with the city lights. Wishing you a great birthday month with wishes for a fabulous year ahead. Thank you for your patronage.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Surprised to See Room was already occupied
Summary: My Room was given to some one with a close but different last name. Only the first 2 letter of my last name were same as the guest occupying the room, but they were totally different names. I approached the room and tried opening, only to see a gentle man opening the room and I realized there is a couple staying in the room. It was good that this gentle man was kind enough to realize the hotel goofed up and gave him incorrect room, and I landed at right room, if not he would have thought, I was trying to break-in to his room.  The front office did not even acknowledge the mistake (to me), after the other guest went to front desk and got a different room assigned, they acted as if nothing happened and called me to ask for a credit card info. that was not collected when they give
Manager Response: We are extremely sorry to hear about your experience and have spoken with our front desk staff to ensure all guests names will be spelled out and confirmed properly.  May I suggest to check at all times either the website or your confirmation for any specific detailed information regarding WiFi, Parking or any other fees for any and all hotels you are staying at. Hotels in popular and large cities usually have limited space and will most likely have a parking fee. We do hope you were able to enjoy the area with all it has to offer.Looking forward to sharing a great experience with you next time.  Best wishes,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Very expensive for the bar and eating.  $8.00 beers and $12.00 margaritas at happy hour.  We were there for a convention and there were several problems with the hotel's audio visual system.  The air conditioner in the room seemed to malfunction.  The thermostat read 68 but the room felt like 80. The escalators were out of order causing long delays to get on the elevators.
Manager Response: I am sorry to hear your room was not cooling properly and I know our maintenance staff will check the room at this time to ensure all has been repaired properly for future use but I would hope that our guests offer the opportunity to repair and make right any problems that arise throughout their stay. We value our guests and look forward to sharing a positive, memorable and productive stay as they deserve and need. Thank you for your patronage.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: This is a very clean hotel with pleasant and friendly staff.  The room was more than I expected.  Great place for business meetings, weddings and more.  Food was excellent.  Go check this place out.  There are event room on main level and more in there lower level.  The executive level had even more benefits than expected.  Well worth the price.  Would reccommend.
Manager Response: Tina W.  I could not have said it any better, thank you for the recommendation. South on Bristol are The Lab and The Camp. The Lab has the kinds of shops you‚Äôd likely find on L.A.‚Äôs hip Melrose Avenue; Klein Epstein & Parker for men and vegetarian Seabirds Kitchen are new. Opposite is the Camp, set amid woods, aluminum and piped-in sounds of crickets. Dining options include Ecco for fabulous pizzas, Taco Asylum for unusual tacos, Umami Burger and Wine Lab.Coem and enjoy it all in Costa Mesa.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Some of the rooms are situated over ballrooms where parties with bands are held.  Bands playing until 1:00 A.M. are not conducive to sleep for conference goers who have 8:00 AM meetings. The design of the hotel is very confusing for learning your way around as a first time visitor.  Also the elevators will not move if other guests press the button before the doors are completely closed.  That was a constant irritation.
Manager Response: We certainly understand your frustration regarding the noise from the event downstairs and that surely was a mistake on our part to place you in this room above the event. We apologize for this and will make note with our staff to empathize and anticipate all our guests needs. We hope you will return and see how wonder our hotel is and to enjoy all the area has to offer. We have The Honda Center for sports events or concerts and the Angels Stadium. If you want to connect to the train or bus service the newly opened ARTIC is a hub for all transportation provided in our area making traveling more pleasurable. Looking forward to your return.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Stayed here for one night. The room was dark and hard to study in , the bed was comfortable. It was fairly quiet for being so close to busy roads. I'd skip breakfast. Between the Parking and Breakfast and the room  I spent almost 300 bucks. Not really worth it.
Manager Response: Steveev1000,  We offer some great room package deals on-line which offer parking and breakfast included in the room price...that may have been the way to go. Please check out our specials and we look forward to having you here again real soon to go whale watching or to enjoy some great fishing with Dana Wharf. Enjoy life at the beach.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The room should have been a quiet room. I complained to the manager twice and he stated the second time that we would receive 50% off the room price for that night. At 1:30 a.m. the party's band finished but i missed my sleep that night and I missed part of the conference I was supposed to be there at 8:00 a.m. and no breakfast.
Manager Response: I apologize for the inconvenience you experienced and for the missed sleep. We did not have another room to switch you to and could have done a better job with anticipating your needs. Please for any future stays contact the Guest Service Manager to ensure a room away from any noise or party celebrations. it is our pleasure to ensure all our guests enjoy a comfortable stay.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Pretty standard for a Hilton Hotel.  The rooms are nice and comfy, great staff and service, and great location.  The main draw back was the distance of the elevators.  The elevators were so far from our room.  There's only one elevator bank, so don't forget anything in your room or you'll be taking a long walk.  Otherwise, we were very happy with our stay.
Manager Response: Dear shadow08,  We are thankful you enjoyed your stay and may I recommend next time to request a room closer to the elevators. We are always delighted to accommodate as best as possible our guests requests. Wishing everyone a great and safe Memorial Day.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Felt comfortable,good service,clean room.Quality bedding.All together was extremely happy with my stay.It was kinda out of my way,but next time I have no problem driving the extra minutes to this location.
Manager Response: Ray A. we are delighted to hear you tried us and we were true with our service. Our location is close to the freeways ( 405 & 55 ) and we are a few minutes form John Wayne Airport with complimentary shuttles for your convenience. Looking to go fishing ? let us assist you with making you fishing trip special.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: My four-day stay at this hotel was fantastic!    The hotel staff was great to work with, and that includes everyone from the front desk, housekeeping, executive lounge, wait staff, and maintenance!!   The food at the restaurant was great - love the soup - and the food in the Executive Lounge was way beyond my expectations.   I would recommend this hotel to anyone who is in the Santa Ana area - you will not be disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear Stan K.,  Thank you for your wonderful review and for letting us know about your experience. We look forward to a return visit to Orange County. There is so my much to do in our area, whether you are looking for a concert , a sporting event such as a baseball game or ice hockey or just enjoy the nature with a beautiful hike along the beach. We have it all.  Looking forward to assisting you with any future stays,  Sincerely,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: We went for a wedding - great experience over the 3 day event.  Front desk, maid service, bar service and banquet was excellent. The hotel was packed with different events when we were there so I found it especially nice that everything went smoothly and was always clean in the common areas.
Manager Response: The staff and I are always grateful to hear the great guest comments and to know that we have done a great job. Thank you for your feedback and we hope you had a great time at the wedding. Our hotel is a beautiful choice for weddings, especially in our patio areas with the fountain or the garden as the background. We look forward to you visiting us again when you can enjoy the California weather and do some surfing, snorkeling, kayaking, Duffy boat ride and our beautiful beaches.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: If your looking for that warm welcome when visiting Orange County the Hilton Costa Mesa is the place to stay. Everything is close by with excellent shopping , food and bars. Having stayed there many times as well as other hotels in the area the Hilton offers that friendly service and helpful advice when you need it. It is the best choice for a great stay in Orange County
Manager Response: Thank you Ron C. for your 4 STAR review and we are happy to hear we are your choice due to our great service, friendly staff and location.  Thinking of a stay-cation? We are located close to the airport with complimentary shuttle service and the beaches, South Coast Plaza, Segerstrom Center of the Arts and now we also have the Disneyland Shuttle for your convenience as a family to enjoy the "Happiest Place on Earth". We are looking forward to your return.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Excellent staff and location, strongly recommend to other travelers and locals looking to accommodate out of town visitors. Was here on business but staff made it feel like a vacation. Strongly recommended.
Manager Response: Thank you for recommending us Guy H.  For our out of town visitors we now can reserve the Disneyland Shuttle for a nominal fee of $5.00 round trip and kids are $2.00 round trip. Stop by the bell stand for concierge services to place the reservation the night prior ( must reserve prior to 8:30 pm) or find out information on where else the shuttle stops. We look forward to sharing a happy and exceeding experience with you and your family.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Stayed in this hotel 3times for business. Sad to say, it's a contract my company has with the hotel and I have no other choice but to stay here over and over again. If I could choose, I never would have chosen it. When you say 'Hilton', you expect to get a well known 5-star deal. Not in this Hilton. Each and every time I was given a room next to the service elevator working all night long.  Since I'm always staying there for two nights in a row, I've asked for another room the next day. Answer was that the hotel is overbooked. I know for sure there are minimum of 3 sets of airline crew staying in it everyday and they're signing in and out on a daily basis. Amazingly, that being said, another room was found within a minute. Two out of three stays, TV wasn't working.  On my second
Manager Response: Dear Maya1306,  We are sad to hear that as a regular guest you are not happy with your stay and I would like to recommend to add to your reservation the special request to place you away from the elevator. If you are a member you have the option to perform a eCheck In on your phone and choose your room as another option. Breakfast options are the buffet or off the menu ; to change up order off the menu so you have a new and tasty option for breakfast. If at any time a guest has a concern please know the Guest Service Manager is always delighted to be of service.. We look forward to assisting you on your next visit.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: This was a high quality hotel. The bar, the food, the room, and the nice service was everything I would expect from Hilton. I arrived late and the bar tender was able to get me a great plate of tasty spaghetti for a late night meal. I really appreciated this favor even though the kitchen was supposed to be closed.
Manager Response: Service the way it should be with so many great amenities...complimentary shuttle to/from SNA, complimentary shuttle to/from South Coast Plaza and beginning this month a shuttle to/from Disneyland. Just reserve the night before ( by 8 pm) and for $5.00 adults , $2.00 kids round trip you will have a worry free day at Disneyland. If for some reason you could not reserve in time the other option is to catch the shuttle at South Coast Plaza; please see our bell desk and concierge service regarding scheduled times for the ART/Disneyland Shuttle.  Orange County where we care about our guests.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: the hotel is in a strange location very accessible from I 405. It-s very pricy for the quality of furniture and being a little old style. Food is good in the morning and concierge very helpful. The gym is old and ugly! Pool too! I've been in better Hilton hotels anyway for the price I paid! Sleep quality anyway is good and beds are nice as well as room are clean.
Manager Response: Thank you AndreaDavoli for taking the time to write a review. Our hotel is located close the John Wayne Airport (SNA) with easy access to several freeways ( 55/ Toll Road 73 and 405). Our decor is all about the "Essence of California" and we represent the mission style and the more modern Hollywood style throughout our hotel. California is known for their diversity and for being able to drive 1-2 hours on any freeway and end up in another climate and surroundings...how awesome is that ! To the mountains, or the beaches or the desert ; it is all within a few hours.  Welcome to "The Essence of California" !  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The Premium Internet Service is no better than the free Internet so don't waste your money.  Also, they deliver room service in a paper bag and the food is in plastic containers with plastic silverware yet the costs are the same.  total rip off!
Manager Response: Keith M.,  Thank you for your feedback on the new In Room Dining menu. The new and changing way we deliver the meals is the thoughtfully packaged food arrives in a kraft style bag and then when you are done just throw the bag away; easy and convenient. The South coast Plaza does have some great shopping and restaurants for our guests to enjoy and our bell staff offer complimentary scheduled shuttle to and from the Plaza.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Nice Rooms Great Service.....but Park Yourself!
Summary: Overall very pleased. Needed to request toiletries from housekeeping. Room cleanliness was satisfactory. Problem with refrigerator noise. All issues taken care of and front desk staff were outstanding. Environment and business services were excellent! Executive floor and lounge were first rate also.
Manager Response: Kathleen Maria W. we are happy to hear you enjoyed the Executive Lounge, the overall service and amenities. The Executive Lounge offers complimentary breakfast, evening appetizers and throughout the stay sodas and water. Parking is either with Valet or Self Parking with the option of coming to the front entrance to unload and check in to your room. Our Bell staff are happy to assist with your luggage upon arrival. Coming in May the Disneyland Shuttle picking up our guests from our hotel ; please check our website for complete information. Thank you for your patronage and we look forward to seeing you again real soon.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Excellent property for value.  Good food, drinks, amenities.  Excellent d√©cor and well kept. My least favorite thing was access to self parking from the egress point. Wish the elevator to the upper parking was closer to egress.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 STAR review Gary M. our staff appreciates it when a guest acknowledges their great service.   Offering a great experience with good food, drinks and amenities is what we strive for. We hope your next visit  you will be able to enjoy the area...maybe go sports fishing, enjoy the whale watching or the boat ride to Catalina Island?  Which ever way you want to enjoy the day we have it here in Orange County.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: poor front desk made the visit difficuly
Summary: The front desk was understaffed, resulting n long lines and very snarky service.  I ended up standing in line three times to check in, and left my key wihtout checking out or getting a receipt.   Otherwise, the hotel is nice but there is not a lot going on nearby
Manager Response: At items when attendees for a event arrive at the same time we have had longer lines and always make sure we have more staff to assist with check ins. Our location is perfect as we are close the SNA, South Coast Plaza for the some great shopping and so many different restaurants to enjoy. If you love the Arts the Segerstrom Center of the Arts is just a 10 minute drive. Or maybe you love baseball - Angels Stadium by freeway is just a 15 minute drive or across the way the Honda Center for sports like the Anaheim Ducks or entertainment such as Bette Midler or Imagine Dragons. Or maybe just a jog by the beach, so much to do and so little time.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent Service from the F&B Team
Summary: We held a family event here last weekend and both Adam and Alfonso were wonderful to work with. They helped organize our event in the Executive Lounge and our private dinner. it was a wonderful evening and both of them were attentive throughout, going over and above. Thank you for everything!
Manager Response: Travis A.  Awesome to hear about our Food & Beverage management offering a memorable special occasion celebration. The way it should be... Thank you for recognizing our staff, Alfonso & Adam . The Private Dining Room located int he Bristol Palms Restaurant is a great way to have a personable experience with family and friends for parties for 13 people or less.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Hotel and room were very clean. The room fixtures were up-to-date. The cleaning staff was very professional. Beware of the in-house breakfast service. We found our menu still hanging on the door after the time passed for its delivery. Management promised to follow-up; we stayed 3 more nights and never heard anything. We went without breakfast on our first morning. Women beware: the parking structure and its entrances to the lobby can make for quite a walk, and we saw no video surveillance in the structure or adjoined elevators.
Manager Response: Theodore H,  Glad you enjoyed your stay and please accept our apologies for missing you breakfast. I will check and followup with this as this is not our standard procedure to let our guests without any breakfast when we made the mistake.  We do look forward to having the opportunity to share a memorable and comfortable stay with you next time.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: So near to the airport I had my doubts. I got even more nervous when I saw the old 1979 style brass railing exterior elevators (worries the place had never been renovated).  What o found inside was a beautifully renovated, spacious hotel!  The common areas are tastefully and modernly decorated with plenty of room to roam.  My room was absolutely beautiful.  My only gripe is the in-room WiFi - woefully slow and completely inadequate for the business traveler.  I would be happy to return to this hotel.
Manager Response: COladyRoadWarriott,  Thank you road warrior for the great review...yes we just recently renovated and will keep on making updated and changes as needed. One of which is the WiFi system that is being upgraded to accommodate our guests in their room and the lobby. For any of the ballrooms of course the WiFi is as contracted by each group. Yes we are close to the airport, the beaches, and culture...Segerstrom Center of the Arts and the Honda Center for entertainment and sports events. Southern California weather added to the mix and we are good.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Comfortable room but too many mistakes!
Summary: 1. Food Catastrophe - BEWARE!!: The first morning I was there, I order breakfast at the restaurant. I specify asked to substitute the chorizo sausage for turkey sausage, as I do not eat pork. When my food came there were cut-up sausage links, but they didn't smell like pork nor were they red like chorizo sausage. So, to be on the safe side I asked: Are these pork sausage? - "No". Are your beans cooked with pork? -"No". Needless to say she was WRONG and I have been sick for 5 days!!! I only found out when my friend ordered food the next morning and the waiter informed her that there turkey sausage only come in patties. Plus, do you think I received an apology - NO =(  2. Uncongenial Staff: I went to the store to buy some sakes and snacks and the staff person didn't greet me
Manager Response: VV F,  Please accept our apologies and our manager will follow up with his breakfast servers to ensure that our guests receive the proper information. We always ask our guests to notify us in the event there is an unfortunate problem or concerns so we may correct it right then and make sure our guests are happy with their stay. Our mission is to share a comfortable and enjoyable stay with us.We do offer our apologies and hope to see you back again real soon. Please contact the Guest Service Manager prior to any arrival and they will be delighted to assist with area information and making your stay memorable.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Stay was salvaged by Luis from the front desk!
Summary: I typically stay at the Westin South Coast Plaza, but they were near occupancy so I decided to give the Hilton a try. I had an early day, so my admin called ahead and asked if early check-in would be available. The individual on the phone said that they had been full the night before, but that they would have a handicap accessible room available. My admin indicated that would be fine and I was very grateful to have a place to change prior to my meeting. Unfortunately when I arrived I was helped by a very unfriendly person at the front desk (I wish I would have caught his name tag). He was extremely abrasive and just kept saying "we have nothing available" and looking away. When I asked him about the accessible room that my admin called about, he said it must have been given away
Manager Response: SobeMMM,  Thank you for sharing about your experience and for letting us know the great job our Front Desk agent Luis did.  We will check whom was working with Luis and follow up with our associate as this is not the type of service we encourage. Please contact the Guest Service Manager prior to any future stays and we will be delighted to assist with preparing and ensuring a comfortable and memorable stay.  Thank you,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: We held a family get together here this past weekend to celebrate our grandparents 70th. Both Alfonso and Adam helped with all the organizing from the start to finished and made sure our reception in the Executive Lounge and fabulous dinner in the PDR went off without a hitch. They were super attentive and went over and above for our family. We are very thankful for their help and attention. Thank you! Highly recommend this property for any event.
Manager Response: Rosewood M.  Thank you for letting us know the great attention and above and beyond service both Adam and Alfonso shared with you and your family.  The restaurants' Private Dining Room is a great option for smaller and private parties. Congratulations again and best wishes from all of us. We are looking forward to making any and all future stays with us just as delightful.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Staff on 4/12 front desk was very rude, manager allowed the clerk to be rude and refusing to give a receipt  after hotel stay was paid in full on 4/12 for a stay4/14/2015. I gave cash and requested and clerk refuse and the manager witness and gave a receipt.
Manager Response: I do apologize for any inconvenience you experienced with your arrival. We are concerned with these comments as we pride ourselves in having a great Front Desk team that are friendly and work hard to share a great experience with all our guests. Our Executive Team is following up with this to ensure all guests receive a positive arrival experience. We do hope you will give us another chance to see what we really are all about.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: This Hilton location was a good place to stay for a recent trip to California. It was very convenient for our shopping excursions in Orange County. My wife was thrilled with the Mitsuwa across the street. Our corner room was very quiet and the staff was courteous. Rooms were clean and as comfortable as you can expect. Make sure you ask for a parking tag as the desk staff doesn't always offer it at check-in. I'd stay here again.
Manager Response: Bgarbi,  Thankful for your valued review and delighted to hear you enjoyed the great location ; walking distance to South Coast Plaza and a 15 minute drive to Fashion Island.  Shopping with special services such as Personal Shoppers, Concierge service, Valet service , Foreign Language Assistance and Currency Exchange...life at the beach is good.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service manager.

Summary: This is my second time staying here. The location is good and I like that the room has a balcony to enjoy that California sun! The pool facilities are also fine. The whole experience is rather degraded by room service that resembles airplane food, served with disposable cutlery in a brown bag, at $30 a main. The breakfast offers a good enough selection however both staff members were generally unpleasant when met with any request... I suppose the already added tip to the bill might have something to do with that! 3/5.
Manager Response: We are delighted to see you were able to enjoy the California sun and the pool area.  Introducing the new room service concept  with a new menu and please know that we value our guests comments. Thank you for your feedback as we are currently obtaining our guests immediate feedback by placing comment cards with each order.   We look forward to sharing a fabulous stay with all our guests and always are thankful when given the opportunity to hear how we can make it right  and offer a enhanced service.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Very nice place to stay on a good location
Summary: The hilton is a very nice place to stasy and on a very good location sleep quality is very good staff very friendly all in all a real recomendation for the area a lot of restaurants are on walking distance the hotel has a nice bar good breakfast and dinng facilities
Manager Response: We thank you Moher for your wonderful recommendation. We are very fortunate to be located close to so many great restaurants and to the John Wayne Airport. Mixing business with pleasure is easy when you have a hotel with great service and outside options for lunch or dinner meetings such as Scott's Seafood or Capital Grill. Both offer some great unique and personable meeting spaces for the high end smaller  Executive meetings. We offer beautiful ballrooms spaces and some with patio for the special Wedding or Anniversary celebrations.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: My Experience At Hilton Hotel Costa Mesa
Summary: My experience was not only pleasant one but very relaxing as well. The food was excellant, the lounge/bar secetion was very relaxing and the service was great. The conference room where our meetings were held was fully stocked with the necessary beveages. Overall a great expereience.
Manager Response: Thank you Frank M. for your great review. We are delighted to hear you overall stay from your event, your leisure time and your dining experience all was a great. Our hotels' location is superb as it is close to Newport and Balboa Island beaches, SNA airport, South Coast Plaza, The Camp and some fantastic options for dining. We hope to be able to assist you with ensuring your next stay to be just as comfortable and memorable.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: We celebrated our anniversary and the Costa Mesa Hilton really made it special.  We would recommend staying there. The room is very comfortable, very clean and everyone is very helpful! We enjoyed the dinner as well as the breakfast buffet.  There is always a great variety.  Staff were very attentive. We observed in the lobby how helpful staff was to those coming and going.
Manager Response: Dear Daniel G.,  We are so happy to hear your anniversary was special and that you had a memorable time together. We hope to see you again real soon and assist you with reservations for area attractions such as Knott's Berry Farm, Disneyland or maybe tickets for a concert at the Honda Center. Check it out Bette Midler performing at the Honda May 29th...the Divine Miss M.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Upon arrival, check the tub stopper to make sure you won't be disappointed @ 5:30 AM when you can't have a hot bath. Also, find a reasonably priced place for breakfast for the next morning so you won't be late for your meeting, as the last spoonful of cold scrambled eggs cost $49.95 for 2 in the hotel Bistro.
Manager Response: I certainly understand your frustration and please accept our apologies for the inconvenience we caused. I have discussed this with our housekeeping team and made them aware the importance of having the room in a crisp, clean and ready state each and every time. May I suggest to check out some of our room packages that offer breakfast with the room at a great rate. We hope to see you again real soon.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Was offered to upgrade to executive level due to husband's status. Luckily it was quiet which I prefer in a hotel stay. Food from restaurant was really good. Bed and pillows were very comfortable. The only complaint was the toilet seat was a little dirty (which grosses me out) and there was a hair in the sink that was not mine. Room seemed fine otherwise. The valet which I asked some questions about the area on two different days didn't know anything.
Manager Response: Dear Morrisonm,  Thank you for taking the time to add a review about your stay with us and I will certainly ask our housekeeping department to check all bathrooms to ensure our hotel looks and feels clean and crisp. We hope you will have a chance to return and spend a day at Balboa Island; the adventure  begins taking the ferry across to Balboa Island and walking in the quaint streets checking out the homes and the views on the water, stop at the Fun Zone and feel like a kid allover again , for dinner go Italian and have dinner at a historical restaurant - Amelia's and for dessert try one of their famous ice creams or stop at the old fashion candy store and find candies you heard you grandparents talk about.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: One of the better Executive Lounges
Summary: Stayed here for a visit to a local company. It is a pretty average Hilton and shows its age a bit. The parking garage is not bad to get in and out of and overnight parking is $23 which is reasonable.  There is a mall just north with a lot of food options.  The Executive Lounge is very nice with snacks and drinks available all the time and the breakfast was very good. Like some it had the Starbucks coffee machine that would brew fresh coffee on demand.  Overall not a bad experience and close to John Wayne airport.
Manager Response: TXWayne,  The Executive Level Lounge offers great views, complimentary breakfast and evening appetizers with sodas, waters and snacks throughout the day and we are happy to hear you enjoyed it all. We offer complimentary shuttles to/from SNA every half hour on the hour beginning as early as 5:30 am. Service with a smile every step of the way.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great stay and comfort for all occasions
Summary: This really is one of the best Hilton's I've stayed at.  The rooms were very clean.  Bathrooms were stocked with great products, bed was comfortable and pillows were perfect.  The view is great as well if you have a higher level room.  Parking was $23 to park yourself and $31 for valet.  Parking was simple and connected to the hotel.  We ordered room service one night and it arrived timely and the food was really good.    The staff was very helpful and friendly as well.  Shopping at the South Coast Plaza is only a couple blocks away.  SNA is only a 5 minute drive as well.  Anytime I'm in the area this will be the hotel I stay at.
Manager Response: Dear Clinton N.,  We appreciate knowing that you had a wonderful stay at our hotel. Delighted to hear you enjoyed our new menu with room service and your food was really good. South Coast Plaza currently is preparing for their 26th Annual Southern California Spring Garden Show presents ‚ÄúAt Home in the Garden‚Äù  from April 23-26. Events include unique garden vendors offering exotic plants and flowers, seminars by award-winning authors and garden professionals, exciting children‚Äôs events hosted by The Land of Nod and Orange County Master Gardeners and home and garden displays designed to provide inspiration for outdoor living. Come and enjoy!  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I have been there a few times and never had issues. As a Diamond member I was hopping to get an upgrade, but I understand this is not always possible. This time i arrived late on Tuesday (10:30 pm) and my room was  for disable people, what I really hate! The person on checking desk was  not friendly and asked me for handle my id instead of looking on my wallet.. As well asked for the credit card that usually is on file.. Well.. I was even unhappier when i had to stay at the room for disable that was really dark.. Next morning was totally different.. Luis was very friendly trying to move me to another room.. But it did not happen.. On the end of the day i got impatient and asked for the manager.. Finally i moved to a "normal" room on executive floor.. Like another hotel .! The
Manager Response: Delighted to hear you enjoyed the executive lounge and were able to get a room upgrade. I hope next time you will have time to enjoy the outdoors. We have some beautiful beaches and coming soon is the Pageant of the Masters. This is an unique and annual art event in Laguna Beach area. The drive to Laguna is just 15 minutes of pristine beaches and southern California sun.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: This was our last year here. I was hoping for a better experience. The Sink and tub leaked, The Tv didn't work right. The heater didn't work. There was not enough trash cans in the general areas. The Event food was horrible bland and over cooked and the salad seemed very lazy.
Manager Response: Angela we truly are sorry you experienced a negative stay with us. I wish we would have had the opportunity to repair and make it right for you. You are important and we value you as our guest so ensuring that your room is comfortable is part of our commitment. We hope to see youreturn real soon so we may share a better experience together.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager
