Summary: I had a basic room with two queen beds beds. The housekeeping and restaurant staff were very accommodating and pleasant to work with.  The grounds are beautiful with little outside areas for hanging out, including by the pool.  Very nice place!
Manager Response: Dear Stacey L.  Thank you for the 4 STAR review and we are happy you received excellent service, had a comfortable room and were able to enjoy our beautiful pool area.  This weekend come to the Orange County Fairgrounds for America‚Äôs Family Pet Expo. The world‚Äôs largest pet and pet product expo with thousands of pet products for sale at special show prices, a variety of animals on display in stage shows, competitions & demonstrations, and plenty of animal experts, pet adoptions, etc.  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Best for Business in Orange County. Hang out in Executive Lounge!
Summary: Hats off to the Hotel Manager.  He/She has a wonderful staff and a clean, efficiently-run hotel. Everyone I encountered here is friendly and helpful.  The wait staff at the restaurant and the cleaning staff in particular on the 6th and 7th (Executive Level) floors were outstanding in doing their jobs, making this business trip effortless for me. The hotel has a great workout gym facility and pool, top notch treadmill machines and weights. I worked out every morning when I stayed and the gym had plenty of clean towels and cold water, even a basket of apples. What is great at this Hilton is the Executive Lounge.  Above and beyond what is normally found at a Hilton.  This hotels' Manager's Reception Happy Hour with discounted drinks and fantastic appetizers was a welcome reprieve
Manager Response: Dear Suxie22,  Delighted to be of service and so happy to hear the Executive Lounge shared a great and effortless stay for you. Our Executive Lounge offers a great breakfast, fantastic appetizers in the evening with discounted drinks and throughout your stay complimentary waters, snacks and sodas. A great value for sure. Location is perfect for business travelers and families alike as we are close to SNA, Newport beach & Balboa Island, Segerstrom Center of the Arts, South Coast Plaza with many options for casual or fine dining. I see a perfect stay-cation for you.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Having stayed at this hotel many times and being very satisfied I feel compelled to write about a change of heart.  ROOM SERVICE What were you thinking when you changed the usual formula. For a start it is no longer 24hours.  It comes in a 'Kraft bag' with everything disposable. (Great for landfill!) it is also very limited with your wine being delivered in a plastic Starbucks cup, at $22 ++ The idea is fine especially if you are mobile or wanting to go on a picnic but for a start  the price is still the same as the previous tray menu.  It is as though the hotel doesn't want the guest to order room service which I suspect may be true. They have a self-service pantry at reception but it consist of packaged snacks close to their use by dates at triple normal retail. The other
Manager Response: Dear Brett M,  Your feedback regarding the new presentation of the CP Express has been forwarded to our management team for consideration. The CP Express does offer a late night menu and the options from the Corner Pantry throughout the night.  As a frequent guest and a world traveler you realize how important it is that our guests share their feedback and are a part of our changes and moving forward with new ideas. With our guests comments and feedback we also keep our hotel clean, up to date and well maintained and for that we would like to thank you.. We are thankful to hear you love our hotel and that we have offered great service throughout your stays.  Best wishes,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Stayed here many times ticks most boxes but recent change to  my favourite pastime Room Service has left a bad taste in my mouth. Be prepared to pay top dollar for a meal in your room and be given what could only be described as at best a take away meal experience . Front desk staff were embarrassed when I complained and agreed it was not up to Hilton standard . It might be a small  thing to most but I for one like to dine in my room Enjoying my meal on a plate not in a plastic container found at the bottom of a paper (they call it a Craft ) bag they also refer to it as thoughtfully packaged , the only thought is how much money it saves the hotel . I mean your either a Hilton Hotel  or your not. I find the  response that will  inevitably appear below from the hotel to my post
Manager Response: 97carol,  We are trying something new and we certainly are happy to hear any and all feedback to make adjustments according to this feedback. As with any new changes there are those that like the change and other that do not and currently we are listening to everyone; good or bad and trying to make the changes a more positive experience for all concerned.  Thank you for your honesty and for taking the time to evaluate the presentation. The food quality has been positive and we appreciate knowing this as well. Thank you again and yes we are a nice hotel...  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Firstly I like the Hotels location and have stayed on occasions for business and pleasure, when I ordered room service it has always been to relax in my room and enjoy a meal presented as if I was dining in the lobby restruant . What can only be described as severe cost cutting , room service is presented in a paper bag in plastic containers with plastic eating utensils ..it is horrible just horrible and insulting to be paying top dollar for what is essentially a cheap takeaway meal you could purchase from any cheap dinner. I noted some previous comments and response from Hotel here saying you can now order Room service and take it to the beach or by the pool , this is so out of touch with why people order in room dining that it's laughable and obviously an attempt to explain
Manager Response: Dear Rob O.  We are happy to hear you enjoy staying with us and thank you for your feedback regarding the new CP Express menu. I will forward your feedback to our management and certainly any comments on how to make this better is always appreciated. The new menu is presented as a fast and easy option for our guests and the quality of the food as many have shared is great and everything is delicious.   Our restaurant will be offering a special Easter Menu and we look forward to seeing you; reservations preferred.   Thank you,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Just a one night stay but wished it was longer.
Summary: After staying in Anaheim for a week and playing at Disneyland we thought we would catch an early am flight out of John Wayne Airport.  We moved to the Hilton Orange County Hotel which is 5 minutes to SNA.  It was clean, well priced, quiet, good food.  Nothing bad can be said about this hotel.  The staff, hotel shuttle and parking attendants were all very friendly and helpful. I would definitely stay there again and would recommend it to anyone.
Manager Response: Dear Dwight H.  Sounds like you had a great experience and after being in the happiest place on earth  ( Disneyland) we were able to share a happy experience with you as well. It is always wonderful to hear that our staff were friendly and helpful and we are all sharing a memorable, comfortable stay with our guests. We look forward to seeing you again real soon her in Orange County.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: A great location close to SouthCoastPlaza ......New Room Service cost cutting delivers your order in a paper bag in plastic containers , plastic knife and fork ....not up to standard of a Hilton Hotel. Bad..Bad ..Bad. Plenty of options outside of hotel if you want a decent meal , don't order room service is my advice very disappointing , I travel all over the states never seen anything like it for a Hotel of this class .
Manager Response: Steven B.,  Thank you for your review and your feedback regarding our new menu and CP Express and we will certainly forward that information to our management. C P Express is changing the way your meal is delivered with a knock on your door and delivering a thoughtfully packaged meal that is delivered in a kraft bag. The food is tasty and excellent quality and the presentation is with convenience in mind for our guests. This is thoughtful because conveniently you have a container for anything you cannot finish eating and you can place it in the refrigerator to eat later. I have tried the burger which offers a choice of fried, chips or fruit.... delicious. What choice are your cravings saying to you? Bon Appetit !

Summary: My mother and I stayed at this hotel for one night in March.  We were there to attend a wedding in the area.  We checked in on Saturday, 3/21 at 1:30pm.  The wedding was taking place at 5:00pm that day.  At 2:45 we tried to turn on the shower.  The knob turned, but no water came out.  We tried and tried.  Called down to the front desk, was told someone would be right up.  I called back three times between 2:45 and 3:15. Got the same story each time.  At this point we were running out of time.  We washed up (hair and all) in the sink.  At 3:30 a maintenance man came to the room.  He attempted to fix the shower, was not able to and left.  He did not speak with us.  At 3:45 another maintenance man came and was able to fix it. He said it just needed a bit of WD-40.  When I asked why
Manager Response: Dear Cheryl R.,  I am so sorry to hear about this and please know the management is following up on this. We are so embarrassed to hear about the options that were given you .  This is certainly not our standard. We will be retraining our staff as needed and please accept our sincere apologies. We do hope you had a great time at the wedding and was able to enjoy the time together with friends. Making memories and sharing special moments is what life is all about.   Thank you for your patronage,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: We've been hosting events here for quite awhile, and have absolutely loved working with the banquet and catering staff.  This is the first time we got to stay as guests, and it was great.  Nice clean pool and jacuzzi, comfortable beds, nice shower, enjoyed the executive lounge (minus the kids and their parents who find it acceptable to put on cartoons with sound on the big screen in the lounge in the middle of a busy breakfast. Grrr.)
Manager Response: Dear Kayla S.,  Thank you for your recommendation and we love having you here with all your events. I do hope you had a chance to enjoy the beautiful sunsets our location has to offer. If not at the beach I would hope you could have enjoyed the view from our Executive Lounge. Looking forward to seeing you back real soon.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: We were here for a conference, and so glad we stayed there.  Extremely comfy beds, really helpful staff, nice and quiet.  The conference area was a bit cool in the rooms - needed a jacket to be comfortable while in session. Overall a really nice place.
Manager Response: Steven B.,  Thank you for your review and your feedback regarding our new menu and CP Express and we will certainly will forward that information to our management.  C P Express is changing the way your meal is delivered with a knock on your door and delivering a thoughtfully packaged meal in a kraft bag. The food is tasty and excellent quality and the presentation is with convenience in mind for our guests. This is thoughtful because conveniently you have a container for anything you cannot finish eating and you can place it in the refrigerator to eat later. I have tried the burger which offers a choice of fries, chips or fruit.... delicious. What choice are your cravings saying to you? Bon Appetit !  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: First complaint: bell service was not offered upon arrival. This pretty much speaks for itself, and should have indicated up front the rope of service I should expect for the rest of my stay.  Second complaint: does the hotel even use air conditioning? If so, I couldn't tell. The hotel itself was too hot (in March!), somewhere in low 80s. The room air conditioning pulled the temperature down to an almost-tolerable mid-70s, despite the laughable settings that indicated a low of 40 degrees.  Third complaint: no ice is unacceptable for a hotel in this price category. There was one ice machine in the entire hotel available for guests, and it was not working. I was told by the front desk there was nothing they could do about it.  Fourth complaint: when I wanted a meal after hours, I
Manager Response: TheDoof79,  All our rooms do offer a refrigerator and they are located inside the cabinet in each room for your convenience. Whenever our bells staff is busy with assisting a guest our valet does offer assistance as needed with your luggage and check outs are always requested via our operators and I am sorry to hear you did not receive the service we are known for. Ice and a late night menu is available all hours through CP Express ; our new menu and delivery make it easy and quick for those late night snacks especially.  I am sorry to hear about your overall stay and would ask for the opportunity to share a memorable stay with you next time.  Regards,  Yolanda H.  Guest Service Manager

Summary: On a recent business trip to So Cal I had the opportunity of trying out a new hotel (for me) in Costa Mesa.  I am a creature of habit and when I find someplace I like I normally go back.  But on this trip I decided to change and stayed at the Hilton Costa Mesa.  The location is fantastic with quick and easy access to the 405 and the 55 freeways.  It is a quick trip to Newport Beach or Irvine.   The hotel is older, but you really can't tell because of how well the property and buildings are maintained.  The rooms are clean and renovated, and the executive lounge on the 7th floor is perfect for the business traveler.  I will definitely stay at the Hilton again on my next trip.
Manager Response: Dear Bull12151,  Wonderful to hear you found another great hotel and yes our location is superb ! With complimentary shuttle service to/from SNA and also our bell staff offer scheduled complimentary shuttles to South Coast Plaza which actually is a 12 minute walk.  Beach weather for sure...go and rent a Duffy boat in Newport Beach or learn how to Paddle-board or Surf in Laguna Beach  or maybe take a dinner cruise with Hornblower in the beautiful Newport / Balboa Bay area. Life is great at the beach.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: My favorite hotel in the area
Summary: I go to Irvine quite often and have stayed at a number of different Hilton and Doubletree properties in the area. This is my go to place when it is not sold out. It's a Hilton, so, of course, the rooms will be clean and the beds will be comfortable. The service is great and the stuff is friendly. But even beyond that, it has some special sort of quiet, unique charm that has an ability to turn it into a home away from home.  It doesn't intimidate you or overwhelm you, but instead, without any pomp, simply makes you feel expected and welcome. This is such a rare thing among hotels, that to me it is worth a lot.  This hotel is great for any sort of traveller -- solo, business, couples, families. It is also very popular with airline crews. It's location is another good thing.  Easy
Manager Response: Dear Kate S.  WOW !!!! You have said it all and more...thank you Kate for your up front and honest review. The restaurant areas you mentioned are certainly some great casual choices and all are walking distance. If our guests possibly want to drive a bit ( 10 minutes) to Newport Beach and have ocean views at Rusty Pelican or 21 Oceanfront. The views are amazing especially at sunset ...life is a beach view:) Good Food, Good Company and Good Views !!!!  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Stayed for a convention, decent hotel but not spectacular
Summary: I stayed at the Hilton for the On Course convention 2014. The rooms were nice and clean. The hotel grounds were decent. The service was average, with a large amount of people there checking in and out at the same time, you can't expect things to run super smooth. There were small things that bothered me about the hotel though.    The wifi was TERRIBLE, almost never a signal anywhere in the hotel and super slow when you could get one. The charge for wifi in your room was also ridiculous. It amazes me that hotels still continue to try and charge a premium for this. It would be fine if I could get a decent cell signal in the hotel, but that also was terrible, which I don't thing is really the problem of the hotel.  There is not a ton of options in the area right around the hotel,
Manager Response: Dear John H,  Thank you for your review and we are happy to hear you had a great convention. For restaurant options our concierge desk are happy to share a local map with restaurant options. For business lunches or dinners any of the restaurants located in and around the South Coast Plaza would be recommended; such as Seasons 52, Capital Grill, Charlie Palmer s, Maggiano's, Antonello's  , Scott's Seafood and if you are looking for a more casual style the Anti-Mall and The Lab offer Ultimate Tacos, Habana's , Native Foods, Seabird's Kitchen as some options. I woudl suggest to contact our concierge staff for further recommendations. Bon Appetite !!!  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Executive hotel cheaps out while price stays the same
Summary: ive stayed here for years and always enjoyed coming back to my room to relax. After a long day at meetings, I was shocked to be sent up from service a $32 steak in a plastic box with a plastic knife and fork along with hot soup in a thin plastic bowl with a plastic teaspoon, all handed to me at the door in a brown paper bag!  I was told this was a test for Hilton hotels, and will be the level of room service at all Hilton properties within six months.   Needless to say, there will be no reason to have a Hilton Honors gold card.   The staff and management were embarrassed at having to offer Motel 6 service. The staff and managers are still first class.   A real disappointment, as the prices remained the same!
Manager Response: Dear Paul,  Thank you for your feedback regarding the new menu and our new thoughtfully packaged way of delivering an in room dining experience. The new process is for convenience so our guests can take their food on the go or to the beach or pool area or after a busy day of meetings and you just want something that is comfortable and easy. For other dining options we have the Bristol Palms Lounge and Bar and our servers are always delighted to offer a quality dining experience with you. Your feedback will be shared with our management for review. Thank you for the great comments regarding our staff and we look forward to sharing a great stay with you again real soon.  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I came to check in only to find out I incorrectly reserved the wrong day. Cesar Picos came to the rescue and found a room for the evening. Although I had to wait 30 minutes the wait was worth it. appreciate the management at this Hilton.
Manager Response: Dear Humphrey F.,  5 STAR Awesomeness !!!! Thank you for mentioning our superstar and front desk agent, Cesar. We pride ourselves in being there for our guests and for making it right and Cesar certainly made it right for you. We look forward to seeing you again real soon. Hopefully next visit will include a visit to the Segerstrom Center of the Arts to see the musical "Newsies:" . This musical a 2012 Tony Awards winner is known as the musical worth singing about. Our concierge staff will be delighted to assist with reservations.  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Beautiful location. Worst customer service ever
Summary: The desk staff is rude, dismissive and shows lack of concern to help on issues concerning your stay. Tv has no channels/signal on something wrong with the AC thermostat. Asked to be moved because of the inconveniences im assigned to the freeway side very noisy but they just said they cannot as they were sold out.
Manager Response: Dear Hiltonlfan,  Our staff is known to be friendly and helpful so I am concerned to read you comments. We all know that things can and do happen and our staff knows it is our standard to make it right. I am so sorry to hear about your experience and I wish our management would have been notified so we could have corrected any and all inconveniences as we always do. We do hope to wee you in the near future and I am always delighted to be of service.  Best regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I've been a Hilton member for a long and an avid fan of Hilton but this is the only and worst stay I ever had. Hilton is always pleasant until this one stay. The location is good. Hotel rooms are the normal Hilton rooms. It was clean when we checked in. We just drop off our bag to go out and the nightmare began when we came back and notice that it is hot in the room. We brushed it off til 2am until our baby started crying and sweating. We called the engineer around 2am and they sent someone quickly. He tried to fix it but still the AC is hot. We even put it in 5C  all the time but still hot. We weren't able to sleep good at all. We called at 9am and asked if they can change our room. They said they will in the afternoon and just leave our stuff there and they will transfer it.
Manager Response: Dear Hiltonhonorskris,  I am so sorry to hear about this terrible experience and as a Honors member you know that we are all about making your stay right. This is not the service we are looking to offer our guests and certainly a follow up with our staff will be completed. I am glad you were able to enjoy the area and were able to get some quality family time. Please accept our sincere apologies and wishing you many happy moments with your baby.  Best wishes,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Spent almost a week at this hotel and we were very pleased.  Room was spacious with plenty of room to relax.  Bathroom was nicely appointed and I liked the fact that the sink was separate from the rest of the bathroom so I could get ready while my husband was in the bathroom.  Large closet was convenient.  The executive lounge made our stay enjoyable as we could get out of the room and relax with snacks and a nice view.  The lounge area of the hotel was comfortable and the food was very good.  The wait staff were all very nice and helpful.  Really liked the ellipticals in the workout area.  Overall a very nice stay.
Manager Response: Dear lmullen,  Delighted to hear your week with us was wonderful, from your room to the Executive Lounge and the friendly staff and service. I do hope it was not all work and you had time to checkout the area. Our Segerstrom Center of the Arts offers American Ballet Theater; Sleeping Beauty to Marie Osmond this month. Hope you will return soon to be able to enjoy the perfromances.  Best wishes,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: It is a typical Hilton hotel. Standard pretty good. No free Internet . In these days it's just silly. Breakfast not to flash. Rooms can be very noisy when staying at the pool side.Starbucks at lobby level is very handy to have! Overall good
Manager Response: Dear Wofram S.   Our hotel is the perfect location due to SNA(John Wayne Airport) being close to the hotel and we do offer complimentary shuttle service. Then the South Coast Plaza is a fantastic shopping experience. Along with restaurants with so many options, the beaches and the Honda Center, Angels Stadium, Segerstrom Center of the Arts all being close by ! How awesome is that ! What a great stay-cation opportunity.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manaer

Summary: Spent two nights at Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa last week. The check in was speedy and very courteous thanks to Caesar at the front desk. Room was exceptionally clean and updated. Room service was fast and orders completed properly. Great base location to see all of Orange County, 405 freeway and South Coast Plaza shopping was literally next to hotel. Beaches are a close drive away. Would highly recommend and would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear JimB58,  It sounds like you enjoyed the shopping, the beaches and you overall stay with us. We look forward to assisting you next time with making reservations for any of the local theatre performances at the Segerstrom Center of the Arts or Honda Center;  possibly a Kings or Ducks Hockey game at the Honda Center?    Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: It is good hotel but when I ordered room service, I waited for 45 minutes it didn't come and when I called they kept me on hold 4 min and I had to call again so they told me I'll receive my order after 5 minutes but I never received it and I slept without dinner :(
Manager Response: Dear Nouran f.  Our In Room Dining Manager and staff are concerned to hear about your experience and offer their sincere apologies. We will look into this to see what we could have done better so in the future our guests will be consistenly happy with our service. We do hope to have a chance to share a exceeding In Room Dining experience with you in the near future, Our breakfast favorite is Eggs Benedict ....delicious!!!! Mmmmmmmm:)  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: So lovely and excellent value in a calm area.. Great services with very friendly staff that really to assist you round the clock.. Rooms are specious and very clean.. Breakfast is excellent too.. Large shopping mall within short walking distance of the hotel..
Manager Response: Dear Hassan H.,  Thank you for a wonderful review and we are excited to hear you received great and friendly consistently. South Coast Plaza is a shopping experience for sure and we do offer complimentary shuttle service to/from South Coast Plaza. Looking for a Los Angeles tour and check out the Hollywood sign? Our Bell staff/Concierge and Guest Service Managers are always delighted to assist with any and all tour, dining or golf reservations.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Stayed her for two nights while on a business trip.  The hotel is updated, and my room was very comfortable.  They have a concierge floor here which is always a plus!  There is valet parking, but it is also very easy to drive around to the back of the hotel and park, and enter the hotel through the garage.
Manager Response: Dear JamesBondLosAngeles,  We are looking forward to being of service upon your return. Looking for things to do? So much to do and so little time...Shopping- South Coat Plaza only a 10 minute walk away Restaurants- H Season 52, Marche Moderne, Capital Grill or Anatello are some favorites,  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Enjoyed a great stay.  I was on the executive floor and really enjoyed the executive lounge.  Rooms were nice and clean; and, the staff was friendly and helpful which are the two most important things.  The pool and hot tubs looked inviting but did not have the chance to try them out.
Manager Response: Dear Jason M,  Hopefully next time you will be able to enjoy the hot tub and pool. To hear our guests are feeling cared for and are receiving great service is always important to us. We are close to beaches, South Coast Plaza, and John Wayne Airport. Just a short drive away is Disneyland, Knott's Berry Farm, Honda Center and Fashion Island.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Comforters on beds - make sure they smell good
Summary: The comfort of the room was pretty good, but the comforter on the bed smelled a littly mildewy. It just had a very weird smell.  Some of my co-workers had other issues with their rooms, but that was mine.  Other than that, i had no problems with my stay at all.
Manager Response: Dear Jarhone62,  The staff and I are happy to hear you and your coworkers had a great event. The housekeeping staff will check the comforters just to ensure they smell clean and make our guest feel warm, cozy and comfortable. Thank you for your review and the opportunity to make it right. Hopefully you will have the opportunity to stay with us again and be able to relax or enjoy watersports at one of beaches close by. Newport Beach, Laguna Beach or Huntington Beach offers some great water sports such as kayaking, swimming, paddleboard or surf lessons or rent a Duffy boat to tour Newport Harbor or take the ferry to Balboa Island and enjoy the quaint island and Fun Zone with the kids.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Book in advance - great price for a luxury hotel
Summary: This is a great hotel for frequent business travelers, while being close to many orange county attractions.   The rooms are very clean, the majority of the hotel is remodeled.   Covered attached parking is very convenient.  If you book well in advance the rates are fantastic, but this hotel frequently sells out a week in advance.  If you are a gold member, the upgrades are great.   It is getting increasingly difficult to find a nice hotel in southern California at a reasonable price point, this is a gem!
Manager Response: Dear MikeBw,  Yes we certainly are a great option for the business travelers because we are close to SNA/ John Wayne Airport and we offer a complimentary shuttle as well. The Tech Lounge offers outlets , computers, a printer and comfortable seating for the business travelers.  For families that are looking to share some culture with their kids the Segerstrom Center of the Arts will have Cinderella, Opera for Kids at the end of February. We hope to see you then.  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Back Again for a Hit, Hit, Miss and Hit
Summary: As a professional speaker, I visit a LOT of Hilton properties. I came back to this Hilton property for a Yellow Ribbon (Air Force) conference in which I was a presenter and it was a delight to be back. The good news is that it was more of a "hit" than a "miss."  HIT - The Executive Lounge for Hilton honors members makes this property worth staying at in and of itself. Their food is plentiful, varied and more than just common fair. Artichoke salad, assortments of cheeses and meats, meatballs, quiche and cake were all there during the happy hour and their breakfast was varied as well.  HIT - I think that whoever trains the employees at this hotel in customer relations should get a raise! Everyone from the porter to housekeeping to the audio visual guys who helped me with my
Manager Response: Dear EllieRKay,  We appreciate your feedback as this allows us to see through our guests eyes what we can do better. I am thankful to see our staff shared a comfortable, courteous and caring stay with you. With regards to the "special" check in line we are currently making some changes so our VIP guests will experience the exceeding service from arrival to departure. Thank you for your patronage and we look forward to sharing a great arrival and overall experience with you soon.  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: This hotel has definitely seen better days. Everything is worn and not really kept up and the hotel "restaurant" and "bar" are a joke. Luckily there are quite a few things around so you don't have to suffer through the extremely impersonal and cold environment in the lobby.   In addition the AC system in the room is unable to cope with any sort of outside heat so you end up having to keep your curtains closed all day in order to keep the room from heating up.   That said the staff is quite helpful (especially a couple of the ladies in the reception and one of the guys in concierge).
Manager Response: Dear Patril L,  Our New Lobby offers an open concept with welcoming and bright  "Poppies" on the Front Desk wall and a "Poppy" mosaic on the floor to offer the "Essence of California" . Our Tech Lounge located in the Lobby is also an open concept overlooking the entrance area with computers, printer, plugs and TV for all our business travelers. For your enjoyment the Bristol Brew has salads, drinks and Starbucks's coffee throughout the day. We thank you for recognizing our staff as friendly and helpful. I am however sorry you did not enjoy the open concept and modern renovation we completed last year. Thank you for your feedback and we do hope you will come back real soon to have another friendly stay with us.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Very close to the airport with good shuttle service   Food service and food was good.  On the could be better:  We had a group at the bar area 2 nights and found the service infrequent.    Room's bathroom had hair next to sink, floor and shower. A purple substance on the floor......not sure what that was.   Makes you question the overall cleanliness of the room.
Manager Response: Dear Usamargaritaville,  Thank you for you review and we are truly sorry for any issues you experienced with your room.  This is a concern and I will definitely make our housekeeping management aware of some of the issues you pointed out. Thank you for sharing and for giving us the opportunity to make it right.  I am delighted to see you enjoyed the food and the overall stay. Did you have a margarita with flat-bread in our lounge or pizzeria? Our flat-breads are some of the best I have tasted; my favorite is the prosciutto and fig.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: This hotel did a great job for being understaffed. The executive lounge for breakfast was very crowded and the person taking care of it went above and beyond to help out even though she was by herself. Paris Hilton should pay her employee's instead of hoarding it all.. We had a great stay..
Manager Response: Dear Bruce J,   The holidays are a time for travel, family get together and sharing special moments with those you love. The travel means crowded airports, planes , trains, freeways and the like....then we get to the hotel and we can actually enjoy and relax. Please know that our Guest Service Managers are always delighted to be of service to make your stay more enjoyable and comfortable. Happy New Year and thank you for your review.

Summary: Hotel was hopping over the holidays..prob location next to busy mall.  Front desk clerk nice but clueless.  Upgraded as a Gold member to concierge floor.  Desk clerk said only alcohol drinks in he the lounge in he the evening.  Rooms were ugly.  Fire the decorator.  Beds were not bad.  I'm glad I went to the lounge because there was a food layout..sandwiches, wine, appetizers, veggies, soft drink, bottled water and more.  Lounge attendant must have thought she was a guest.  Instead of working, she sat down and chatted the entire 45 mins we were there.  I understand small talk with the guest, but I could not ask her a question, she loved the sound of her own voice.    Very close/easy access to garage from elevator.  Great holiday rates.
Manager Response: Dear Gerry H.  Thank you for your patronage and for your great comments regarding the Executive Lounge. The Bristol Palms Lounge and Bar is open nightly and we are looking forward to serving some great appetizers and drinks for the New Year. Come sit at the Pizza bar in front of the oven area and enjoy a flatbread and glass of fine wine.  Happy New Year everyone!!  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: My wife and I stayed over Christmas 2014. Conveniently located within walking distance to restaurants and South Coast Plaza shopping centre. The hotel was extremely clean, comfortable and met all of our needs. All of the staff were very friendly and helpful which really made for a nice Christmas. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Scotty R,  We are happy to hear you and your wife had a great stay with us. Enjoy Tchaikovsky‚Äôs sunny violin concerto ‚Äî always an audience favorite ‚Äîperformed by Augustin Hadelich, hailed as ‚Äúone of the most distinctive violinists of his generation‚Äù at the Segerstrom Center of the Arts. What a great way to begin the new year.   Happy NEw Year to everyone.  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Friendly, helpful staff. Nice, clean and comfortable rooms. We stayed at this Hilton before, and we'll definitely stay here again. It's not as convenient if you're visiting Disneyland. Otherwise, it's a great hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Carolyn L.,  Disneyland is located a few minutes away and if you desire to be away from the hustle bustle and not want the daily Disneyland traffic we are the perfect location. Close to the Newport Beach, Balboa Island and South Coast Plaza. Balboa Island offers the "Fun Zone" for the young at heart and their kids.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I booked a night before the holidays to give my wife and I a moment to catch our breath. The service was outstanding from beginning to end. The room was perfect and the food was excellent in presentation, taste, portions and quality.   I will definitely book another evening here at the property.
Manager Response: Dear Richard T.,  We are delighted to be your choice for the must needed "catch our breath" stay cation. Enjoy Tchaikovsky‚Äôs sunny violin concerto ‚Äî always an audience favorite ‚Äîperformed by Augustin Hadelich, hailed as ‚Äúone of the most distinctive violinists of his generation‚Äù at the Segerstrom Center of the Arts. A great way to relax and have a wonderful dinner at Season's 52 or for fine dining at the Capital Grill. Our Concierge service will be delighted to confirm reservations.  Regards, Guest Service Manager

Summary: This was my second stay at this Hilton property and I was just as impressed as I was after my first stay here.  I used to stay at another recognizable hotel chain property in the area but will definitely not choose other than the Hilton Costa Mesa when I'm there again.  Great, professional, and courteous service; well appointed, immaculate rooms, and the best pillows on earth!
Manager Response: Dear DesertLvr,  We are grateful for your feedback and knowing that we are consistently great with our service and accommodations. Come and enjoy Dianne Reeves at the Segerstrom Center of the Arts. Diana Reeves with her distinctive jazz and R&B stylings, the four-time GRAMMY¬Æ winner is one of music‚Äôs most gifted vocalists. For this not-to-be-missed engagement, Reeves is joined by rising vocalist Gregory Porter, winner of this year‚Äôs Grammy for Best Vocal Jazz Album and the 2013. That is entertainment!  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I needed one more stay to make Hilton Hhonors Gold status for 2015 and decided to go 20 miles from home and stay here the day after Christmas. Figured to go shopping at South Coast Plaza (10 min walk and a shuttle is available) and visit in the area. The hotel put me on the card-only executive floor in a room where I could see planes taking off and landing at nearby John Wayne Int'l Airport. The entire staff was exemplary with their service for me and my service animal and the room was delightful. Only complaints were the length of time getting hot water for my morning shower (we've still got a drought, folks) and the traffic jam in the lounge for Sunday breakfast. Selections for breakfast were excellent, though and I worked through the crowd easily. Would recommend for business
Manager Response: Dear Ann P.,  Delighted we could be your home away from home. The Executive level does have some awesome views. Our chef does an awesome job with the variety and options for our Breakfast Buffet in the Bristol Palms restaurant as well as our executive level lounge. Check out the Orange County Fairgrounds for the SoCal World Guitar Show in Costa Mesa.  There will be many manufacturers, builders, collectors, buyers and retail stores in attendance. Happy New Year!!  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Plumbing back-flow in washroom and no one came to clean up when called.
Summary: We had sewage coming up from the sinks and no one came by to clean up while we were out. When we asked to be moved to another room, they offered a smaller room that wouldn't accommodate all guests and wouldn't send anyone up to clean the mess.  The service at the restaurant and lounge are pretty good though.
Manager Response: Dear person 00123,  I am sorry to hear about your negative experience and we will certainly follow up with our staff. We do hope you will come back and  give us the opportunity to share and enjoy a great stay. Maybe in time to enjoy the Segertrom Hall entertainment of Shen Yun. Shen Yun captures the spirit of a culture long lost. The show moves quickly through regions, dynasties, and legends. Ethnic and folk dances fill the stage with color and energy. The staff and I wish you and yours the happiest of New Years.  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: My go-to hotel in the area when travelling both for work & with family. My daughter loves the executive lounge with complimentary sodas & bottles of water 24-7. Did experience a bit of a traffic jam in the lounge during breakfast since the area with the food is fairly small. The rooms are fine when travelling with with others & more than adequate when travelling solo. The additional vanity outside of the bathroom was great when travelling with my wife & daughter as they weren't bumping into each other trying to get ready. Will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Roy L. and family,  Best wishes for the holiday and we thank you for making us your go to place to stay when in Orange County. There is so much to do in the area with the kids such as plays and shows at the Segerstrom Center of the Arts or Whale Watching and Sports fishing in Newport Beach or maybe during the holidays go see the Newport Boat Parade or New Years Day Rose Parade is just a short drive to Pasadena. Whatever you decide enjoy every moment !  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: This property is one of the best in terms of guest satisfaction, service and follow-up.  I am a HH's member and have stayed at hundreds of properties around the country.  The entire staff from GM Rob Gauthier to Douglas Mills, Dennis Taton, Teresa Weinstein, Trevor Meek, David Mora and Yolanda Hatzopoulos, this staff if fantastic and do all they can to ensure your stay is excellent.  They check in with you prior to your arrival and ensure that your stay is great while you are there.  I highly recommend this property any time you are in the area.    Thanks, Patrick
Manager Response: Dear Patrick B.  Thank you so much for recognizing some of our great staff. We are all at your service and ready to share a great experience with all our guests. The staff and I would like to wish you the best of holidays and that the New Year will bring many memorable moments shared.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: We were greeted with a beautiful lobby, decorated for the holidays - great location off freeway and near airport - good quality food on site, very clean and staff friendly and attentive - I would definitely recommend
Manager Response: Dear Stephanie I  Location is certainly a benefit when traveling far away from home and we have a complimentary shuttle to/from the John Wayne Airport. We are also close to South Coast Plaza, Segerstrom Center of the Arts, Honda Center, Angels Stadium, Disneyland and Knott's to name a few which makes our location superb for family stay-cations.  Happy New Year to all our guests,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel all around - excellent stay
Summary: We stayed here 5 nights and found everything with this hotel really nice.  On arrival we were greeted by a very friendly girl in the reception, who gave us (because we stayed multiple nights) cheaper parking and some vouchers to the Starbucks in the lobby (because my wife said she was going to have a cup when we have packed out). Good start. In general always really friendly staff all around  The room was clean, spacious and in general really nice. Nice bathroom as well, with a a lot of room to shower.   We were here in start December so the weather was of cause so-so. We did however use the outdoor pool which was heated great (the normal pool could have been a little warmer however) but the hot tub was really great and warm.   We were living on the "executive-level" (mainly
Manager Response: Dear EA-DK,  Thank you for your review and we hope you will back soon visiting again from Denmark. This time of year the shopping is of course the best. Also the Segerstrom Arts center offers international talent such as the Rotterdam Philharmonic performing in January. We look forward to having you visit us again real soon.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: You'd think with this hotel they would have more control over their shuttle drivers - but not they are a seperate company...they just dont want to know! No assistance from the front desk, none from the bell, and drivers were not answering calls. Useless operation, what if there was an emergency????
Manager Response: Dear worldtravelerrnz,  I understand your concern with regards to any emergency and to give you the assurance that any and all 911 calls actually go to a separate line and are always responded to right away. The shuttle drivers offer great service to and from John Wayne Airport and we apologize for any miss communication or miss understanding. The staff adn I wish you the best of holidays.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Stayed one night in order to attend a local event. We are diamond members and were upgraded to an executive floor room. Room was very comfortable and clean, one caveat is that the air conditioning, like a lot of hotels, is motioned controlled. So you wake up in the middle of the night hot. Room service was fast and tasty, and not overly priced for what you received. Service overall from check-in to check out was excellent.
Manager Response: lizzybill we are so happy to hear you had a great stay with us. We are the perfect location for guests that are attending events at the Segerstrom Center of Arts, going on a Hornblower Dinner or their popular Brunch, Fantastic Shows or Ducks Hockey at the Honda Center, Angels Stadium to watch the Angels games, or check out the holiday lights at Balboa Island and Newport Beach. Just a little ride away is Disneyland, Knott's Berry Farm, Anaheim Convention Center and Anaheim Packing House that offers several casual dining options. Amazing options so close by !  Happy Holidays from all of us, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Loved the hotel. It was a quiet room - good work area and a separate chair with foot rest to relax and watch TV once the business was done. There also was a good workout room. The lobby also had a coffee and snack place that was easy and good. The location was also convenient to local restaurants.  THANKS it was relaxing and affective.
Manager Response: Dear BefordNH_Bob,  It was our pleasure to share a relaxing and productive stay.  Come watch the South Coast Repertory 35th Annual Production by Charles Dickens adapted by Jerry Patch on the SEGERSTROM STAGE .... Nineteenth-century London comes to life.   Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The hotel was beautiful and the staff was especially friendly and helpful. The manager Asad was very helpful with a small issue we had and we look forward to returning in the near future. I stayed with my wife and daughter and they had 2 queen size bed and the room was very spacious.
Manager Response: Dear Elena,  We are always happy to see the positive impact our managers offer when they are helpful and share great guest service. Thank you for your patronage and we wish you and your friends a wonderful holiday season. We look forward to seeing you back in the New Year.  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Spent a weekend at this hotel, the lobby is pretty nice. Got a nice room facing the carpark which was spacious and bed was comfort. The room doesn't feel dated, bathroom seems to be upgraded recently too. I asked for bedroom slippers which they do not have. Also I got upgraded to the executive floor since I am a gold member with Hilton, the lounge evening service was so so, chips and cheese etc and charge around $8-10 for a glass of house wine. Breakfast was alright, eggs, potatoes, cereals, bacons, fruits, toasts, juices etc.   I dined at the lobby restaurant..had pizza there, it was good however the cocktails was way strong and tasted horrible.   The airport shuttle pickup from SNA was convenient and on time, location of the hotel is great with good restaurants within few
Manager Response: Dear loracny,  We are delighted to see the weekend trip with your friend was memorable. We look forward to your return stay and enjoy some of the area attractions such as the Whale Watching tour. It is always joyous to see the dolphins race in the water along the side of the boat and then to suddenly see the tale of a blue whale..it is such a memorable experience. WOW, it is amazing to see nature at its best.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: This hotel is great.  Front desk is very friendly. rooms are spacious and very clean.  The executive floor evening happy hour variety of food is very good, very fresh and good variety.  I can't remember the hostess' name that was there, but she is the nicest person ever-very attentive to your needs.  Breakfast is also very good.
Manager Response: Dear trumpet77,  Whether a Quick Get Away or a Stay-cation we look forward to seeing you as our guests. Come and enjoy the Irvine Spectrum ice rink, Ferris wheel or the Disney Magic Holiday Lights. What a great way to spend special time with family and friends. Enjoy!!!   Thank you for the 5 STAR review  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: This Hilton is a nice property with an attentive staff.   I enjoyed access to the concierge level, although by the time I arrived there at 9:30 a.m. some of the staples were left wanting.    The valet staff was helpful and very friendly.
Manager Response: Dear KarmaKids,  As the holidays and the New Year are around the corner we would like to thank all our guests whom stayed with us in 2014. We are looking forward to a great year ahead and offering all guests great service, a comfortable bed and sharing a consistently awesome stay. Our Guest Service Managers will be reaching out and welcoming each guest prior to arrival and offering further service with local information, making reservations at our local golf courses, spas, tour companies and/or restaurants and any specific special requests.  We look forward to be of service in 2015.  Happy Holidays!  Yolanda H.  Guest Service Manager

Summary: Every Hilton team member we had contact with was extremely courteous, friendly and attentive! The front desk manager quickly had us checked in, and the Food and Beverage manager and each of his team checked in with us to recommend wine selections, see if there was anything else they could get us and let us know when their shift was over.
Manager Response: Lisa H.  Great Experience and it was great having you stay with us.  Disney Magical Holiday Lights at Irvine Spectrum Center¬ÆNovember 28, 2014 to January 05, 2015. The holidays will shine brighter with a unique music and lighting moment each evening throughout the holiday season with Disney Magical Holiday Lights at Irvine Spectrum.  Happy Holidays from all of us,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Decent Hilton, typical prices and amenities of big city hotel
Summary: Location is convenient to three major LA area freeways (which means LOTS of road noise if you're room faces a freeway--but that's just LA). Also convenient to the airport (a fair bit of airplane noise, too). There are plenty of dining options nearby, particularly Japanese food.  Customer service was average, nothing spectacular, no real disappointments.  Self-parking is very pricey, most I've ever paid outside of downtown Manhattan. That was a surprise. Or a shock.   Decent beds, very firm and large pillows, average room amenities.  Intermittent and second-world speed internet.  Zero cell phone signal in the deep basement where the meeting rooms are located.  Zero wifi in hallways of meeting area.  The catered meals were truly disappointing.  The pasta was so overcooked and
Manager Response: Dear K W,  Thank you for your feedback and our catering manager will certainly follow up to wee what happened. We take pride in our service and the quality of food thus feedback such as yours keeps us on our toes and consistently better. Tonight opening of the Newport Beach Christmas Boat Parade,  join parade grand marshals (and Newport Beach natives) actress Leslie Mann and actor/singer Mark McGrath of Sugar Ray for opening night (Dec. 17) of the holiday spectacular that Conde Nast Traveler hails as one of the ‚ÄúWorlds Best Christmas Parades‚Äù as Newport Harbor transforms into an illuminated wonderland.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: rare to find a 7 foot deep pool, but they have it here.  Everything you'd expect from a Hilton, centrally located and extremely convenient assuming you can manage you freeway travel time of day.  Although, heading to Orange County the day before Thanksgiving and back out that Saturday, we seemed to be going against traffic, so it was easy as (pumpkin) pie!
Manager Response: Dear Don D.  We are as thankful for the 5 STAR review and thankful knowing that another guest received great service, loved our location and was able to enjoy our pool area. Come celebrate New Years Eve at AnQi at South Coast Plaza with an exciting concert-style soiree filled with Nicolas Feuillatte champagne and critically-acclaimed fare all night long. American Idol season 12 winner Candice Glover headlines the night, teeming with other notable performers from American Idol and The Voice. Hollywood‚Äôs fave DJs spin the crowd into 2015.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Never will I come here again. worst customer service and poor services. I had horrible experience here and will never come again. Ever. I was recommended this hotel from a colleauge but I will never stay here again due to their lack of any customer service or care.
Manager Response: Dear Leyla B.  I am so sorry you had a negative experience and frankly I am so surprised to hear about this as our staff shares great service with our guests as a whole.  We are all about great service and a comfortable stay as this is a very important part of our hotel and we will be very aware of anything that may be amiss for sure.   The staff and I wish you a Happy Thanksgiving with friends and family and we look forward to the opportunity to sharing a better experience with any future stays.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I was very pleased to be one of the diamond stars chosen for that week.  The free access to the executive lounge for water, juice and breakfast was well used. The only complaint I have is the attendant on duty on Monday afternoon (11/10). I got to the lounge after 6:30 for some snack. I would say at exactly 7:00 p.m., the male attendant on duty started asking us if we were done. We were about 5 to 6 guests left in the lounge. I'm not sure how the other guests felt but I felt very rushed by him. I finished my snack, got some bottle water and left. It was the last time I went to the lounge for afternoon snack.  Otherwise, it was a nice experience; did not have any issues with the morning female attendants.
Manager Response: Dear Marie-France D.  Our Executive Lounge is a great benefit for all our Executive Level travelers and the complimentary breakfast and appetizers they serve daily at regular scheduled hours are phenomenal. I am sorry you felt rushed by our attendant which I am sure it was not meant this way . Our management will cover this at their daily meeting with our staff. The staff and I are wishing everyone a safe and Happy Thanksgiving.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: This is what I want on an executive level in a hotel! I have been doing significant travel and always stay at the club/executive level in my hotels. This was by far one of the best. The food at happy hour and at breakfast were fantastic and it was great to have 24/7 access to water. The room was large and the bed was wonderful. I also really enjoyed the balcony for some fresh air. Airport was a very short drive away but far enough i did not feel like I was staying at an airport property. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Jennifer W.  Executive level for our Executive Travelers with views of the city and the planes taking off or landing at John Wayne Airport. Definitely a great location with South Coast Plaza just walking distance ,although we offer complimentary shuttle service to and from the South Coast Plaza to make holiday shopping a breeze.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: We enjoyed our recent stay at at the Hilton in Costa Mesa, CA (Bristol St.). The valet and front-desk staff were friendly & knowledgable regarding nearby amenities. Grounds were beautiful & rooms immaculate, though one room had a loose light switch. Traffic noise in day but quieter at night. Food was acceptable though expensive & not as good as the nearby Hilton Fairmont (NPB). Older hotel, beautifully maintained.  Infinite shopping & services on Bristol.  Would stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Jon M.  Thank you for noting our great staff and our beautiful hotel. Location is very important for all travelers. We are close to Newport Beach, Balboa Island and a short drive to Laguna Beach. Fashion Island and South Coast Plaza are both close to us...South Coast is actually walking distance. Are you ready for the holidays? We are ready and waiting to see you...  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: 10 minute walk to South Coast Plaza - Hotel runs a shuttle.  Has mini fridge and coffee machine in room. Beds are very comfortable.  Pay extra if you can and stay on the Executive Floor with access to the Executive Lounge which offers breakfast - snacks and has happy hour for a minimal cost.  Staff very accommodating - will definitely stay again.  Had a ball shopping with the girls.
Manager Response: Dear Georgia J.  Cheers! Delighted to hear your stay was fabulous and seamless. Shopping here is phenomenal and currently South Coast Plaza offers some great holiday deals. The shuttle is a extra amenity for us girls when we shop...do not have to deal with parking and traffic just have to concentrate on the Christmas list.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Hotel has had a major update to the interiors in the open spaces and rooms.  Really enjoyed my stay here as well as the convenience of the location just south of South Coast Plaza on Bristol and about 10 minutes from the beaches (without traffic).  Staff were friendly, professional and accommodating.  Lobby had a wonderful relaxed atmosphere with lots of open spaces.  Had appetizers in the evening and they were delicious and appreciated the staff's great service attitude.  Parking in a garage next door had in/out privileges. Shuttle service also available from John Wayne Airport (SNA).
Manager Response: Dear carrieul,  I love our flatbreads; my favorite is black truffle, fontina cheese and rosemary flatbread...DELICIOUS! !!!! We do have the best location for business travelers, families and events with the south coast plaza, SNA airport , beaches and attractions are relatively close by.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: This hotel never fails to unimpress.  They do everything at abgout 90% except -- The bell and Valet Staff are excellent - along withthe concierge staff.  Other than these folks the hotel is jus a little above average.    It seems like they try but they are always just a little behind the curve.  I asked - specifically for a room on the same hall as the concierge lounge... not a big deal right -- well it was to me - I offered to pay full price even though I could have accepted a lower group rat e-- just to gaurantee a room - cloe to the lounge.  I cehcked in and NOPE -- sorry only room available is not on the hall you requested - and by the way - still full price.  anyway - I'd stay here again, just with lower expectations.
Manager Response: RIVERMAN63,  I certainly understand the disappointment you felt. Any and all requests are always followed up by our great front desk staff and all is based on availability. Thankfully we have been busy so may I suggest to contact the Guest Service Manager prior to your arrival. We look forward to hearing from you and assisting you with all your requests.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The Hilton Costa Mesa is a great place to stay with  friendly and courteous staff.  Our Escrow Association also held our conference here a couple of weeks ago and we enjoyed the venue for our meetings.  The location is easy to get to and great shopping at the Mall very close by.
Manager Response: Dear rosannam,  Definitely we are thankful for having guests like you whom enjoy our area.  California's Largest Thanksgiving Day Run Event - The Dana Point Turkey Trot - One of America's Most Scenic Runs... hosted by The Dana Point Chamber of Commerce.  Great for hte whole family to enjoy!!!  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I travel quite often, and I try to always stay in Hilton brand. This by far has been the absolute best experience that my wife and I have had ever, what a great hotel and great staff, we will be back again many times
Manager Response: Dear Dennisbynum,  Wonderful to hear you both enjoyed your stay and experienced great service. November is the end of the typical blue whale migration and you can see a large number of blue whales traveling south along the Newport Beach coastline. Let's go whale watching and as an added bonus the dolphins usually like to be headlining entertainment.. A Fabulous Experience !!!  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The Hilton here is a typical Hilton in that it is clean, nicely presented and of the style you come to expect from Hilton.  But something interesting happened and I can't figure out who's telling the truth.  I reserved a room for a conference here and was told I missed the rate for the conference and only one room was left. Ok I get that.  So why, through the Hilton Honors site, would I be allowed to check in and select one of 50 different rooms if I was reserved the last room?  Who is telling the truth? Am I wrong here?
Manager Response: Dear Michael F.  I am sorry for any confusion Mr. Michael F. ; you placed your reservation and at that time it was noted for this conference only offered a certain amount of rooms at the contracted rate. When you e-checked in through our Honors site it showed how many King rooms or Queen rooms were to choose from that had been reserved prior,  not that any were available to rent.  I certainly understand how you must have felt and I am sorry for any confusion.   Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: IP Utility Safety Conference and Expo trip
Summary: I had the good fortune of staying on the 7th floor, where I had access to the lounge for breakfast and happy hour each day. This was a tremendous value, since the show was in the hotel at the B2 Ballroom level.
Manager Response: Thank you David W. for your 5 STAR comments and we are delighted you were able to enjoy the Executive Level and experience a Fantastic and Fabulous 5 STAR Service. I realize the conference probably kept you busy with meetings so I would suggest a future stay with us and experience Orange County at its best during the holidays. Newport Light Parade is where you experience the beautiful area of Newport,  the holiday lit boats and the community holiday atmosphere...amazing!!!  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: All services and amenities available making this hotel dedicated more for business and off sites very convenient.  Location is great also, being close to the more luxurious shopping mall of the area as well as close to the sea front by walk .
Manager Response: Dear joel b.  Our hotel is great for business travelers due to the location, complimentary airport shuttle , tech lounge and upgrade executive level all amenities to make our business traveler comfortable and productive. Then we are also great for the families that come to visit the area attractions, Disneyland, Knott's Berry Farm, Universal Studios are just a short drive away. We are located close to all the freeways and toll roads to make a family stay-cation comfortable as well.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The hotel is extremely convenient for flying out of Santa Ana airport. Rooms are large and well equipped. What makes the difference is an extremely professional personnel: if you happen to meet Charles know he is a clerk from another age, someone out of grand Budapest hotel if you know the movie. Breakfast excellent, you can feel the quality even in scramble eggs. Recommended
Manager Response: Dear Theimp80,  The staff are happy to see that the smiles and the personal touch we shared with you offered a great experience. Did you know the Newport Coast area has famous people living in this area such as  Michelle Pffeifer, Kobe Bryant, Chuck Norris and some that have departed like John Wayne. The Spruce Goose, his famous yacht,  is still in use for tours. So much to do and see.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Nice, clean hotel very close to SNA airport
Summary: Very nice, friendly staff...clean and nice lobby.  The bar in the lobby has nice small menu and wine list.  Shuttle service is regular and easy to/from the airport.  The beds were comfortable and nice linens.  Very close to South Coast Plaza too!
Manager Response: Dear Kesslane,  Yes we have it all, shuttle service to/ from SNA, comfortable and clean rooms, a great staff that are always ready to assist and make your stay a great experience and even an complimentary shuttle service to/from South Coast Plaza. If you are in the area this weekend the Orange County Fairgrounds will have The Veterans & Community Celebration to say thank you to our veterans. Live music, food and art projects, historical military vehicles and fun for the families.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I forgot to submit this earlier after my trip but found the card with my notes the other day and wanted to give credit where due. Eldred and Dora were Front Desk Associates and were VERY accommodating and pleasant. Their service would cause me to revist next time in need to stay nearby. Thank you to both of these fine Staff Members.
Manager Response: Dear Kevin W  Thank you for the kind words. The staff and I strive for each and every guest to consistently receive the experience each guest is looking for and we are thankful to see we were able to share a wonderful experience with you. We hope you will be able to enjoy the holidays in Orange County as we have so many events to enjoy. Even while shopping at the Irvine Spectrum you can go in the Ferris Wheel and go Ice Skating and making shopping a fun day for all.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Attending a recent conference, I was "wow'ed" by the beauty, luxury, and accommodations at this hotel.  The stay on the executive floor with a happy hour (they charge for drinks but the spread of food was exceptional) and full breakfast made it convenient and welcoming.  I would recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear joanne h  Delighted to see you had an excellent stay with us. The Executive Lounge is a great benefit for our Honors Diamond and Gold members and certainly does offer a wonderful breakfast and appetizers  to enjoy complimentary. We hope you will be able to visit us again , possibly when the Newport Light Parade is happening. The boats are decorated and puts everyone in the holiday spirit.  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I used to live in Orange County and returned for a visit over New Years 2014.  I knew of this hotel as I had attended several conference here in the past, but this was my first stay as a guest.  I booked two rooms for 4 nights each.  The price was fantastic, $89/night.  The hotel is very nice, and the lobby and conference areas are impressive.  The rooms are comfortable and the staff is very friendly.  I ate breakfast at the restaurant several mornings.  It is your standard breakfast buffet.  The food was high quality, but it was kind of pricey ($24/person).    Parking is expensive, I think was $25-$30/day.  The hotel is close to everything in Orange County and you can get to just about everything in 20-30 minutes.  It is super close to South Coast Plaza and Newport Beach.  I
Manager Response: Dear Andrew D.  We are happy to hear you had a great visit back to Orange County. Possibly you will be back for New Years and enjoy the Rose Bowl Game or the Rose Parade with friends and family here. Going to see the floats prior to or after the parade is always an amazing and fragrant experience too.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: We just stayed at the Hilton Orange County, it was a great choice.  The hotel staff was very friendly.  The hotel was very nice, very clean.  The rooms are great, very clean and large.  We had a room in the Executive level with a sofa.  It was great.  The afternoon social hour was awesome, the quality of the food was really good, very fresh and good choices.  The hostess in there was very friendly.  The breakfast was as equally good, good variety.  Will be back that's for sure.
Manager Response: Dear trumper77,  Thank you for the 5 STAR review. The staff and I are always delighted to hear about the 5 STAR service and overall experience our guests receive. Are you getting ready for the holidays? We are too..coming to our hotel the Junior League of Orange County. Featuring several vendors selling holiday decor,  jewelry and wonderful gift items. Hope to see you there.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: We stayed in Hilton Orange County for Capture 3D Conference, and we had an excellent experience to live in there. The room was very comfortable, nice and supper clean for four adults (two queen beds, just myself at the time). The free breakfast was great and delicious. The hotel is very close to the Airport for just 10 minutes away by hotel free shuttle bus.  I would definitely stay there again no matter business trip or personal trip.
Manager Response: Dear Honwei T.  We are happy to see our staff took great care of you and you had an awesome conference. Yes the airport shuttle makes life a little bit easier for our business travelers are not planning on going to any of the attractions. We also offer a complimentary shuttle to the South Coast Plaza which is a shopping experience in itself...although it is walking distance from our hotel. We hope you will have the opportunity to visit us again.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: A very comfortable hotel in what seems to be a very quiet area... There is a large mall, walking distance from the hotel and a number of strip malls close by... But for any exploring you will need a car. The rooms are large, well decorated, appears to be recently refurbished... The room was spotlessly clean, bathrooms are a little small but there is a separate wet bar area that you can always use if sharing the room and need the extra space! Breakfast buffet offered a good choice and al a carte options were available. This was the only meal I ate in the hotel, but my colleagues were also impressed with the room service.
Manager Response: Dear twmorton,  Thank you for recommending our fabulous breakfast buffet in our Bristol palms restaurant. The buffet consists of bacon, sausage, pancakes or waffles, scrambled eggs regular and with vegetables, rice, oatmeal, muffins, croissants, wheat or white toast, fruit, yogurt, salmon and bagels with cream cheese...delicious!! Add the coffee, tea or mimosa and we are good to go .  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Overall a good experience with room service needing some improvement.  The hotel is decorated upscale with the room having matching decor.  The hotel restaurant is quite good to have a meal when not wanting to travel out.
Manager Response: Dear Stephanier491  4 STAR Awesomeness !!! Our restaurant, pizzeria and lounge is located on our lobby level. On cooler evening the pizzeria is cozy and perfect for two friends sit and to catch up with each other and enjoy a flat-bread and wine.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I stay here for business every few months and it continues to impress. Clean, comfortable, classy and a friendly staff. I can't ask for more. Great restaurant and on site Starbucks and market for snacks and what not.
Manager Response: Dear jpaw88,  Thank you for the 5 STAR review and for sharing about your continuous stays with us. Our staff is always delighted to hear that our standards and goals are being appreciated. Check out the 40th Annual Fall Faire & Pumpkin Patch in Newport Beach on October 19th and it is free admission. Enjoy the day with great food, entertainment and shopping for the holidays.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Everything was average about this Hilton.What made my stay terrible was how they handled roaches (2 that I saw)in my room on the "executive floor" . Everyone I talked to, was apologetic but acted like it was no big deal. They took 10% off of my bill and gave me free parking (parking was only going to cost $3). The conference I attended was great, but the Hilton was terrible.
Manager Response: Dear Zepherine H.  We are thankful to hear you had a great conference and sad to hear about your room experience. This is an isolated experience and we did have a service come to inspect and make sure the unwanted guests did not return. For any stay-cation plans I would suggest to check whom is performing at The Honda Center; performing on November 26th is Justin Timberlake. This will be an awesome show for sure!!  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Terrible customer service after an error on their part.
Summary: After changing a reservation a week before my trip, I arrived to find out they had no room for me on the night I had requested and reserved. They sent me to another Hilton that was miles away from the conference I was attending, and didn't offer to recompense my inconvenience at all. Never even acknowledged their mistake. Not OK!
Manager Response: Dear tmartin63,  I am sorry to hear about your unfortunate experience and we do apologize for any miss communication that may have happened when changes were called in to our reservations desk. I am glad to see they were able to find another hotel for you to stay in so you could still attend the conference. I would ask that at any time you make changes with your reservations, whether it is with any hotel or airlines that they email you the confirmed changes to give you peace of mind that all has been changed and confirmed as requested. Thank you for your patronage and for the opportunity to make your stay better.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Stayed three days at the establishment during the recent California Student Success Symposium. Staff were extremily professional and helpful. Romm was clean and bed was dcomfortable. The only negative was the fact the hotel temperature at time was on the warm side. The week before the conferance the LA area experance a heat wave in the upper 90s which was abnormal. The AC was trying but did not have the Umph to address such a heat wave. Other than this the stay was great. I am looking forward to checking out the establishment minus a heat wave.
Manager Response: Dear Mike M.,  We are delighted to hear about your consistently great stays. This is our goal to share a home away from home and it is always nice to hear we have accomplished our goals.We hope you do have a chance to try some of the great shopping and restaurants close to our hotel. Currently try for a business dinner or girls night out the Capital Grill located in the South Coast Plaza, which offers Wahgu Burger with fries and glass of wine for $25 for a limited time. Great atmosphere, great service and great deal. Enjoy!!!  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Stayed here to celebrate our engagement and had a perfect weekend!  The lobby, dining area, and common rooms are tastefully decorated with comfortable furniture.  Walking around the hotel is relaxing and there is also great people watching.  The room was big and bright, smelled clean and had had an awesome western facing view: the sunsets were stunning.  Equipped with blackout curtains, the light from the huge balcony door is easily kept out if you want to sleep in. The king-sized bed made me feel as if I was sleeping on a cloud. Be prepared to want to eat everything and then some at the delicious breakfast buffet.  And the staff were helpful, attentive, and made our experience the most relaxing stay-cation we've had.  The Hilton Costa Mesa is on the top of our list for future
Manager Response: Dear Lauren L.  Congratulations on your Engagement ! Wonderful to hear you had a relaxing and enjoyable time with your fiancee. We hope you will have fun preparing for your wedding and hope you would consider us as well. We do have 48,000 sq. ft. of indoor and outdoor event space; our patio space is beautiful with a choice of fountains or a wonderful garden like setting.  Whatever you decide to do we wish you all the best in your future plans.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I loved the bed and pillows.  Very comfortable.  The hotel was easy to access off the freeway and very close to a shopping mall and restaurants.  It was only 10-15 minutes to the beach.  I don't normally stay at Hilton's because they are usually more money than I am willing to pay.  But, I got a great rate in conjunction with the conference I was attending.  If I could get that rate every time, I would DEFINITELY stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Lexa L.  5 STAR service, 5 STAR comfort and 5 STAR location !!! Awesome!!! We are delighted to see you had a great experience and look forward to your return. If by chance you will be back in December a great fundraiser to attend is the 11th Anniversary Orange County Walk Now for Autism Speaks.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I stayed at this hotel while on a business trip.  I had a very unpleasant experience with the staff at reception and manager due to their inability to understand that I had a voucher and my room was already paid by my travel agent.  They were unable to manage the situation, to the point that they got to cancel my room key, even though we gave them a credit card when they asked us.     Finally everything was solved at the very last minute thanks to my travel agent, who called several times to clarify the situation.  Never received an apology from the management.
