The hotel charged me only 50% of the parking, which, by the way is ridiculously expensive.    It was not my first stay at this Hilton hotel, and I still have to return to Costa Mesa several times for business.  However,
Manager Response: Dear Alejandro1977,  As you could see with your first stay with us this certainly is not the experience we strive for and the staff and I apologize. I am following up on your situation so that it will not happen again to anyone and our executive team is looking into this as well. Our goal is to share a comfortable and productive stay for all our business travelers. Some great amenities such as the Tech Lounge make the business travelers stay so much more productive.  We look forward to another opportunity to share a great stay with you.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I loved this hotel and I was there 4 time in last few years, always satisfied. This hotel is hosting Longevity  as wall as Woman's Wellness conferences and it was always great experience to be a conference participant in this lovely hotel with pleasant staff. I usually booked less expensive room and each time  I was satisfied with room and everything else. This time I decided to treat myself and booked more expensive room. I booked it 4 months prior to this conference(September 18-23, 2014) When I arrived, it was almost feeling like coming back home, I was in excellent mood. While checking in, I requested certain side of the hotel (I called ahead of time to do it, but i was told that they can not do it, to do it on checking in). I got a key and found my room. It was very dark,
Manager Response: Dear milhalja,  As you know and have experienced with previous stays we offer great guest service and our staff is always ready to accommodate when ever possible.  I am so sorry to hear you had a negative experience and apologize for any miss communication on our part. Several great room package deals available where you have breakfast included and/or parking and WiFi.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The hotel and it's amenities are ok.  Nothing out of the ordinary compared to the hotels i usually stay in.    The staff are friendly and polite and constantly smiling which is nice to see.  The room i had was on the pool side and unfortunately for me there is also a car wash on that side which i think was particularly busy as i could hear the dryer go off every few minutes.  I wasn't able to sleep properly on the quite comfortable bed.   I like to rate hotels on their recycling programs too which this hotel  has nothing new to offer unfortunately.
Manager Response: Dear Benjamyn,  We do have various Eco-friendly programs in place and would like to thank you for being Eco conscious . Our shuttle option to the South Coast Plaza and Airport that are worry free options for our guests. Several walking options for some great restaurants or stay and dine at our Bristol Palms Lounge or Pizzeria.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The staff and overall experience of this Hotel was better than I could ever imagine.  The best Hotel I have ever stayed in.  The beds were extremely comfortable and the rooms were very clean.  The staff was very helpful.  Highly recommend
Manager Response: Dear Marlaina,  Awesome review!!!! Hope the next time you will enjoy some of the area entertainment at the Segerstrom Center for the Arts or local talent at some of the Newport Beach area restaurants.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: We were given excellent traffic directions by a bellman named Jerry around the first of August when we stayed at this great hotel! He told us 3 ladies  an easier route to get back to Phoenix around.  As we are not used to driving in LA traffic, it really was most appreciated!  We saved so much time!  Thanks again, Jerry!    Also, Travis helped me out with my many questions about the hotel!  We would most certainly return to this hotel if the opportunity came up again!   Wendy R
Manager Response: Dear Wendy R.  Our bell staff always are delighted to assist all our guests with directions and area dining information. Close by and walking distance is The Lab where Havana a Cuban restaurant is one they love to suggest for a great meal and atmosphere.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel, ridiculous fee to park there
Summary: We enjoyed the hotel itself very much. Well decorated, beautiful inside and out, with a comfortable bed and decent food in the executive lounge. The night was quiet and no one was heard in other rooms or in the hallway, which is something I treasure a lot. The staff is very friendly and accommodating. The swimming pool and spa are very clean and large and rarely crowded. I saw groups of flight attendants arriving frequently everyday to stay there and that's always a good indication of quality.   The only complaint I have, and I have it with any hotel that charges you a lot to park in their garage, is that this hotel charges $23 per night for you to self park. I recently stayed at 3 Hilton properties in North Carolina and not one charged to park on their property or in their
Manager Response: iwork2travel107,  For a traveler such as yourself we appreciate your 4 star review. October is around the corner and I would suggest to celebrate at the House of Blues in Anaheim or Balboa Bay Resort. Celebrate with  special beer, sausages or bratwurst and wonderful music.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I stay at this hotel 6-10 times per year. I have always had a good experience. Check in has always been quick. The restaurant area and bar area are both fun. The food is good for breakfast and dinner. It is always busy but I have never not been able to find a seat. The rooms are nice and updated. Bathrooms seem modern-ish. The views are not great but that is what you get for staying in the heart of Irvine/Costa Mesa. They offer room service and free wifi.   The only negative I see is self parking can be a little difficult in their garage and there can still be a bit of a walk after you self park.
Manager Response: Dear Tim B.  Consistently a great experience is what we strive for. Thank you for your comments and for sharing about our location. We are in the city and yet so close to the beaches ; Newport Beach/ Balboa Island. The weather has still been summer like to enjoy the paddle board, kayaking, surfing and snorkeling. Great restaurants such as the Rusty Pelican or Ocean 21  and both overlook the water and those sunsets are amazingly beautiful.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Excellant stay at this top notch Hotel
Summary: This is quickly becoming one of my favorite to stay while on business travel to OC. Top notch staff,and feels and looks freshly revovated. I had the opportunity to stay on the executive floor and was not dissappointed. Very pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Dear Richard C.  Thank you for the wonderful review and we are happy to see we are exceeding your expectations. The wonderful thing about our location is that we are close to the airport (SNA) close to shopping, close to a wide variety of restaurants, Close to the beaches and a short distance from Angels Stadium, Honda Center, Segerstrom Center of the Arts. We have it all for you to enjoy!!!!  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I stayed here for the first time and was really impressed.  They seem to do all of the little things with excellence. The location is excellent for business- very close to the airport, the major freeways, and most of the significant OC office parks.  It is a very safe area as well.  While not that geographically interesting (no beach or mountains) it is a highly functional place to stay.  There are dozens of restaurants within walking distance- mostly asian themed. The rooms were great.  Very well appointed.  I had a standard room and was thrilled with it.  My coworker was upgraded to a suite and it was phenomenal.   The service was outstanding.  Everyone seemed genuinely interested.   Fitness center and pool were very well equipped.   Lastly, the concierge level lounge was
Manager Response: TDBusiness,  Thank you for your review and I could not have said it any better.  The beaches are close by and I know you would have enjoyed seeing the beautiful sunset while having dinner at any of the restaurants located on the water front in Newport Beach.  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Service is great but room is dirty
Summary: The staff in this hotel was excellent. However, my room was dirty. Fingerprints on TV, sinks were dirty and the bath tub had hair on it. Overall my experience was good cause of the staff but the cleanness part of it was not good.
Manager Response: Dear Ankeen,   The staff and I are delighted you enjoyed great service as we strive to share a comfortable , clean and enjoyable stay with all our guests. As for the room cleanliness it is a disappointment to hear that it was not up to standard. Did the kids have fun at our pool ? or possibly you went to the beach?  Huntington Beach has the well known "Dukes" restaurant right on the water,  you almost feel like you are in Hawaii.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: This place was not clean enough to take my kids to, food quality is so poor. staff was so helpful but they do not have much in hand they can do. they changed smelly room and then they changed unclean room because there was no staff available to clean the room.
Manager Response: Dear Salvana M.  I am sorry to hear the housekeeping staff had left already for the night when you requested service to clean any mess in the room. We thank you for your feedback so we can check and see what exactly happened as we strive to improve our service and make it right.  I do hope you and your family had a great experience with your group convention and that you were able to enjoy the beaches as well.   Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Bends over backward to help. The STAFF
Summary: Mr. Ryan lytle and his staff made every effort to attend to our needs. They didnot make us feel like they were inconveniencing them . The desk clerks were always willing to smile and give assistance . All of their efforts made our stay so enjoyable. Thanks again!
Manager Response: Dear Gary B.,  WOW - Thank you so much for the kind comments regarding our hotel staff and specifically Ryan our Convention Service Manager.  Hope you also had a chance to visit our local area attractions such as Disneyland, Knott's Berry Farm or possibly a game at the Angels Stadium.  Costa Mesa is truly a great place to visit and we are always happy to have you stay with us.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Finishing up my stay at this Hilton and being a Diamond member, staying at one Hilton property or another every week for business, I can say this is one of the best. The hotel lobby/bar/restaurant area is expansive and welcoming, without being a bit "convention like" (LAX Hilton, which I also like BTW).  The food has been very good, and the staff friendly and attentive. The executive lounge has some nice apps during happy hour. The rooms are well appointed and pretty quiet. The hotel is located in a nice area of Orange County, convenient to the Airport. Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Dear Gunzee,  Thank you for being a Diamond member and for sharing your experience. Have you tried the prosciutto and fig flatbread yet? It is amazing. You can actually watch the chef prepare the flat bread while sipping on a refreshing drink in our lounge/bar area.Life is Good!!!  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I have stayed in numerous hotels near South Coast Plaza but had not tried the Hilton until this week -- well now I have my new favorite hotel!   Staff friendly and professional, rooms large and with spacious balconies, clean and bright public spaces.  Did not use the pool but it looked very nice.  Bed was comfortable with nice bedding.  It has a 1980s feel to it, but what's wrong with that?  I will definitely stay here again!  Loved it!
Manager Response: Dear rover 28,  Our decor is definitely representing the California Essence that is a eclectic modern Hollywood era style. The hand blown glass poppies and the poppy mosaic in the lobby make our lobby bright and welcoming. Orange County is a short drive to the Nixon Library and Bowers Museum for all our guests whom are history buffs.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Went to Costa Mesa for a concert at the Pacific Amphitheater. We were able to walk to the concert. There were plenty of nice places to eat. This hotel was so convenient that I wouldn't hesitate to stay there again. Plus it was very clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Petch,  We are grateful your stay was great. How nice you were able to walk to the Pacific Amphitheater. Yes, close by is Scott's Seafood, Morton's Steakhouse and Leatherby's Cafe' Rouge to name a few.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: It has been a few months since my last stay and this one was just as enjoyable as the first.  Room was clean, nicely furnished.  Front desk and executive lounge staff are friendly and helpful.  I would definitely recommend this hotel for business travelers and if you're a Hilton Honors member, the executive lounge access is a great perk and incentive to stay here.  The gym is spacious, by regular hotel gym standards.
Manager Response: Dear rafa d.  Whether you are coming for business or leisure our fitness center , pool area and tech lounge is sure to please all our guests. The Southern California beaches offer surfing, kayaking, boat rentals, boat excursions, fishing excursions and fine dining with beautiful sunsets.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: this is an excellent hotel located in middle of the orange county close to beach, too. Rooms were excellent clean and quite. If we were to have another function we will choose this Hilton hotel. Room service were excellent and staff were very courteous. We liked the bar it is located right near the enterance with good services.
Manager Response: Dear Dean M.,  Delighted to see you received 5 STAR service and had a great stay. Close to Segerstrom Center of the Arts , South Coast Plaza, The Lab and The Camp along with several great restaurant options. Orange County has it all ! Relaxing, Special, Memorable, Delightful; it is what you're looking for.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The hotel was a beautiful HIlton and very well maintained.  The staff was extrememy frinedly. The only negative is you have to turn the a/c down to about 61 to cool the room, which we did.  It was very hot in Costa Mesa that day and the hotel was 100% occupied.  .
Manager Response: Dear ChicagotoArizona,  Labor Day weekend was very hot and humid and our A/C system was working overtime for sure. Thankfully Fall is around the corner and the beach area will be perfect for those morning strolls. Want to go kayaking, surfing or snorkeling you can do it all here at Newport beach, Huntington Beach and Balboa Island.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Would recommend this hotel for anyone staying in the Orange County area. Very polite and helpful staff. Clean rooms (Very important to me!) Extremely convenient to the John Wayne airport. Centrally located for ease of travel yet still far enough away from LA. Great value for the dollar when compared to others in that area.
Manager Response: Dear LarryY,  We are so happy to see you had a great stay with us. Conveniently located by SNA and in the event you forgot to pack something ? No problem... the South Coast Plaza has it all.  The Cashmere Salon conveniently located in the hotel for a regular hair cut or hairdos for special occasions. I do suggest to make a reservation ahead of time as they get busy.   Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The Hilton - Orange County on Bristol is a tremendous value for the money.  As Diamond members we were upgraded to the Presidential suite which is absolutely magnificent.  The Executive Lounge also provided drinks and a full buffet breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear SoccerDad22,  Being a Diamond member certainly has some great benefits. We truly have a great location, are a great value and have fabulous staff!  Complimentary Shuttle service to/from John  Wayne Airport and also complimentary shuttle service to/from South Coast Plaza.  And we are centrally located to enjoy the area attractions and the beaches. WOW!   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Great experience during my business/leisure stay at the Hilton Hotel; Orange County.  The hotel staff was wonderful.  Two very talkative children, and staff was attentive to every word.  The hotel appearance and cleanliness was up to a high standard as well.  Overall wonderful, relaxed trip. Thank you
Manager Response: Dear Kimberly F.,  So happy to hear the kids had a great time. It is so wonderful to have kids that are inquisitive and adventurous. I hope they were able to enjoy the Discover Museum in Santa Ana. Currently they have the "Myth Busters" program going on. This museum is hands on activities that are academically based. True and safe fun for the family. The staff and I thank you for your kind words and we look forward to your return.  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The hotel staff was very friendly and helpful. Once you walked in the room everything was nice and clean. The bed was super comfortable. Had plenty of space in the room that we were staying in. The only hard thing to find was the light switch. Overall great experience at the Hilton.
Manager Response: Dear Marcela S.,  We are grateful to hear you had a great experience even though it was mostly sitting in meetings. We hope next time you will have a chance to enjoy some outside activities . There are so many options for things to do ; from going to attractions such as Disneyland, Knott's Berry Farm or renting a boat, going fishing or a scenic trip to Catalina Island in the Newport/ Balboa Island area.  Happy labor Day weekend everyone !!!  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Hotel was very well maintained and clean with decent rooms. Hotel Staff was very helpful and courteous, and room service was very helpful and on time. The gym is well kept along with the pool, and they are near a supermarket and various restaurants, and malls. I would recommend this hotel and would stay again for future travels.
Manager Response: Dear Jeremiah I,  Thank you for the review and we are delighted to see that our location was of great benefit for you. The Japanese Supermarket , Mitsuwa, across the street is a fabulous store to shop for fresh Asian food items. For accessories and apparel shopping South Coast Plaza is a true shopping experience.  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Get a room overlooking the pool, but from 5th - 6th Floor (pool is on the 2nd), for a fabulous breeze, as that side of the hotel had a nice skyline view. Was able to open the windows and not use the ac. I guess I caught great weather. Pool closes at 10, and was not noisy even before then. Good selection of restaurants, and fast food places.
Manager Response: Dear R. King,  The pool view  along with the sky view of the city and the ocean breeze certainly make for a fabulous stay with the balcony or window open- life is good!  Newport and Laguna Beach are all close by with magnificent options for restaurants along the coast for you to enjoy. Balboa Island is another area and you can actually take the ferry boat across to the island to enjoy the Fun Zone and the quaint shops.  Have a safe and great weekend everyone!!!  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I was a keynote presenter for the Yellow Ribbon Conference for Air Force Reserves and they always choose the best places for a conference. This hotel had wonderful meeting rooms, a fabulous ballroom and great foods for breakfast, lunch and snacks. The attendees, who are facing a deployment soon, were so comfortable because of this great facility.
Manager Response: Dear EllieRKay,  We are proud to have the Yellow Ribbon conference at our hotel. The staff and I are delighted to see that you enjoyed your stay and your conference.  We certainly do have a great sales staff along with a fabulous catering and banquets team, you cannot miss having a successful conference. We hope to see you at the next conference.  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Keep an eye or you credit card bill
Summary: There were several charges on my credit card which I did not incur and hotel staff did nothing to help. They could not even explain what the charges were for. So in summary, keep an eye or you credit card statements.
Manager Response: Dear Edward W.,  Our expectations are to share a quality stay with all our guests from the pre- arrival to the departure and at any time there is a mistake we own the situation and resolve. I am sure by now the issues have been resolved with your billing errors and I do apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. I look forward to sharing a memorable and comfortable experience with your next stay with us.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Being a Hilton honors member for year there are simple things you ask for and expect.  Have little expectations if your staying here. The hotel is beautiful the beds comfy.  My husband lived the pillows. The tv had no picture just a blank screen with sound. The shower flooded the bathroom every time we used it.  Better shower curtains would help. The cleaning lady left her cleaning supply's in our room. The room is big so we just left them.  Asking for a 30 minute late check out we were told not possible.  30 minutes really ! I could understand multiple hour late checkout but 30 minutes?
Manager Response: Dear neatcmom,  Thank you for your review and I am delighted to see you loved the new and updated bed linen and pillows. The staff prides itself on sharing a great guest experience and always make it right for all our guest whenever possible. The staff and I are thankful you had a 4 STAR experience.  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The Hilton has recently had a much needed face lift.  Although the elevators have not changed, it still adds a unique quality to the decor.  The natural earth-tone color pallet, thoughtful art distributed throughout the hotel, and welcoming registration desk does offer a sense of, "I've arrived", and relaxation.  Starbucks, restaurant, lounge and business area are all in cell-phones throw of the registration desk; perfect to grab a drink, snack, or print your boarding pass or check e-mails before your next destination.  The rooms are clean and comfortable. My two favorite features!    The goose-down pillows are soft and beds firm.  The bathrooms are conducive to the hotel d√©cor, and the waterfall shower head is nice added feature.  The marble sinks in and outside the bathroom
Manager Response: Dear Arrowhead Conference,  Thank you for the 5 STAR review. You narrated and described our hotel beautifully and precise. The decor updated and represents the "Essence of California" .Our Tech Lounge is conveniently located in our lobby close to Bristol Brew for a coffee or pastry in the morning and our Bristol Palms Restaurant, Lounge and Bar for the afternoon snack or beverage for the break you need by then. We are happy to have been a part of making your stay 5 STAR.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: In a pinch it's a good value
Summary: This place just screams 1980‚Äôs, from the glass elevators to the funky shapes that make up the building.  Sure much has changed since then, but for this hotel...not so much.  Hilton has redone and improved on the convention center, bit the rooms leave a bit to be desired; they are clean but very well warn.  Positives - Starbucks coffee, located in Orange County CA....I‚Äôm stretching here folks  Negatives - Our of 3 stays only once did the TV work, Poor Wi-Fi on the lower levels, very little hot water reserves etc.
Manager Response: Dear brimil,  Our hotel does incorporate the Essence of California in all our decor; from the mission influence with the wooden decanters and bowls displayed to the modern Hollywood style in our Tech Lounge and the glass poppies hanging in the lobby . The beautiful mosaic poppy design in our lobby represents the State flower and was specifically designed for our hotel this year. A beautiful blend is represented in our guest rooms and throughout the hotel. The Lobby also offers Starbucks's coffee in our Bristol Brew and home made granola parfaits are delicious and healthy too.  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: This Hilton in Orange County was very clean, the price was right, and the shuttle service excellent.  I did not need to rent a car or take a taxi to or from the airport. The service was also helpful for nearby restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear Kelly B.,  Delighted to see your 5 STAR experience with all service aspects of our fabulous hotel. Being close to South Coast Plaza certainly gives our guests some great dining choices. Anatello or Maggiano's for Italian, Scott's for Seafood, or Capital Grill for the business luncheon.   Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I'm usually not a big fan of Hilton, but I was really impressed with this hotel. The king room was laid out well. Very comfortable bed with four king down pillows for a great night's sleep. All staff were extremely courteous and went out of their way to accommodate. The property is maintained very well. Room service was very prompt every time and the quality of food was impressive. One of the Country's largest shopping mall, the South Coast Plaza is a short walk, or the hotel offers a frequent shuttle. A great stay!
Manager Response: Dear malibubrat,  We love to hear the positive and about our guests having a great experience. The staff and I are delighted to hear you were pleasantly surprised with our quality and service and that we exceeded in every way. To add to the experience next time take a tour of the harbor and see the dolphins play and the magnificent blue whales ; you can do a dinner cruise. Have a business lunch or dinner at any of the ocean front restaurants such as Ocean 21 or Rusty Pelican, both have great views of the harbor with great atmosphere and delicious food.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: This hotel is a great location for conference and other business meetings.  The staff are great and the food (for those familiar with conference food) was quite good.  The service staff for the conference lunch were accommodating to my dietary needs (Vegetarian) and the check in and out process was easy and fast.
Manager Response: Dear Desiree C.  Glad to hear your conference went well and that all the staff were a part of making the conference great. Newport Beach and Balboa Island is a great place to go before the summer ends with boat rental, kids zone and ice cream all making the weekend a great experience to remember.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel, just the location is little bit boring
Summary: Hotel is great, they have nice and helpful staff. Rooms are very spacious and clean, bed is comfortable and bathroom is ok. Nothing that would make me drop my jaw, but a hilton standard, which is measured with an overall satisfaction. Food is really delicious, I liked the breakfast choice and dinner was very nice too. Just one thing that caught my attention in a very positive light ( cause I always seek for an extraordinary things in hotels which are lifting the standards) are the lifts, which were made of glass, so you could see the whole lobby. With all the lights it is very beautiful especially in the evening.  Otherwise the hotel provides a shuttle to the nearby mall (every 2hours). There is not much to do around the hotel area, which is a little disappointing. However, the
Manager Response: Dear misii_mis,  Our location is ideal if you are looking forward to going to Newport Beach, Balboa Island or Segerstrom Center of the Arts. We are also close to Anaheim and a short drive to Knott's Berry Farm or Disneyland . SNA ( John Wayne Airport) is so close and with the complimentary shuttle service makes this an ideal location. Our bell staff are always delighted to print any area information and reserve Enterprise rental car or taxi service throughout your stay.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I LOVED this hotel. From the moment I drove up, I felt at home. I love the color pallet ( brown, tan, orange yellow. Strong wood and botanical overtones) and warmth. This is how I would decorate my home.The room was spacious, and top floor with balcony was a treat. The double sinks were perfect for everyone getting ready. With one sink outside the door.  I would recommend a soap at each sink and shower. I loved the large desk, seat with ottoman, large dresser with up to date TV. My bed - the best sleep ever in a hotel room. Comfy pillows and lots of them. White fresh comforter. Ahh. Room Service made us feel like royalty. The fresh flower a nice touch. The openness down stairs and skylight filled the area with light. Plenty of space through out the hotel to just sit and kick
Manager Response: Dear Danelle Z.  Always delighted to hear you feel like home away from home and that you had a enjoyable stay.  Did you know this weekend is the 8th Annual Lobsterfest at Newport Beach? You can enjoy Maine lobster that is flown in fresh, live entertainment and activities for kids. A great way to enjoy the day with friends and family.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Hotel was overwhelmed with occupancy which was noted on several fronts from front desk wait times, elevator mechanical problems, slow dining service. Staff tried to stay professional and helpful but Hilton needs to invest some $$ into this location to make it rise to the service promise and expectations of this area.
Manager Response: Dear Bret G.  Our location is ideal for business travelers and with many options of meeting space for any and all corporations.  Brett I hope you were able to enjoy the area and I apologize for the elevator issues. The service came out and checked them all right away and all is going well. I understand when you are on a time schedule for lunch and I apologize I did not know you waited for service as I could have shared the other option of our Corner Pantry where they offer salads, sandwiches, fruit, cheese trays etc.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I've stayed in the hotel for two nights and wasn't disappointed, Place is clean, rooms look fresh and recently redecorated and the breakfast was excellent. Staff is generally nice and I'd always stay here again.   The only complaint I have is water. Tap water tastes like drinking pool water and one provided in the room is $6 a bottle. I understand hotels overcharge food and drinks, but water is basic necessity. With this fixed, it would be clear 5*.
Manager Response: Dear FoodEliminator,  We offer several options for our guests along with the bottled water in the room we also offer complimentary water station ( lemon, cucumber or lime induced) which is located in our lobby for you to enjoy upon arrival and throughout your stay. Very refreshing! The Corner Pantry has the large and the small size bottles and vitamin water, juices and sparkling water.  Thank you for your 5 STAR review.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Fun in the Sun in the Middle of the Big OC
Summary: My wife and I stayed for two nights as part of a large wedding party.  The bride and groom had arranged to have a block of rooms available for wedding guests who wanted to stay near the wedding venue. The discounted rate was very good as was everything about our stay at this Hilton.  Plus the location is great for getting easily to various "fun" things to do in the OC, e.g. beaches, South Coast plaza shopping and Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear 971marcw,   Our hotel has great space and beautiful ballrooms, some with patios to share the bride & grooms' memorable day with family and friends.  Awesome to hear you enjoyed the wedding and also some of the great area attractions such as Disneyland, the beach and South Coast Plaza. It was an AWESOME weekend!  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: This stay was again not disappointing. It just shows the Hilton high quality standards of maintaining the facility and its amenities. On this trip we had the pleasure of our Granddaughter and she really had a super time at the pool and hot tub. The room was good size and very comfortable. We even visited a near by miniature golf and took in a movie. The hotel is also located near the John Wayne airport.
Manager Response: Dear Richard H.  It was our pleasure to be a part of those great moments shared with your granddaughter. South Coast Plaza has it all from great restaurants, specialty shops and close by a movie theater and Segerstrom Center of the Arts.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great for out of town wedding guests.
Summary: Although our daughter's wedding was at another venue, our out-of-town wedding guests stayed at this hotel.  Terrific rates!  And the coordinator for the wedding guests' stay was excellent.  The hotel has been recently renovated and everything was in top  condition.  They have a very large hotel swimming pool that everyone enjoyed.  The staff went above and beyond to make sure we had everything we needed.  The location was great, too, right off the 405 and easy access to Newport Beach and Laguna Beach.  Guests also enjoyed the shuttle from the hotel to South Coast Plaza, an amazing up-scale mall.  Super close to John Wayne Airport (SNA).  We stayed in a suite, with access to the Executive lounge and ate a full breakfast and enjoyed afternoon wine/snacks everyday.  Really, can't
Manager Response: Dear SusanmK4819QJ,  Weddings are always such a special event and our wedding coordinator has so many ballrooms and locations to organize for all the to-be brides. For wedding parties our location is perfect  John Wayne (SNA) airport with a complimentary shuttle option from the hotel makes this convenient. Relax, enjoy and share the special moments.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Very pleasant hotel, needs a few tweaks, freezing cold display hall and ball room, small gift shop, few selections. Rooms big and comfortable. Staff friendly, dining area very slow services. Went out to eat to local places.
Manager Response: Dear Karen O.,  Our Corner Pantry offers sandwiches, salads, chips, yogurt parfaits, bagels, sodas, water and alcoholic beverages of all kinds along with many of the much requested sundries. A great option for a lunch or dinner on the go or a picnic at the beach. Newport Beach, Balboa Beach and Huntington Beach are the closer beaches and all offer great shops , restaurants, boat or kayak rentals. Enjoy a day at the beach!  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Spent one night for girls night out prior to going to OC Fairgrounds for GOGO's Concert. Great location. Hotel very clean and staff very nice. Pool area clean but pool itself needed to be cleaned of debris. Overall would stay here again. Thanks Hilton for another great time.
Manager Response: Dear Tami J.  Sounds like the "Girls Night Out " was lots of fun and having our hotel conveniently located by all area attractions means more time to have fun with the "Girls'. South Coast Plaza is walking distance and we do offer a complimentary shuttle just in case you shop till you drop and need assistance with the packages and bags.   Best wishes, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Awesome experience at the Hilton. Nice beds and the executive lounge was the best I've seen. Great food in the morning, and appetizers at night. It was such an added value. We were able to have coffee first thing in the morning, and actually the in room coffee was great except those machines never seem to work all that great. We found a wonderful restaurant nearby call Vietnam Pearl that was delicious, fresh and inexpensive. They only stay open until 7:30pm so get there early. You can easily walk to South Coast Plaza from this hotel as well.
Manager Response: Dear 525gwenng,  You can actually see the planes take off from John Wayne Airport from our Executive Lounge. We offer complimentary airport shuttles beginning at 5:30 am for our guests; please keep in mind if there is any special transportation requests we suggest to request them with the reservation desk or contact the Guest Service Manager to make arrangements ahead of time. Guest Service Manager will be delighted to assist with making reservations for golf, tours, transportation, restaurants and area attractions. Looking forward to your next visit with us.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: This was very close for our medical appointments. The staff was great and friendly. The comp breakfasts were a real treat. We will stay here again for our appointments.  Bottled water and parking a little over priced. But I am used to the super8.
Manager Response: Dear James S.  We are happy to hear our location was accommodating for your medical appointment and for South Coast Plaza. I hope you also had a chance to go to Huntington Beach where the Vans Surf Competition is happening , some great talent out there.  Did you happen to have time to go to the Orange County Fair? Awesome bands performing and love the food!   Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I realy like this hotel, the pool area is beautiful and the rooms are clean, smell fresh and beds are confortable. The front desk staff is very friendly and the hotel is located in a very good busines area.
Manager Response: Dear Maria L.  Delighted to see you enjoyed our beautiful pool area and that you had a relaxing stay. Our fitness center is also a great amenity to enjoy prior to or after the business meetings as it is available 24 hours a day. Enjoy it all !  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Everything was great during my stay from the moment I stepped into the hotel till the day I departed. Definitely would recommend this hotel when travelling to this area. Food was great and the room was so comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Rick H.,  Delighted to see you had a comfortable stay and that you recommend us. If you have any future plans to go to Orange County Fair, Disneyland, Knott's Berry Farm, or to the beach for the weekend we are close to it all.  We are looking forward to seeing you again real soon.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The hotel was very accomidating for business meetings and the staff was of great assistance when needed.  The fitness room was great for working out after long meetings and the pool was great for relaxing afterwards.  Really enjoyed our stay in the hotel and would most likely consider staying there again if ever in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Ronald K,  We are delighted you enjoyed your business stay and was able to work out in our fitness center and relaxed at our outdoor pool. Our hotel offers great business space and ballrooms for all your events or weddings and our Tech Lounge is available 24 hours . Complimentary shuttle service from and to John Wayne Airport makes this a business choice for sure.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: This is a top quality Hilton Hotel with all the amenities at a great price.  The hotel has a very good fitness center with cardio and weights and a restaurant and bar that is relaxing with good food and a nice selection of beers.  Rooms are very clean and staff that is  extremely helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Daniel P.  Only a few minutes from all the attractions and entertainment. Currently Orange County Fair is happening Wednesday through Sundays. Ghost -The Musical is currently at the Segerstrom Center and I hear it is a great musical. Dine at our Bristol Palms Restaurant or if you desire Italian  Antonello's or Cuban a wonderful choice is Habana and conveniently located.. For later in the evening Newport Beach restaurants and my favorite is Ocean 21 great views and ocean front for a refreshing evening stroll. Enjoy it all in Orange County !  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Good reliable Hilton by South Coast Plaza
Summary: Very convenient to South Coast Plaza and our usual hotel when visiting Costa Mesa, Irvine and Newport Beach. Hotel has been around for a while but deluxe rooms have had a makeover with flat screen, new linen and carpets. Can specify King or Twin (double-double) although King rooms seem to have higher rate. WiFi costs $9.95 per day except for high-tiered loyalty card holder (why do hotels charge for WiFi?). Restaurant and bar good, if not outstanding. Self parking costs $23 per night which is a negative. Service very good and they upgraded us to suite when we complained about aircon noise in our first room.
Manager Response: Dear GourmetNZ,  Great location and great staff for sure and thank you for recognizing this. Located close to South Coast Plaza, Newport Beach, Segerstrom Concert Hall, Disneyland and Orange County Fairgrounds. So much to enjoy and so many wonderful days to share with family and friends.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Easy Access location and very clean
Summary: Loved the location for the tournament we were playing in. 2 beds made it easy for our waterpolo team to get everyone up there.  Hotel was very clean.  Parking fee was expensive and connection from parking to hotel was tricky.
Manager Response: Dear Laura R,  The Orange County Fair is happening right now and we are a stone throw away from the fair grounds and I wish you could have stayed to enjoy the entertainment. We are thankful that you had a fabulous stay and that everything was convenient and comfortable. Thank you for your feedback regarding the parking and today I have scheduled to walk the parking area to make note where we need further signage. Hope to see you back real soon.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: A clean and moderately sized room made us feel relaxed. Hilton's comfortable and clean beds are always pleasant. Our 3rd floor room faced to swimming pool and Mitsuwa market (Big Japanese supermarket and restaurants). Window was un-openable, like high rise office building. Clean decent bathroom. Water pressure was weak in the Toilet, maybe it could be old? And water pressure was weak in the Shower, too. There was no adjoining door to next room. There was a annoying continuous motor machine sound we heard all the time. We thought it could be from AC system. Our room was not quiet. There was no AC vent in the bathroom, so heat from the bathroom kept rest of the room very warm.  Despite setting the AC temperature as low as possible and full fan, it remained almost feeling like 77F.
Manager Response: Dear StarShine80,  Your comfort is our concern and we apologize for the inconvenience you experienced with your a/c system. Our maintenance crew do a great job of repairing such issues and I will follow up to ensure all rooms have a/c in working condition. Our Bristol Brew is open 5:30 am till 10 pm daily and serves Starbucks's coffee with fresh baked danish, pastries and cookies or for the healthy choice oatmeal, fruit and yogurt parfaits. We look forward to assisting you throughout your next stay with any concerns, questions or requests.  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Off the beaten path and a very nice classy clean hotel
Summary: Orange County Hilton is extremely clean with very prompt service.  Rooms are open and sunny nice decor I might add.  Entrance is roomy and beautiful.  Self park is available as well as valet for $$$.  Restaurant is good although we've only tried the salads with goat cheese and broiled chicken.  On the holidays and some of the weekends be prepared to have a lots of young kids for a gathering.  They have big convention rooms and plenty of wait staff the clean after them.  Overall I like the hotel despite lots of kids but that adds to our liking.
Manager Response: Dear Truthsquad1001,  Summer has truly begun as families and college students decent to the Orange County Fair and the beaches in our area. We invite you to Fun in the Sun days and if you have an extra day South Coast Plaza is close by and  remember we do offer complimentary shuttle just in case you have a lot to carry;  this certainly will make your stay convenient and enjoyable. Thank you Truthsquad1001 for your review and we are happy to see you enjoyed your stay.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Everything was fine except for the leaky shower and paid parking that wasn't mention during reservation. The service was exceptional. The room keepers were doing a great job at cleaning and replacing the items in the bathroom. Overall, it was a good experience.
Manager Response: Dear Run C,  We are all delighted to see you had great service from everyone and especially our housekeeping staff who kept the room clean and restocked in a timely manner. I am sorry about the leaky shower and we did repair shower right away once we heard about the problem. Our hotel is close to Disneyland,  Anaheim GardenWalk and Knott's Berry Farm for that family stay-cation and to relax at the beach the following day would make the weekend stay perfect.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: A good room is always a plus; however, excellent service from staff goes even further.  I left my glasses in the car (valet parking), the bellhop made 3 trips to get the right glasses for me.  No complaints from him: just a nice smile.  I appreciate nice people especially when there seems to be shortage of nice ones lately.
Manager Response: Dear xtremern,  We strive to share a great experience and service and are always appreciative when our guests share their great experience in their reviews. We wish you a safe 4th of July weekend. Newport Beach has the boat parade and fireworks for the 4th,  Dana Point , Doheny Beach is also a great area to enjoy the fireworks and beaches with family and friends. The parking and traffic will be busy so come early.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Very nice.  Clean.  Quiet.  Everything worked.  Spacious. Refrigerator in the room which was nice but no microwave.  Easily accessible.  Staff were friendly/nice/available.  Conference rooms were well equipped and food service was great.  Very comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Scott H.   Wonderful to hear you had a 5 STAR stay with us and the food was wonderful. We strive to share a great experience with all our guests and always love hearing the great service our staff provides.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Room, conference facilities and staff all excellent. Transport to and from airport also excellent. Hotel is well positioned with good amenities and restaurants nearby. Bath a little old but that's a minor detail. I just like baths... :)
Manager Response: Dear Cf Q,  The location is perfect for any travelers wanting to enjoy Disneyland, Knott's Berry Farm, Blue Whale watching or enjoying a great day at Balboa peninsula. For the business travelers that may have forgotten their suit or cocktail dress our bell staff will be delighted to take you to South Coast Plaza with the scheduled shuttle and pick you up in time for the Gala Dinner.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I attended a conference.  They said they did not have a room left at the conference rate.  However, they had no problem getting me a room at a MUCH higher rate!! Asking for the very same room to be priced at the conference rate was met with the finality of "Sorry, we can't do that."  Incredible!!
Manager Response: Dear Ari L.  The special rates as in any other industry are within specific dates available and I apologize if your group contact or our staff did not explain this properly. I do see that our agent was able to offer the lowest rate available at the time and they gave you a great room.  We do hope you were able to enjoy some of the area attractions or beaches and that your stay was not all business and meetings.  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: While the hotel appearance is a little dated, the layout and ammenties are superb. The gym facilites are top notch, the business center is handy and the bar/restaurant serve some outstanding drinks and food. Everything we ate there was fantastic! I was on a business trip with my family and they enjoyed the stay too.
Manager Response: Dear SBpicky,  The staff and I are delighted to see you had a great conference and stay with our hotel. Our Bristol Palms Lounge offers flatbreads,  sandwiches, wraps and burgers on their menu. Watching the sports events on the big screen t.v. makes this a great destination for an early evening or afternoon lunch with friends and co workers. I personally like to thank you for the compliment and as most of us know it takes a great staff to work with to make the hotel an enjoyable and comfortable place to stay.  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Stayed at this hotel for a conference, I wasn't expecting much even with a top floor room.  Boy was I wrong.  The rooms are a good size, the bathrooms have great showers, everything appeared to be in excellent condition, nice balconies, and the housekeeping staff did an excellent job.  The conference rooms were outstanding, the food was better than average, the bar was terrific and the grounds and lobby are well maintained.  And of course it's very convenient to good restaurants and shopping down the street.  There is a woman at the hotel, Yolanda Hatzopoulous, the Guest Service Manager, who seems to run around taking care of everyone nearly twenty-four hours a day, I couldn't really determine when she wasn't working, what a big plus for Hilton!  Now if they could just fix two
Manager Response: Dear Barbara B.  Our staff strives to accommodate all requests to make our guests stay comfortable, relaxing and memorable and of course any special requests we most certainly will do our best to make your stay the best.   Regards,  Yolanda h. Guest Service Manager

Summary: This is a very nice full service hotel, however it is also a Crew Hotel for Airline Employees, and if you plan to check in early, it may not happen.  As with other Hilton Hotels, if you like HBO, they don't have it.
Manager Response: Dear Barbara B.  Our staff strives to accommodate all requests to make our guests stay comfortable, relaxing and memorable and of course any special requests we most certainly will do our best to make your stay the best.   Regards,  Yolanda h. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I stayed here for one night on a recent business trip and left with a cluster of red bug bites on my arm with several more bites on my forearm and neck. At checkout I was told a manager would contact me, but nothing 2 days later. I guess Hilton thought comping my parking was enough to make this right.
Manager Response: Dear mls724,  Please accept our sincere apologies and I realize how you must feel thinking that no one contacted you... please check your email as I did contact you right away when we received the outside company report that there was no pest activity in the room or bed.   I am sorry you did not have a great stay and I am concerned that you did not see my email. I hope that any future stay the staff and I would be able to assist you sharing a productive, relaxing and memorable stay.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I have stayed in hotels around the world. My favorite hotel is the Hilton (Orange County/Costa Mesa). It is really the people that work there that make it my favorite place to stay, they treat me like family. Two of their employees Trevor Meek and Michelle Spalding are my favorites, they really understand Customer Service. I would highly recommend this hotel if you are in the Orange County area.
Manager Response: Dear Dean B.  Thank you so much for mentioning our staff and how you feel at home because of the staff. We strive to make all guests feel comfortable like home and assist our guests with quality service. It is important to us to share an enjoyable, comfortable and memorable stay. Along with the great staff our location is superb as it is close to the beach, John Wayne Airport , Disneyland, The Honda Center, Angels Stadium. restaurants and shopping.  Sincerely, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I thought this was one of the better all around quality hotels that i have stayed at. The room was very nice and clean,  it was very nicely furnished for the business traveler. Beds were very comfortable, climate control was very easy for room. Very nice lobby and conference rooms
Manager Response: Dear Steven P. ,  The staff and I are happy to hear you had a 4 STAR stay with us and that you loved your accommodations. Our hotel is a great place for not only the business travelers but also for families. Pretend City Children's Museum and Discover Museum are both a great way for families to learn and have fun together and then to come back to the hotel to relax by our gorgeous pool.  Hope to see you again real soon,  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Very close to everything. Great customer service and wonderful rooms..great size room, very clean and extremely comfy beds. Close to shopping and restaurants. Value is unbeatable. I have stayed at Hiltons and have always been pleased.
Manager Response: Dear 853darlenet,  The Hilton Costa Mesa is an excellent location for travelers that want to go to Disneyland, Knott's Berry Farm and City Walk for some family enjoyment for the day and then have some beach fun at Newport or Huntington Beach. the next day. What a great stay cation ! We hope you were able to enjoy some of our local attractions during your stay. Thank you for your review.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Great place to stay, great staff and very nice rooms. Perfect location , near UCI, some great shops , beach, and plenty of fun. The food was great too. We will come back for sure. Try it and enjoy , enjoy, enjoy!!!
Manager Response: Dear GlenC512,   Our hotel location is perfect for guests that are looking for great shopping at either Fashion Island which is a beautiful drive or South Coast Plaza a few minutes away. We are near  UCI,  Newport and Huntington beaches and Balboa Island. Guests can take a boat ride to see the whales, enjoy a day at Catalina Island or there is plenty of waters sports for all to enjoy.  We are delighted to see you will come back for a visit and enjoy some of the area attractions and uniqueness.   Sincerely,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Best Service at a Hotel Ever
Summary: Charles Noh, Miguel, Chris, Jerry, and everyone in the morning staff (both at the lobby front desk and the breakfast Aura restaurant) are amazing!  They do service with a smile, they try to bend backwards to accommodate your every desire, want and need.  I have been staying at this hotel since February of this year and I've been pleasantly surprised each and every time by the level of personalized service and care that Charles, Miguel, Jerry and just everyone who works at this specific Hilton stand for.  Finally, I will comment that even though the lobby has been remodeled the rooms are still a little aged but that doesn't take away from the wonderful team that make up for any less than perfect physical state of the hotel guest rooms.  Thank you all so much for significantly
Manager Response: Dear Ditt2011,  We are happy to see that each and every time our staff shares a great experience and service with you. We are located close to Newport Beach and Balboa Island and also close to South Coast Plaza with many options of casual and fine dining and shopping galore. Our Bell staff and Guest Service Managers are always delighted to offer some suggestions on where to dine.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: It was very nice surprise. My friend and I visit Orange county once a year from Arizona, but we'd never stayed this Hilton before. Although many people were checking in when we arrived at the hotel, check in process was very smooth and pleasant. Our room was very clean and comfortable. The hotel was located near highways and convenient. We would like to come back and stay this Hilton again.
Manager Response: Dear Rie M,  I love nice surprises and always love to hear when guests experience a nice surprise. The staff and I hope you will have the opportunity to have more than an annual visit to our hotel. Our location is perfect for anyone that wants to venjoy and perfromance at the  Segerstrom Arts Center. If you want romance I woudl suggest the Hornblower Dinner Cruise on the Newport Beach Harbor. If you are coming this weekend we have the 6th annual Fish Dry and Carnival at Fairview Park . There is so much to do in Costa Mesa and certainly having the John Wayne Airport so close to our hotel makes it convenient to come and enjoy a stay-cation.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Plumbing was being worked on the last of a 4 night stay.  I was supposed to be off from 12:00 am to 4:00 am.  I had to catch an early flight and had to shower and shave with cold water at 5:00 am.  This was reported to the desk clerk both over the phone and at check out but the desk clerk said he did not know anything about it.  I left with a very negative feeling about this hotel.  Up until then, the stay had been very satisfactory.
Manager Response: Dear randy D.  I do apologize for the inconvenience you experienced with the emergency plumbing repairs. Unfortunately we tried to quote the proper time and as sometimes happens to resolve the issue became a longer time.   I am delighted to hear that most of your stay was great and you had a a great  stay in general. We had some beautiful warm days and I do hope you were able to enjoy our beautiful outdoor pool or Jacuzzi to relax after a hard day of meetings.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Large rooms and hallways. Beats the newer hotels
Summary: Stayed here again for a week. This hotel caters to conferences and does a great job of putting them on. You can't feel claustrophobic in this place as areas and hallways are wide open.  As it is 5 minutes from the John Wayne Airport it is used by many airlines including Emirate. You'll see the beautiful air hostesses in full uniform at various times throughout the day.  Nice bar atmosphere and food is very good.  Staff very helpful and a short walk to South Coast Plaza and adjacent shops.
Manager Response: Dear alsupremo,  The banquet staff is happy to hear that each and every event you have attended has been wonderful service and food. The hotel offers a complimentary shuttle to the South Coast Plaza or on a nice day it is only a 10-15 minute walk. Along with the John Wayne Airport being so close we also have some great restaurants and the Segerstrom Arts Center to enjoy.   Best regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The overall experience was very good.  I gift shop would have been nice. An additional place to eat in the hotel would have been great.  Check in was lengthy and probably should of asked for a better room.
Manager Response: Dear Ralph V.  We are delighted your overall stay went well. Our hotel offers Starbucks, Bristol Palms Restaurant, Bristol Palms Lounge & Bar and the Pizzeria along with the In Room Dining and the Corner Pantry as options for breakfast, lunch or dinner. We offer complimentary shuttles to South Coast Plaza to accommodate all guests with other options off property. South Coast Plaza and the surrounding area has some awesome restaurants; such as Antonello, Scott's Seafood, Morton"s, The Capital Grill, Charlie Palmer's, Darya Persian Cuisine, Season 52, Marche' Moderne.  Our bell staff are delighted to assist with any and all reservations.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The hotel is five min. from the airport. When leaving the airport go north on 405.  The other direction is a nice ride to the beaches and university.  The hotel is very nice for meetings.  Short walk to restaurants and the mall. Pillows are the best not just one or two lots of them.
Manager Response: Dear fnm,  Our hotel also offers a complimentary shuttle from the John Wayne Airport. I am happy to see you were able to enjoy the shopping and restaurants in our area as well. The scheduled complimentary shuttle from our hotel to the South Coast Plaza is also a great convenience. The bedding is all new and comfortable to our guests delight.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: stayed for the oc marathon which they offered a complementary shuttle, and reduced parking rate my only complaint was that the ac was not working and the room was a little warm so maybe try and make sure you're in a room where the window opens to let some fresh air in
Manager Response: Dear Keith F.   I apologize for the A/C not working properly please next time contact our front desk so an engineer can come to repair as needed. I hope you were able to have some time to go to Newport Beach or check out the great shopping options at South Coast Plaza or Fashion Island or maybe go to the Segerstrom Art Center. Our hotel is close to all of these options and we offer a complimentary shuttle to South Coast Plaza. We hope to see you next year.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Loved this location for a quick get away and OC Marathon accomidation. Ice machine was full, shower was hot bed was nice and pillows perfect :-) I think I will be back using this hotel for the OC Marathon next year
Manager Response: Dear Mike C.  We are a great location for the OC Marathon and always appreciate all the great comments we receive from all the attendees. I hope you also were able to enjoy some great pizzas and flat-breads or in our Bristol Palms Lounge and Bar. The Fig and Prosciutto flatbread is my favorite. We look forward to having you stay with us next year.   All the best,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: First appearance was very nice, but when we checked into our room the toilet was dirty! We had prompt attention but then wondered about the overall cleanliness of the entire room. Won't stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Janets630,  I am so sorry you had a negative experience. The staff and I strive to share a clean, crisp and comfortable room and to have a great first impression with a great lasting impression as well for all our guests.  I would ask for another opportunity to share with you a great experience and to enjoy the great location, fitness center, pool and tech lounge along with the great service our staff is known for.  Best regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Had a few minor issues, nothing that would stop me from staying here again. I appreciate the shuttle that not only took us to the airport, but made frequent stops at the mall for all guests. I also appreciated the on had assistance with the rental car service.
Manager Response: Dear Lynn,  It is our pleasure to offer complimentary SNA /Airport shuttles and our bell staff is delighted to offer a complimentary shuttle to the South Coast Plaza for great shopping and dining. Check our website for special package rates for honeymooners, anniversary celebrations and celebrating togetherness as a family.Thank ou for your 4 STAR review and we hope to see you soon.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel in the gorgeous part of California
Summary: Stayed here for 7 nights as part of a conference group and cannot fault the Hilton on any level.  The staff are courteous and helpful. My room was extremely well-appointed with an amazingly comfortable bed, huge LCD television, fast internet, amazing desk and a big balcony. The breakfast buffet was great. My only small criticism is that my room faced the main road and the balcony door did not screen out the traffic noise as well as some other hotels I've stayed in.
Manager Response: Dear Darren W.  The staff and I are happy to see you had a comfortable bed, great service and a most wonderful stay. May I suggest that next time you are making a reservation to place notes in your reservation requesting a quiet room. Our hotel strives to accommodate our guests with their special requests and we would certainly be delighted to assist you with that as well next time.  Thank you,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Hotel is noce, food lees then desirable. The location was very nice and easy to get to. The internet service should be provided for all guests and should not have to pay additional parking fees when you are a guest.
Manager Response: Dear Kelli S.  The parking fees you will find with most of the Orange County and Los Angeles County areas that have parking structures.  Our Bristol Palms Pizza Bar area offers a great view of the chef making the pizzas and you are able to comfortably enjoy friends or business colleagues in the Bristol Palms Lounge area too. I am delighted to see you had a great experience. We hope to see you again real soon.  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Hilton usually does a lot better
Summary: Most uncomfortable 3 nights sleep in ages!  Need to upgrade mattresses. Inconvenient and expensive self-parking. Stayed on points/cash, so got a good deal.   Great free (hot) breakfast for HH Diamond members, though very crowded.
Manager Response: Mr. Richard F F,   I am sorry to hear you did not sleep very well and please know that we strive for all our guests to have a comfortable and enjoyable stay. Thank you for sharing with us your experience, we value your feedback as a Diamond member and I am delighted to see you enjoyed our Executive Lounge breakfast and the Hilton Honors benefits.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The beds at this location are amazing !!! The room was very clean & room service was great . I would def recommend staying here :) Location is close to the freeway & many restaurants & service at the hotel was phenomenal
Manager Response: Dear Karen O.  We are happy to see that your room was beautiful and comfortable. It is always nice to read one of our guests had the best sleep ever. Our hotel is centrally located to shopping, theater, beaches, and restaurants. We offer a complimentary shuttle to and from South Coast Plaza as ell as the John Wayne Airport.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: My visit over all was very pleasant, I was very pleased with the room and the amenities. I was traveling for two days and very happy once I arrived at Hilton Costa Mesa to spend the weekend and dinner with friends......Unexplained noises from the floor above made sleeping in the comfy bed impossible
Manager Response: Dear Gloria K.  Our hotel is close enough to Disneyland and yet also a central location for the beaches. And if you are visiting  sunny California the beaches are a must to see and enjoy. They offer surf lessons, kayaks, motor boat rentals, cruiser bicycles and see-do's at various beach locations for the family to enjoy.  Thank you for your 5 STAR review and we are delighted to hear your stay was comfortable.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: We stayed here for our recent trip to Disneyland and it was a great hotel overall. The lobby was incredibly beautiful, kudos to the people who keep it looking sharp. All of the bell people were very helpful, and all of the facilities offered at the hotel were exceptional. The room was amazing, very spacious and very clean and the beds very comfortable. The biggest issue we ran into was trouble in the parking garage. It's very hard to find parking late at night. Other than that, it was a wonderful stay and I would definitely go back!!
Manager Response: Dear Gloria K.  Our hotel is close enough to Disneyland and yet also a central location for the beaches. And if you are visiting  sunny California the beaches are a must to see and enjoy. They offer surf lessons, kayaks, motor boat rentals, cruiser bicycles and see-do's at various beach locations for the family to enjoy.  Thank you for your 5 STAR review and we are delighted to hear your stay was comfortable.   Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Ugliness of the surrounding city notwithstanding, the Hilton Costa Mesa is a perfectly fine hotel with one glaring exception: its wireless internet is terrible. The restaurant is good, rooms are clean, and service is great.
Manager Response: Dear Bethany J.  Thank you for your review and I am delighted to read you had a perfectly great stay. The hotel is close to John Wayne Airport, the beaches, shopping plaza and experiences, Southern California attractions and is a perfect locations for all travelers.   Regards,  Yolanda H.  Guest Service Manager

Summary: Having stayed here before some time ago, we were not prepared for the "new look" and fine renovations that we saw.  According to "rumor", this was the first Hilton to be set up with their new look to be carried on throughout the chain.  The lobby was uncluttered and open.  The Tech Center with computer access for both PC and Apple users.  The restaurant was also an open atmosphere and the breakfast buffet was good, with eggs, bacon, sausage, potatoes, oatmeal, fruit and breads.  The room was modern and fresh with a very comfortable mattress.  Staff was most courteous at all levels.  If you use Hiltons or an equivalent, give it a try.  You should be very happy you did.
Manager Response: Dear Skip M.,  Thank you for returning to the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa and for noticing how we have kept our property modern, comfortable and up to date. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your breakfast  at the Bristol Palms restaurant and that our staff was courteous. We hope you will have the opportunity to return again real soon and  hope you can enjoy our beautiful pool or fitness center the next time.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: The Hilton in Costa Mesa is Excellent
Summary: The finest hotel I have stayed at for a conference in 20 years. Looks , food, helpfulness, rooms and conference accommodations. Altho I'm not a smoker, all the rooms are smoke free, but they have a great smoking area outside the hotel that is easy to get to. Being an animal lover, I even saw a dog on a leash in the entry area. Loved my 4 day stay.
Manager Response: Dear Joy C.,  Thank you for the great review and we are delighted to hear this was one of the best stays in 20 years of staying in hotels. The staff and I strive to exceed in service and anticipate our guests needs. Our hotel is pet friendly we offer doggy biscuits at the Front Desk and have a "doggy potti" for the convenience for our guests and keeping mind to keep the area clean for all our guests.   Thank you and we look forward to your return,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Recently renovated, very clean and easily navigated. Meeting room for the three-day conference (about 100 attendees) was well-appointed and comfortable. Restaurant was reasonably priced and food was very good. Wine prices are a little high.
Manager Response: Dear aileneb2014,  Thank you for your wonderful review regarding your stay at the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa. The staff strives to exceed all our guests expectations and are delighted to read that the staff was exceedingly helpful and beyond your expectations.  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest service Manager

Summary: Our retiree association held a conference at the Hilton Hotel in Costa Mesa, California.  The service, staff and amenities at the hotel were excellent.  The conference manager was able to assist us with making this one of the most successful conferences in the past 20 years.
Manager Response: Dear aileneb2014,  Thank you for your wonderful review regarding your stay at the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa. The staff strives to exceed all our guests expectations and are delighted to read that the staff was exceedingly helpful and beyond your expectations.  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest service Manager

Summary: Room was very clean, bed was extremely comfortable, amenities were appropriate, hotel staff was accomodating, pleasant, and extremely professional.  I'd stay here again in a heartbeat.  The hotel was easy to get to as well.  While I was only there less than 24 hours, I still enjoyed my stay. The food offered during the event I attended was delicious and the staff serving were so attentive and respectful.
Manager Response: Dear 486Annm,  Thank you for your 5 STAR review. I am delighted to see that everything from your room, food, comfort and service was wonderful. The staff and I are happy to hear you will definitely be back for another visit.   Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: My stay at the Hotel was very pleasant, the staff were very helpful and very kind. The Restaurant and Bar was awesome, although more menu options would be better.  Airport Transfer was very convenient and on time.  Only issue was that the Wi Fi was having technical issues while I was there.  I will definitely use this hotel next time I am in OC and I will recommend to any friends that are travelling to the OC.
Manager Response: Dear Daniel M.,  I am happy to hear that our staff were very helpful and very kind and the Restaurant and Bar was awesome. Our airport shuttle is complimentary to all our guests and is a great amenity.  Thank you for recommending the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa to all your friends.    Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: I was surprised when my credit card came...
Summary: We stayed from the 22nd of March until the 31th. I've  payed everything in cash.  Yesterday I received my credit card bill and there is 12,98 dollars in charge! I live in Brazil,I have the receipts clearly showing everything was payed. Now I'll send them by fax the receipt and I hope they'll get everything OK. It was a bad surprise! We enjoyed the time we were there, everything was so fine... what is correct is correct no matter if it is one dollar or a hundred dollars!!!  My name is Lisabete Gardenal Epiphanio
Manager Response: Dear  Lisabete Gardenal Epiphanio,  I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that the service you received was great.  We hope you will have another chance to visit us from Brazil again real soon.  The staff and I strive to make our guests stay comfortable, convenient and exceeding you expectations.  Thank you for your review.  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Title says it all. I liked everything about this hotel except the wireless Internet service. Food was great, facilities well kept, clean, staff friendly and generally helpful. But, the Internet service was weak and spotty when it worked. My only reliable service was in the office area near the front desk.
Manager Response: Dear Michael B.   Our Tech Lounge is certainly a great option to use at any time of day or night for all your emailing, printing and on line transactions. The 2 TV's in the lounge allow you to relax in between as well. Please know that the provider has corrected the issue you encountered. Thank you for you wonderful comments regarding our service and we hope you will have the opportunity to visit again real soon.  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great Hilton quality but with a couple of concerns
Summary: It's a Hilton so as always; you can expect clean, comfortable accommodations that are more than adequate. The only reason I'm giving just 3 stars is because although it is a very nice hotel, the cons outweigh the pros (at least for me) so if you need a place to stay in the area, there may be better options.  The biggest issue I had was with parking. It is not reasonable to charge paid hotel guests $23 per day for self-parking. I've been to many nicer hotels that offer free parking and in general it's rare for a hotel to charge guests to park. I understand that this is California which has a high cost of living and the big parking structure needs to be paid for but if you want my business, you'll let me park for free or only charge me a couple of bucks. $23 a day for paid guests
Manager Response: Dear AdTravelR,  Thank you for your review. I am delighted to see your room was great and your service was exceeding your expectations. I would encourage you to check our website with several options for room packages where several items such as parking would be included in the room rate.   Thank you for your patronage.  Best regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Checking in was fast and easy, but my room was not ready. They took my phone number and called me when it was ready. My room was very nice, clean, and comfortable. Nice location but you probably need the shuttle, rental car, or taxi to visit the local attractions. This is a very large hotel mostly served by two elevator bays (8) elevators, sometimes making it difficult to catch an open elevator.  Get up early and prepare to wait ~ 30min if you like Starbucks, the line was long.
Manager Response: Dear Georgias944,  Thank you for your review and I am delighted to see that you enjoyed your stay with us at the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa. Yes, everyone loves their Starbucks' in the morning and then late afternoon. Our hotel does offer a free shuttle to and from the South Coast Plaza and to and from John Wayne Airport. For a car rental Enterprise does deliver the car to the hotel for your convenience. Some local attractions and fun areas to visit are Disneyland, Knott's Berry Farm, Newport & Balboa Island, Universal Studios, Hollywood and Los Angeles to name a few. We hope you and your family will return to enjoy some of these local areas again.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: My stay was perfect for what I expect on a business trip.  Quick, clean, easy.  And when I needed help with a rental from the hotel I was not prepared for and the Concierge was wonderful getting me what I needed.
Manager Response: Dear John C.  Good morning and thank you for your review. The Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa staff strives to share a great experience with our all our guests. Thank you for noting our great service from our concierge and bell staff; they certainly try to exceed our guests expectations. Thank you for staying with us and look forward to the next time.  Sincerely,  Yolanda H.  Guest Service Manager

Summary: This hotel and the superb staff get it--they know how to deliver on sleeping rooms, conference food/beverage and meeting rooms.  Accommodating hotel staff are rare finds and cooperating and cordial hotel staff know how to execute successful conferences!
Manager Response: Dear Yanira M.  We are delighted to see that our staff was able to assist and accommodate throughout your conference. Our hotel is certainly a great option for all events, weddings and meetings and our catering and sales staff do an awesome job.
