I would encourage everyone to set up a site visit and see our location, the convenience, the shuttle offered from/to SNA, shopping options, our on site Bristol Palms Restaurant, Bar and Pizza bar and the Tech Lounge.  Sincerely, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The Costa Mesa Hilton has a very professional staff.  Moreover, I appreciate how I was valued as a customer.  This customer appreciation was demonstrated as I was reimbursed for a reservation discrepancy.  Last, the facility itself is well modeled to reflect luxury and up-to-date decor.  Very clean facility as a whole too!
Manager Response: Dear Julio V.  The staff is delighted to see that the service they provided is what we strive for "exceeding your expectations".  We value our guests and always are happy to see our guests value our service. One of my favorite areas of the hotel is the Lobby; which offers along with the usual bell desk and front desk a beautiful and up to date Tech Lounge/Business Center, Starbucks and the Corner Pantry store for sundries, snacks, drinks, salads and sandwiches throughout your stay. Thank you for your review and we hope to see you again soon.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I decide to stay in this hotel as i had to be for a tradeshow in the Anaheim Convention Center (is 20 min from the hotel) but is whorted. The hotel is perfect for a business traveler, if you are gold, you have breakfast and snacks at evening in the hh business lounge. Great customer service
Manager Response: Dear Henry P.  I am delighted to see that our hotel met your needs as a business traveler. Our location is perfect for business travelers whom have an event at the Anaheim Convention Center (is 20 min from the hotel) . As a Hilton Honors guest the Executive Lounge offers a fantastic breakfast, in the evening appetizers and throughout the day and evening waters, sodas, juices and snacks. We strive to share a great guest experience and we thank you for noting the service.   Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Not worthy for the price paid
Summary: For the price paid this hotel did not live upto my expectations. The rooms had some kind of smell which was quite irritating. The conference rooms has many spots  were paint was came out. During presentations the hotel staff were moving trolleys which was quite annoying.
Manager Response: Dear Dinesh P.   The conference rooms at the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa just have gone through a refresh and they are ready for all events, weddings and functions. I will most certainly give the information to our engineering staff to check what you might have seen. Our carts have been sprayed with WD40 and all is good to go. Thank you for your observations and for giving us the opportunity to make it better.  Best regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: This Hilton property is one of the best taken care of that I have ever stayed in. Every person I encountered from the check in clerk to the lounge attendants to the security guards were very friendly and attentive.   Yesterday morning when I went to have breakfast at the executive lounge the lady was already putting away the food but she was kind enough to wait for me to serve my plate before continuing to put away the rest of the food.  I also want to thank Trevor for emailing me the day before my arrival to make himself available in case I needed anything during my stay.
Manager Response: Dear gelizon,  Thank you for the great comments regarding the Executive Lounge staff . Trevor, Guest Service Manager, is delighted to have been of assistance. The staff and I are happy to hear that you had a great stay and that all the staff exceeded your expectations. Thank you for staying with us at the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa.  Best regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The hotel was nice and the room was very clean. Bed was extremely comfortable. The room had everything I needed for a business trip. The hotel staff were very courteous and respectful. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear irl29,  Thank you for sharing your great experience with us.  The Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa is a great choice for business trips and I am happy to see that the room was accommodating your business needs. Thank you for your patronage and for the great comments regarding our staff. The hotel staff and I  would definitely love to have you here again .  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Stayed at this hotel for 3 night during a recent business trip.  Pillows were great and the room is very comfortable and clean.  I had to stay at the Anaheim Hilton on the 4th night and this was a much nicer room for the money.
Manager Response: Dear Richard C.  I am delighted to hear that you had a comfortable stay with us at the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa. Our housekeeping standards are remarkable and I am always delighted to see when guest notice the cleanliness of our hotel. Thank you for your review and sharing your experience with us.  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Good value for money, friendly helping staff, good quality food and beverages, fantastic comfortable room with excellent amenities also good parking facilities an excellent location close to Freeways and quality shopping. definitely worth booking again.
Manager Response: Dear A.M.M.Ton S.  Thank you for the review. It is always wonderful to hear from our guest visiting from Singapore. I am delighted to hear that you had a quality stay at the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa. The 55 and the 405 freeways are close to our hotel and to the John Wayne Airport so all guests can enjoy going to all the great attractions such as Universal Studios, Disneyland , Knott's Berry Farm or shopping at South Coast Plaza. And on a beautiful day enjoy a stroll on Newport Beach just to unwind and enjoy the California sun. Thank you for your great comments.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Our recent stay was for business. It is very easy to find with multiple freeway access. Inside parking structure allows bad weather conditions. The hotel staff are accommodating to guests needs. The room was very clean and quite. Hotel offers an inside restaurant and Starbucks coffee bar. Hilton maintains it's high quality at this facility.
Manager Response: Dear Richard H.  Thank you for the great comments about our high standards and for noting the great staff we have that is always ready to assist.  The 55 and 405 freeways are a great easy access from and to our hotel. The underground parking is great for all weather conditions and we also offer valet services. Our hotel restaurant and bar currently offers Happy Hour, 4 pm till 7 pm;  $5 Heffeweizen Draft Beer and House Wines $6.  Looking forward to your next stay.  Best regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: beautiful hotel, for business meetings plenty of space but understaffed to handle the small things and especially bell service to unload business meeting materials and luggage, had to do it ourselves.
Manager Response: Dear Dean D.  Thank you for the comments about our beautiful Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa hotel and the plentiful meeting spaces that we have to provide. I apologize that our bellman were assisting other guests at the time of your arrival. Thank you once again and we hope to see you in the near future.  Best regards,  Yolanda H Guest Service Manager

Summary: I had the pleasure of staying at the Hilton for a conference.  It was a seamless stay from start to finish and every associate I came in contact appeared delighted that we were there.  Awesome service from all.
Manager Response: Dear Bob M.   The consistent great service you wrote about is what we strive for and it is always rewarding to read a great review about our service and our staff. We are delighted to see that your conference went well and that you love our Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa hotel. Thank you and we hope you will have the opportunity to visit us again real soon.  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: From start to end it was great.  Food and service were great.  New renovations are very nice.  Had a conference and it was managed perfectly.  I highly recommend for a leisure or business stay, you can't go wrong.  The staff is always present and eagerly takes care of any request that you have.  I really appreciated their bright smiles and "can do" attitudes.
Manager Response: Dear Lance M.  Thank you for sharing about your conference experience and how well it was managed. The Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa has so many options for leisure or a business stay. The staff  thank you for noticing their"can do" attitudes and for trying their best each and every day .

Summary: Clean, comfortable, stylish.  The food was great!  The room was very clean and I was able to accomplish all of my goals.  I felt like I was on a vacation even though I was there on business.  The team did a great job of going above and beyond every step of the way.
Manager Response: Dear Bill C.  Thank you for the raving review about our staff, location and our overall service at the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa.We thank you for letting us know how awesome your stay was and look forward to any future return stays with us.  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: WOW...not the same Hilton as before
Summary: WOW...can be used to describe the incredible transformation of the Hilton Costa Mesa.   I was so happy to see the newly refreshed look, but also the felt the hotel service was as equal.   The hotel added new features which I noticed right away (high tech lounge and a corner pantry). Both made my day.  My room was very nicely decorated and the bed was amazing.   I had meetings at the hotel and noticed they made upgrades to this as well.
Manager Response: Dear Brad D.  Thank you for noticing all the refreshed areas of our hotel. The Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa does have some great meeting space for conferences and weddings and yes they were also refreshed. Thank you for noticing the Tech Lounge and the Corner Pantry too. I am delighted to see that you had a great conference and that you had a comfortable stay. The staff and I hope to have you visit again real soon.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Service is second to none.  Every employee I came into contact with was friendly and accomodating.  They went out of their way to make sure I was satisfied.  The hotel lobby and sleeping rooms are beautiful.  The food was excellent and the location is great.  Close to a large mall and the airport.  I will definately stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Kevin T.,  Thank you for the WOW'ing review. Our staff always strives for going above and beyond for group conferences, business travelers and vacationing families or couples. We are happy to see you had a great experience at the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: From the moment I arrive I felt like I was home. I was greeted as I arrived by name. WOW! The Hotel looked great. My guestroom was very large. The staff was fantastic I was greeted at every turn from the front desk, House Keeping, and Restaurant staff. They made it easy to be away from home. Thank you you for a wonderful visit.
Manager Response: Dear Blake D.  Thank you for the great staff comment. Our catering and banquet staff are delighted that your food  was excellent at your meetings and that all was superb. The hotel refresh of the Tech Lounge/Business Center and the Corner Pantry certainly is a great improvement for all guests to enjoy and make use of.  Thank you for recommending our hotel for all travelers.  Sincerely, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Hotel is exceptionally clean and the staff is amazing. Great job and keep up the great work! Food and Beverage was excellent and our meetings were superb. Hotel renovation turned out amazing as well. I highly recommend this hotel to any traveler.
Manager Response: Dear Blake D.  Thank you for the great staff comment. Our catering and banquet staff are delighted that your food  was excellent at your meetings and that all was superb. The hotel refresh of the Tech Lounge/Business Center and the Corner Pantry certainly is a great improvement for all guests to enjoy and make use of.  Thank you for recommending our hotel for all travelers.  Sincerely, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Great hotel with friendly staff. Enjoyed the spacious business center and pantry with great variety of food and beverage products. First class meeting facility. Definitely will be back on my next trip to Costa Mesa
Manager Response: Dear Hans R,  Thank you for noticing our friendly staff, the spacious business center and pantry with great variety of food and beverage products. I am delighted that you called us a First Class meeting facility. Definitely we are happy to see you upon a return visit.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Always a great place for a conference. Buffet food is not my favorite but it was plentiful and surprisingly creative . I ve never seen sushi served buffet style. Nice layout good location friendly staff and clean rooms. The bar area is nice plenty of comfortable places to sit and visit and again, wait staff terrific. I come here once a year and am never disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear Loomin8,  The Breakfast Buffet at the Bristol Palms is always fantastic with many choices.  I am delighted to see that you had a great conference. Our central location to the beaches, John Wayne Airport,  Disneyland and South Coast Plaza make our hotel a great choice for families and business travelers alike. The staff and I would like to thank you for your patronage and look forward to your annual trip to Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa.   Best regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Great hotel & great value. I was disappointed that the elevator wasn't working for my 4 day stay. Hotel was clean, restaurant was average. Location was nice, just minutes away from the airport. Staff was very friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Jason L.  We are delighted to hear that you had a great stay and that all was enjoyable. The location is wonderful for any of our traveling guests. The John Wayne Airport is close by and we do offer complimentary shuttles. I hope in your future stays you will be able to enjoy the beaches and Balboa Island area too.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: When I was in OC for the night, I stayed here. I found the hotel clean, pleasantly located & They gave me a very large suite.  The bed was very comfortable & I slept very well as I found the hotel floor to be very quiet. Anytime I am out in OC for the night I will definetly stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear JGrammatic,  Thank you for your review and the staff and I are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa. We strive to share a great , comfortable experience for all our guests.  We thank you for your patronage and look forward to your next great expereince at our hotel.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: some rooms have half window looking at the foyer and don't open,some other face the car park and only have half size window.If you are planning or having a rest there forget it as they have no consideration of guest resting .you will have noise from maintenance above your room.Don't rely on front desk staff to help you as they sound like pre recorded robots ...i am sorry how was your stay.The rooms often smell as if it just been shampooed.I stay at this hotel on a weekly bases as my company puts us here and who would know better than me .
Manager Response: Dear Lewis S.  Thank you for your review. Your feedback as well as all our guests feedback is of value to us. We strive to give our guests the best service and along with the location our hotel is a great choice. That is probably why your company contracted the rooms for you and your coworkers so you can enjoy the shopping at South Coast Plaza, the restaurant, area attractions and enjoy the beaches on a beautiful day. The staff and I do hope you will have the opportunity to enjoy all the area attractions and features. Thank you for your feedback and have an enjoyable day.  Cheers, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: I was here on a business trip , but I noticed this hotel is situated a short walking distance to a great shopping mall in LA called South Coast Plaza. people drive miles to get to this pace so I guess I was lucky to stay near by.
Manager Response: Dear JP Band,  Thank you for your review. I am glad you were able to walk to the South Coast Plaza and on a nice day it is a wonderful way to go to see the stores in South Coast Plaza. Our hotel does offer complimentary scheduled shuttles from our hotel to the South Coast Plaza and back in the event you find some great deals and do not want to carry all the bags. The Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa is also conveniently located near Segerstrom Theater, Morton's Steakhouse, Scott's Seafood, Maestro's, Charlie Palmer and several great restaurants. John Wayne Airport (SNA) is also close by and a complimentary shuttle from SNA to the hotel or for your return flight we offer airport shuttles every half hour and on the hour. Thank you for staying with us.  Cheers, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: What's with the oily water supply?
Summary: It's not that the staff was unfriendly. Or the bed was uncomfortable. Or that the hotel is undergoing construction ... well that is annoying, but that will pass.  I won't choose this hotel again for two reasons: the "quiet" side faces a parking lot where people close their cars with their remotes, meaning there are regular toots of car horns. And the odd car alarm.  But the main deal breaker here is one that I've only ever experienced in 1 hotel in London: the water supply feels oily. Not just in my room, cause I tried it in the lobby restrooms. You lather up and then you rinse, and rinse, and rinse, and rinse. The feeling is so oily that it's like the soap is still there. Which I'm sure it isn't. But it's not a very good feeling, especially for a contact lens wearer. Is it just
Manager Response: Dear Nina B.  Thank you for your review and I am delighted to see the staff is great and our beds are comfortable. Along with the location being close to SNA /John Wayne Airport, South Coast Plaza and Segerstrom Performing Arts Center. Our Corner Pantry does sell contact cleaner and solution in the event you need to clean your contacts on any future stay with us.  With regards to the water I am not sure what you are referring to as I myself have not noticed anything; however I will follow up with our Engineering Department to investigate on what you possibly have experienced.  The staff and I are thankful you had the opportunity to stay with us and look forward to your next stay.  Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Excellent location to surrounding areas. We had stayed here twice (2 nights each) in two weeks as we were VERY pleased with the attention to detail. It is a large hotel, yet it still is convenient and quiet. My 10 year old love the "glass elevators" :):) Enjoy!!!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Veronica S.  The Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa certainly does have a great location as it is close to South Coast Plaza, John Wayne Airport (SNA) , Segerstrom Theater , Newport Beach, Balboa Island, Disneyland and Knott's Berry Farm. A great location for business travel and for families alike.  I am happy to hear your 10 year old loved riding in our glass elevators that give you a view of the city and our lobby. Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to write a review.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The hotel made extra effort to make the runners race day effortless.  Shuttle to and from race was a nice touch plus opening the Starbucks at 4:30 AM so it was available before the runners had to leave the hotel.  All that made race day less stressful.
Manager Response: Dear Robin H.  Thank you for your review and it was our pleasure to make your stay special. We always feel so great when we see the responds from our guests that the small details did make a great difference in your time with us. The staff and I look forward to your return sometime soon and sharing another great time at the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa.   Regards, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Stayed for four nights, January 22-25 on a getaway with my adult daughter.  Service was fantastic throughout our stay; staff had all advance requests taken care of.  Enjoyed the executive lounge and floor; breakfast was great every day and we were able to enjoy some of the evening snacks.  Lots of construction going on and I would have appreciated knowing the pool & hot tub would be closed.  Great stay and very good value, too!!
Manager Response: Dear Jason967,  The staff and I would like to personally thank you for sharing your great experience with us. I do apologize that you were not aware of the pool closure for refresh and I would like to thank you for your understanding of the need to refresh and update our hotel. Our Executive Lounge is a great feature for our Hilton Honors Diamond and Gold members to enjoy . Thank you for your review and we hope you will be able to enjoy our hotel again real soon with your family .  Best regard, Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Hilton Costa Mesa is a guest friendly hotel.  Staff work very hard to accommodate all guests. Gym fairly basic, but pool area very nice. Once refurbishments are finished the Business and Lobby area will be very good.
Manager Response: Dear Georgie l.   Thank you for your wonderful comments regarding the friendly and accommodating staff we have here at the beautiful Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa hotel. The Lobby refresh is coming to an end and our Tech Lounge, Corner Pantry and Starbucks are just amazing. We celebrate the Essence of California and our decor really bring that essence forward. The pool is also beautiful with the new blue tiles, new patio areas and I know you will certainly enjoy it all on your next visit to California. Thank you for staying with us.  Regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Stayed here on a business trip for two nights, January 28 and 29. Two associates checked in the day before. They were told the pool was closed and construction was in process (pretty obvious when its going on in the lobby) but none of us were notified before arrival. The jackhammers during the day would make it tough to sleep, so if you are on a schedule and need to rest during daylight hours, best to stay somewhere else until the construction is finished. I was confirmed in a king room, but on arrival was given a room with two queens. I asked, and was told that "it's what you get for the price for the rooms held for your group." Funny, we weren't with a group nor did we have special pricing. The room was large and clean--I did not eat at the restaurant but did get Starbucks
Manager Response: Dear Lisa G.  Thank you for your review, we are extremely grateful so many recent visitors have truly appreciated our efforts and are excited about the vision of a much improved hotel in the not so distant future! The rooms are spacious and soon the Tech Lounge will be open in the Lobby for all our guests to use throughout their stay. The newly tiled pool and the newly refreshed meeting rooms are ready for all the weddings and meeting groups and our guests to enjoy. I hope you will have the opportunity to enjoy all the new features and refreshed areas of our hotel real soon.  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The accommodations were perfect, great room, great service, dog friendly, good location.  The employees were cheerful, helpful and genuinely friendly. I recommend the rooms have a micro-wave, and that a large sand box area be constructed for the dogs to potty so as not to hurt the grass areas.
Manager Response: Dear Ralph S.  We would like to thank you for the great comments and suggestions. The Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa is a pet friendly hotel and we have a "Doggy Potty" with trash bags for easy disposal. Our location is perfect for all dog lovers as we do have many dog friendly restaurants in the beach area. Thank you again for your great comments and we look forward to seeing you real soon.  Best regards,  Yolanda H Guest Service Manager

Summary: I ate a vegetarian ravioli lunch as part of a one day business meeting I attended. Fabulous meal. Everyone else raved too. The service was quiet and efficient. Wait staff stopped and asked often if we needed anything else.
Manager Response: Dear Caroline K.  I am so happy to hear that you had a great conference at our hotel and that everyone raved about the vegetable ravioli. The staff and I strive for great and consistent guest service and we are thankful that we were able share a great experience with you and your colleagues. Thank you for staying with us.  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Hotel was very spacious in common areas and rooms were large.  Extra towels were provided quickly.  Disappointing adjacent room had occupants who partied until early hours in the morning and smoked nightly in a non-smoking facility and were not removed from the property.
Manager Response: Dear sschafe,   The housekeeping staff is delighted to hear their service was great and would like to thank you for mentioning this. The staff and I strive for consistent and great service and any and all feedback  will assist with making our guests experience consistently great.  I apologize for the inconvenience you experienced.; most guests after their first warning do realize the inconvenience they cause. Thank you for your patronage.  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Disgusted with the lack of communication between hotel and guests during ongoing renovations. Jackhammers starting at 0700 in the morning and vibrating through the entire hotel. No prior warning given. Room service closes at midnight.
Manager Response: Dear Martybelly,   I personally would like to apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced during the refresh of several areas of the hotel. We are extremely grateful so many recent visitors have truly appreciated our efforts and are excited about the vision of a much improved hotel in the not so distant future! Along with the great service, our location close to the airport and shopping we are definitely a great hotel to come and stay. We do hope you will have the opportunity to experience all the updated amentiies the next time you are here.  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Great service everywhere.  Staff is well trained, polite and helpful.  We were here for business with a good rate, $135 which included internet and $5 in and out parking.  Not sure if that is a standard rate.  I was unable to upgrade as a group had reserved the upgraded rooms. Our first room was on the 2nd floor and overlooked a rooftop and was only a half window, and very high.  It was a bit claustrophobic because of the window issue, but a nice room.   The first night they didn't have any other rooms but at 1pm the following day, they were able to accommodate us in another room on the 4th floor which had the exact same floor plan as the one we left but a large sunny window and a balcony.  The exercise room was very nice.   Temporary problem:  pool and jacuzzi were emptied and
Manager Response: Dear Petalpalz,  Thank you for sharing some great comments about our staff and the service. We are extremely grateful so many recent visitors have truly appreciated our efforts and are excited about the vision of a much improved hotel in the not so distant future!  Thank you for realizing this and we do hope you will have the opportunity to see the new "Corner Pantry" ; the gift store, the beautiful ballrooms as well as the new "Tech Lounge". We truly are excited that all the necessary daily amenities are at the guests fingertips while staying at our hotel.  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Having a fridge was great but a microwave was needed but not in room. Hotel's location was great, near Newport Beach and freeways. Quiet and clean is what stands out. I would probably stay here again, but a microwave would seal the deal.
Manager Response: Dear Ken O.  Thank you for the 4 Star Review.  The location is close to shopping, SNA Airport, restaurants, many of the major corporations have their offices close by too. So whether you are here for pleasure or business we certainly are the great choice. I am thankful you had a great stay and that you enjoyed having your refridgerator in your room. Thank you for sharing your idea and for giving us the opportunity to be better for all our guests.  Best regards,  Yolanda H. Guest Service Manager

Summary: Everyone we met - from the bellhop and parking crew to all the staff in the restaurants and registration and the ballroom staff - they were so friendly and so helpful with everything.  Always smiling too.  We felt very welcome.
Manager Response: Dear Susan E.B.    The staff and I are so happy to hear that you had a fantastic stay with welcoming service from all departments. Our location is also a plus with being centrally located for shopping at the South Coast Plaza or The Lab, or Newport and Balboa beaches and entertainment at the Segerstrom and great restaurants all around us.  Thank you for taking the time to let us know and for staying with us.   Regards,  Yolanda H.  Guest Service Manager

Summary: This is my 5th year attended a conference at this hotel and it gets better every year. I found the staff very helpful and the rooms clean and comfy.Its close to everything and they have a shuttle that drops you off and picks you up.
Manager Response: Dear Paul L.  I am delighted to see that our service was fantastic and your room was awesome. The free shuttle to South Coast Plaza is a great amenity to enjoy for all our guests. Thank you for having your conference at our hotel and we look forward to your next event. Thank you for taking the time to note our service, rooms and our convenient location.  Best regards,   Yolanda H.  Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Convenient location, comfy, clean and attractive
Summary: I stayed here one night and really enjoyed it.  We flew in late so stayed close to the airport.  There is a restaurant in the hotel and you can get food to your room until midnight.  Clean and nicely decorated.  Parking is $20  a night was the only drawback but I took the shuttle and did not have to park there overnight.  I went back in the morning to pick up my rental car.
Manager Response: Dear Sailing_Sweetie,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review and I would like to thank you for noting the comfortable accomodations we offer. The complimentary shuttles to the South Coast Plaza and John Wayne Airport are both a great added bonus for our guests. Thank you for your comments about the restaurant located in the lobby level, the Bristol Palms restaurant is delighted to have been of service. The proximity to the mall and to the airport along with the hotel amenities does give great options for a overnight stay or long term stay.  Regards,  Yolanda H.

Summary: I would highly recommended this place business or vacationing. Great hospitality and services, rooms are clean and executive lounge are the must. They have excellent breakfast, dinner and beverages at the executive lounge, you can relaxed and watch TV in there nice cozy atmosphere overlooking the city view.
Manager Response: Dear Karen N.  Thank you for recommending the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa and for lettingus know you enjoyed great service and hospitality. Our Executive Lounge is a great benefit and they do offer breakfast every morning with several choices each day such as bacon, scrambled eggs, oatmeal and the like. I am delighted to see you enjoyed the view and possibly you saw a few airplanes taking off from the John Wayne Airport too.  Thank you again for your recommendation and for your review.  Best regards,

Summary: One of the nicest rooms I've experienced. Well decorated, very clean. I had a nice little balcony overlooking the parking garage - not ideal, but I liked the "fresh" air! Their pillows are quite overstuffed so if you like something smaller, I'd recommend that you bring your own.   There is a Starbucks kiosk in the lobby, but service was very slow. There is also a nice restaurant and bar area for meals. Lots of nearby fast food restaurants.This Hilton is 1/2 mile away from the South Coast Plaza shopping mall - a shopper's paradise! Lots of restaurants too! I felt very comfortable walking to the mall, but the hotel does offer a shuttle to there as well  The only complaint I have was the shuttle service from the airport. When I arrived early on a Sunday morning, I called the front
Manager Response: Dear szambal,  Thank you for your feedback. I am happy to read you had a great stay and that you enjoyed your room with the balcony.  Our Starbuck's located in the lobby is a popular spot and they are open daily 5:30 am till 10 p.m.  and they do keep busy. I am sorry about the confusion with our complimentary airport shuttle and  glad that this was resolved by the shuttle staff.  Thank you for your patronage and we look forward to the next time you visit us at the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa.   Best regards,

Summary: We had a great experience and will return in the future.  The hotel was nice and clean and the employees were very friendly and professional.  The room was nice and clean.  Our whole stay was a very pleasant  experience.
Manager Response: Dear Gloria M.  I am delighted to see that you had a great stay at the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa and that you are looking forward to a return visit.  Our hotel has some great staff and the location is great for anyone whom wants to enjoy any of the Southern California attractions such as Disneyland or Knott's Berry Farm. We are also close to South Coast Plaza and our hotel offers complimentary shuttle. Thank you so much for your patronage and we look forward to you staying with us again real soon.  Best regards,

Summary: I needed a place to crash one night and I jumped on Hotwire and found this great place.   The best part about it was the front desk staff. They were both tremendous. You just knew that they loved what they did for a living and they represented Hilton extremely well.   The hotel is a great place to stay as well. Very clean!
Manager Response: Dear Calvenn S.  Thank you for the great compliments for the Front Desk staff and I will certainly share this with them. The Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa is a great location for businessmen such as yourself. We are close to shopping,entertainment or to make use of our Bristol Palms Pizzeria or Bar is also very convenient. Thank you sir for your kind comments and we look forward to your return visit.  Best regards,  Yolanda H.

Summary: This hotel was VERY nice and clean and the staff was nice. I made a reservation on the 800# with special notes that did not get translated to the hotel, so I would suggest you follow up with the hotel directly before your arrival day for any special requests you have, in order to make sure they are aware of them.
Manager Response: Dear TIna P.  The staff and I are delighted to read you had a great experience and stay at the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa.  Thank you for the nice comments regarding the service you received from our staff. I am thankful the Front Desk staff tried to assist with your request and I apologize the reservation desk somehow forgot to enter your request. We would like to thank you for your patronage and look forward to your next visit with us.   Best regards,  Yolanda H.

Summary: Got a great deal with a AAA rate, and really enjoyed our stay here. While it is not an impressive looking building from the outside, it is a nice property, with glass elevators, a large open atrium, and great staff.   The room was nicely appointed, and the bathroom was very modern, with a large shower replacing the small dingy tubs that most hotels have. The bed was comfortable, and the room had everything we'd expect from a Hilton. The only thing that I thought was a negative was the sound of the climate system in the room. It was noisy, regardless of being on/off and made some odd sounds throughout the night. Perhaps it was just our room, and I was tired enough to not let it affect my sleep, but for lighter sleepers, this may have been a problem.  On the executive floor, there
Manager Response: Dear Derek C.  I am so glad you were able to receive a AAA rate and that you stay was enjoyable. yes our Executive Lounge is a great amenity to enjoy with the scrumptious breakfast and early evening appetizers and the view from the Executive Lounge is spectacular. I am delighted to read that you had a great stay overall with great service.  The staff and I are looking forward to your return.   Best regards,  Yolanda H.

Summary: We are currently staying at the Hilton Costa Mesa for 5 days.  This is our 2nd stay here.  The first time we had no issues, this time, however, we have had several.  When we checked the website before staying there they never mentioned that they were undergoing construction in the lobby area.  Some amenities were not available (Starbucks) all the time and it was noisy and smelled like paint.  The tv reception is horrible.  Our tv keeps going to no signal.  They sent someone up to change the cable but that did not help.  They offered to upgrade us on Christmas Eve, however, we were all unpacked and did not have the energy to pack, move, and unpack again.  It is very inconvenient to have to change rooms. Also, apparently the Do Not Disturb sign on the door means nothing as today
Manager Response: Dear Debi B:   On behalf of the staff and myself, I am very sorry your recent experience was not satisfactory. We have made every effort to compensate our guests in every possible manner for any inconvenience they may have experienced during the refresh of several areas of the hotel. We are extremely grateful so many recent visitors have truly appreciated our efforts and are excited about the vision of a much improved hotel in the not so distant future!    Debi B, you bring up several valid points in your commentary and I will follow up each and every one. Once again, I am truly sorry and wish you a Happy New Year!    Sincerely,   Rob A. Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Stayed here as a great base to explore Orange County, Laguna, Balboa, Newport and even San Diego. Had adjoining rooms for our family and the individual rooms were HUGE.  We only paid $99 per room and had a deal with the third night free so it was a great value. We did have to pay for nightly parking as well as a small fee for the adjoining rooms.  It was still worth it. There is a quite a bit around the hotel but the staff was not as familiar with the surroundings as one would hope.  They were all very nice and helpful though so just do your own research. Just to the west of the hotel on Bristol is a great shopping center called "The Camp."  There is a wonderful bakery there called Blackmarket Bakery which is definitely worth a stop.  There are also other food choices right
Manager Response: Dear Renee Florida 27:   Thank you for choosing the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa and for your thorough and thoughtful comments. We've enjoyed having many wonderful guests during the holiday season, with everyone taking full advantage of the tremendous Southern California sunshine we've all been enjoying! On behalf of the staff, your notice of  the many things we're doing right is appreciated. Please be assured, some the things we fell short in have been noted as well.    As we prepare to go forward into 2014 and with our refresh almost concluded, we're proud to show off some of the great new changes and additions we've made here at the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa. We hope you'll come back soon and thank you once again!   Happy New Year!   Sincerely,   Rob A. Gauthier General Manager

Summary Heading: Not as good as it looks. :/
Summary: Online this place looks very pretty and its prices were very good. When we arrived to the hotel the elevators were not working so we had to go down so many stairs. The stair area was very ugly looking very disappointing for a 'Hilton'. We checked in with the front desk, the gentleman helping us was very nice and quick. When we were checking in they tell us the room very initially reserved is available which was a one king size bed room but water was going to be shut down from 10-2pm which is very inconvenient! who doesn't need water??? We were offered a room with two queen size beds. Definitely not what my boyfriend and I were picturing for our special night. We take the room and the whole night there was this buzzing noise that kept waking us up!! Definitely not staying here
Manager Response: Dear Grecia Q:   I apologize for your inconvenience during a recent disruption with some of our services. We have made every attempt to provide our guests with advance notification to minimize any surprises. I am truly sorry we fell short during your stay.    As we strive to make the improvements to our hotel that will continue to set us a part from all other area hotels, some refreshing of each area of the hotel has required some brief deviations in service, but the end result will be impressive I assure you.   Thank you for your patience!   Rob A. Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Nice location; nice lobby and big, clean rooms.  Overall, it was a good value for the money.  There was nothing extraordinary about the staff or even the hotel itself, but nothing there was nothing bad. I would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Janine A:   On behalf of the staff, thank you for taking the time to provide your comments. The Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa offers visitors to Southern California an excellent location with close proximity to Orange County John Wayne Airport, beautiful beaches, the major business corridors in Santa Ana, Irvine, Newport Beach and more; within minutes of a diversity of entertainment and shopping.   We are pleased that our guests are enjoying the extensive changes we've made, maximizing the clean, new and sleek California style visitors enjoy!   Once again thank you for choosing the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa.   Sincerely,   Rob A. Gauthier General Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel and best staff - Michelle & Ben
Summary: This Hilton in Costa Mesa has great rooms, gym, pool, hot tub, and restaurant! Rooms are clean and upscale. Their staff are very knowledgeable, nice, and eager to help. Michelle was extremely patient explaining all the details in the hotel. Ben had gone to great length to accommodate my request. That had made my stay extremely pleasant. Thank you for the staff for this wonderful experience! - Westphal
Manager Response: Dear Bei Y:   Thank you for your great observations and comments! On behalf of the staff, it was a pleasure being your host recently. My appreciation especially for your comments about our staff members.Our employee associates are committed to exceeding our guest's expectations and when it's noticed, we are very thankful.    We look forward to your return and once again, thank you.   Sincerely,   Rob A. Gauthier General Manager

Summary: I recently spent an evening at the Hilton Orange County and I must say it is a typical Hilton.  I stay at Hiltons when ever I travel on business (10+ nights/year) and this is a typical Hilton which is to say very good.  The room was large, clean and nicely appointed.  I had two complaints many might consider minor but annoying.  The first was a charge for internet.  Come on guys,  Motel 6 gives free internet for a $40 room.  Hilton can certainly afford to give free internet access with a $140 room.  The second is the charge for overnight parking.  Way too much to leave a car sitting overnight.
Manager Response: Dear Doug W:   Thank you for being a loyal Hilton guest. On behalf of the staff, your comments are sincerely appreciated. In regards to the internet charges and parking fees, unfortunately as with many hotels of our service level and geographic location, these charges are standard, ours are even lower than most of our direct competitors. We continually evaluate these charges to ensure they are competitive, fair, and accurate and will continue to do so.   Thank you once again.   Rob A. Gauthier General Manager

Summary Heading: Check out staff with attitude can spoil the stay
Summary: The Hilton stay was off to a good start with an upgrade to the Executive Floor for only $19 per night.  The room was large and on the quiet side of the hotel, so thank you!  Easy walk to The Camp for fun meals and quaint shopping.  All in all, the two night business stay was nice, until the check-out fiasco.  My room was prepaid by my company, but the final folio did not acknowledge the pre-payment that was confirmed by phone and upon check-in.  I was met with attitude from the front desk staff when attempting to resolve the matter (still waiting for my credit card charge for the entire stay to be refunded), plus I didn't appreciate that the entire lobby was cordoned off for some "repairs."  A heads-up from management would have been appreciated. Also, a thank-you from the
Manager Response: Dear nubusniesstrvlr:   Thank you for your insight to some of the things you liked and some of the things you did not during your stay. I am very concerned about the accounting issue you experienced during check out. Please call me directly at 714 438 4900.  Sincerely,  Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary Heading: Outstanding service - huge thanks to Trevor
Summary: My wife lost her phone at a social mixer during a conference...go figure. She boarded the plane, tried to call me, realized she lost it and we got in touch with Trevor, who is the hotel manager. Not only did he canvas the lobby, but took my information and made a few rounds afterwards. He found the phone and sent it Overnight (for Saturday delivery even!). Big thanks. We'll be back when we're down south early next year - this time with a chain on her phone.   Hotel is beautiful - perfect for the business trip and get-together. Stayed at the Fairmont as well - you can stay here and still enjoy the same luxury. Service is outstanding.
Manager Response: Dear Jeff Z:   Thank you for taking the time to write your kind comments about the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa and one of our many highly valued associates Trevor! Things happen on busy trips away from home and the fact that we could step up for your wife is indicative of our commitment towards service that goes above and beyond expectation. Trevor represents the service we have become known for and he makes us proud daily!   Whenever visiting the southern part of our beautiful state, we certainly hope you'll choose to return to the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa and enjoy all the hotel and more importantly, the area offers-hospitality, sun and fun, and convenience to the major business corridors of Southern California.   Thank you once again for choosing the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa.   Rob A. Gauthier General Manager

Summary Heading: The place to stay at SNA Airport
Summary: Hilton COSTA MESA has a dependable free shuttle. It is convenient,clean and the staff really cares, the breakfast is very good(get the shredded potatoes vs the chunked) You will also find a variety of restuarants that are close. I like Charles Palmer.
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Thomas G:   Thank you for acknowledging some of our services and our committed, hardworking employee-associates. They strive to provide the highest level of guest service and hospitality and are the reason for our success.  We hope you return soon and thank you once again for choosing the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa!   Sincerely,    Rob A. Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Very attentive and warm staff. We thoroughly enjoyed our visit and look forward to a return visit. We found the staff extraordinary in the care and respect they afforded us. The lady in the club room at breakfast was especially kind and competent.
Manager Response: Dear ojtheukrainian:   Thank you so much for acknowledging our wonderful staff here at the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa. It was our pleasure to be your host and we look forward to your return in the future.   Whether for business or leisure, the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa offers visitors to Southern California a great location with close proximity to everything the area offers-beautiful beaches, a multitude of entertainment options, the business centers of major corporations, as well over 100 major retail stores, all within minutes of Orange County/ John Wayne International Airport..   Sincerely,   Rob A. Gauthier General Manager

Summary: So sorry, Hilton's have always been one of my go to dependible sources for a clean comfortable room.  We checked in very late to our room called down immediately to have them change rooms, undortunately the new room smelled perhaps worse that our original room.
Manager Response: Dear Fred C:   We apologize for your poor perception of the guest room smell. We have had no reports of "smells" before or since so we are befuddled at your comments, but nevertheless, are very sorry.   Possibly a guest in a nearby guest room on the same floor created an unusual odor. Sometimes people bring food into the hotel that may offend others in close proximity.    Once again, we apologize.   Sincerely,   Rob A. Gauthier

Summary: I had a conference in this hotel and stayed there for four nights in November 2013. Both my room and the conference room were very good. There was not cold and not hot. The air conditioning was great. The bed was comfortable and the room was clean. There was everything I needed for breakfast including smocked,  salmon, oatmeal and berries. The staff was very attentive and helpful. I did not rent a car and used the shuttle bus from and to the Santa Anna airport and to the nearest mall. It was very convenient. I would recommend this hotel to my friends and co-workers.
Manager Response: Dear Polina S:   On behalf of the staff and myself, thank you so much for your positive comments. The Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa offers travelers to Southern California close proximity to everything the area offers including shopping, entertainment, beaches, the major business centers in the surrounding areas, and convenience to Orange County John Wayne Airport.    Once again, thank you for choosing the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa.   Sincerely,   Rob A. Gauthier General Manager

Summary Heading: Another great stay at Hilton Orange County/Costa Mesa
Summary: My recent stay here was the second this year and it was all good. The staff are all very friendly and helpful, the room was spacious and comfortable and the food and service were very good. This property is well managed and I look forward to staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Right On the Corner:   Thank you for your continued patronage of the Hilton Orange County/Costa Mesa. On behalf of the staff and myself, we sincerely appreciate your choice to stay at one of Southern California's most enjoyable locations, whether for fun in sun at one of the beautiful nearby beaches, doing business in one of the many corporate headquarters throughout the area, or shopping in over 100 top name stores across the road, the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa has become the first choice for travelers visiting the area.   Sincerely,   Rob A. Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Nice rooms with extremely comfortable beds and lovely linens.  Had a lot of "no signal" moments with the tv and the tub wouldn't hold water long so enjoying a soak in the tub didn't work too well.  The jacuzzi at the pool area either ran too hot or cool.  Others made similar comments.   There wasn't anywhere to buy a pop, water, snack, etc., after the coffee stand closed around noon and it had an extremely limited selection.  No concierge.
Manager Response: Dear Judy 104:   I am sincerely apologetic that some of the issues you mentioned occurred. I am aware that having our Starbucks close at noon presented inconvenience to our guests and recently instituted new, longer hours of operation as well as an expanded menu of available items.  Unfortunately, temperatures in our whirlpool is a per guest preference and is not always to each guest's personal liking (some like it really hot while others prefer cooler temps). Concerns can be addressed remotely when we are made aware of requests. I apologize that you did not have your personal preferences addressed. As far as concierge service, we offer a journey ambassador located throughout the hotel to assist guests with a wide range of requests and questions.  Once again, I apologize on behalf of the entire hotel that your experience was not the typical excellent experience we are known for.   Sincerely,   Rob A. Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Two days after a 37 hour return trip from Kruger I had a business dinner in Costa Mesa.  Rather than face a long drive home I got a room at the Hilton.  It was horrible!  The room smelled of smoke, my Hilton profile clearly states to place me well away from the elevator (this was right across), and during check-in there was nobody near the Honors area so We waited while some airline emp took forever to sort out his reservation.  Never again!  I left.
Manager Response: Dear Roadtri:   I am truly sorry your experience after such a long trip was unacceptable. Since we do not allow smoking in the building, I am shocked you smelled "smoke" and will research your comment further for immediate action. On behalf of the staff, we strive to provide the highest level of service to all guests and when we fall short, we are truly disappointed. Clearly, you did not have your expectations met and I apologize. Best wishes for your future travels!   Sincerely,   Rob A. Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Nice, well maintained property.  Professional and courteous staff. If you have Executive Lounge access, it is nicely appointed and offers a decent breakfast, light appetizers/snacks from 5-7p and munchies until 9 p.m. The fitness center is one of the better hotel ones I've been to in the area, good size and numerous aerobic machines to use. Rooms are fine - nothing spectacular, the balconies are a nice touch and the ability to open the sliding glass door and let fresh air in is great. I would definitely stay here again and it would probably be my 1st choice among the other Hilton brands in the area.
Manager Response: Dear rafa d:   Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay. On behalf of our staff, it was a pleasure being your host and we sincerely look forward to your return.   Whether for business or a quick get-a-way, the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa is a great choice for the discerning traveler with close proximity to all Southern California offers in terms of corporate headquarters, shopping, fun in the sun at one of the area's many beautiful beaches, and entertainment venues galore!   Once again, thank you for choosing the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa.   Sincerely,   Rob A. Gauthier General Manager

Summary Heading: A Hilton like they all used to be
Summary: Very nice Hilton for business, classy well kept hotel like so many Hiltons used to be.  On a main street but very quite, close to business area and mall.  Service car was excellent we used it several times for local travel.
Manager Response: Dear PHG2008:   Thank you for your great comments about the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa. On behalf of the staff, it was our pleasure to be your host.   Sincerely,    Rob A. Gauthier General Manager

Summary: I stayed here with my family for a few days (would have extended longer if the customer service wasn't so poor) and had nothing but bad service as soon as we pulled up.   We had waited over 20 minutes just for a luggage cart which I understand they were in use, but once one became available, instead of giving it to us after waiting for so long, it was given to a person that had just pulled up and didn't have to wait any but 5 minutes. When I checked in, the front desk agent was an extremely rude gentleman with a poor attitutde. The room itself was very clean, but when we asked for a cot/rollaway bed, the front desk refused to send one up forcing one of my family members to sleep on the floor, which is unacceptable. Then the tv would not work, it kept freezing every other minute,
Manager Response: Dear Bdz3:   I am extremely apologetic that our service did not meet your expectation during your recent stay. I am investigating your concerns and invite you to contact me directly at the hotel (call 1-714-540-7000 and request the General Manager, Rob Gauthier) so we can discuss your comments.   The staff of the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa have been recognized for their commitment to not only meet the expectations of our guests, but consistently exceeding those expectations. When there is a failure to do so, it is very disappointing. Thank you for letting us know and once again, my apologies for your experience.   Sincerely,    Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights. The rooms are basic and clean. We had breakfast and for all the days we were staying as part of a package. Breakfast was basic with not so much variety.  But if you get sick of it, you can walk to McDonald's next door. Hotel is about 15to 20 minutes walk to South Coast Plaza, a very huge mall with lots of shops and restaurants. The staffs are all very friendly and helpful. Their service and attitude is much better than other hotels I have stayed in.
Manager Response: Dear cckkash:   On behalf of our wonderful staff here at the Hilton Costa Mesa Orange County thank you for noticing our hard work and commitment to guest service, as well as our convenient location, close to everything the area offers.   Whether enjoying the concierge level with a well rounded breakfast (and evening cocktails and hot and cold snacks) or the Bristol Palms restaurant with an expansive breakfast buffet plus menu, as well as 24 hour room service and a Starbucks right in the lobby, we offer something for everyone to start their day.    Whether for business or for leisure, the Hilton Costa Mesa Orange County is quickly becoming the #1 choice for Southern California visitors!   Sincerely,   Rob A. Gauthier General Manager

Summary: In the are on business this hotel was conveniently located right next to the OC airport.  Airport noise was not an issue however.  The hotel staff was courteous and friendly too.   We ate at the hotel the first night and I thought the food was very good and the bar was a great place to watch a game after dinner meetings.
Manager Response: Dear Joe S.:   Thank you for your comments. On behalf of the staff, we sincerely appreciate the opportunity to be your host. We were  happy to hear you enjoyed the Bristol Palms restaurant.  With all the new and delicious California fresh entrees and offerings, we are enjoying lots of enthusiastic feedback from our guests.   Our great location, near everything the area offers including shopping, the major business centers of Orange County, the airport, and the most beautiful beaches in Southern California, the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa is truly the best choice!   Sincerely,   Rob A. Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Not exceptional.  Does not make me want to go again to a Hilton Hotel.  Food was average at best. The sheets were very clean but not very soft.  The noise of the joining room sliding closet door was a bit annoying. For a smoke free hotel I found that I could not open the sliding door on the 4th floor without being accosted by a heavy dose of cigarette smoke.  The staff were very nice and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Trip Advisor Member:   On behalf of the staff, we are sorry you did not enjoy your recent stay. As a consistent choices for hotel accommodations as rated by Southern California visitors over and over again, we strive to exceed expectation. We are disappointed we failed during your stay, but hope you will give us another opportunity in the future.   Thank you.   Rob A. Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Had a good stay in Costa Mesa but the thing that stood out to me was the great service by staff. Ben at the front desk went above and beyond to meet my complicated needs with a hotel room and, in doing so, exceeded my expectations for service. Very grateful for how kind he was and how helpful. Maricela at the Starbucks counter in the lobby was energetic and engaging to all customers... she even remembered the orders of people staying in the hotel for a few days!
Manager Response: Dear Mrs. C.:   Thank you so very much for your positive comments about our hardworking staff. We strive to go above and beyond and are pleased you had an enjoyable experience during your recent stay.    The Hilton Costa Mesa Orange County offers close proximity to everything Southern California offers including South Coast Plaza's impressive shopping, a wide range of nearby entertainment venues including golf and tennis, John Wayne Orange County Airport, the major business complexes in Costa Mesa, Irvine, Santa Ana, and Newport Beach, as well as some of the most beautiful beaches in the state!   Once again thank you choosing the Hilton Costa Mesa Orange County.   Sincerely,   Rob A. Gauthier General Manager

Summary Heading: Really nice touches, especially for women
Summary: Had not stayed in a Hilton in the last 20 years unless I couldn't avoid it as I had a couple of pretty experiences. My friend organized a girls' weekend for our reunion at this hotel. I almost booked down the street at the Starwood property but didn't want to miss out on the fun. Lovely hotel, super comfy beds, very quiet guest rooms, great customer service, and a lot of nice details that make for a comfortable stay.  I loved that every lamp had an electrical plug in the base so it was easy to find plugs to charge my devices. I loved that there was a makeup mirror in the bathroom. I loved that there was a refrigerator in the room and I didn't have to ask for a blow dryer, and it was a good one. there was ok in-room coffee with entry of creamer, one of my per peeves with normal
Manager Response: Dear loudentnr:   On behalf of the staff, thank you for giving the Hilton Costa Mesa Orange County an opportunity to be your host. We're pleased you enjoyed the hotel amenities, the service, and our spacious, newly upgraded guest rooms. The next time you stay with us, you'll find the convenient in-room guest safe in the dresser drawer, along with even more great changes throughout the hotel including a state of art tech lounge, an exciting new breakfast buffet and lots of fresh California menu items added to the Bristol Palms restaurant, as well as the 24 hour in-room dining menu.   The Hilton Costa Mesa Orange County is a perfect choice, whether for business or leisure with our great location near so much Southern California offers visitors - entertainment, major business centers, 100's of shopping choices, and beautiful beaches!   Once again, thank you!   Sincerely,   Rob A. Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Rooms need some updating.  Get rid of mildew in Bathrooms. Maybe up date furniture or fix it.  Set up a special desk identification for the concierge desk.    Restaurant food, choices, & service was excellent & relaxing.
Manager Response: Dear Renkogold:   I am so sorry you had a less than excellent experience recently. Since we recently completed an extensive redo of all guest accommodations I am surprised to hear they were not to your liking, especially given our high ranking with so many guests across the board.   I understand that frequent travelers have high expectations and a lot to compare our hotel to. I will certainly look into your concerns. As a frequent traveler myself, I understand the disappointment when one is flying and the cleanliness of the airplane or the service is poor and how frustrating that is.   We will have to do better. Thank you for your comments.   Sincerely,   Rob A Gauthier General Manage

Summary Heading: Outdated and a little out of the way if you have no car!
Summary: From the outside the hotel appears impressive. On entry the lobby is quite big however nothing out of the ordinary. Staff are helpful and always available. Despite there being a number of elevators when hotel is busy it can take 10-15 minutes to get a lift. Rooms are big with comfortable amenities however the bathrooms are in need of renovation. Pillows are plentiful but of poor quality with no good neck/head support. Pool and spa area not very big but adequate. Health club is reasonably small with only 1 exercise bike with most other equipment being step or walk/running machines. Room provided coffee machine is very ordinary and tastes like detergent. To top it off Starbucks is only open for half the day. A McDonalds can be found opposite hotel with a number of restaurants
Manager Response: Dear Shudjan:   Thank you for taking time from your busy schedule to comment on the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa. I can tell from your comments that you are a discerning traveler and due to your frequent stays in hotels, have high expectations. I will certainly take all your constructive criticisms in consideration to improve our level of service.   Once again, thank you for choosing Hilton Hotels.   Sincerely,   Rob A. Gauthier  General Manager

Summary: Hotel has a dirty lobby that looks like they have not dusty in years.  If you want to use the Fitness Center, make sure to tell the front desk when you check in.   Otherwise, Executive Lounge ammenities and service was excellent and housecleaning staff were responsive to our needs.
Manager Response: Dear Reuben J:   I appreciate your comments and will immediately follow up. I'm unsure to the time period in which you stayed with us, but due to some upgrades we made recently to our lobby tile, possibly we missed some residual dust. I sincerely apologize for presenting less than the best to you during your stay. I can assure you our reputation here at the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa is that of a clean, comfortable hotel with well appointed guest accommodations, excellent service, and a great location. I'm disappointed that was not the image you experienced.   Thank you for choosing the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa.   Sincerely,   Rob A. Gauthier General Manager

Summary: I've stayed at this hotel a handful of times. It's nice but nothing special. The rooms are fine. The location is fine. The on site restaurants are fine. Their just isn't anything special about this hotel. I'm actually switching to another Hilton property nearby. Not for any poor service but just for consistently average service.
Manager Response: Dear JW:   We're so sorry we've failed to impress you here at the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa. Having completed an extensive project upgrading our guest accommodations and having made numerous changes in other areas as well, including in key service areas and with more great changes coming in the near future, I am disappointed to hear we won't be your first choice in Southern California.    As one of the top rated Hilton Hotels for service, we strive to provide the best amenities, spacious upgraded accommodations, with an excellent location near all the area offers-gorgeous beaches, major business complexes, a wide range of shopping, entertainment, and more.   I hope you will give us another try in the future.   Best wishes,   Rob A. Gauthier

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, several restaurants in walking distance
Summary: Stayed here for three nights for business workshop in early September. Hotel has good atmosphere, rooms are good, though mine did not have a balcony (most do). Parking in the multi-storey at the back was easy. Did not use any of the pool / leisure facilities so can't comment on these. Only negative comment was that breakfast was horrendously expensive, so I avoided it and stocked up on coffee and Danish during the workshop breaks.
Manager Response: Dear True_Briton:   Thank you for your comments. It was a pleasure to be your host recently; we're so glad you enjoyed your stay in Southern California.   We've completed some exciting changes here at the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa, including many upgrades to our guest accommodations and throughout the hotel. Our Bristol Palms restaurant offers a wide range of fresh breakfast menu selections, as well as an expansive buffet featuring everything from hot and cold cereals, juices, breakfast breads and bagels, and a delicious array of hot entrees and offerings. There is truly something for everyone, with many budget conscious items included.    The Hilton also offers a Starbucks with many healthy and delicious snacks and 24 hour room service is a great convenience for in-room dining.   Once again, thank you for choosing the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa.   Sincerely,   Rob Gauthier General Manager

Summary Heading: Orange County is a good place to stay
Summary: Was in Southern California for a training, and I enjoyed my stay at this Hilton.   I really found the outdoor pool to be a wonderful place to relax and exercise.   In addition, the executive lounge had delicious hors d'oeuvres in the evening and breakfast in the morning.
Manager Response: Dear Randi C:   Thank you for your comments and for choosing the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa. On behalf of the staff, it was a pleasure to be your host; we are pleased to hear you enjoyed just a few of the many amenities we extend our guests including the beautiful new Executive Lounge, with its array of delicious breakfast offerings and evening snacks and beverages. We're making every effort to ensure the upgrades here at the Hilton that create enjoyment, invigorate and enliven our guest and their stays.   Once again, thank you!   Rob A. Gauthier General Manager

Summary Heading: Love swimming pool, but so-so fitness.
Summary: Very nice and warm pool & spa even though they are outside.  However, fitness room has got to be bigger and has got to have more machines.  Excellent location from the airport, beaches, restaurants and bars, while the rate is high side.
Manager Response: Dear Masayuki S:   On behalf of the staff, we are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay, especially our big beautiful outdoor pool.....perfect for the unbeatable Southern California sunshine.  During your next visit, you will notice even more great changes we have planned for the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa. As you noted, our location is ideal, near not only the Orange County John Wayne Airport, but the outstanding shopping, entertainment venues, and gorgeous beaches within minutes of the hotel.   Thank you once again for choosing the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa.   Sincerely,   Rob A. Gauthier General Manager

Summary: This is a very nice hotel with very nice common areas and a great VIP progam. I enjoyed the VIP lounge which was comfortable for breakfast or relaxing in the evening. It is close to the Orange County airport, shopping and the freeway. Overall, very convenient.
Manager Response: Dear Bradley F:   Thank you for your comments about the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa. I'm so glad to hear you enjoyed just a few of the amenities we provide our guests, including our concierge lounge where upscale California Contemporary meets personalized guest focus, a wide selection of breakfast items in the am and snack and hors d'oeuvres in the evening. The completion of a recent refresh of all of our spacious guest rooms provides visitors well appointed accommodations, complimented by delicious California cuisine in the Bristol Palms restaurant or served by 24 hour room service.    A perfect location, with close proximity to the nearby major business corridors of Costa Mesa, Irvine, Santa Ana, and Newport Beach, down the street from the best shopping and beautiful beaches in Southern California makes the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa the best choice, whether for business or leisure travel needs.   Thank you once again for choosing the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa.   Sincerely,   Rob A. Gauthier

Summary: A special thanks to Alexander for going to the trouble of finding out somewhere I could store my bags at LAX, and even writing up and giving me price comparisons of the best ways to get back into LA from the airport for my last day here - and even his phone number (on his day off) if I got stuck! He was really kind and helpful, a lovely note to end my stay on. Thanks!
Manager Response: Dear kiwitraveller41:   On behalf of Alexander and the entire staff, thank you for choosing the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa. We strive to extend every courtesy and assistance that ensures our guests feel they received the personalized attention that completes their stay in Southern California.    I will insure that Alexander is recognized for his assistance during your stay. With a great staff, spacious, well appointed accommodations,  and close proximity to everything Southern California offers, we're the best choice for business and leisure travelers. Thank you once again for your comments and for choosing the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa.   Sincerely,    Rob A. Gauthier General Manager

Summary: I stayed at this Hilton for a retired teachers workshop.  I found the accommodations very pleasant.  The staff was very courteous and friendly.  The room as clean and well appointed.  The meeting rooms were well prepared and offered all of the services necessary.  Overall, it was an excellent stay.
Manager Response: Dear Richg95340:   On behalf of the staff, thank you for choosing the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa; it was our pleasure to be your host during the recent workshop.    We continue to strive to provide the best in spacious accommodations, services, and guest amenities in one of the best locations in Orange County.   Thank you once again.   Rob A. Gauthier General Manager

Summary: I stayed at this Hilton for a business trip and everything was perfect. Great staff. The shuttle even drove me to a restaurant and Best Buy because I forgot my charger. The room was clean and I the bed was very comfortable also in an excellent location. Highly recommend it!
Manager Response: Dear Luz L:   Thank you for your kind remarks about the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa and our terrific staff. They are the most essential resource of the hotel and elevate the services, amenities, and accommodations we are being praised for as a Orange County destination. Close to everything the area offers- great shopping, beautiful beaches, the major business corridors of Costa Mesa, Irvine, Newport Beach, as well a multitude of entertainment venues, the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa is a perfect choice for travelers, whether for business or leisure!   Sincerely,   Rob A. Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Great Hotel the staff go way above and beyond what is called for. the pool was very enjoyable. the hotel was very clean and well kept. The staff were very helpful at the pool area and extra blankets. This made my trip very enjoyable and worry free so that I could enjoy the trip I came for.
Manager Response: Dear Sierra B:   Thank you for choosing the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa! On behalf of the entire staff, we are so happy to hear you enjoyed the hotel and the personalized service we provided. Whether for business or for leisure, the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa offers well appointed and spacious accommodations and a long list of services for our guests' enjoyment. With its convenience to everything the area offers-shopping, beautiful beaches, John Wayne Orange County Airport, a wide range of entertainment venues, and all the major business centers throughout Costa Mesa, Newport Beach, Santa Ana, Tustin, Irvine, the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa is Southern California's best choice for the discerning traveler!   Sincerely,   Rob A. Gauthier General Manager

Summary: I have stayed many nights at the great property.  The staff, accommodations are really super.  Food is excellent and a wide variety of chose.  Sales team for working with event planning as good as it gets.  Recommend Highly!!
Manager Response: Dear Gordon N:   Thank you your comments; on behalf of all of us here at the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa, it was a pleasure to be your host. We especially appreciated your remarks about our spacious, well appointed guest rooms. We're making special efforts to provide our guests with the best in food selections, amenities, guest services, and beautiful accommodations.    Also, your positive acknowledgement of our great sales team is very gratifying.  Whether for business or for leisure, the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa is the best choice in Southern California!     Sincerely,   Rob A. Gauthier General Manager

Summary: Stayed here here for one Friday night with two teenaged children during a summer vacation to the greater LA area. Very large business hotel, front staff were extremely helpful, room was two double beds, spacious and clean. Parking is 19 dollars a night and is a 10 minute walk to the South Coast Plaza Mall. Rate was very reasonable for this type of Hilton. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Gaber837:   Thank you for your compliments regarding our staff, spacious accommodations, and close proximity to not only the greatest shopping in Orange County, but a wide range of entertainment options, the most beautiful beaches in Southern California, and more!   The Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa strives each day to exceed the expectations of our guests and along with the numerous upgrades completed throughout the hotel, more and more travelers are taking notice that we're the best choice for Southern California visitors, whether for business or for leisure.   Once again, thank you for your review!   Sincerely,   Rob A. Gauthier General Manager

Summary: The lack of tourist or areas of interest flyers in the lobby kind of surprised me. When I asked the concierge he almost seemed offended like the Hilton was above the Hollywood tourist thing. We really wanted or needed information on simple things like where is the beach or is the zoo nice. Things we ended up researching on the internet. The price for the internet was surprisingly high especially having to pay for each device and not just the service per room. With four internet devices even at a discounted rate was $40.00 a day.   Parking was very nice the ramp was convenient,  clean and secure. My wife and I where there for the Yellow Ribbon event and after the event we continued our stay into the next week. I was thankful the Hilton gave us the discounted military rate for the
Manager Response: Dear Joseph M:   I am sincerely sorry you were disappointed in your stay here at the Hilton Orange County Costa Mesa. We greatly enjoyed having your group here at the hotel and received many compliments.
